rngubs mug shag ka dun gu ru nr-i dza hur thums dza/ srog la yaM shag hri myag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya nr-i ya/ breng shag hur yaM rbad/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta nr-i hur thums dza/ srog la mA ra ya rbad/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta yaM

shag nr-i hur thums dza/ kha srog thun rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la dun nr-i tsit+ta dza srog ma ra ya rbad/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta yaM hur thums dza/ srog breng shag mA ra ya rbad/ spu gri nyid so so'i sgo nas brdeg pa'o// de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ spyi dril la brdeg pa'i sbyor ba dam pa 'di gsungs so/ khyad par dmar len drag po yi// rang gshed dril la dbab pa'i las// brda don thabs kyis dril ba'i mchog/ ba dang 'o ma zho
dang mar// zhun mar snum gyi snying po bcud// snying po'i sbyor ba bsad pa mchog/ g.yeng min brtan par grol dbang bcas// stobs ldan sbyor ba'i snying phyung 'di// gang mthun rgyu la gzugs brnyan

bya// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyad// gdugs byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// srid pa'i khyams khang drod sdud bca'/ khyams khang lto na brnag pa'i gzugs// spyi gtsug snying gar mtshon cha bca'// mu khyud

bzhi dag ming rus bri// phyi ris rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu gnyis spu gri mtshon// rtsa ba spu gri'i bar na khyams// chu srin khang pa mu khyud zlum// lto sbyor nang la phas kyi phyi// mu khyud bar du ming rus
khams// bskul zhing lus la za kha dbab// rus sbal lto ba'i phyogs mtshams las// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtse mo nang// gsad pa pho mo'i spu gris gang// 'khrul mig bar khyams ming rus gang// don gnyis

bsdus la sbyor ba brtsam// kha sbyor dug khrag tsha ba nad// sme ba dang bcas thod pa dong// rgyu rten ling+ga'i gzhi bca' ming// rus khams nag pa rten du bzhag/ zhal gyi thun dbab rten la bstim// zhag gsum khri

bzhi sgra spang bya// drag sngags 'od zer rang shug 'phro// sha za gsod byed pho nya bskul// kun gyi ye shes 'od 'phro las// rang rgyud rtsa ba'i 'khor lo las// snying gi rtsa bzhi dwangs ma na// rtsa ba'i 'bru brgyad rnal

ma'i gnas// rtsa bran brgyad dang su la bzhin// drag po rtsa ba'i 'bru bcu gnyis// rtsa mdud rang gshed 'bru bcu bzhi// lte bar bcas pa'i snying po gsum// de las rang bdud gshed la bslang// gnas pa'i yi
ge 'di lta ste// tsit+ta dbus kyi si ra la// dmar nag ya gnyis dbus na ni// me chu las kyi 'khrul mig skyon// dwangs ma bzhi yi si ra la// chos nyid rtsa la e dang myags// me long ye shes gsal ba'i
'od// gnas pa'i srog rten gso zhing 'joms// bskul na rang srog rtsa sbub gcod// rten dang bag chag dwangs snyigs 'byed// de bzhin yon tan me khams la// ya rngubs gnas pa srog rten 'joms// mnyam

pa nyid kyi brkam chags 'joms// gnyis las bde khrid nad rlangs bskyed// ye shes si ra dwangs ma chu// mug dang shag gnas sdud cing skyom// stong pa'i ye shes rang gnas 'joms/ khrag dang tsha ba dmu chu
bskyed// rang rgyud si ra dwangs ma rlung// bag chags 'phel 'grib 'phen dang phul// ka dang dun gnas rlung nad bskyed// bya ba'i ye shes bskyod bdud 'joms// las ni rnam shes dngas ma 'degs// de
bskul de 'od de mtshon chas// de gcod de nyid bsreg cing skems// de las de byung rtsa mdud bskul// mdud pa bzhi la mtshon cha'i 'bru// bzhi gnyis gsum gnyis bsnol mar gnas// chos nyid
mdud dang srog las ni// de bzhin rang rgyud hur thums dza// yon tan mdud pa byang brag snying thugs gnas// ye shes rim dang shag dang rbad// rang 'dod me dang mtshon char 'char// de yis de

bcad bag chags bsreg/ rtsa bran brgyad dang sul bzhi la// 'od zer 'phro zhing thim phog pas// nad dang mtshon chas rang sngags bskul// rang gshed bdud kyi mtshon char 'bebs// ye shes klong du thig ler
'du// bag chags khrag khol me mar gsod// kun 'dus dkar nag mtshams su thim// hur thuM dzaHyis nr-i phrogs nas// gzugs brnyan grogs kyi 'khor lo 'phro// srid pa'i khyams khang rten la sdud// de
yis rang gshed rang la 'bebs// tshe dril nag po'i dug mda' yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gcig tu dril ba'i drag sngags bsnol ma bton to// e myags ya rngubs

mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM dza/ rtsa khrag snying thums ril raM shag rbad/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la hur thums rbad/ de dag sbyor ba dam pa yin/ snang snang ma yin dril las

brdeg/ mnan pa gdug pa'i klu la gtad// de yis las de ma smin na// srid pa sngags kyi 'byung ba dkrug/ mnan pa gnyan dang dkyil 'khor 'og/ 'khor lo dug shing bsnol du gzhug/ srog thuM ril nr-i dza/ raM

snying baM la thun shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog breng thums tsit+ta shag tur dza la rbad/ las kyis rgyal po 'phyong chen yin/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gzir zhing mnan pa'i

sngags 'di bton no// dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM dza tsit+ta gzir nan srog s+t+wam b+ha ya nan/ dgra bo'i srog la thuM ril li li b+h+yo/ 'di des las gsum rdzogs par byed// rang gshed dril ba'i sbyor bar
bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srog len gsang ba'i dug mda' khong du bskyal ba'i sbyor
ba 'di gsungs so// las rnams kun gyi mchog bsdus pa// rtsa ba gcig tu dril ba yin// las kyi gnad dang bskyod pa'i thabs// bar mtshams sbyor ba kun dang ldan// ri nag dur khrod dme gri

mnol// g.yul bkye sa chu dug rlangs la// stegs bu hom khung thod pa 'thol/ khrag sna dug sna ling+ga ming// bcas la mthing kha dring mos dgab// rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dang// thal chen mnol khrag nyung
dkar thun// gsal gsum thun sngags dgu skor brdeg/ thun brlab sha za mtshon char gsal// 'od kyis lus bsdus thun la thim/ khrag khol dug rlangs khengs shing 'chol// zor bskyod bsrung ba'i go cha
dral// lus dang sha rus de bzhin dbral// tsit+ta'i sgo phye sgo dgur 'jug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// las kyi rim pa gsum yin te// rnal ma
bzlog dang lto dkrug gsum// dang po tsha gsum sngo sna gsum// tsha ba gsum dang ha la lnga// gzugs brnyan sor bzhi sngags kyis dril// mon thod nang du brun gsum bstim/ khri tsho brgyad du dril la
dbab// dmigs pa'i yul dang bsrung ba brnag/ des ma phebs na sbyor ba bzlog/ dmigs pa'i yul nas gzugs blangs la// tsha ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gsum// bskus la gzugs brnyan bar du
gzhug/ brun gsum 'bru gsum mon thod bstim// dug shing rdzas rgod brgyad kyis bdug/ dmigs pa'i rten la gzir bar bya// des ma phebs na sbyor ba gzhan// dug dang mnol khrag sbal pa gnyis// bag
zan bsres la sor bzhi'i tshad// gnyis byas bar du gson ma gzhug/ lcags phur khri bzhi dril zhing gzir// mtha' ru yul dbus chu mig dkrug/ rdzas rgod brgyad kyi dud pas bdug/ gsal bar khyad par
zil gnon rtag/ chu rgod 'khyags pa ri ltar gtibs// dam pa'i sbyor ba drag sngags brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton no// e myags ya rngubs

mug shag ka dun/ phroM shan nug bur ya ma hril b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hril ya ma hur ri shar shar phroM thun/ dgra bo'i snying gzer hril yaM phu hur/ thums dza/ shar b+h+yo drag tu phob/ gsang ba snying gi dkyil du gzung// las kyi
mchog chen nag por gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brnag pa mngon du 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i sbyor ba gsang bcud gab sbas mchog rang la rang chas gab bzhin

gsang// sbyor ba rim pa lnga dang ldan// rtsa ba'i rgyal po rtsa ba gsum// bse bya'i sha dang bse zho mkhris// ma bsrungs zhe sdang lus las bsdu// bdun khri'i mtha' ru yul dang sprad// nam mkha' bar snang sa

la gsum// mal lam ya tham ma them la// bsku zhing rbad pas sbyor ba 'du// sbyor ba lo'am dus na smin// 'greng dang rkang bzhi'i lus la bsku// sbyor bas zla ba dus na smin// gar bsgyur gsar pa'i sha la

sbyar// gu h+ya tsit+ta so ma ha// de bzhin gnyen po stobs dpag med// ga pur skyer chu kha ru tsha// zil pa shugs drangs rdo rje'i chu// yungs kar khan+da drug bsres la// sngags kyi rgyal po khri gsum bstim// lus la

bsdus te 'thungs pas 'joms// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton no// hur yaM tsa ma ri thuM/ tsit+ta khas mra ra rbad/ e baM raM tal tsam ri phyung/
hur thuM dz+wa la raM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba smin pa'i don 'di gsungs so// bsrung dang bsad pa lo tog gzhom// bstan pa che la gnyan phyir sngags// bslu ba'i bag chags gnas
sbyangs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi bde ba thob// dbugs kyi rtar bskyon rkyen byas nas// srog bdud rang gshed rgyud las slong// sangs rgyas dgongs don yongs su dag/ gsang lam sgo dgu'i rten bsregs

nas/ dwangs gnyis shes pa 'bru gnyis sdud// bde ba'i ye shes thig le mnyam// dwangs ma mkha' dbyings bde lam bgrod// sku lnga ye shes lnga ru smin// kun tu bzang po'i bde chen gnas// phung po sgyu ma'i

gnas sbyangs nas// mtshan dang dpe byad longs spyod skur// lhun grub ye shes sku ru rdzogs// bag chags las dbang 'gro ba drug/ 'bru sdebs rten sbyangs tsa na'i 'bru// tsit+ta dkar nag sdig sbal rkyen// thun

sbal lcags ltar 'khol zhing zhu// 'bru gsum gnad kyis 'phrog byed cing// seng ge'i sder bzhin bzung na 'jog/ rang dbang med par rten la bsdu// thod pa'i ling+ga khyams khang gling// gsang mdzod gnas su
'chang zhing bsreg/ spogs pa med par las rnams 'joms// drag sngags dmod pa zor la bskyon// dgu dkor dmod la yang sngags sdebs// de yis 'pho thob bkod pa smin// srog med gsad dang gcad du
med// srog med skyes bu'i log rtog tsam// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// srog tu 'dzin pa 'khrul pa ste// bde ba'i gnas las ring bar 'gyur// dus gsum sangs

rgyas thugs rjes kyang// byang chub sems la dpyad du med// sems de ma skyes stong bdag med// stong pa nyid ni 'byung gnas pa// rten dang rten med rang grol ba// 'dod pa chen pos ye sangs rgyas// zhe sdang

rnam dag mngon sangs rgyas// phrag dog dbang rdzogs der sangs rgyas// gti mug thig le spros med rgyas// nga rgyal mngon pa'i bde chen rgyas// sku lnga lam lnga spang bya lnga// mgo zlum rang rgyal sems dpa'

dang// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor grags// sku lnga bde ba'i ye shes lnga// bskyed dang rdzogs dang chen po'i ngang// bde chen sangs rgyas phug pa rkyang// rang sngags dang bcas rten la 'pho// 'gyur ba med pa'i sbyor

ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las thun sngags drag po 'di bton no// e myags la rngubs mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i srog la thun b+h+yo/ nr-i ra dza yaM raM shag tsit+ta rbad/

dgra bo'i srog la hur yaM thuM ri li li b+h+yo/ drag po sngags kyis sbyor ba'i mchog/ dug mda' khong du bskyal bar bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ sngags kyi yon tan rdzogs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan rang rgyud kyi 'khor lo 'di gsungs so// nyams dga' dben pa'i bde gnas su// bde ba'i gnas la bde ba'i mchog/ bde ba
chen po'i don nyid las// bde ba'i ye shes rang gsal brtag/ yi ge sgra bcas smin par gzungs// sgra nyid don dam snyan par grags// yi ge'i 'khor lo bdag nyid rdzogs// brda' don sprad pa'i gdams ngag
yin// sku nyid phyag rgya brtan gsal la// spyi bo sum cu rtsa gnyis mdzes// bde ba chen po ha nyid dbus// oM dang gab pa'i rtsa ba bcu// bshig pa lnga dang ya yis gang// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad
dbus// a dang rtsa ba bcu gnyis pa// 'dab brgyad sul bzhi gang bar mdzes// dwangs ma bzhi yi rtsa sbubs na// dmar len 'bru brgyad bcu gnyis gang// lte ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la// mgo dgu'i rtsa ba bcu

drug dang// drug po gnod ser drug cu gcig/ 'bru gnyis gnas mthun lto sbyor ba// me rlung 'khor lo bsad dang bskor// rgya gram dag dang rtsibs drug pa// yaM raM dbus nyid bag chag drug/ rtsa gsum srog shing

bde chen las// rkyen gyis sbyor na gang zhig 'bar// tsit+ta'i steng na thig le hUM// kun gyi byed pa bskul zhing 'phro// yaM las ye shes bde ba brod// bde ba lus la 'bar zhing gang// bag chags sa bon drug

bsreg nas// gyen du 'bar zhing phyag rgyar gsal// bde chen hUM las bde ba'i rgyun// bskul zhing spyod pas zhu zhing 'bar// yum yang rtog med de bzhin nyid// gsang lam khrus byas dgram bkram la// rtsa lam
'od 'phro bag chags sbyongs// b+ha ga'i gnas su pho brang btab// rang gi bde ba dbab cing bskyil// rtsa lam bgrod pa shugs kyis gang// bde ba'i ye shes shugs kyis myong// sems kyi dmigs pa rtog med

mnyam// rdo rje'i bar du thun mong bde// thun mong bum pa'i bgrod pa thob// rdo rje'i sked pa mchog dga' bskyed/ khyad par gsang ba'i rim pa thob// rdo rje gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// bde ba'i ye shes rang nyam

bstar// sa ha dza yi bde ba skyes/ bde ba chen po nyid du rdzogs// bde ba'i ye shes b+ha gar mnos// rtog med pa dang mnyam par gnas// yum gyi bde ba'i ye shes la// mnyam pa nyid kyis ro yi tshor// dga'

bral dga' ba ro dang ldan// mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du rdzogs// b+ha gar bskyal bar chos kyi sku// 'dab brgyad gang zhig phyag rgyar gsal// bde ba'i ye shes longs spyod sku// rtsa lam shin spros byang chub sku// nA
sa'i lam brgyud gnyid don sbyangs// sprul pas 'gro don mdzad pa'i sku// bde ba'i ye shes nam mkha'i bcud/ 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis su// ye shes 'khor lo yongs rdzogs bsdu// rdo rje gsang ba'i
lam las drangs// bsgrub par bya ba'i lus su bzung// 'dod chags nyid na ye shes te// phyag rgya bsten pas rang grol ba'o// 'chi med tshe yi dbang thob bstan// bskul ba gcig gi man ngag
yin// bde ba'i ro yis gang zhig 'bar// yab yum gnyis su mnyam par gnas// gnas pa brtan pa man ngag yin// mchod dang rdo rje'i bzlas pa la// dbugs dang tshor ba zhen chags bral// nyams myong
brtan pa'i man ngag yin// chos sku 'gag med lhun gyis grub// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgyar gsal// bya ba chen por thams cad rdzogs// 'chi 'pho med par lhun gyis grub// rten dang mi gnas drang por

gnas// rdo rje'i sku ru dang gsal ba// sku la mi zad rgyan 'khor lo// mi g.yo mi bskyod chos nyid rgyas// 'khor 'das snang srid rang grol yin// 'di ni bde dang smin pa'i las// sbyor med sbyor 'das sbyor ba'i

mchog/ 'di la khye'u dang bu mo zhes/ kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma ru// brtags shing zhen pa yod ma yin// thig le gcig gi ngang las 'das// mi g.yo g.yos med g.yo ba med// ma sbyangs sbyangs med sa yi
mchog/ zil gyis gnon pa'i sa ru bstan// sra byed sa ni rdo rje'i sa// 'gyur ba med par lhun gyis grub// ma btsal bgrod thob med pa'i lam// bde lam 'jog pa rgyan ldan lam// rang rgyud pa yi 'khor lo
la// 'khor lo'i gnas su 'khor lo bstan// dam tshig 'khor lo bstan par gsungs// lha yi 'khor lo legs thob nas// ye shes 'khor los dbang bskur bya// rig pa'i 'khor los thog tu dbab// shugs
kyis 'khor los 'phen zhing 'joms// 'khor lo rang gnas sbyor bar bshad// dpal tshe bdag gis dgongs rgyud nag po las/ bsam gtan rang rgyud kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo lcags thag mgo dgu ma'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// rgyal ba'i bka' las 'das pa dang// mtshams med lnga la spyod pa
dang// dgon pa'i gnas su phra ma dang// dam chos dge bcu smod pa dang// bden pa'i don bor log lta spyod// de tshe sngags kyi dmod pa bor// dur khrod shin tu dben pa ru// mchog gsum tshang ba'i gnas

btsal la// gdeng gsum sngags kyi dmod pa bca'// de yang rnam pa gnyis yin te// lus srog dbye dang lo tog gzhom// dang po'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rgya shog dur khrod ro ras la// sme ba lnga yi thod bcas

la// ni raM su yis mdog bton la// thig skor rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum brnag pa'i gzugs// rus khams ming dang snying po bri// zla gam dbang sdud bsrung ba'i lha// phyi rim rgya gram 'phen
pa'i sngags// rtsa bar dril ba'i 'bru brgyad dgod// yang logs bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i rtsibs// bla dang srog 'gugs drag po dgod// tha ma'i rtsibs chen brgyad gnyis la// mtshon cha'i rtse mo'i

sngags mgo'i nang// lus srog 'byed la nad bdag dgod// bar du 'khor yug lto sbyor ming// bkod pa phag mo'i lto bar bca'// gri khrag nad khrag dug chus bsku/ kha sbyor tshon gyis rgya gram bsdam// spyang ki

dar ma'i thod par gzhug/ ling+ga dug dang grogs mkhar sa// mkhar rgod dag la mchog tu bya// gzhi bcas thod chen nang du brnag/ gru gsum maN+Dal lho nub tu// chag gang thur du brkos la gzhug/ dme khrag nal

khrag ra rog khrag/ yugs sa pho mo gri bo'i khrag/ thod chen ling+ga de bzhin mnan// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// yungs kar thal chen dug ngar bcas// thod tshal nang du dug ngar bsham// sngags
pas gsal gsum zil gnon bsgom// mdun na zhing bsnol nyi ma la// sprul pa'i ma mo srog gcod ma// mgo dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad la// k+Sha dang rag mo thugs kar bstan// dbu dgu'i steng ma bya yi

dbu// dur bya khra dang bzhad kyis dbu// nang khrol glo snying za zhing rngams// bar gyi dbu gsum dud 'gro'i dbu// dom dang dred dang chu srin dbu// rtsa dang khrag dang nang khrol za// rtsa ba'i dbu gsum khro mo

ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing la// mche ba zangs yag mi ro 'brul// spyan nas khrag 'dzag dug rlangs shangs// sku stod zhing lpags thod pa sbrul// sku smad re lde dril bu khrag/ phyag g.yas dgu na

bsnams pa ni// mngon du sgrol ba'i snying sbram 'dzin// g.yon pa dgu na thod zor bskyod// stag dang spyang gi ba glang mon// gri bo snol mo khyi nag phag/ 'thom nag g.yas la dug khrag zor// zhabs brgyad dregs

pa'i snying gar brdzis// 'gro ba sgrol phyir gar stabs 'gyings// skra dang ba spu me ru 'bar// de la bka' bsgo bskul zhing mngag/ 'khor lo thod par thun phab la// dang po thun de rab gnas brlab// brgya mtsho

gnyis kyis dbang du bsdu// gsum pas thun gyi rdzas la bstim// bzhi pas sha za mtshon char brlab// lnga pas brlangs 'phro ldeg cing 'chol// drug pas bla dang tshe srog bsdu// bdun pas dkar nag mtshams su
bstim// brgyad pas srog gi me mar bsad// dgu pas dwangs snyigs rgyud las dbye// dgu skor thun gyis brnag pa yi// las grub mtha' ru gnan gzir bya// brag dmar srin mo'i sgrom du mnan// mnan pa'i

steng du dmigs bya la// bsad pa'i thun zor yang yang brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags gab pa 'di bton to// e baM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs rtsa la breng dza/ e

baM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog la thun rmugs ling shag rbad/ e baM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog la breng breng yaM yaM thuM ri li li b+h+yo/ tsit+ta gzir thuM s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis srin mo las la skul ba 'di gsungs so// tshe bdag thugs kyi yang sprul mo// srin mo gcod par byed pa b+h+yo// chos sku gnyis su med pa las// 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po'i sku// thugs kyi
sprul pa mgo dgu ma// yang sprul bdud dang sha za'i tshogs// ma lus 'joms pa'i mthu mo che// dug dang khrag gi mtsho dkyil nas// dug rlangs mug nag gtibs pa na// srin mo kha 'dar mgo dgu ma// bdud

dang mu stegs bran du 'khol// srid pa'i ma mau las la bskul// dom dang khyi mo bla la 'gyed// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na// stong gsum sha la rol cing gsol// nga yi sha skal gang na yod// stong gsum zos

kyang nga ma 'grangs// stong gsum khrag la myos shing 'thung// nga yi khrag skal gang na yod// stong gsum khrag gis nga ma 'grangs// dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na/ ri rab rtse nas

snyil kyin 'ong// rgya mtsho gting nas rlab cing 'ong// dgra bo'i khrag la myos shong [\[]shing [\]]'ong// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na// rang sha rang gis za zhing 'ong// rang khrag rang gis 'thung zhing 'ong// rang sha

zos kyang nga ma 'grangs// rang khrag 'thungs kyang nga ma ngoms// dgra bo'i sha dang khrag la rol// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na// gnam sa ri klung bzlog cing 'ong// ri rab sgong rdor 'phen zhing 'ong// dam

nyams dgra la zor thun rgyobs// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na// lus can ma lus bran du 'khol// dam las 'das pa'i tsit+ta 'byin// dgra bo'i khong nas tsit+ta phyungs// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na// snang

srid b+h+yo bzlog me yis bsreg/ dgra bo'i lus srog bag chags bsreg/ drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na// lus can bla la rbad cing brgyug/ sprul pa'i khyi mo nag mo dgu// dgra la rbod la bla dang phrol// drag tu

bskul ba mchis tsa na// stong gsum nad kyi dra bar 'chang// dam nyams dgra la rims nad phobs// drag tu bskul ba mchis tsa na// snang srid lus srog dwangs snyigs 'byed// dgra bo'i lus srog dwangs snyigs

phye// tshe bkrag bsdus la rtsa rgyud chod// srin mo lcags thag mgo dgu ma// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// shangs nas dug khrag bun ne bun// snyan nas 'brug sgra di ri ri// zhal gyi rngam sgras stong gsum

phung// g.yas pa dgu na snying sbram dgu// thogs nas dgra bo'i tsit+ta 'byin// g.yon pa dgu na thod pa dgu// dgra la khrag mda' dug zor 'phen// dgra bo'i khong du dug mda' rgyob// klad pa 'thon la klad khrag
chom// lus srog phrol la tsit+ta btubs/ khrag mda' dug thun phur zor rgyob// sngags pa'i sku dgra sgrol la shog/ byas la pho nya bla ded kyi sngags bzlas la dgra la rbad do// 'khor lo thun brdeg
las kyi mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srin mo gzir te nye bar las la mngag pa 'di gsungs so// grog mkhar rgya tshil sa dmar la// bong bu'i bdud rtsis legs sprus la// srin mo'i lder so

gong bzhin bca'// kha khyer gsum snying gar gru gsum do [\[]dong [\]]bris la yang ldan gong du brko// snying po 'bru gnyis 'bru dgu gzhug/ drag sngags bzlas la stobs kyis gzir// srin mo bos la khrag gis bran// phur
pas bsdigs la dbang du bsdu// srin mo bka' nod zhabs 'og gzhug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gzir dang spogs pa'i drags sngags 'di bton to// e ka ya ma

baM raM rag mo yaM hur thuM dza/ dun dun trig nan/ khaM baM raM te shag tsit+ta/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ snying ga'i snying po sngags bton la// ling+ga'i ming rus brnag pa gzhug/ zhag gsum thun brab
ro khang mnan// 'byung ba dkrug pas las rnams 'grub// rag mo dkon mo'i spogs par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dme thod nang du me long
bsag/ gser dngul zangs lcags rdo nag bzhag/ ra dmar nal bu khyi nag snying// steng du gling bzhi rtsibs brgyad dgab// de steng srin mo'i sku bzhag la// mthing nag dar gyis bkab la gzhag khrag sna

gsum dang dug bsres la// ling+ga ming byang g.yag rur gzhug/ smyug ma tshigs gsum smin pa la// ltas ngan sgro bzhis bsgron la bzhag/ zhag lnga'i bar du drag sngags bzlas// gser de zhu zhing 'phel chad

na// mda' lcags blugs la dgra la brdeg/ srin mo drag tu bskul la 'phang// drag sngags sbyor ba gnyis su bya// baM raM khaM shig tsit+ta rngubs 'ur tog phraM shar dza la raM sme sha hril/ hur khaM sha yeng phroM shar sing khrol

b+h+yo/ ma byung spogs na sngags 'di bzlas/ khaM tsit+ta baM shag rngubs raM phroM hril tog shar dza la 'ur raM dza/ sma sha b+h+yo/ srin mo'i las 'di rgyas par bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ lo thog
mtha' sdud kyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las kun gyi mtha' sdud du gshin rje bye ba dgu khri'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gdug pa'i dben gnas

su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad la// rten rdzas dam rdzas gri bo'i snying// thod pa ri mo bde ldan der// drag po'i hom khung gru gsum rtsad// brnag pa'i rten gzugs rgyu rkyen drug/ ba yi lci ba sa dmar
drug/ 'gar ta'i A mi 'khar rkang la// ling+ga sor brgyad dbang po dod// nad khrag tsha ba dug chu bsku// ri sho dang ni gro ga la// de yi ming dang rus bris la// snying gar glan la sngon dmar
bsdam// thod par bcug la dong du gzhug/ zhing ras ro ras zhabs ma la// sme ba lnga yi thong ba bya// gcod pa'i 'khor lo cha gnyis bri// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla gam
gsum// phyi rim 'khrul mig rgya gram ldan// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu gnyis bca'// mtha' ma gdug pa'i ra bas bskor// srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bca'// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su brnag

pa'i snying po gzugs// zla gam gsum la bsrung ba'i lha// rgya gram rtsa ba'i drag sngags lus// yang logs rtsibs la spu gri rbad// gdug pa'i gseb tu rtsa mnan yang ba'i sngags// mtshams dang mu ran mig rus
khams// bkod la tsha ba dug chus bsku// thod pa'i steng du 'khor lo bca'// drag sngags dmod pa zhag dgur bzlas// rang yang zil gnon sku ru gsal// bye ba dgu khri mdun du bskyed// zhing bsnol rU tra'i

gdan steng na// chu glang sngon po sbrul ris can// thod pa nor bus brgyan pa la// nyi zla dang bcas gdan la gnas// sku mdog sngo nag gtum khro brjid// sku stod glang chen stag sham zhing// sbrul dang thod pa rin
po ches// dbu dang lhu tshigs phyag zhabs brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas pa gsum na ral gri dang// be con lcags kyi ri rab
bsnams// g.yon pa gsum na lcags kyu dang// zhags pa rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// zhal gdangs sbrul dang mi ro 'brul// stod nas me 'bar 'dab chags lding// smad nas khrag 'dzag gcan gzan
rol// thugs kar nyi mar ya dang sngags// dregs pa'i tshul du las la brtson// rbad pa'i drag sngags gtum par bzlas// mtha' ru thod pa zhabs 'og gzhug/ lcags phur gshin rje'i skur bsgoms
la// gzir ba khri yis snying gar gdab// pho nyas bkug la rten la bstim// 'khor lo ling+ga thod par bca'// rdzas kyi ling+ga phag par gril// dar dang re ba skud pas bsdam// gnyan sar gdug pa'i klu la

gtad// dpang gzug 'o dod cho nges gdab// 'byung ba pho brang don yod bsam// mnan sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bcag/ las kyi kha gso thun dang sbyar// drag sngags bstud la lci bar bzlas// bla dag byung na

drag sngags brdeg/ bla chen bzhi la rnal ma brdeg/ sprul pa brgyad po dbus nas so// yang sprul bcu gnyis mtha' nas so// chags sdang lnga lnga 'byung ba dkrug/ gzir dang mnan pa kha gso zor// drag sngags spu
gri bdun du sbyor// de yis ma lus 'joms shing 'pho// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton to// e ka ya ma hur yaM thibs/ dgra bo'i

srog la baM ril dun dzaH baM myags mA ra ya rbad/ tsa tsha dun ril baM laM srog la myags/ mA ra ya rbad mA ra ya myags tsa tsha/ dun ril baM srog la rbad/ srog dun baM myags/ tsa la dun rbad/ mA ra ya dzaHsrog la sbur

nan/ snying gzer rbad/ srog s+t+wam+b+ha ya mnan/ srog la thun b+h+yo/ breng shag rbad/ sbyor ba de yis ma lus kun// 'joms shing dwangs snyigs 'byed par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las sna tshogs

la bskul ba 'di gsungs so// hUM bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i pha rol na// 'byung ba rten gzhi rngams kyi 'og shed na// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rum na// mun khang lcags khang sgo med na// rU tra dregs
pa'i gdan steng na// gshin rje bye ba dgu khri bzhugs// sku mdog mthing nag rngam pa la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag drug phyag mtshan 'bar
ba ni// g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'bar// dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod cing gsol// g.yas kyi bar ma zhing dbyug bsnams/ khams gsum ma lus rdul du rlog/ tha ma lcags kyi ri rab bsnams// dgra bgegs
las ngan gcod cing gzir// g.yon gyi dang po be con bsnams// dgra bo ma lus mgo lus 'joms// bar ma lcags kyus dgra snying 'byin// tha ma zhags pas dgra bo 'gugs// dgra bo las ngan sdig can

rnams/ khyams khang gnas su khrid la shog/ sku la lcags kyi tshem tshem gsol// zhing dang thod pa sbrul gyis brgyan// sku smad stag lpags zhing chung brgyan// stod nas nga rgyal me chen 'bar// smad nas 'dod

chags khrag tu 'brub// sked na zhe sdang sbrul gyis brgyan// zhal nas dug gi rlangs pa 'don// shangs nas phrag dog 'tshubs mar 'khyil// snyan nas stong gsum 'brug sgra sgrogs// thugs las sprul pa phyogs
bcur 'gyed// pho nya bye bas dgra bo 'gugs// yang sprul dgu khris srog dbugs 'phrog/ las kyi mtha' sdud khyod yin gyis// dgra bo dam nyams sdig can rnams// lag tu gtad do shor ra re// 'di ni bka'

gcog dam dral yin// 'di la sangs rgyas mi gnas kyis// 'di la dam tshig gnyan mi gnas// 'di la snying rje'i gnas med kyis// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting du sbos// lcags kyi ri rab 'og tu non// bye ba dgu

khri dgra la b+h+yo// lcags mkhar btson rar dgra bo chug/ dgra bo'i pho rgyud mo rgyud chod// bcol ba'i las rnams bsgrub par mdzod// bye ba dgu khri'i sbyor bar bshad/ dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po
las/ las kyi mtha' sdud kyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor sgrol gyi las la gol ba 'di gsungs so// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i las rnams ni// rtsol

bsgrub rtags dang dpe la mtshon// rig pa gnyis med ma rtogs na// gol bas mu stegs rtag par 'gyur// bsnyen bsgrub sngags don yongs rdzogs pa// bya byed thob bya thob byed la// rang nyams 'khrul pa rang

la ldog/ de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// sbyor ba mi shes sbyor byed pa// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ma shes na// rtags la don gyi ngo bor 'dzin pa yis// mngal gyis grong khyer brgyud pa'i bdud kyis zin// thabs

lam gsang ba'i spyod pa brten shes na// rang rgyud 'khor lo rtsa lam bde bas gang// bskul 'bar dbab bskyil bya byed don dang ldan// snang srid chags pa'i spyod pas mes spar kyang// gnyis med phyag rgya lhun

grub 'bras bu smin// bde ba chen po rang la shar bar bshad// sgrol ba mi shes sgrol byed pa// skye shi med pa'i don dang mi ldan na// rtsol bas sgrol ba mu stegs 'khrul pa ste// las kyi srin pos bcings pa'i

bdud kyis zin// byar med rdzogs pa'i srog kyang bcad du med// srog tu 'dzin pa log rtog 'khrul pa yin// rang grol gnyis med rang shug sa ru grol// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgyar rang grol na/ khams gsum

sems can log pa'i srog bcad na// sgrib byang tshogs ldan 'bras bur lhun gyis grub// spyad du med pa'i phrin las ma shes na// dpe la mtshon byed rang zor spyod pa dag/ las kyi rnam smin mnyam pa'i btson

rar chud// rtsol ba byas pas rtag pa'i bdud kyis zin// phrin las lhun grub spyad du med shes na// lha srin kun gyi ming dang mtshan smos nas// las la mngags shing pho nya kun bkye yang// blang dor med pas

'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid// ma btsal ma bsgrub rdzogs te ye sangs rgyas// bsnyen bsgrub rtsol med sngags don ma shes na// phyi nang rtags la zhen pas bsnyen zhing bsgrub pa yis// mi dge bsog la rtsol ba'i

rang bdud rang la 'khor// mnar ba'i dmyal ba'i gnas la the tshom med// bsnyen bsgrub rtsol med sngags kyi don shes na// srid gsum rtsol 'phro 'dus pa'i srog mdangs la// lha srin kun gyi srog snying dril

ba'i mchog/ drag po e dang yan lag sbyor ba ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pa ye shes rol par shes// gang mthong cir spyad mtha' gnyis rang sar grol// bsgom du med pa'i don dang mi ldan na// mtshan ma'i khro bo gzhan

nas rtsol bsgom pa// mu stegs 'khrul pa'i spyod lam rtag par gol// chos nyid mi dmigs stong pa nam mkha' las// skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul du// rang rig phyag rgya lhun gyis grub pa'i sku// gnyis med ye
shes rdzogs longs spyod// rtag chad mtha' gnyis grol bas sangs rgyas sku// phung po mi gnas sangs rgyas rang gnas pa'o// rtog dpyod 'das pa'i sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub// 'di med rang

'ching don med rtag chad mtha'// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho lhun po ltar// don gnyis smin pas yon tan cir yang snang// ma bcings grol med bgrod pa'i 'bras bu smin// snang srid 'khrul pa dug lnga'i smag

rum nas// sangs rgyas drag sngags ye shes nyi ma shar// bdud bzhi'i gnas su chos sku bde bas bcom// bla med sangs rgyas bde chen rang la shar// sbyor sgrol bya rtsol rtag chad mtha' las 'das// gnyis su
med par lhun gyis grub par bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las// bya rtsol bral ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gsang ba sngags
kyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i gsang rgyud rim pa'i gnas// bde ba'i ye shes rang la 'char// bde ba'i ye shes rang gsal ba// bde ba chen po mnyam pa'i ngang// bde ba'i dbang phyug 'gag pa

med// lhun gyis grub pa'i bde bar gnas// 'di dag bde ba'i lam can no// rgyas dang bsdus pa'i bye brag gis// sdeb dang rkyang pa shis tshad gsum// nye dang 'gyangs dang dbang dang ldan// de yi rig pa 'di

lta ste// gzugs brnyan 'khor lo chag gang la// lus dang spu gri mtshams dag tu// mu khyud bzhi yi 'khor lo la// gang bsgrub bsad pa'i sngags kyis mdzes/ khro bo nang la ma mo dbus// gnod sbyin phyi ru shes

par bya// rang gi 'khor lo lto bsdeb pa'o// brtan pa lhun po gsal ba yi// tsit+ta gsang ba'i pho brang na// brgyad dang bcu gnyis rtse dbus hUM/ khro bo'i sngags dang ma mo dbus// gnod sbyin phyi ru shes par

bya// man ngag gsang ba'i sdeb tu bya// drag po'i lus la bsnyen pa'i sngags/ khro bo lus la ma mo gdags// de bzhin dregs pa'i gang bsgrub bsnyen// de bzhin rbad dang bsad pa sbyar// dmod pa zhal gyi sdeb tu
gsung// rang gshed drag pos bsad pa'i sngags// lus la spu gri mtshams dag tu// rang sngags nang la gshed ma phyi// drag po bsad dang rang sngags sdeb// las kyi gshed sngags brgya brgya bskul// de dag

rang gshed gsum sdeb yin// de bzhin drag po sngags kyis sdeb// bcu gnyis lus la snying po yi// spu gri'i sbyor ba shis pa ste// las kyi kha 'khyil yun du bde// man ngag gnad mda'i sbyor ba yin// lus la spu
gri bsnol mar sdeb// dgra bo 'dul ba'i rno dbal yin// las kyi bshan pa rtsub 'gyur te// drug 'gyur sbyor ba stobs dpag med// sngags ni yon tan kun rdzogs pas// lha dang bdag po las 'khor
kun// rang rang so sor sdeb la dkrug/ bde byed tshangs pa'i gnas las 'phang// rig pa bde ba'i klong du bsdu// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od las 'phros// gang 'grub las kyi pho nya la// mngag pa rbad

pa'i mtha' ru 'gyur// dgra bo'i srog la thuM ri li li// pho nya bla ded brgya brgya mngag/ de yis thams cad 'joms shing 'gugs// drag po sngags kyi gsang sdeb ni// dang po lus bsrung rtsa ba stong// de 'og kha

chings gzer ba stong// mkha' 'gro kha gzan dgra la 'phang// mtha' ru srog rtsa gzungs thag gcod// mnan pa gzir dang phur pa gdab// drag po sngags kyi spyi sdeb yin// do ra nang gi drag po yin// lus ni
gsang zhing lci bar gnas// mtshams su snying po b+han+d+ha ming// gzir bya gang dmigs gsal bar bdo// mtha' ru spu gris gzir zhing gcod// drag cing 'dril la 'bar bar gdab// srung ba kun la shis pa
yin// lus srog 'byed pa drag po'i sngags// lus kyis gsal la dag par bzlas// snying po rus khams ming bcas pa'i// gcad pa lnga yis brda' sbyar ba// lce la dig pa yid la gsal// yul gyi rnam par
gsal bar brtag/ ming bsdu mi 'gug rang sar gsal// gcod byed spu gri rnon dbal mtshon// gang yang rno myur tshad ldan pas// che dril drag la 'phar zhing 'dril// de yis dkar nag rten la brdeg/ bsrung
dang go cha sha spags rus// drag cing dkar nag sgo phye nas// rtsa bzhi bcas nas rtsa mdud dgrol// dwangs ma bzhi bsdus thig le 'bar// nA ga gzugs can stong bdag med// snyigs ma la gnyis me 'bar

khrag/ de dbus sbal ba nr-i dang sdig/ sngags kyis me bsad sdig sbal gshag/ yi ge hur thum dza yis 'phrog/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul e la bsdu// srid pa'i khyams khang gnas su bya// sha khrag lus la sha za
rol// gsang ba sngags kyi drag sngags yin// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ gsang ba sngags kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas

ngan dang cho 'phrul dbab pa 'di gsungs so// sram dang phyi ba'i thod pa ru// byi la sre mo srin bya'i khrag/ spu dang sha sbyar zhabs mas bril[\[]gril[\]]// de bzhin gar 'bebs yul ming sngags/ khrag gis bris
la thod par gzhug khri bdun bzlas la zhing ras gril// gsob de srod la dmigs pa'i 'gram la gzhug/ zla ba bdun nas ltas ngan 'bab// sems kyi lta la che dmigs bya// sbrul dang sbal pa'i gsob bshus
la// dgra yi sa chu gdug pa'i sa// dug chus sprus la de nyid gzugs// gang dmigs bcas pa sngags kyis gril// gsob de brgyangs la tsha ba bsku// drag sngags tshad ldan lam la gzhug/ gdug pa gzugs kyi
cho 'phrul 'byung// thod pa dur ma gnyis btsal la// dme mnol gri khrag kha mig btod// dug dang sme ba lung ngan bsku// gang dmigs ming dang phob ya gzhug/ mkhar gyi bris dang bang 'og

sba// thod pa 'thab dang rgyug pa 'byung/ khra dang 'ug pa srin bya'i snying// sha khrag dang bcas bag zan dug/ dgra yi khang par tsha ba sbyar// mnol khrag bskus la bya gzugs bya// gang dmigs ming rus sngags

kyis gril/ khri brgyad bzlas la zhabs mas gtums// mkhar gyi rtse dang sked du sba// bya de skad 'byin sder mchus 'dzings// ltas ngan sdig pa'i than skad 'byin// ltas ngan srod kyi smag la 'bab// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton to// e ka he dun yang e aM ka dun myags rngubs shag mug tri ling sarba spu raM ling spur/ nA ga rA dza ha ya ka pa ha h+ya ha la ha la ki li

has phob/ sngags kyi rgyal po gang dmigs la// lus dang yan lag sbyor shes na// ltas ngan cho 'phrul dbab par bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ ltas ngan dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug

pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po sngags kyi yon tan 'di gsungs so// e yi ye shes 'di rnams yi ge yin nam dpyad ye shes las byung ba// drag po 'joms shing srog snying sdud// lhun grub tshe

bdag snying por rdzogs// ka yi ye shes las byung ba// sbyor ba las kyi rgyal por 'dus// sprul pa mgo dgu'i snying po rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// ya ma thugs kyi snying po ste// rlung gi stobs kyis 'phen

zhing 'phul// ma yi ye shes las byung ba// bdud mo srog gi snying po yin// bskyed dang sdud pa'i dbang po rdzogs// he yi ye shes las byung ba// dgyes pa'i gar dgus gdug pa 'joms// bya khyung rgyal po'i snying
por rdzogs// dun gyi ye shes las byung ba// srog dang dbang po las bsdus nas// las kyi tshe bdag srog bdud 'joms// snying gi ye shes las byung ba// gdug pa gnas su 'joms dang 'pho/ khyung mo smug

nag snying por rdzogs/ khrag gi ye shes las byung ba// dregs pa gnod sbyin gdug pa 'joms// gsang bdag rdo rje'i snying po rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// bsreg cing skem la gnas su spor// zhe sdang

gdug pa'i snying por rdzogs// ma yi ye shes las byung ba// pho nya las la mngag pa ste// srid pa'i dbang mo bdud mor rdzogs// tsa yi ye shes las byung ba// snang srid mdangs bla bsdus nas 'chang// srid pa'i

rus sbal snying por rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// las kyi rlung gis 'phul zhing skyom// ya ma rA tsa'i snying po rdzogs// myags kyi ye shes las byung ba/ khams gsum dbang la las bsgyur ba// rngubs kyi ye

shes las byung ba// tsha grang nad smin 'bras bu rgyas// mug gi ye shes las byung ba// pho nya sha za rang dbang bsgyur// dzaHyis sreg byed drod dbang bsgyur// raM gyis spor byed drug drug bsreg/ sha ni
srin pos bde bar sgrol// ru yis chos nyid gsal bar byed// thum gyis chags sdang gnas su 'joms// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ sngags kyi yon tan gyi le'u ste nyi shu bdun
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dmar len gyi rtsa ba 'bru bzhir bsdus pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad

la// dpa' brtul dmod pa'i drag sngags bzlas// dur khrod rgyu la tsakra bca'// mu khyud bzhi dang ldan par bskor// lte ba gru gsum ma ra nr-i// gnyis pa rgya gram e dun ka yaM dgod// gsum pas mtshon cha'i

rtsibs brgyad la// srog la breng breng srog la gsum// dun dun bzhi la srog la rbad dang lnga/ khaM shag drug pa tsa rbad bdun// srog la zhes pa brgyad du dgod// yang logs chu yi mu khyud la// gang grub bsad

sngags lto sdebs dgod// tha ma'i mtshon cha'i rtsibs bcu la// myog dang rbad dang khyer dang phyung// mug dang ting dang ling dang shag/ long dang rbad rnams rdzogs par dgod// srid pa'i rus sbal lto na gnas/ kha
sbyar rdzas kyi sbal par gzhug/ tshon skud lnga dang phag mo'i ltor// gzir la mchog phur snying gar gdab// thod pa bcas la klu la gzir// gnyan dang mchod rten nag po la// gtad pa'i las tshogs gang
gi tshul// nyin mtshan gsum gyis gang brtsam 'grub/ kha so nyin zhag phrugs gcig sbyar// phyag rgya bsam gtan zil gnon bsgom// rang yang rang la gab par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid

kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las sngags 'di bton to// e dun ka yaM dgra bo'i srog breng nr-i srog la dun dun/ srog la rbad khaM shag tsa rbad/ srog la myog rbad khyer phyung mug ling shig shong rbad/ sbyor ba kun gyi
mchog bsdus pa'i// las kyi rtsa ba 'dril bar gsungs// sems kyi drod brtag rmi lam min// sku yi phung po gnas sbyangs nas// rin chen rgyal bar thugs 'phang ste// gnyis su med pa'i rang rig gsal// rang
byung ye shes rang 'bar ba'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ba 'di gsungs so// rig pa gnyis med don gsal ba'i// rang rig rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gsal// sku gsum bde ba'i rig pa rdzogs// sgyu

ma'i ye shes rang shar ba'i// don gyi man ngag drag po'i sngags rgod la// bsad gso dbab bcad ltas ngan thog ser las// kun 'dus rnam rtog chen po rang las 'byung zhing 'char// de yi sbyor ba drag po lnga
dang ldan// lnga yi mchog tu snying po don gyi las// de las 'bru bzhi 'bru brgyad rtsa ba'i sngags// 'bru bzhi gsad gso las 'di srung ba'i mchog/ dngas ma bzhi yi rtsa las ye shes bzhi shar

ba// dug lnga'i las dang gdug pa'i sbyor ba kun 'joms yin// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru bzhi la// sbyar ba lnga dang tsha ba dug chu'i brgyangs// las kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi

ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum dang ldan// de yi phyi rim rgya gram rwa bzhi bya// yang logs mu khyud zlum po chu yi ris// tha mar rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtse mo nang du bstan// srid pa'i khyams khang

phag mo'i ltor bar bca'// de la gnas shing dgod pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum gang gnod ming dang snying po bri// zla gam gsum la sdod stongs kyang pa'i ming rnams bri// rgya gram rwa bzhi rtsa ba'i 'bru bzhi dgod// chu
ri mu khyud rbod gtong gdug pa'i ming// bcu gnyis rtsibs la gcod cing gzir ba'i sngags// bkod la kha sbyar dar dang sngo dmar bsdams// thod pa dur mar bcug la gru gsum rtsang bcas brnag/ phyag rgya
zil gnon gsal bas zhag lnga drag tu gzir// ling+ga'i snying gar mchog gi phur pa gdab// drag tu bskul zhing dmigs pa dud pas 'dug/ phying pas bkab la yungs kar brab la bkru/ las de thon nas bka'

rten 'og tu mnan// klu dang sa bdag gnyan dang lha gdon dang// gshin rje ma mo zhi khro phur pa khyung// dregs pa can dang bon po'i rigs gnyis 'dzin// bdud dang mu stegs btsan dang rgyal po dmu// the brang

gshin rngog phung bdag rig 'dzin sri// rang rang ming dang snying po sbyar bas bcad// drag sngags sbyor ba la sogs brgyad du gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag
sngags 'di bton to// oM he dun a dun ka ya yang ka yaM/ sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha thaM 'drid phyung shag rbad/ srog la breng breng shag dun dun e he yang ya ma hur thuM dza dza/

sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan/ khaM shag tsa la rbad/ sa nA ga dza/ sa nA ga thuM/ sa nA ga rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ram thun rbad// khaM dz+wa la ram sarba sha truM nan 'dred yaM bzlog sbur nan/ trig nan/ e ka ya ma shig 'drid phyung/ khaM shag trig nan/ sbur nan/ sarba sha truM s+t+wam+b+ha
ya nAn sha rbad/ 'di dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// las rnams kun gyi rtsa bar bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ dmar len 'bru bzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis thog ser gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// e ma'o gsang ba'i lam can 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'di// chos nyid nyer bar gtan la 'bebs// ye shes nyi ma rang las
'char// 'di la gnas shing bsrung ba ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dzin pa dang// 'chang zhing rab tu rtogs pa la// bka' yi byin rlabs shugs las 'byung// de don rgyas pa 'di lta ste// gnyan ra 'dug
pa'i bde gnas su// dbang btul sngags kyi 'khor lo bca'// dur khrod gnas nas dpa' bo yis// gos su bca' ba'i rgyu blangs la// gos la sme bas thod pa bya// de la bod pa'i 'khor lo bri// thig skor rim

pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su pho brang zlum po la// gdug pa'i gzugs dang yul gyi ming// ser ba drag tu phob ces bri// zla gam gsum pa ser srung dang// yul lha'i sbyor ba gzhom pa bri// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram
bri// rtsa ba'i drag sngags 'bru bzhi dgod// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// chu dril zor gyi dbab pa dgod// tha ma'i rtsibs chen bcu drug la// thabs dang drag po gzir ba yis// lo tog gzhom pa'i

spu gri dgod/ kha sbyor tshon skud brkyang pas sngags// thod chen sbyang sprugs shu na du// gcod pa'i 'khor lo tsha ra gzhug/ gri khrag khyi khrag rta nag khrag/ dod bur sngags bstim zor du 'bar// sngo sna nal khrag dug
sna zho// zhabs mar sngags bstim thal gyi rdzas// lcags phur seng ldeng rdzas rgod rnams// dug gi ngar blud drag sngags dkrug/ spogs pa drag pos gzir ba'i rdzas// dgun zla gsum la nyin zhag gcig/ chu

dril khri tsho zhib tu bstim// dpyid zla gsum la zor dril brdeg/ zhag re dong du thod par bstim// dbyar zla gsum gyi nya stong la// zhag gsum nya la gta' ma gzhug/ yul dbus klu dang lha rten la// thod

chen spyang thod sbrul gzhug dang// ston zla nya stong rnams bzlog brdeg/ brgya pa bcu par khrag la bstim// stong gi bar du rdzas rnams bstims/ khri bar phur pa dgug rdzas bstim// drag sngags rnal bzlog 'byung
ba dkrug/ zor dril thab dang gzir las sbyar// de yis thams cad ma lus 'joms// sman dang rtsi shing lo tog la// drag po gnam lcags ser ba 'bebs// tshe brgyad sa sros bzhi yi 'jing// nya yi srod
'khor bcu gcig yol// nyi cu dgu yi mdung gang la// dbab pa gsum pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// grub na gta' ma gdugs kyi gso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag

sngags 'di bton to// e dun ka yaM/ U khaM phroM phroM hri la phob// shar shar hril drag tu phob/ yaM ka dun te/ phroM shar hril b+h+yo/ ka duM raM phob ka e yaM dun nA ga snying gzer phroM ya hril shar/ chu mig lha rten la dmigs
shing// zor thab sbyor ba thod pa zangs// mi lag mi sog thal 'jim zor// gzugs brnyan gnyis par rten bzhag la// 'byung ba dkrugs la khri bzhi bstim// gar dmigs klu gnas phur pa gdab// chu rgod
drag po ri bsnyil 'dra// rang yang rang la gab par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// drag po gnam thog 'phang ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// de bzhin gnas dang mtshams bcad

la// thog rgod gri thog nyams can du// me long gser dang thog lcags zangs// rdo nag yungs kar rgyal po spungs// rta nag rabs chad khyi nag khrag/ dug sna dang bcas steng 'og rten// yul dang bcas pa'i ming

rus khams// ling+ga rten dang rgya gram dbus// thig skor rtse mo drug pa bri// rgya gram 'bru bzhi sngags kyi lus// thod skor spu gri tshan res dgang// gser thog gzhu dang spel dang gcag/ 'phangs pa bsrung dang
gcun la dbab// gser gyi mi 'gyur brtan pa'o// spos dang bdud rtsis bsangs la bkru// drag sngags 'khor lo bskor la gzhug/ dri mda' dug mda' ltas ngan mda'// bcas la gser blugs dgra la

'phang// nya dang nyi shu dgu la shis// sngags pa zil gnon phyag rgyar gsal// lus la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// 'khor lo bsrung ba'i drag sngags spro// che ba'i nga rgyal drag pos bskul// sngags la ltas ngan tri

mda' sbyar// dug mda' thog rgod gcun dang sdeb// gnam thog chen po rang 'dod dbab// sbyor ba'i rgyal po khong du gzhug/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags

'di bton to// e dun ka yaM/ raM thun ro myag dz+wa la raM khaM raM/ raM thun mA ra ya nr-i dza khaM khyer laM raM/ rag thuM ro myag khas rbad/ e yaM khaM raM trag chem srog la thun b+h+yo/ sarba tsit+ta sbur nan kham shag rbad b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i

srog la hur thuM nan 'drid rbad/ sarba sha truM hri myags rbad/ kha thaM b+hig nan/ las 'di snang snang bya ba min// thog ser skyin thang sbyor bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas ngan gyi sbyor ba 'di

gsungs so// sprel dang byi la wa thod dang// sbrul dang srin bya phag sha dang// gzugs dang ming rus bcas la bca'// drag sngags khri bdun dug chu bsku// tshes brgyad srod la mkhar la gzhug/ gzugs rnams

'thab cing sgra 'byin du// sbyor ba smin nas rten rnams gdon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags 'di bton to// e dun ka yaM ru sti nan du ting has phob/ las kyi

rgyal po 'bru bzhi yis// 'byung ba bzhi dkrug dwangs ma sdud// ye shes bzhi yi thig le rdzogs// sngags kyi 'od zer 'pho zhing 'dril// kun gyi rtsa ba dril bar bshad// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po
las/ thog ser sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi don 'khor la gdams pa 'di gsungs so// rgyud ni 'brel pa gsum dang bcas// chos dang chos can
nyin gcig pa// yul sems gnyis 'dzin rang snang shugs// blta spyod man ngag thabs cig dang// gzhi lam 'bras bu ro gcig gnas// 'khor 'das snang srid don la gcig/ bde dang sdug
bsngal rgyu mthun 'das// rang bzhin bdag nyid ngang du rdzogs// bde ba nyams dang 'od gsal ro// so ma lhug pa rdzogs te gnas// thabs dang thabs gnyis thabs bsam yas// bya ba med par rang shar

'di// a dang yang dag sgyu mar sbyar// e dang skye ba'i cho 'phrul rdzogs// ma skyes skye ba gnas las 'das// skye 'jig 'gag pa stong bdag med// bde ba'i ye shes ro nyid mnyam// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dzin pa

dang// mnyam pa'i don la drod len pa// sangs rgyas nyid dang skal ba mnyam// 'di la yun gyi don ldan pas// che bas che ba'i yon tan rdzogs// rang lus rdo rje sems dpa' med// yan lag rdo rje stong bdag

med// stong pa nyid las gzhan med pas// snying po don gyi sbyin pa yin// sbyor dang sbyor ba rang bzhin pas// rang nyams bde ba'i sbyor bar bshad// 'di de bde dang smin pa'i mchog/ zung du zungs mtshams

kun spangs te// yon tan ma lus kun ldan pa'i// 'di la 'jig rten dngos grub mchog/ ma lus 'byung phyir snying po'i don// rgyal ba kun gyi thig le can// nga yi 'phrul gyi dgongs pa 'di// bka' yi bstan pa

ma lus kyi// snying po mchog dang don zab pas// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dril ba yin// nga yi sbyor ba me lce 'di// khro tshogs gang gi stobs bsdus yin// nga yi stobs kyi drag sngags 'di// bgrod pa thob pa'i go
mtshon mchog/ nga yi gsang ba'i sgron ma 'di// ma rig 'khar ba'i bde lam yin// 'di la gnas shing bsgrub pa dang// 'dod pa'i dngos grub len pa dang// phyag rgya chen po rab sbyor ba// 'bras bur nges
pa'i thabs su bshad// mnyam pa'i rgyal por rgyas par bsngags// gsang ba'i bdag por legs gsungs pa'i// nye bar gyur pa'i rgyud 'di la// bgrod pa'i stobs kyis gang len pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi
dgongs pa 'dzin// rnal 'byor bde ba'i lam can la// nga yang dam las mi g.yel bsrung// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yin// don gnyis mngon du spyod pa'i phyir// tshad ma bzhi yis rab brtags
pa'i// don gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa 'di// rtsol dang bsgrub pa'i mtha' las 'das// 'phro 'du sbyor ba'i g.yang sa bcad// rgyu rkyen bgrod pa'i sar ma lhung// rdzas dang rtags la rten mi 'cha'// mchod

dang thugs dam bskang mi dgos// thams cad ngo bo ma bcos pa/ kho na chos nyid gcig pa las// lhun grub rang byung longs spyod sku// las dang sbyor ba sna tshogs sprul// sku gsung ma btsal bgrod thob med// de
dag chos nyid rol pa'i rgya// chos nyid rig pa rang byung dpal// ye shes chen po rang gsal ba// 'khor 'das dbyings dang ye shes gsal// yul sems gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pas gol// ngo bo mi
dmigs gnyis kyis dben// snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku// 'dzin rtog mtha' gnyis rang bzhin med// med pa'i ngang las snying po gnas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// 'khor ba ma spangs rang
sar gsal// gsal ba mtshan nyid lhun gyis grub// 'di de bde dang smin pa'i las// sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo gnas// che bas che ba'i yon tan ldan// mos dbang spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// bgrod pa
dbang gi phyag rgyar btab// rig pa'i brda yis med cing bsnyad// rdo rje stong bdag che bar gnas// sems can sangs rgyas ma lus kun// rgyud 'di bzung zhing bstan par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par bstod do// dpal tshe bdag gi dgongs rgyud nag po las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// rgyud kyi snying po dam pa zhes bya ba sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa gcig tu bsdus pa lha'i yul du grags pa rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI ya ma yan+t+ra kA la bits+tsha hr-i da ya kIr+Na gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gshin rje 'khrul 'khor nag po sdig pa snying 'dzings gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal

'jigs byed chen po ya mAn+ta ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong/ mtha' dbus med pa'i pho brang na/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i ye shes lhun

gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chos nyid ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba

mnyam pa chen po'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de nyid ma bsgribs kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i ye shes dang/ sa dang lam la gnas pa rnams dang/ lha dang mkha' 'gro rig pa 'dzin pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten

las 'das pa'i ye shes pa dang/ 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso bo rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor de dag gi nang nas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bcom ldan

'das la gsol pa/ kye ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang// chos sku thugs rje chen pos kun khyab kyang// ma rtogs sems can thugs rjes bsgral ba'i phyir// mi rtog dbyings las rdzogs pa'i
skur bzhengs la// mnyam pa'i ngang las 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid mi rtog pa'i dbyings las rol pa chen po'i thugs rje'i chags pas skur

bzhengs te/ dregs pa can dbang du bsdu zhing 'dul ba'i phyir/ phyag rgya chen po zil gyis gnon pa'i skur ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang sngags 'di dag ched du gsungs so// a+ye a+ye a+ye/ a kro te

ka ya mAn+ta ka ya ma ye/ kA la rU pa/ ka pa ye/ hri sti/ a pa ye/ a a ne/ a ne/ u u ne/ u ne/ du du ne du ne/ a I/ u e/ o aM/ ra rI/ la lI/ du du ye/ bya tsa ye/ sid+ha ye/ hri da ye/ b+hi da ye/ tsit+ta le/

ha la ye/ mu kha ye/ U U ne/ U U ne/ byi kri ta/ A A/ nA nA/ ya ma ra tsa/ ya ma ra ga a// ya ma rak+Sha/ be tA li kro d+hI rI/ ma ma e ka dza ti/ de ma kha la bam ril/ ru lu ru lu shrI badzra kro ta/ ya ma karma ro Sha na kro

d+ha tsan+d+ha/ rag sha mon ta/ a mu ka myags thuM ril trig nan/ sbur ya nan/ e hur thuM dza/ khaM shag ro myags mug ti rbad ya/ zhes gsungs pas nam mkha' nyid gru gsum mthing nag tu gyur to// rlung rdo rje rgya gram

phyogs bcur 'thor ro// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khrug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'ur 'ur dang chem chem dang rab tu 'gul ldeg go/ de'i tshe'i de'i dus na 'khor thams cad brgyal te/ lus sa la rdebs shing
dran pa'i dbang po nyams so// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye ma ho// 'jigs byed chen po lags// mnyam pa'i ngang las 'jigs pa'i skur khros te// gsang sngags gsung gi ngo bo ched du
gsung// 'jig rten khams rnams rab tu cher g.yos te// 'khor tshogs 'dus pa'i srog dang bral du nye// thugs rje nyi ma lta bur dbugs dbyung phyung// dkyil 'khor chen po bskrun par phrin las bsgo// zhes
gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs te// bcom ldan 'das la 'dun pa skyes te/ skad cig mas lhag ste

[\[]lhags te [\]]rang rang gi snying po mthu rtsal dran nas phul te sku la 'khril bar gyur to// dpal sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// lnga brgya'i tha ma snyigs ma'i dus kyi tshe// 'chi bdag bdud kyi gshin rje khogs nas 'khrug/ mtshams med lnga yi las
rnams 'dun spyod pa// dga' rab dbang phyug bdud kyi sprul pa 'gyed// rang dang 'dra ba'i tshul 'dzin ban 'dra yis// phyi rol la sogs sngags dang dug blangs 'tshal// de dus gzer thun nag po dmod pa'i
mchog/ sdig pa nag po snying la ru 'dzings pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor nag po bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo thams cad 'byung zhing las kyi

gzer thun drag po rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ btsun mo chos kyi dbyings kyi b+ha ga la snyoms pa zhugs te ye shes bzhi dang sku gsung thugs las/ ya ma rA dza dang/ myos byed 'bar ba dang/ Ar+ya dmar po dang/ ral

pa tshar dgu dang bzhi mngon du phyung ste/ de nyid dregs pa 'dul zhing zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir/ ya ma rA tsa dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ rus sbal mi zan dang/ ye shes bya khyung dang bzhir gyur to// 'byung ba'i ngo

bor 'dzin pa nyid dag nas/ dwangs ma ye shes chen po bzhir grol te/ phyag rgya'i sku la rdzogs par gyur to// sprul pa rnam pa gsum ste/ sku'i sprul pa 'chi bdag/ gsung gi sprul pa srog bdag thugs kyi sprul pa
tshe bdag ste/ gdug pa can 'dul bar gyur to// gshed chen po bzhi las/ las kyi mon pa bzhir sprul te/ pho gshed sum brgya drug cus phung po la dbang bsgyur ro// mo gshed bdud mo bzhis mo gshed sum

brgya drug cus 'byung ba la dbang bsgyur ro// de ltar gshin rje bdun brgya la sogs pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can thams cad kyis dpal phyag rgya chen po zil gyis gnon pa'i ya mAn+ta ka la yongs su bskor
te/ rol pa chen po las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khod par gyur te bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams 'di skad ces gsungs so// snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku// thig le
nyag gcig spros dang bral// skye med rnam dag bde chen sku// 'gag med bde chen klong gdal ba'i// brda dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// chags dang bral gyis grub pa'o// zhen chags bzung 'dzin rtog dpyod

'das// gnyis med don dam chos kyi sku// rgyu dang rkyen las sgrub pa med// kun gyi rang bzhin dngos med pa// yon tan ma lus kun 'byung ba'i// de nyid rtog med brjod dang bral// dug lnga ye shes lnga yi

sku// phyag rgya chen po ye shes nyid// stong pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// rang snang rol pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// las dang sbyor ba du ma kun// sgyu ma lhun grub rol par bshad// 'di dag bde dang smin byed
pa'i// rol pa chen po'i 'khor lo yin// sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po'i gsang rgyud las/ las kyi 'khrul 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
chen pos/ rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i phyir/ sdig pa nag po snying la ru 'dzings pa'i/ 'khrul 'khor dkyil 'khor chen po'i bca' thabs 'di gsungs so// stobs chen nag po'i rdzas bzlog dag/ phung shul
mi bsad yul bkyes sa// dur khrod ro yi sa dag la// ro bsreg rdo dang sol ba dang// gri lcags dpa' bo g.yul bsad khrag/ ra dug re'u lcag a sho nag/ grog mkhar sa sbyin khro shug
nag/ shog 'dam mche chu sbyar te brtseg/ nag po khru gang bang rim bzhi// yongs rdzogs stobs chen mi 'gyur gnad// gdan la rus sbal glang chen 'degs// bar la rigs bzhi sprul gyis 'degs// bang rim
bzhi la stag dang gzig/ gsum pa seng ge chu srin no// 'khor lo 'brug gis 'degs pa la// char khebs mkha' lding ro nye za// rang rang kha dog ldan pa ste// mkhas pas bkod pas stobs chen gnad// bang

rim phyogs kun drag po'i sgo// yongs su rdzogs pa'i lto ru bca'// gri mda' smyug rgod khrag tshan ldan// srog shing zil gnon sku ru shar// bang rim dang po zur bzhi la// srin po ya ma rA tsa dang// gshin rje
myos byed 'bar ba dang// bdud po Ar+ya ma ru tse// gnod sbyin ral pa tshar dgu dgod// bang rim gnyis par srog gi gshed// dung lcags bse dang gser gyi mon// gsum pa phyi yi gshed bzhi'o// tha mar
'chi bdag bcu gnyis dgod// dkar po snying 'byin mgon po nag/ yab rje nag po sku mdog dmar// drag po sgo bzhi dag la dgod// lhar gsal stong gsum zil gnon sgrol// sangs rgyas thugs rje stobs
dpag med// bka' rten byin rlabs yun du gnas// bang rim dag gi bar bar du// phas kyi lha dang gnod byed mnan// gang bsgrub las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// stobs dang ldan pa'i sngags pa'am// rdo rje
nang dme drag po yis// gnam lcags ur mo nang 'gras na// rgya mtsho'i gting du nA ga bdud// mun pa'i dmag sdud 'khor lo bca'// ri rab brtse la gnam lcags dag/ ur mo so brdar 'khor lo
bca'// ri thang mtshams su zhe sdang can/ khros pa gzhu bcag 'khor lo bca'// nam mkha' mthing gi bya ra la// sbyor ba bshig pa'i mtshon cha dbab// ya bag sha yi las yin pas// me dang mi srun gang zag
gis// spyad kyang rang la gcod par 'gyur// sdig pa nag po snying la ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po'i gsang ba'i rgyud las/ stobs chen gyad gnon mchod rten yongs rdzogs kyi le'u ste gsum
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i las/ las kyis 'khrul 'khor snying la bskor ba 'di gsungs so// sku rten yongs su rdzogs pa'i lto ba ru// man+Dal mthing nag gru
gsum dag/ phung sa gsum dang dug khrag spru// bang rim gsum la kha khyer rtsang// dug dang sol bas nag por byug/ dpa' brtul can gyi sngags pa yis// zhing lpags dag gam ro ras la// rno myur gdug byed
phag mo'i ltor// srid pa'i khyams khang srog snying sdud/ khyams khang lho ru mnan pa gzhug/ snying gar mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bca'// rgya gram dag la rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu bzhi spu gris
so// rtsa ba spu gri'i bar na khyams// bsten pa bdud du 'bebs pa'i 'bru// ming rus khams bcas za kha dbab// rus sbal lto ba'i phyogs mtshams la// bcu gnyis nang bstan phag mo'i 'bru// 'khrul mig

khyams khang ming rus bri/ kha sbyar dug dang khrag gis byug/ sme ba'i rdzas byug dza ril gzhug/ rgyu rkyen drug la ling+ga bri// rang rgyud rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dag/ dmar nag ya yi dbus na ma// ma yi gang na srog snying

nr-i// me chu las kyi 'khrug cing skyom// snying gi rtsa bzhi dwangs ma la// zhe sdang sdig pa nag po gnas// lus la dmar len yin 'bru gnas// ru 'dzings 'bru brgyad bsnol mar gnas// rtsa mdud rang gshed 'bru

yis 'joms// dwangs ma bzhi yi sa re la// chos nyid rtsa la e dang myags// sa yi dwangs ma me la sdud// yon tan rtsa la ya dang rngubs// me yi dwangs ma chu la sdud// ye shes rtsa la mug dang shag/ chu yi dwangs ma

rlung la sdud// rang rgyud rtsa la ka dang dun// dwangs ma sdud cing nad gzhi rgyas// rlung gi rnam shes dwangs ma 'degs// de bskul de 'od de mtshon las// de bcad de nyid bsreg shing 'joms// mdud pa bzhi la
mtshon cha'i 'bru// bdun gnyis drug gnyis bsnol mar gnas// las kyi me chus 'khrug cing skyom// rang bdud rang gi rgyud la ldang// mtshon chas rang srog rang gis gcod// snying la gnas pa'i tshe
bdag gis// rtsa rnams gcod cing srog rten 'joms// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i yang snying 'di gsungs so// e myags ya rngubs/ mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i srog

la nr-i hur thuM dza/ rtsa khrag snying thums ril raM shag rbad/ dgra bo'i tsat+ti breng shag dza/ srog la hur thum rbad/ dun ka shag mugs/ rngubs ya myags e/ shag raM ril thuM/ snying khrag rtsa rbud/ thuM ril dgra bo

dza/ thums hur la srog rbad shag breng tsit+ta dgra bo dza/ e ya shag myags dun rngubs ka mug srog thums ril tri nr-i hur thums dza/ thums khrag snying rtsa raM yang la thun shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la breng thuM tsit+ta shag
hur dza la rbad/ rnal ma bzlog dang lto ba dkrug/ bsgrub dang spogs dang shi sa yi// yi chad rang dbang med par 'pho// 'khor lo mkhas pas gdug par gtad// nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi la// mnan pa'i
las kun rdzogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// sdig pa nag po snying la ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i rgyud las// rang gshed 'khor lo snying la bskor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ rang gshed rang la dbab pa drag po thun gyi las 'di gsungs so// gnad kyi gsang thun las kyi mtshon// bskyod pa kha gso las kyi gcod// gri rgod thod pa mon

nam mnol/ khyi dang spyang ki wa yi khrag/ thal chen mnol khrag bdud mda' gsum// zangs phye lcags phye rdo phye sbyar// gri rgod khrag dang dug rgod dang// tsha ba gsum dang yugs sa'i khrag/ gri lcags phur pa
dung chen gzir// bcas pa 'khor lo thun dang spel// 'khor lo gtad nas zor kha gso// nya stong dus su yul la brab// mon thod nang du brnag pa gzhug/ lha gsal zhal nas dug rlangs 'phro// nad dang mtshon

cha char du dbab// dug gi na bun khong du skyel// nad khrag rgyas nas rtsa mdud chad// 'gyur ba med pa'i las su gsungs// dgra bo'i srog la thums ril rbad b+h+yo// a mu ka rtsa la thun rmugs rbad b+h+yo/ sngags pa

snying du sod/ tsit+ta tub rbad long/ srog tsit+ta long/ myags myags mA ra ya/ tsit+ta la thun b+h+yo/ dug rlangs 'chol ba las kyi thun// snying la dug dbal 'debs par byed// skyes pa kha gso rgyun mi bcad// sdig pa
snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po'i rgyud las/ rang gshed thun nag gsang ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ rdo rje'i nang dme'i las kyi dmod pa bsad pa
las kyi spu gri 'di gsungs so// dmar len yang gsang snying po'i mchog/ gdug rtsub mchog gsum sde gnas su// rang nyams brten pa mtshams bcad la// ye shes rig pa'i bde klong nas// mkha' lnga khyab
pa'i don bsdus la// gzung 'dzin chos kyi dbyings su bsgral// stobs can lha tshogs gzan la dbab// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i 'khor lo la// mchog dang phag mo lto sdebs la// dbus kyi pho brang rgya chen
por// mtha' 'gyur gang yin ling+ga bri// gu ru seng ge'i khog mi bshig/ las kyi rgyal po btsad po la// 'khor lo rus sbal thod par brub// dkyil 'khor byin can 'og tu mnan// slob ma dam med dgrar

langs na// gcer bu'i ling+ga'i snying nang du// zhe sdang lcags kyi sdig pa gzhug/ thod pa stag gi 'dzum la mnan// dam 'dres yi dam gcig pa na// gcer bu rid pa'i slad dkyil du// phrag dog bse yi sbal pa

gzhug/ dme khrag nad khrag rkyen rlangs bsku// thod pa gzig gi thig ler gtad// dam mi gcig pa spyi yi spun// ling+ga spyi tshang snying ga ru// bse yi sbal pa dmar po bri// dug rgod dz+wa la'i khrag gis brab// thod
pa mun pa'i gling du mnan// lha gsas chag pa'i bon po la// snying gar gdug gi phag pa gzhug/ nad khrag khyi lud thun brab la// srin mo'i sgrom du nye bar gtad// drag sngags ur mo nang 'gras na// drag
sngags rnal bzlog snol mar brdeg/ mnan pa 'brong gi ra brag mnan// dril dang rkyang pa las kyi sdebs// rtsa ba 'bru brgyad spu gri bcas// 'khor lo thod pa bcas pas grub// ma grub sbyor ba

stobs zhan na// dril ba'i mtha' ru spu gri bsgyur// drag sngags rnal bzlog dkrugs pas sdebs// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las sngags 'di gsungs so// rA dza nr-i dza thuM ril mA

ra ya rbad/ srog la hur thuM rtsa la mA ra ya rbad/ srog la hur thums yaM thun rmug mA ra ya rbad/ srog la mugs dza tri shag mA ra ya rbad/ srog la nr-i dza thun rmug mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta khaM shag dza srog la mA ra ya thun rbad/
'dod pa'i ming dang a mu ka/ las kyi skabs su shes par bya// sngags kyi 'khor lo nang gcod dang/ kha 'thab mjing bsnol rtsal 'dren sngags// dam tshig dme 'khrug byung ba la// dpa' bo chen pos las 'di
bshad// spyang ki mon kyi thod pa dang// mu zi nag po mdze can snel/ khrims 'chal mgo'am gos dag la// rabs chad nag po'i thod par mnan// 'di dag las kun yang rab ste// rang gshed nag po las
mthar phyin// zhes gsungs so// sdig pa ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba yang snying gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ban sgra nag po stobs dang 'bral
ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// dbang chen stobs dang dbral ba dag/ dur khrod gdug pa'i dben gnas su// sna tshogs drag po'i sa dag la// mchod rten nag po bang rim gsum// dug khrag dag gis

rab tu byug/ gri rgod ras sam rgya shog la// ban dgra nag po'i ling+ga bri// rkang rjes skra dang chu ngan sa// bag phye khrag dang kham sa ru// mdzub gang dbang po dod pa la// sny-ing gar ming rus gzhug par bya// lce steng

du ni lnga yi mtshon// rgya gram thugs nyid las gyis thug pa'i lam gy-i 'jom las yin nam dpyad/ mdzes// srog 'dus lha srin snying pos mnan// steng du ri rab mchod rten bzhag/ gnas khang steng ngam shar du

mnan// rtsol bsgrub phrin las ci byas kyang// ngag gi nus pa stobs kyis 'ching// dam tshig ldan dang sngags gcig pa'i// rgyud gsum nus pa stobs dang bral// ha la nag po stam+b+ha ri// nus pa 'joms pa'i

'khrul 'khor yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stobs can mnan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// a+ye a+ye a+ye/ hriSh+t+rI a pa ya/ bi kr-i tA na na hUM [\[]bar 'dir mchan yod kyang mi gsal/[\]]s+t+wam+b+ha ya/ laM laM laM laM nan tak+She na/

ya ma/ ma ma/ rag mo/ rak+Sha/ k+She ma/ shrI badzra kro ta/ dun ting kI la ya/ ma ma rag mo/ snying du rngubs/ he rak+Sha trag tu brag dun ting b+hi la ni/ a+ye dun tri/ tri sha na ra tsa ha sti/ ra tsa mu trag sha truM ti sta/ ro ni ro tri

nan/ a tri sa du/ tsa tri/ rA tsa/ nA ga/ de ba ru tri/ kha rak+Sha ma tri/ dun ting dun ting tri/ tri srog la mA ra ya/ ga na pa ti/ b+ha na ka ro/ kA la du brag byi ru ra/ nA' ga mo ti/ sa ga byi du/ sarba sha truM/ e

che ge mo a mu kaM du du nan/ du du nan/ du du nan/ myags thuM ril trig nan/ spur ya nan man tra nan/ khaM shag ro myags mug ti rbad/ bstan pa spyi la gnod pa yi// ban 'dra mu stegs dag la bya// kun la byas
na sngags kun gyi// nus pa nyams par 'gyur bas na// rnal 'byor can gyis bya bar bshad// las 'di ya bag sha yin pas// phung byed nag po'i sbyor bar bshad// sdig pa snying la ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor
gsang rgyud las/ stobs can nus pa dbral ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang 'gras kyi las 'byung ba'i khram bzlog chen po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dben
zhing nyams dga'i gnas dag tu// rigs dang rigs min sbyor ba 'joms// stobs gzir pho nya bzlog cing mnan// rigs can sbyor ba dbang du bsdu// rigs med yul gyi lus srog dbral// yugs za mo yi

zhabs ma dang// sa dkar cong zis mdog phyung la// 'khor lo rim pa lnga ru bskor// gru gsum nag po ming tshar bri// zla gam lha dang ming rus bri// mu khyud sbrul gyis rab tu bskor// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa
ba'i sngags// phyi rim rgya gram ral gris gtams// yang logs bcu drug gsod dang gnon/ kha sbyar mu su'i thod par bru?b// zhag gsum thang bcad mal 'og mnan// stobs kyi pho nya'i rbod gtong 'chad// tshe

bdag las kyi 'khrul 'khor yin// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra mA tsa ya/ dgra bo a mu ka srog la thun rmugs rbad b+h+yo/ srog la khaM shag b+h+yo/ srog la breng shag b+h+yo/ srog la yaM shag b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra

ya rbad/ dgra bo'i srog stam+b+ha ya nan/ las 'di yang snying gsang ba'i bcud// pho nya zlog pa'i las su bshad// ces gsungs so// sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gzhan gyi rkang
mgyogs bzlog cing mnan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa snying 'dzings lha srin tsit+ta dkrug pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ras la dug khrag

gis// snying gi 'khor lo bri bar bya// rtsa chen bzhi la dmar len 'bru// 'bru brgyad rang gnad bsnol mar gnas// rtsa bran brgyad dang sul brgyad du// tsit+ta dkrug pa'i spu gri bri// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug
bri// phyi rim mu khyud gdug pa lnga// 'chi bdag shan pa'i lto bar bri// de ltar 'khor lo kha sbyar bar// dmigs pa'i ling+ga bris te gzhug/ zhag bdun bar du ma yengs par// tsit+ta dkrug pa'i 'khor lo
bskor// yang gsang thugs kyi las mchog yin// phyag rgya zil gnon gsal bar bsgom// las kyi 'khor lo lto dkrug pas// srog dang grog srog kyang gi ming sdeb can// gzas pa'i tsit+ta dkrug par
byed// rtsa phran brgyad dang rtsa chen bzhi// las kyi dmod pa'i mtshon chas gcod// rtsa srog bcad nas rnam shes phrogs// 'chi bdag bdud kyi las su rig/ 'jig rten lha srin thams cad kun// gshed bdag
nag po'i lto na 'chang// rU tra de yi rgyud la gnas// de yis rang srog rang gis gcod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa snying 'dzings tsit+ta dkrug pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// e dun ka yaM e

myags ya rngubs/ mug shag ka dun/ ya ma ra tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo'i nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ ma ma ru lu ma tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ tir ti ka du/ ru tra d+ha/ de ba a rak+Sha ra/ rag mo ra/ yak+Sha k+Sha/ ya mo k+Sha/ mun

mun pa/ shu la dza/ ra tsa tsa/ badzra sa du tri/ haM shaM tri/ nA ga phu/ tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ de yi las de ma grub na// drag sngags 'di la rab tu 'bad// tsit+ta dkrug dgra bo'i srog la breng shag nr-i ma ra ya

rbad rbad gsum yang 'dug/ mtha' sdud mnan pa'i sngags kyis bsdu// sdig pa'i lus chang brtags la gtad// thod pa dur ma'i las yin pas// gsang sngags grong khyer dkrug pa ste// gnad la dbab zhing bsad pa
zhes// lha srin 'khrug nas nang 'thab cing// stobs chen dril ba'i las su bshad// sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i rgyud las/ tsit+ta dkrug pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bsrung ba'i rim pa 'di gsungs so// e nyid stong pa chos 'byung zhes// ma skyes 'gag pa med pa las// rgyu rkyen sngags las ma bskyed par// rol pa chen po'i sku ru gsal// dbu
gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rngam// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// rigs lnga'i khro bos dbu la brgyan// rang gi
phyag rgya chen pos brjid// sbrul dang rin chen 'bar ba dang// dregs pa'i mgo bcad phreng bas brgyan// klu rigs du mas sku la spras// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings// mthing nag tsit+ta b+han dmar

stob// thugs kar smug nag ya ma gnas// me long ye shes ngo bo nyid// 'khor lo don snying phyag na bsnams// ya ma'i thugs kar dregs pa che// mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// ljang nag rdo rje snying phreng
'dzin// dregs pa'i thugs kar khyams khang ste// bya ba nan tan ye shes nyid// 'jigs byed chen po thur du blta// dbu gtsug mkha' lding gdug pa 'dul// so sor kun rtog ye shes nyid// dkar po
zil gnon ro nye za// phrag sor smug nag 'jigs pa'i khyung// dpung par stag chen ro la rngams// nu 'jing seng ge ral pa sprug/ sta zur dug sbrul nag po 'khyug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo

nyid// rdo rje 'chang rgyal spyi gzugs can// ma skyes ngang las rang bzhin 'char// gdod nas rnam dag ye shes sku// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod mi dgos// rgyu dang rkyen la rag ma lus// skye 'gag med pa'i ye

shes gsal// phyag rgya kun gyi zil gnon yin// rol pa chen po'i phrin las kyi// gsang sngags phreng ba denyid las// bod pa ming dang brda' ru sbyar// rnam par shes pa 'bru re phrogs// dregs pa 'dul byed
gsang sngags srog/ zil gnod gsung gi ngo bo nyid// 'di nyid mchog gi las yin pas// 'di med las kun dbyug pa rkyang// rbod gtong 'khrug gam thun mong du// rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa yis// dregs

pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa 'joms// sdig pa nag po snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya chen po srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos des/
klu bdud 'chi bdag gdug pa can chu srin mgo can dbang du bsdus te/ las kyi 'khrul 'khor gtad log nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// rus sbal nag po mjing bsnol gyi// las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di lta

ste// tA la'i lo ma'am ka ri ka/ yang na rgya shog dag la yang// klu rigs bzhi dang sa bdag dang/ dpe gcig la bar 'dir srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bris// 'khor lo rim pa bcu bzhi bskor// dbus su ling tshe dgu ru bya// mu khyud yang snying/

zhes pa zhig byung yang tshig mtha' yang ma 'grig pas dpyad// klu yi yang snying gtad log dang// rtsa ba'i snying po 'bru brgyad bzhi// 'dod pa'i ming rus a mu ka/ nag po mgo dgu'i gsang sngags sbrel// yang gsang dpa'

brtul can gyis spyad/ e dur ka yi/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la breng shag hur thums rbad/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun nA ga ru tra kA la dgra bo'i snying la b+h+yo/ nag po bam tsit+ta la rgyob/

trag thur snying sgul myags myags/ rtsa bzhi skums/ shan shan srog la shan/ thur thur dgra bo tsit+ta la thur rbad/ sa nA ga ha la tsa ma ri dgra bo'i snying la thun b+h+yo/ zhag gsum mtshon cha bsnol mas gcod// mtha'

ru dpa' brtul can gyis spyad// klu yi nad rlangs dug gi ngar/ kha dag de la rang gshed dbab// 'di ni las kyi man tra ho// stobs chen 'joms pa drag po'i mtshon// sbyor ba mkhas pa'i sngags pa yis// las
rdzogs rus sbal khog par gzhug/ bang rim lnga pa'i 'og tu mnan// ri gsum 'brang gi rwa brag mnan// yang na sa bdag gnas sar gtad// las 'di mnan pa kun gyi mchog/ ces gsungs so// sdig pa
snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gtad log nag po rus sbal mjing snol gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des 'khrul
'khor rdzas bzlog dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// stobs chen 'khor lo'i gnad dag gis// las dang sbyor ba nus pa'i mthu// bung ba ri ka 'khor ba ltar// rang gi nus pa 'joms shing

gsod// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ri rab 'og gam rgya mtsho'i gting// gdug pa can gyi stobs gzhom phyir/ kham sa'i ga'u rus sbal gyi// lto sbyar bar du rus sbal bca'// rgya shog dag la mu khyud gsum// gru

gsum sdig pa ru 'dzings pa'i// steng 'og ling+ga lto sbyar bya// bar ma'i mu khyud dregs pa can// 'dus pa'i yang snying 'khor bar bri// phyi rim 'byung ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi// skyom zhing sdud pa'i yang snying bri/ e baM

raM yaM khaM shig tsit+ta gtubs/ sas gtibs/ mes tshig chus dkrug rlung gis g.yeng/ kha ri ba ldag kha ri ldag rnam re tse ri khas yen sogs 'dra min mang sna ri khas yen/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ e ka ya ma srog la hur thuM gzir

nan/ dgra bo'i snying la shag rbad/ ra ti ra khrag dgra bo'i srog la yaM yaM tri ling dgra bo'i snying la shag rbad/ nag po nA ga b+he ta srog la dza la dza la/ nr-i thuM shag/ dgra bo'i snying la rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag nr-i mA ra ya/
'khor lo kha sbyar ga'ur gzhug/ nam mkha' bar snang sa 'og gi/ dbang chen stobs chen 'dus pa yin// 'og gi 'khrul 'khor gsang bar gshad// bar cha'i 'khor lo 'di lta ste// gshed po las rgyas lto

ba ru// mu khyud rim pa lnga ru bskor// dbus su 'dod pa'i ming rus bri// g.yas g.yon 'doms su dam sri ru// klu srin sa srin snying po bri// snying la sdig pa bzhi bgrad pa// dmar len drag sngags 'bru brgyad

bri// phyi rim yang snying 'khrul mig dag/ brgyad bzhi dregs pa'i yang snying bri// tha ma 'khor lo bcu gnyis rtsibs// byas pa 'jigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor bri// bar chad dag gi 'khrul 'khor yin// sarba sha truM s+t+wam+b+ha
ya nan/ 'grir rbad/ pad+ma sbur srog nan snying gzer breng shag yaM rbad/ ri rab bang rim gsum pa'i khar// gru gsum nag po dug khrag byug/ rabs chad thod par 'khrul 'khor bca'// sgo bzhi rdzogs pa'i
mchod rten dag/ rus sbal gdan la glang chen 'degs// sgo bzhi gri lcags sbug ma ru// drag po'i sngags thun mtshon chas brdar// bsad pa las kyi mtshon du bshad// nam mkhar phyag rgya gsal ba yi// stobs
chen snying po rdzogs pa dang// las rab kun gyi mchog tu bshad// sdig pa snying 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang rgyud las/ rdzas bzlog gsang ba 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de
nas yang 'jigs byed chen po des/ gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di gsungs so// gdod nas rnam dag ye shes sku// lhun gyis grub pa yin pa la// stsol bsgrub re dogs 'dzin pa
bral// rnam rtog bag chags sprin lta bu// nam mkha' lta bur 'dzin med pa// srung ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// stong pa'i dbyings las rdzogs pa yi// phyag rgya'i rol pa yongs rdzogs pa// bsam gtan sems

kyi 'khor lor bshad// rgyu dang 'bras bu srog dang las// dregs pa'i de nyid shes pa na// dreg pa rang gshed rang gis byed// bsam gtan 'khor lo byed pa na// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis// ming

dang rtog pa dbyings su bsgral// sngags kyi grong khyer rab bsgril zhing// ming nas bos shing rab tu gzir// rnam shes 'phrog cing gcad bya ba// sngags kyi phreng bas gdug pa 'dul// dregs pas dkrugs shing

dbang bsdus la// ming nas bos la thog ltar gzir// rnam shes 'phrog ste mtshon chas gcod// bsrung zhing bzlog pa'i las su rig/ de nyid rang gshed pheb pas na// rno myur srid pa'i khyams khang na// rang
gshed gdug pa'i yi ge gnas// drag sngags dbus kyi rta la zhon// dug rlangs 'od zer rang shugs 'phro// sha za gsod byed pho nya bskul// rang gnad gdug pa'i yi ge blangs// bdag gshed grogs kyi 'khor
lo 'phro// kun 'dus rtsa bcad tsit+tar 'dus// hur thums dza yi nr-i phrogs nas// srid pa'i khyams khang mtshon chas gcod// 'di dag bsad pa'i las su rig/ bskyed pa kha gso dug dbal gyis// rtsa rnams

khengs nas nad rgyas nas// rtsa yi mdud bcad srog bral gyur// phyogs sam sgo bzhi las kyi thun/ kha gso zor gyi las su shis// 'khor lo thun brdeg las rab mchog/ rkyang pa sbrang ma las kyis sdebs// spyir

ni 'khrul 'khor gsang ba'i bcud// yang gsang thugs kyi 'khor lor bshad// las kyi rgyal po'i snying nang du// rtsa bzhi mtshon gyis gcod par byed// dam med slob bu'i sems pa nyid// lcags kyi sdig pas rtsa
brgyad za// dam 'dres bse yi sbal pa la// nad khrag 'dus shing ldang bar 'gyur// sngags pa nag po spyi yi sbun// rang gshed bse yi sbal pa yis// rnam shes dug khrag me chur bskol// bon po rigs gnyis
phyi rol pa// phag rgod nad dang mtshon gyis bsgral// gnam lcags 'thab na rtog med las// phyag rgya rdzogs pas rol pa'i sku// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsgom// gzhan gyi stobs rnams rab tu
gzir// las drug spyi yi dgongs par bshad// nag po stobs dang dbral ba dag/ rgya gram dregs pa'i sngags bris te// lce steng ri rab dag gis mnan// zhi khro phur pa gshin rje nas// sa bdag klu srin yan
chad kyi// sngags kyi bzlas brjod ci byas pa// ri rab rgya gram chen po yis// ngag gi nus pa gnod par byed// nus pa non cig ces kyang brjod// drag po'i ngag mnan 'khor lo bshad// 'byung
ba'i khram bzlog chen po ste// gsang sngags 'khor lo bskor ba yis// 'jig rten lha 'dre khams 'khrugs shing// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo log pa ltar/ kho rang rgyud la ldog pa ni// pho nya bzlog pa zhes su

bshad// 'chi bdag shan pa'i lto ba ru// gsang ba'i sngags kyi lto dkrug pas// lha srin tsit+ta 'khrug pa yis// gzas pa'i rtsa srog 'bral bas ni// tsit+ta dkrug pa'i las su bshad// srid pa'i rus sbal lto ba
ru// klu dang sa bdag sde bzhi la// stobs kyi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// gdug pa'i klu gnyan dug blangs te// gzas pa'i snying la 'dus par bsam// gtad log nag po'i las su bshad// phyag rgya mtshon cha
dmigs pa'i yul// gsal ba gsum gyis las kun 'grub// ces gsungs so// sdig pa snying la ru 'dzings 'khrul 'khor nag po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yang gsang thugs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma rnam rtog mtshan ma rang grol ba'i// rdo rje bde ba chen po'i bka'// gsang tshig dmod pa'i las mchog

'di// rig byed rdo rje snying pos zung// skye med rnam dag chos dbyings pho brang nas// thugs rje'i rol pas bye brag cir bstan kyang// gnyis med 'bras bu phyag rgya chen pos rdzogs// snang stong gnyis med ye

shes sgyu ma'i sku// rtag chad mtha' las grol ba'i ye shes nyid/ kho na nyid do gnyug ma rdo rje'i sku// phyag rgya chen pos zil gyis gnon par gnas// sku yi sgyu ma'i phyag rgya cir yang gnas// gsung ni khro bo rngams
