sgra lnga dang ldan// thugs ni sna tshogs cho 'phrul mtshon cha bzhin// las kyi skabs kyis phye ba de lta bu'i// ngo bo nyid ni chos sku 'gyur ba med// skye ba'i cho 'phrul snang la rang bzhin med// yon tan ye shes mtshan

dang dpe byad ldan// snying po 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang las 'char// thams cad chos sku bde ba chen po'i ngang// bgrod pa rnam gsum thob pa'i rtsal gyi yod// e ma rno dbal mtshon cha'i mchog/ sdig pa snying la ru
'dzings pa'i// snying po dug dbal dmod pa'i mchog khyad par gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyod// sdebs dang rkyang ba stobs dang sbyar// stobs ldan 'dzom na sbyor ba
bsdeb// rgya mdud brtsegs pa'i lto ba'am// nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi'i 'og/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa rdzas kyis gnad// ri rab mchod rten bar dag tu// stobs kyi 'khor lo thod par gzhug/ phyag rgya gsal
bas rngam tshig bzla// dregs pa dkrug cing gnod byed gzir// rang gshed 'khor lo thun gyis brab// bla gnas gzugs la gnad yig dgod// mtha' bsgyur spu gri rno dbal

sbyar// mgyogs bzhengs kyang kyi pho nya bzlag cing bsad// gdug pa klu yi gtad khram bzlog/ bsdeb pa'i las rim skabs su sbyar// bsad pa'i las su shis par spyad// rgyun du lha srin stobs gzhom zhing// ngag
mnan 'khor lo bcas la mnan// stobs chen nus pa 'joms par bshad// tsit+ta dkrug pa'i rang gshed dbab// sdig pa'i lus tshad brtags la gtad// dregs pa 'khrugs na shis par bshad// e ma yang

gsang rnal 'byor rgyud// thabs dang shes rab snying po'i don// rtsa ba bshad pa 'phrul gyi bka'// yang snying nag po gsang ba'i mtshon// sdig pa snying la ru 'dzings 'di// gsang bdag rdo rje snying po

dang// longs spyod 'phrul ni sprul par bshad// lha dang mkha' 'gro rig pa 'dzin// rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dregs pa'i 'khor// byang sems bka' dang lung bor min// slob dpon mi spang spun mi brnyas// sangs
rgyas bka' la nges par bkur// bla ma dkon mchog yi dam mchod// bdag gzhan byang chub sems mi gsad// don gyi lam stor log pa la// gsang sngags brda' dang dam mi smra// yongs su ma sbyangs tshad mi

sbyar// theg pa dman la chos mi bshad// bka' la tshad ma'i sgras mi gzhal// dad ldan mi bzlog phyag rgya bstan// rin po che yi rtsal mi sprug/ rnal 'byor mi gtang gsang sngags bzla// drod rtags dbang po rang

nyams brtag/ sems kyi me long rtag tu blta// e ma 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs// lha klu dregs pa rdzu 'phrul can// nga yi gsang rgyud snying po 'di// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// de yi dam las mi 'da'
srungs// 'khor gyi dregs pa pho mo yis// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i grogs gyis shig/ ces gsungs so// de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la dga' mgu yi
rang te mngon par bstod do// 'jam dpal gshin rje 'phrul 'khor nag po sdig pa snying 'dzings gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad cing rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// 'jam dpal gshin

rje dngos grub nye bar bsdus pa'i zla gsang nag po'i snying po'i rgyud/ las kyi 'khrul 'khor nag po sngag [\[]sngags [\]]pa snying 'dzing kyi rgyud ces bya ba// lha yul du grags pa rdzogs so//// bal yul gyi
slob dpon chen po ba su d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gnubs ban sangs rgyas ye shes bdag gis bsgyur ba'o// rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya a+thi+-i/

rgya gar skad du/ ru dra man+t+ra bits+tsha hr-i da ya kIr+Na tan+t+ra nA ma// bod skad du/ drag po'i sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud ces bya ba// dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po ya mAn+ta ka la phyag 'tshal

lo// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// rdo rje khro bo 'jigs tshogs la// kun kyang gus pas phyag btsal te// bde mchog yab la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo

nyid// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// mtshams med las rnams kun spyod pas// 'gal ba chom la dbab pa'i phyir// rang gshed drag po bshad par mdzod// de nas phyag rgya chen po yis// rdo rje snying po khro tshogs
la// gsang tshig drag po'i dmod pa yis// 'gal ba chom la dbab ba'i mchog/ 'khor la nye bar bka' stsal to// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// mtshams med las ngan kun spyod pas// ban dgra dam nyams

bsgral ba'i phyir// ri thang mtshams su zhe sdang can/ khros pa'i gzhu bcag sbyor ba brtsam// de yang phyir la bzlog pa dang// byas pa bshig dang zug pa dbyung// gsang lam dgag dang gzir gnan te// spyang mo

drug gi sbyor ba yis// dang po 'chi med dus sbyor zlog/ bar du mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab// tha ma dug mda' khong du skyal// zhes gsungs so// drag po'i sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud las/ zhus pa

dang gnang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po yis// dang po stong pa lha yi 'khor lo yi// 'chi med dus kyi sbyor ba bzlog pa 'di gsungs so// e nyid stong pa chos 'byung zhes// ma skyes
skye 'gag med pa las// rgyu rkyen sngags las ma bskyed par// rol pa chen po'i sku ru gsal// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rngam// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri
g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// rigs lnga'i khro bos dbu la brgyan// rang gi phyag rgya chen pos brjid// sbrul dang rin chen 'bar ba dang// dregs pa'i mgo bcad phreng bas brgyan// klu
rigs du mas sku la spras// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings// mthing nag tsit+ta b+han dmar stob// thugs kar smug nag ya ma gnas// me long ye shes ngo bo nyid// 'khor bo tsit+ta phyag na bsnams// ya

ma'i thugs kar dregs pa che// mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// ljang nag rdo rje snying phreng 'dzin// dregs pa'i thugs kar khyams khang steng// bya ba nan tan ye shes nyid// 'jigs byed chen po mthur du blta// spyi

gtsug mkha' lding klu nag 'dul// sor rtog ye shas ngo bo nyid// dkar po zil gnon ro nye za// phrag gong smug nag 'jigs pa'i khyung// dpung khar stag chen ro la rngam// nu khar seng ge ral pa sprug/ sta zur
dug sbrul nag po 'khyug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// rdo rje 'chang chen spyi gzugs can// ma bskyed ngang gis rang bzhin 'char// phyag rgya kun gyi zil gnon yin// de 'dra'i sku ru gsal
bsgoms la// stong srog 'khor lo 'di dag bzlas/ a+ye a+ye a+ye/ a kre te ka ya mAn+ta ka ya ma ye/ kA la rU pa/ ka pa ye/ hri sti/ a ba ye/ a A ne A ne/ u u ne u ne/ du du ne du ne/ a I/ u e/ o i/ ra

rI/ la li/ du ru ye/ bya tsa ye/ sid+ha ye/ hri da ye/ bi da ye/ tsit+ta ye/ ha la ye/ mu kha ye/ u u ne/ u u ne/ b+hi kri ta/ a a na na/ ya ma ra tsa/ ya ma rak+sha/ ya ma rag A/ ya ma rak+Sha/ be tA li/ kro tI shwa rI/ ma

ma e ka dza ti/ de ma kha la baM ril/ ru lu ru lu/ shri badzra kro ta/ ya ma karma/ ro Sha Na/ ya ma rak+sha kri ta tsan ta/ rak+sha mon ta/ a mug myags thum ril/ trig nan/ sbur nan/ e hur thums dza/ khaM shag ro myags/

rmugs ti rbad ya/ gsang sngags phreng ba 'di nyid la// spyang mo drug gi so 'di gsungs// bar du ming dang brda' ru sbyar// zhes gsungs so// drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzing kyi rgyud las/ stong srog lha'i
'khor lo las/ 'chi med dus kyi sbyor bas srung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po des/ mkha' 'gro'i za kha dgra la sbo ba yi/ spyang mo drug gi so 'di gsungs so// che ge mo a mu

ka trig nan/ e hur thums dza/ kham shag ro myags mugs ti rbad/ che ge mo a mu ka rtsa sbur srog nan/ snying gzer breng shag yaM rbad/ e hur thums dza/ kham shag ro myags mugs ti rbad ya/ che ge mo a mu ka

man+t+ra dum/ ma hA ra ga du du yang ma sta ra dum/ thum ril rbad/ e hur thum dza/ kham shag ro myags/ mugs ti rbad ya/ che ge mo a mu ka du ram tri yaM 'drid phyung/ srog gzir nan phyung/ e hur thums dza/ kham shag ro

myags mugs ti rbad ya/ che ge mo a mu ka tsit+ta s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan/ e nan yaM bzlog 'drid bzlog b+h+yo// e hur thums dza/ kham shag ro myags mugs ti rbad ya/ che ge mo a mu ka bi taM s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan/ e hur thums dza/
kham shag ro myags mugs ti rbad ya/ de dag gong gi sngags ring la// skabs kyis bsgyur ba shes par bya// bgying gzir byad bzlog gsang lam dgag/ byas pa bshig cing zug pa dbyung// stobs dang nus pa

mnan pa'o// ting 'dzin sbyang mo 'phro 'du ni// g.yu yi sbyang mo drug tu 'gyur// sbyang mo re res phrin las re/ myur du byed pas gsal bar bsgom// zhes gsungs so// drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi
rgyud las/ spyang mo drug gi mkha' 'gro'i za kha dgra la spo ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang sngags kyi dug mda' khong du skyel ba rang gshed dbab pa 'di gsungs so// dpa' bo grir shi pa'am/
khyi nag po'am/ ra rog po'i snying nang du/ gdug byed rang gshed dbab pa'i 'khor lo gnyis/ zhe sdang lcags kyi sdig pa nag po dang/ phrag dog bse'i sbal pa dmar po gnyis lto bar bcas la/

tsit+ta'i nang du tsakra gzhug/ de nas rabs chad thod pa gshag/ thod pa'i nang du tsit+ta gzhug/ ag tshe ba yar bstan la/ de nas mnan rdzas dang thun gyis brdeg go// bdag nyid phyag rgya zil gnon du bsgoms la/

ngan sngags 'di bzlas so// e myags ya rngubs mugs shag ka dun/ a mu ka srog la rbad/ thum ril rbad/ rtsa khrag tsit+ta phyung/ nr-i srog hur thums dza/ zhes bzlas so// ngan sngags 'di skye ba rgyun gcod yin

no// nag po rag sha snying la sbur/ nan rbad/ nag po rag sha srog la hur thums rbad/ nag po rag sha snying khrag la breng shag rbad/ nag po rag sha rtsa la breng shag rbad/ nag po rag sha snying khrag tshal pa sham long

rbad/ nag po rag sha gar b+ha nr-i dza/ b+han tra b+han d+ha ri yang b+hi tam s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan/ zhes bzlas so// nyin mtshan phye la bzlas te/ mtshan mo nag po'i las bya'o// nyin par dmar po'i las bya'o// des tsit+ta yang gas

par 'gyur ro// dus thams cad du thun gyi las nyi tshe bya ba gces so// gsang ba tsit+ta rang gshed dbab pa/ zhe sdang sdig pa nag po dang/ phrag dog bse'i sbal pa dmar po gnyis/ rang gshed phab la gnan

par bya/ zhes gsung so// drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud las/ sngags kyi dug mda' khong du bskyal ba rang gshed dbab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas drag po thun la brten te bsad

pa'i las 'di gsungs so// gri rgod kyi thod pa'i nang du/ gri rgod kyi snying ngam rog po'i snying du/ dgra bo'i ling+ga bcug pas/ de yang ling+ga dza dgu dang/ gar b+ha nr-i dzas brgyan pa ni/ sngon dmar srad bus brgyan

la bzhag/ bdag nyid phyag rgya zil gnon bsgom// thun rdzas dug dang ske tshe dang// nyung nag dang ni zi ra til// shang tshe mi khrag khyi khrag dang// ra khrag dang ni phag pa'i khrag/ lcags phye zangs phye thun du

sbyar// ngan sngags 'di dag drag tu bzlas/ a+ye a+ye a+ye/ a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa/ hri sti byi kr-i ta/ kA li kro ta/ a ne u ne/ du ne bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsit+ta ye/ ha la ye/ ya ma kri ta/ ya ma kro ta/ ya ma mo

na ta/ ya ma rak+sha/ ya ma byi sha tsi du te du ti yang/ mon ta kri ta ya tri na ya yang/ a mu ka tsit+ta breng shag/ mugs shag mug thun b+h+yo/ thum ril srog la myog b+h+yo/ dur ting hri shag ha la yaM b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i snying khrag tshal pa

myog rbad/ srog la mA ra ya rbad/ nr-i sha ku ru ni rbad/ nr-i hur long breng dun dun/ hur thums dza/ tsit+ta rbad/ ces bzlas la sum yar du brdeg go/ bsgom pa ni phyag rgya zil gnon du bsgom mo// skabs su bskul
ba yang gtang ngo// ling+ga thun gyis nyugs pa de/ lam rgya gram du/ gza' rgyu ba dang bdud kyi nyi ma la srod la mnan/ gru gsum nang du mchod rten bang rim gsum pas mnan/ ba bal nag dang tsher

mas dgab/ phyis kha gsos la dum re 'phang ngo// zhes gsungs so// drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud la/ rang gshed gsang ba snying thun gyi las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten

gyi lha 'dre spyi'i rbod gtong mkhan gyi ngag mnan pa 'di gsungs so// phag thod dam dod thod du/ kho'i srung ma rnams shog bu la bris la/ ngo ma shes na rmi lam du gang byung ba bris la/ rang dang gnyis kyi so

mtshams su/ dong khru gang ba brus la/ kho rang gi ming rus/ der dug sna tshogs dang/ khrag dang/ nyung nag dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ gu gul dang/ gri rgod khrag dang thal chen sbyar ba'i thun la ngan sngags bzlas

te/ gzugs kyi khar mnan/ rbod gtong mkhan gyi srung ma rnams nus pa'i mthu nyams par 'gyur ro// sngags 'di'o// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun srog la thum ril rbad b+h+yo/ rtsa la thun rmugs rbad b+h+yo/

khrag la mugs ti thun rbad b+h+yo/ snying thur nag po khas khas yan yan/ gar b+ha na hUM dza dza bi ti s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan/ zhes bzlas na/ pho nya rkang mgyogs kho rang la/ gnod cing bzlog par 'gyur ro// de nas yang

sngags pa nus pa can gyi stobs dang nus pa mnan pa 'di gsungs so// kho'i zag pa'i rdzas blangs la/ kho rang gi 'dra 'bag byas la ming dang rus dgod do// de'i lce snying gar drangs la/ lce la sngags dgod
do// lce steng du phur pa sor bzhi pa gcig gdab bo// de gti mug nag po'i snying du bcug la/ mchod rten bang rim gsum pas mnan no// de yang zla ba nag po kho rang dur du zhugs pa la bya'o// gza' phur
bu'am/ skar ma lag sor la bya'o// des ni kho'i sngags bzlas pa thams cad// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa gnyis su gyur nas/ lce la lcags kyi gzer gyis gtab nas ri rab khong seng brgyud nas/

'gyur dbang med par bsam mo// ngan sngags ni/ e myags ya rngubs mugs shag ka dun/ a mu ka snying du nan/ pri du nan/ tsit+ta dza di nan yang nan/ snying gzir sbur nan/ kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badzra ti sta/ man+t+ra b+hi taM

s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan/ zhes bzlas so// rtag tu kha dang lce la 'brum pa 'ong ba dang skrang bar 'gyur ro// sngags de khri phrag gcig gam gsum rdzogs nas gnan par bya'o// skabs su a+yai ring dang ting 'dzin bsdebs la
bya'o// drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud las/ sngags pa stobs can ngag mnan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gtad mkhan nang 'gras na/ gtad bzlog nag po rus sbal mjing bsnol
gyi 'khor lo 'di gsungs so// tA la'i lo ma'am rgya shog la/ klu mgo dgu pa'i lto bar 'khor lo bcas la/ bdag 'chi bdag nag por bsgoms te/ ngan sngags 'di zhag gsum bzlas la/
'khor lo rus sbal gyi lto bar bcug la/ rang gi gnas su mchod rten nag po'i 'og tu mnan te/ skabs su sngags pa brgya brgya tsam bzlas na/ gtad mkhan de myur du brlag par 'gyur ro// ngan sngags ni/ e

dun ka yaM/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la breng shag hur thums rbad/ a+ye myags ya rngubs/ mugs shag ga dun/ nag po baM tsit+ta la rgyob/ trag thur snying sgul/ myags myags/ rtsa bzhi skums/ shan shan dgra

bo'i srog la shan/ thur thur dgra bo'i snying la thur rbad sa na ga ha la tsa ma ri dgra bo'i snying la thun b+h+yo/ zhes mtshon cha bsnol mar bzlas te/ rus sbal gyi khog par bcug la mnan no// zhes gsungs so// drag
po sngags rgod sdig pa snyings 'dzings kyi rgyud las/ las kyi 'khrul 'khor nag po gtad bzlog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed zla gsang nag po'i snying po las kyi 'khrul 'khor

nag po/ drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying 'dzings kyi rgyud/ snying po don gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bsam gtan lha yul du grags pa rdzogs so//// bal yul gyi rgyal po ba su d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba sangs
rgyas ye shes rin po ches bsgyur ba'o// sa ma ya// rgya rgya rgya//// rgya gar skad du/ ru dra man+t+ra pra ha ra Na kA la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ drag sngags mtshon cha nag po'i rgyud/ dpal gshin rje
gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsum ldan bde ba yis// zungs thub mtshan ma kun spangs shing// yon tan ma lus kun ldan pa// bde ba chen po khyed la 'dud// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus

gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med pa'i pho brang ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can dbang du sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

so// de'i tshe 'khor rdo rje snying po la sogs pa ma bsgribs pa'i chos kyi dbyings na gnas pa rnams dang/ sa lam la gnas pa rnams dang/ bgrod pa phyin ci ma log pa rnams dang/ dregs pa 'dul ba'i khro tshogs
dang/ 'jig rten khram 'debs 'thoms pa'i tshogs dang/ khrag skyugs bshan pa srog la rngam pa'i tshogs dang/ gdug pa gsum dang bcas pa'i sde dpon dregs pa can dang/ thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na/

'jam pa'i rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol/ rnam dag chos sku'i rang bzhin las// 'gro ba 'dul phyir mtshan ma'i sku// thabs kyi rgyal po bde ba che// ye shes rol pa'i las rnams kun// rdzogs
pa'i tshul du rgyas mdzod la// gdug pa 'dul ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam pa nyid mi g.yo ba las rngam tshig drag po'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/

a+ye badzra sarba duSh+taM zhes gsungs pas 'jig rten thams cad 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem/ g.yo zhing ldeg go/ de'i tshe 'khor thams cad brgyal zhing srog dang bral du cha'o// lus sa la brdebs shing
smre sngags 'don no// rigs pa'i rgyal po bde ba che// 'khor du 'dus pa srog dang bral du nye// srog gi snying po 'di bzhes la// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul pa mdzod// ces gsol ba gdab bo// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs te/ rngam pa'i sgra 'di bsgrags so// kun gyi rang bzhin gcig pa la// rtog dpyod snang srid kun khyab gdal// ye shes chen po kun 'byung ba// sna tshogs sbyor ba rgyas
pa'i zhing// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams kyis thos nas/ 'khor gyi gtso bo 'jam pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// yang dag bde ba'i lam mchog las// gsang ba rin chen grub pa'i don// zung
'jug thabs dang shes rab lam// dmod pa drag po rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen po nyid dregs pa can 'dul zhing dmod pa'i las rgyas par mdzad pa'i phyir zil
gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// drag po e yi gzhal yas na// stobs chen dregs pa 'dul ba ste// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi
bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo rdo rje ral gri g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// zhing chen g.yang gzhi ko rlon dang// stag gi sham thabs rab tu

mdzes// sbrul dang rin po che yis mdzes// snyan cha mgur chu tshangs skud dang// phyag zhabs ro nyes rab tu mdzes// dbu la he ru lnga yis brgyan// bdud rgyal srin po'i thod pas spras// thugs mchog smug nag

'khor lo snying// dregs 'dul ljang nag rdo rje phreng// rus sbal rngam pa klog 'gyu ste// dbu la mkha' lding gdug pa 'dul// stag dang seng ge rngam pa la// yang sprul smug nag ro nye 'dren// dug sbrul rlangs pa

dgra la gtong// bdud mo g.yon na nye ba ste// snying 'khyud dung dmar gtso la stob// 'khor gyi mon pa bla 'gugs dang// 'chi bdag tshe bdag srog bdag bcas// ma skyes gdod nas lhun gyis grub// stong pa'i

ngang las rang bzhin 'char// las dang sbyor ba sna tshogs pa// ye shes rol pa'i rgyan du che// bsgro dang phyag rgya stobs can gyis// stobs chen snying pos rang lus bsrung// dus ngan las kyis mnar ba'i tshe// sdang
sems can dang 'gugs byed la// las kyi 'khor lo snying la bskor// 'byung ba rgyu ba'i phung po bshig/ nyon mongs lnga gsum rang gshed dbab// pho nya'i za kha nang du bstan// 'byung bzhi dkrugs
shing skyin thang dbab// las kyi mtha' bsdu mkhas pas brtag/ gsal gsum yin pa gsum gyi gdeng// lhun gyis grub pa'i las su bshad// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las gleng bzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang

po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa'i rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i phrin las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gdug pa'i dben gnas su// mchog gsum tshang ba'i mtshams bcad la// man+Dal mthing nag gru gsum
la// phung sa gsum la dug khrag sku// lho ru rtse bstan rtsang dmar bskor// sha chen snying snas gtor ma brgyan// mon pa'i don dang dpa' bo'i rta/ khyi spyang bya spre'u lug dang

ra// rabs chad nag mo yugs sa phag/ nal bu'i rgya tshil bong bu sbrul// 'bras bu bcas dang don snying la// dregs pa'i dam rdzas bzung la dbye// blta ba chos nyid zab mo'i gdeng// dbang rdzogs rdo rje ye
shes gdang// ye shes lhun grub phyag rgya gsal// spyod pa spyi dang sgo yi gzer// gnod byed gzir ba de bzhin min// chos sku mnyam rdzogs gzir mi dgos// log rtog brkam chags 'khrul pa yi// dug lnga'i
nad kyis zin pa la// bde ba'i stobs med zhen chags can// log pa'i stobs gzhom drag pos gzir// gshin rje la sogs dregs pa yi// rang rang srog dang spyi srog dril// yi ge'i gnad kyis 'joms par
byed/ khams gsum dbang byed dregs pa can// dregs pa'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs pa rang gshed rang gis byed// kun gyi srog snying e la bsdu// 'bru gsum snying rtsa mgrin par gnas// 'bru gnyis mgo

dang yan lag gnas// gnod byed 'bru drug shes rgyud dbang// de la sngags kyi stobs kyis gzir// rang gshed phyag cha rang la bskor// lha bsnyen brtan thob sgra la dbyung// A+oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha

b+han dza hUM phaT/ bdag nyid sku gsum rdzogs par bsgom// stobs kyi drag sngags 'bum tsho bcu// snying sna dam rdzas gang grub dbye// spyi dril las dang rang rang dbye// myur dang stobs dpag med pa 'byung// sgrub
bya las kyi shes rgyud la// rno dbal mtshon cha'i yi ge gnas// snying la nr-i gnas mgrin par hur// lte bar thums dang gsang bar dza// klad par hrig nan mgo steng nan// rtsa bzhi'i mdud pa 'bru bzhis

gcod// mtshon cha'i rgyal po rno dbal ldan// rtsa srog shes rgyud dran pa gcod// de bskul mtshon cha rgyud la ldang// stobs kyi sngags kyis 'phen par byed// e badzra sarba dus tan/ e tri nan/ e hur thums
dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ de yis sbyor ba stobs zhan na// ming dang snying po 'bru re sbyar// 'bru bzhi mtshon cha'i stobs kyis gcad// las dang sbyor ba rtsa dang srog/ thams cad gang 'dod mi 'jig
gcod// gang brtsam las la don med na// stobs dang bcas pa dril la brdeg/ rang lus brtan pa'i shes rgyud la// badzra sarba dus stan gnas// rang lus gnas pa'i go chas bsrung// zhes gsungs

so// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las rang gshed dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ sngags sor bzhag/ e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag

ra ma tsa ya/ e badzra sarba dus tan/ trig nan/ hur thums dza/ e mA ra ya rbad/ srog la tsa sha ru ti nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ srog la mA ra ya nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ srog la tsit+ta 'gu li ni mA ra ya rbad/ srog la e baM raM yaM khaM nr-i

mA ra ya rbad/ srog la khyer phyung baM shag mA ra ya rbad/ nr-i hur thums dza s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ ang+ku sha dza/ ag+ne dz+wa la raM/ srog la kI li kI li ya/ trig nan big+h+naM snying la gzir nan/ hur thums dza/ myags thums ril rbad
ya/ mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa cham la dbab pa'i phrin las 'di gsungs so// ngo bo ma bcos bde ba chen

po'i ngang// chos nyid ye nas lhun gyis grub// ye shes dkyil 'khong snang la rang bzhin med// sprul pa sna tshogs log rtog 'dul la mkhas// tha snyad tshig rnams don la yang dag stong// de rtogs sangs rgyas
yin pa gsad mnan med// bden don ma rtogs sdug bsngal phung por smin// lus ngag sems kyi 'du byed kyis// gzhan las lhag pa'i stobs rnyed pas// dregs pa'i lus ngag sems su snang// gdug pa'i
sems kyis gcod cing rngam// de la sngags kyi sbyor ba brdeg/ rang bdud phyag cha rang la bskor/ khams gsum dbang byed dregs pa yin// dregs pa'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs pa'i rang gshed rang gis
byed// yi ge spyi yis gzir byas la// dregs pa'i rnam shes yig 'bru gcig/ 'phrog byed yi ge 'bru gsum gyis// snying gi dkyil las 'phrog cing 'dzin// gcod byed mtshon cha 'bru bzhi yis// rang srog
rang gis gcod par byed// dregs pa spyi yi gnad rnams dang/ dregs pa sgos kyi sbyor ba'i stobs// las dang nus pa sbyar la gzud// gzir dang srog dbrog rbad pa'i las// rang gnad gzhom pa 'di lta

ste// zhi khro gshin rje phur pa dang// ma mo bdud mo srin mo dang// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po btsan// rmu dang rU tra srin po dang// gnod sbyin skyes bu gying dag dang// thug bdag sri can gdug pa gsum// de
nyid shes na rang srog gcod// dregs pa'i phyag cha rang la 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di dag bstan to// e badzra sarba dus tan sarba sha trun/ oM shrI badzra kro d+ha/ e ya ma

ya/ ma ma ru lu ma/ dun ting kI lA ya/ ta tir ti ka/ ru tra du/ de ba a/ dan tang me/ mun mun pa/ rA tsa tsa/ rak+sha ra/ rag mo ra/ yak+Sha yak+Sha/ yag mo k+Sha/ shu la dza/ badzra sa du tri/ haM shaM tri/ ru tri ru/ sa nA ga phu/

de sngags kyi grong khyer te// sngags pa nang 'gras pa/ dregs pa'i lha 'dre rgyud la gnod pa dang/ rtags dang sbyar zhing sngags kyi phyag cha rang la bskor// rtags rnams 'khrugs na stong gsum gcig dril gzir/

bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ gsum mam lnga ru drag por gzir// dang po rab sgrub snying po drangs// gnad du gzir zing dgug par bya// bos shing gzir la srog snying dbrog/ ming dang rnam shes 'bru bzhis
gcod// tha ma gnan bsreg dam bdar gces// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las dregs pa gzir ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsad pa las kyi rang gshed mtshon cha rang bzlog
gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs so// phung sa'i 'brub khung mthing nag tu// mtshon cha dmar po srin mo 'gros// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// 'khor lo rim pa gsum pa ste// drag po dbang gi 'khor lo
brgyad// dregs pa gang sgrub lto bar bca'// ming dang rnam shes bsgyur cing bsad// rang gshed rang la dbab cing bskor// des kyang lus sems ma phyed na// dug lnga lngas ni 'khor lo bskor// dug gsum
shes pa ar la gtad// tsit+ta gnad la dbab cing bsad// 'byung ba dkrugs pas phung po 'jig/ rang bsgrubs dam can rang la bzlog/ tsit+ta dkrug pa'i sngags dang bsdebs// gshed po las rgyal lto bar

bsad// gu ru seng ge'i khog mi bshig/ dam mi gcig dang sngags pa spyi// rdo rje spun dang ur mo pa// las kyi skabs sbyar 'khor lo dkrug/ 'di min las gzhan yug pa brkyang// mtshon cha nag po'i sku'i rgyud
las/ bsad pa srog tig las kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyin thang drag po chu 'khyags dbab pa 'di gsungs so// gnyan ra gdug pa'i gnas dag tu// rabs

chad thod pa spyang ki'i khrag/ gsum la khrag gis kha so skus/ khrag dug yul ming srung ma bzhugs// rta nag lug gam rta dkar snying// ra dmar rgya bo sbrul gyi snying// gri bo rabs chad nag po'i snying// dam rdzas

rten la sde brgyad bsten// thod pa dong bur yugs sa sme// gri dang mnol gyi khrag blugs la// drag sngags 'bum tsho bcu ru bstim// rta tsho gsum po me thab tshul// yul gyi kyang mdun dbus su gzhug/ dril dang
bzlog sngags mngon du dbab// ma phebs sbyor ba stobs zhan na// sde brgyad snying po gnad nas dbrog/ dmar nag dug khrag klong du sdud// sngags rnams dkrugs la sde brgyad gzir// snying sna
bsres la 'og tu gzhug/ gshin rje gshed dang stobs chen bsgom// snying po 'bru brgyad bsreg cing sdud// de yis chu rkod ri ltar gtibs// dril dang gtor ma bsnol mar brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis chu 'khyags dbab pa 'di gsungs so/ sngags sor bzhag byas shing dpe tshan 'di dang gcig las bsdur sa ma rnyed// e badzra sarba dus tan/ ma ma/ ya ma ra tsa mu sa trig nan// ku ma hri ta khraM khraM shar shar kha hur thog phob tris mu tsa ra la

ya// hril shar phraM phraM/ ya ma mu tsa mun pa tri hur thums dza/ trig nan phraM phraM hril hril/ kham shar hril hril b+h+yo/ su trig nan sa na ga khaM shar hril phob/ de yis 'khyags pa ri ltar spungs// ma phebs sbyor ba stobs

zhan na// zhing lpags brgyangs la gsum du bskor// dbus su thig bzhi le tshe brgyad// phyi rim rtsibs drug la long mtshon// lte bar e dang badzra la// phyogs bzhir stobs la mtshams bzhi srog/ drug la srog
dbrog gzir ba ste// tha mar mtshon cha 'bru bzhis gcod/ kha sbyar bcas la dug mes bdug/ des ni las rnams 'grub par bshad// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las chu 'khyags dbab pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa rnams kyi rtags bzung ba 'di gsungs so// sngags pa rbod gtong 'gras pa'am// dregs pa'i tshogs kyi rtags bstan pa// mon dang zhub can mdze can

rnams// gshin rje gshed kyi rtags su bshad/ khrag mtsho mun pa ma mo'i rtags// me 'bar phyur ba na 'un [\[]bun [\]]rtags// bya nag shing chen bdud kyi rtags// 'bag seng btsad po rgyal po'i rtags// nag po

bzhad khro bya nag 'thab// me 'bar tshig pa bdud mo'i rtags// spre'u dang ban de dge bsnyen rtags// rta pa khyi spyang btsan gyi rtags// khyi dmar khrag mtshon the rang rtags// g.yag dang bon po mu stegs

rtags// me 'bar sha rgal srin po'i rtags// kya mul skya bshar the brang ngo// bya nag bud med dam sri'i rtags// rgol dang khro na rbod gtong yin// las byed gar stabs sha la rol// ded dang brdeg na thub pa'i
rtags// rmi lam sna tshogs phyi yi rtags// dbang po mngon sum nang gi rtags// lus yang sems gsal gsang ba'i rtags// zhes pas rtags bzung 'khor lo bskor// gnam la shing lo gtibs pa'i
sprin// bar snang rlung sgra 'od chags med// sa la 'khyags rom stom ma lud// dug rlangs 'chol ba skyin thang rtags// mtshon cha nag po'i sku'i rgyud las rtags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis mnan pa'i las 'di gsungs so// gzhan gyi rbod gtong mnan pa dag/ zhi khro ya ma phur pa ni// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'og tu mnan// ma mo bdud mo srin po rnams// bka'
rten byin can 'og tu mnan// bdud dang mu stegs mgon po rnams// ro khang sgo srung 'og tu mnan// rgyal po dge bsnyen dkor srung rnams/ khyi tshang lam ka'i 'og tu mnan// btsan dang srog bdag srin po

rnams// sha ru spyang thod gong gsum mnan// the brang phyag 'gong gshin rngog rnams// glang rur bcug la lam mdor mnan// bon po rig 'dzin khyi tshang mnan// sri can chu bya them 'og mnan// srin po gdug

pa'i thod pa la// ri rab rgya gram dang bcas la// thugs kyi snying po rab mdzes pa// mnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lo bshad// gri lcags phur pa gdug pa la// rdzas rgod bdug ste snying la gdab// bco brgyad rdzas
kyi dud pas bdug/ dregs pa gnad la dbab par bshad// bsreg pa me yi 'khor lo dag/ me thab bcas la me lha bskyed// ling+ga bdug la dug khrag nyug/ dug sngags brab cing bsreg par bya// las rnams
rdzogs nas stong nyid la// dregs pa thams cad zhi bar bsgyur// phyis kyi dngos grub bsdu bar bya// lha la stong pa'i rgya yis gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags thun gzer la
dbab bya ba// thod khrag dug chu stong skor tshad// ldan pa gsum gyis zor du 'phang// nyung dkar thal chen rdo thun brab// gzugs dang thal ba dong der sba// gnan pa gsang ba'i las su rig/ ces gsungs
so// mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las/ las kyi mtha' sdud pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor la rgyud gtad pa/ e ma rdo rje snying po che// nga yi bka' rgyud me lce

'di// rgyal ba kun gyi mdzad spyod ste// skye med rdo rjes bsam dpag dka'// stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag brgyad// snying po don gyi gnad bsdus pa'o// brjod pa kun grol bka' dang ldan// bde ba gcig
gis bgrod pa 'di// sangs rgyas spyod lam bcing grol med// gab ba gsang ba'i lam can 'di// rigs can rdo rje snying pos zung// nga yi bka' yi gsang rgyud 'di// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// nga yang

dam las mi g.yel bsrung// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyal po dang// stobs dpag med pa'i khro tshogs kun// dam can sgrub byed bsrung zhing gnas// rgyud kyi snying po rab tu zung// rnam rtog mtshan ma rang grol ba'i// rdo

rje rgyal po bde ba'i bka'// lcags thogs spu gri rbab chen 'di// lha dang mkha' 'gro gsang ba yi// thun min rigs dang thun mong kun// snying po sngags kyi gsang rgyud zung// dam tshig bsrung dang thugs brtse
'ong// de skad gsungs pas 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang ste mngon par bstod do// drag sngags mtshon cha nag po sku'i rgyud las// rgyud gtad cing yi rang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// sde

brgyad cham la 'bebs shing rang gshed rang la 'bebs pa'i rgyud// rdo rje thogs 'bebs sku'i rgyud ces bya ba// lha yul du grags pa rdzogs so//// bal po ba su d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba

slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes kyis/ ba ta sa ru mkha' 'gro dang bka' 'gros te bsgyur ba'o// snying po'i rgyud dam pa/ snying po don gyi rgyud/ rtsigs su bzhag pa lags so// rgya rgya rgya/ phra rgyun lags so// \u0f35\u0f35a+thi+-i/ ya
mAn thanaH////

rgya gar skad du/ shri A yuHpa ti ra kA la tan+t+ra/ e man+ta twa ta dzi bin rA ga ka so ri nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal tshe bdag nag po'i rgyud/ drag sngags kyi de kho na srog dmar len gyi spu gri zhes bya ba/ dpal tshe
bdag nag po bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi pho brang na/ khyab gdal chen po'i gnas zhe sdang chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzhal

yas na/ 'khor du ma 'dus pa'i nang nas/ rdo rje yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ bde ba'i ye shes can dang/ bgrod pa phyin ci ma log pa dang/ lam nye bar 'dzin pa dang/ gar dgu'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'bar ba'i rnam
pa dang/ lam las gol ba'i rdzu 'phrul can rnams dang thabs cig tu zhe sdang chen po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rngam par bzhugs so// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi phyogs bcu g.yos par gyur te/ 'khor
rnams rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ 'jigs shing skrag nas brgyal la khad do// 'khor de'i nang nas rig pa'i stobs can longs te gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams 'khor du mchi/ 'khor
la thugs rje ma chung mdzod// mgo lus snying yang 'gas pa snyam// gdung ba'i shugs kyis nye bar mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te dgyes pa'i nga ro 'di ston
to/ sngags sor bzhag/ a e ha ha yA ga sha de pa ti su ma ra raM raM zhes bsgrags so// 'khor thams cad rang rang gi yid rang bzhin gyi me ru 'bar nas tshig cing brlag la khad do// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis 'khor de dag gi rang rang gi rang bzhin mthong ngo/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po tshe bdag nag pos/ nyid kyi srog gi snying po de kho na nyid yang nas yang du rnam par bsgrags so// e
e e e zhes brjod pas chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa ma skyes pa// 'dus ma byas pa/ nam mkha' lta bur rang grol pa'o// de la chos thams cad 'byung zhing ye shes rang la gnas so// de la chos thams
cad drag po'i gtum rngam 'bar bas ye shes thig le'i ngang du rang bcom mo// de la chos thams cad zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me yis rtog 'dzin thams cad bsregs te rang skam nas ye shes rang gsal lo// de las
'khor thams cad ye shes skyes te rang rang gi srog gi snying po thams cad mdongs gsol du phul lo// de la thugs kyi sprul pa tshe bdag nag po mgo dgu pa yis/ ka zhes zhes rngam par bsgrags pas phrin
las thams cad lhun gyis grub cing yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ de nas yum gsod byed kyi rgyal mos myags shes phul bas/ log pa'i srog dbang du 'dus nas ye shes kyi thig ler gsal ba'o// phyag na rdo
rjes rngubs shes phul bas ye shes chen po'i mes khrag dang bag chags bskams nas phyag rgya brtan par rang gsal ba'o// rus sbal gyi rgyal pos mugs shes bsgrags pas/ 'gro ba rmongs pa'i srog bsdus te/

bla dang tshe srog bcangs te chos nyid du rang grol ba'o// ya ma rA tsa sa ya zhes pas/ rang gi las kyi rlung gis lha dang lus srog phrogs nas/ ye shes bla ma'i sar bgrod pa'o// bya khyung gi rgyal pos shag ces pas/
gdug pa'i dug rlangs thams cad bcom nas/ nye bar bgrod pa thob pa'o// las kyi tshe bdag nag pos dun zhes phul bas/ srid pa'i srog rten zhi nas 'od dmar nag 'thibs pa phrogs nas/ kun tu bzang po

bde ba chen por rang grol ba'o// de nas mon pa seng ge'i mgo can gyis/ srog la baM raM kha thum yaM yaM rbad/ ces phul bas/ srog gi rten gzhi gcod par 'gyur ro// de nas mon pa stag gi mgo can gyis/ srog

la hril myags thum shag rbad/ ces phul bas/ dwangs ma bzhi yis rang rang gcod par gyur to// mon pa dred kyi mgo can gyis/ srog la gzir thums raM thun rbad/ ces phul bas/ srog gi dwangs snyigs phyed pa

gyur to/ mon pa khyung gi mgo can gyis/ srog la mA ra ya thun rbad/ ces phul bas/ srog gi bla mtsho bskams par gyur to// bdud kyi srog gshed chen po bzhis/ srog la hri shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog
la thun rmugs tsit+ta breng shag dza/ byer hur thums dza/ srog la thun gzer shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ zhes phul bas/ tshogs drug rten las 'phos par gyur to// de nas srid pa'i lha gdon drag

po rnams kyis/ srog la mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag thums dza/ zhes phul bas/ tshogs brgyad sgo 'gags par 'gyur ro/ de nas rmu'i rgyal pos/ srog la hur thum rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ zhes phul bas/

bsod nams che ba'i lus srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas btsan gyi rgyal po rnams kyis/ srog la thums shag rbad/ tsit+ta hur breng dza/ zhes phul bas/ lus kyi 'byung ba dkrugs te 'pho bar gyur to// de nas

rgyal po sde bzhis srog la breng breng rbad/ ni srog tum tum rbad/ khaM shag rtsa la rbad/ srog la myogs rbad/ khyer byung mugs/ ti ling shag ling dza/ zhes phul bas/ rgyu bdun gegs su skyes par gyur to// de nas

bdud kyi rkya dmag 'bum sdes/ srog rtsa khrag ting snying phyung thums ril raM shag rbad/ ni srog hur thums dza/ zhes phul bas nang khrol smad lnga gtubs par gyur to// de nas srin po pho mos/ e baM raM khraM shig tsit+ta

rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog la thun rmugs ling shag rbad/ ces phul bas/ bla dang rnam shes gags [\[]'gag [\]]pas 'pho'o// de nas ma mo'i tshogs 'bum sdes/ srog la hur long rbad/ tsit+ta khrag thibs/ hur thums

dza/ zhes phul bas/ rnam shes rten las 'pho bar gyur to// yang ma mo rnams kyis/ srog la baM ril raM shag rbad/ tsit+ta byer thum hur thums dza/ zhes phul bas rims dal yams kyi nad 'bebs par gyur to// de

nas gdug pa gsum gyi tshogs kyis/ srog la baM ril raM shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng hur thums dza/ zhes phul bas/ gdug pa'i spu gris lus srog gcod par gyur to// de nas sde brgyad gza' dang lha srin gyis/ phroM phroM/

shar shar/ hril nA ga snying gzer/ rbud yaM thun yaM hril shag b+h+yo// zhes phul bas srog dbugs dang lo tog rtsi bcud thams cad bcad de 'pho ba'o// de nas stobs can rnams kyi mthu dril te/ srog la rbad thum

ril rbad/ rtsa khrag tsit+ta phyung/ nr-i srog hur thums dza/ zhes phul bas/ rtsa dang srog zungs bcad de 'pho ba'o// dregs pa can thams cad kyi mthu stobs dril te/ snying gzer sbur nan ha la ha la tsa ma ri phyung/ e
hur thums dza/ khams shag rbad/ ces phul bas/ rang gi mthus gzir ba dang/ dug dbyung ba dang/ srog dbrog pa dang/ sbyor ba bcad pa'o// de nas 'khor de dag rab tu 'dus nas/ dgyes pa'i mdangs

rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ e he he he e hur thums dza/ zhes sgra bsgrags pas/ nye bar las la brtson pa'i tshul gyis rang rang gi shes pa'i rgyud la 'dus te thim
pas/ bdud dang gshed rang gi rgyud las ldang zhing/ rang gcod kyi mtshon cha bskul bas/ rtsa dang srog zungs rang gshed gcod cing/ khrag dang bag chags rang skyes te/ thod par snying po dang srog
sdud pa'o// dpal tshe bdag nag po srog dmar len gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'khor rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin
dngos// gsang sngags ngo bo de nyid lags// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa'i mthu rtsal ldan pa kun// srog snying dbul zhing las la gnyer// bka' bzhin nye ba ji lta bu// lhun grub zil
gnon phyag rgya bstan// gnyen po gang phyir brjid pa'i sku// drag pos gdul bya gang lags pa// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba gsum gyi don rgyas par

bshad do// bskal pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la// rigs las gol ba'i khro bo la// nag po 'thom byed bdud kyi gtso// srid pa'i mnga' bdag khrag skyugs gcod// rtsub khro srog gcod ging gi gtso// zhe sdang gdug pa

gdug khro'i gtso// phung byed nag po tshe yi bdag/ 'byung ba bzhi yi rngam 'og na// brgyad gnyis drug gnyis bzhi dbus na// lus chen yan lag rags la rngam// skra dang kha spu ag tshom rtsub// stod smad srin pa'i

rlon gyi shun// mgo dang snying gi phreng bas brgyan// mtshon cha me rlung dug gi mtshon// thogs nas rnam bzhi'i 'khor la 'tshe/ myur du gsod cing sha rlon za// mngal du 'tshub cing rak+ta 'dzag/ thod rus 'bru mar

dkrugs shing 'thungs/ ded dpon bzhi yi 'khor la rbod// chags pa'i rgya mtsho myos par byed// gdug pa'i me yis rang rgyud bsreg/ de lta bu yi sde bzhi'i gtso// rU tra nag po tshe yi bdag/ de yi bstan pa gting
nas dkrugs// rnam bzhi'i 'khor la 'tshe bar byed// 'gro ba ma lus bsdus shing gsod// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bde ba'i dbang phyug ded dpon zhes// rigs kyi bdag por grags pa cig/ gsang sngags de
nyid ris su phye// brda' don ma grol lhug par spyad// bgrod pa ma thob dpe las mtshon// rang nyams ma rnyed brkam chags spyad// rigs ngan mo la grogs su spyod// sha chen keng rus rgyan la rol// gsang
sngags bka' bsgo log pa yis// dus ma yin par tshe 'phos nas// na rag rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// bzhi brgya mtha' ru sdug bsngal myong// chad las rgal te bde bas brel// bskal pa bzhi nas brgyad gnyis

'khor// tsha grang gnas nas bskal pa bzhir// 'khor zhing sdug bsngal zad mtha' ru// nyi tshe nye 'khor kha 'khor nas// bskal pa gnyis su sdug cing 'khyams// de mthar phyi nang sgrib pa'i gnas// gzugs che
ske dang yan lag phra// rnag khrag ngan skyugs lcags thum mid// bskal pa gcig tu sdug cing 'khyams// de mthar rdzu 'phrul drag po'i gnas// lcags mkhar bcu gnyis brgyad gnyis 'obs// thod
mkhar bzhi dbus sha khrag za// rngam pa'i nga ros 'khor rnams mngags// de ltar rnam smin mang bsags pas// gnas su rU tra nag por smin// de yis 'jig rten phung byed na// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rgyud

nas// byin rlabs mthu rtsal stobs 'gran te// nag po de nyid 'dul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas cho 'phrul sna tshogs mdzad// stong pa'i rang bzhin de stong kyang// stong pas nag po sde ma stongs// sangs rgyas rdul

snyed zhing khams 'dod// nag po'i sha khrag rngam zhing rol// des ma bskyod phyir stobs chen gsum// ya ma badzra ha la'i sku// rang rang lag cha cha byad 'khor// sngags tshig drag po rngam bzlas nas// nag po tshe yi
bdag po la// lus ngag skong phyir me rlung sbrul// nad dang mtshon cha'i char phab nas// nag po 'khor bcas dga' mgu nas// sha khrag ro dang bdud rtsir 'gyur// mnga' brnyes sde las rgyal la khad// des

ma thul nas khro bor bya/ khro bo sme ba brtsegs pa yis// rdo rje srin po 'khor dang bcas// nag po bsgral la bza' bar rngams// gsang sngags gdug pa'i nga ror bton// ye shes me yis sras mchog sprul// tshe

bdag drag po gshin rje yis// kI la tsit+ta'i dkyil du bza'// btab pas sme brtsegs de nyid rgyal// rdo rje srin po'i 'khor brlags nas// nag po dregs pa'i tshe bkrag phrogs// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul zhi bar

byas// des ma thul te dgongs pa bsdus// gsang sngags ngo bo de kho na// dwangs ma chen po lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga nyid de rtogs pa'i// rigs lnga'i gtso bo spyi yi gzugs// ka la mthing nag brjid pa'i

sku// zil gnon phyag rgya chen po nyid// stong nyid ma skyes 'gag med pa'i// lhun grub ye shes thams cad mkhyen// lhun po ri rab brtan ltar brjid// rnam par dbu gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyud drug 'khor ba
bsgral ba'i rtags// pha rol phyin phyag ye shes drug/ skye ba rnam bzhi dag pa'i rtags// tshad med zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang// sra byed brtan pas thams cad gnon// mnyen byed bskyil zhing sdud pa'i
dbang// gsal byed khrag chu bag chags bsregs// g.yeng byed rkyen med rang shugs ldan// snang byed go 'byed khebs 'og chud// rgyu rkyen thabs la rag ma lus// bde ba chos sku stong bdag med// stong las
kun skyes bsam dpag dka'// nag po 'dul phyir sna tshogs sprul// ya ma badzra khyams khang khyung// de bzhin gnyis ldan seng ge stag/ gdug pa'i ye shes khro chung 'bar// tshul dgu chas dgu rgyan dgu
dang// gar dgu stabs dgu rngam sgra dgu// thod sbrul rin po che la sogs// gsod byed khrag skyug tshogs kun gnon// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje 'phen// be con gtun shing sdigs 'dzub
brdeg/ nag po gel pa bsgyel te mnan// phyi nang gshed 'khor 'chi bdag tshogs// yang sprul drug khri drug stong bcas// rngam zhing dregs pa'i 'gying stabs kyis// nag po 'khor bcas gdan du bting// nag
po brgyal sangs 'dar zhing sleb// zil gnon phyag rgya'i gdan du gsol// 'khor rnams dbang bsdus mdangs dang phral// 'khor du las kyi sgrib pa sbyangs// snam nas slar bton bran khol bskos// srog gi
snying po rang dbang bsdus// nag pos rngam pa'i sme jags bton// bdag cag rgyal ba'i 'khor lags kyis// 'khor la thugs rje ma chung mdzod// bka' la thogs shig bka' bzhin 'gyid// ci bcol las
rnams bka' bzhin nyan// zhes gsol to// de phyir rgyud 'di drag jags bshad// ces 'khor la rgyas par gsungs so// drags sngags kyi de kho na nyid srog dmar len spu gri las dregs pa can btul ba'i
le'u ste gnyis pa'o/// de nas 'khor gyi nang nas rdo rje 'dzin pa stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ho bcom ldan khrag 'thung dpal// las rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ru// brnag
pa'i rgyal po dmar len la// rtsa ba dag dang man ngag gi/ las kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po don gyi man ngag rgyas pa bshad do// dmar len don gyi man

ngag las// rtsa ba rnam pa gnyis su bshad// thun mong dang ni khyad par ro// thun mong sbyor ba rnam pa lnga// 'bru bzhi'i sbyor ba drug gnyis bzhi// kun 'byung rtsa ba brgyad gnyis gcig/ gab pa'i sbyor ba bzhi
gnyis ldan// gsad gzir gnan gzir bsrung dang dbab// bsreg dang srog dbrog dbral bar shis// yan lag sdig pa'i phag mo gnyis// skye ba rlung bshig rang bdud 'phel// rnal mar spog dang tsher

spogs dkrug/ 'pho tshul gnyis ldan bde ba gcig/ ye shes rig pa rang rtsal bgrod// kun gyi mtha' ru 'byung ba dkrug/ thun mong phung byed sdig pa 'joms// 'byung ba gnam bstan gnyis ldan pa// ma sbyangs
dag pa'i tshul du bgrod/ khyad par las rim gsum gnyis gcig/ phye ba'i rim pa bde dang ldan/ khyab gsal spogs med bde dang ldan// snying po mchog gi rtsa bar gsungs// gnyen pos 'phen cing gcod par
bskul// spu gri'i las su gcod cing sdud// rang grub bdud gshed 'chi bdag ldang// rang gsal bskul bas ya yis bskyod// thugs rje shugs sgrol thar pa'i lam// bde ba'i ye shes rang nyid
ldan// phyag rgya rang gsal bgrod thob med// 'gag med snying po mchog nyid gsal// bden pa gnyis med chos skur gcig/ thams cad 'joms sgrol bde chen nyid// nyid las gzhan du btsal
yang med// gser bug snying po rang bstan yin// kun thub snying po las dbang 'joms// srog ces bya ba 'pho bar byed// gnyis med rig pa lha ru gsal// srin mo las kyi mtha' ru 'pho// sbyor ba lhan cig
lnga'am gsum// rgyal ba'i bka' thub rgyal mtheb mngag/ rang nyid che ba'i gnas la gnas// lo thog gzhom pa'i las gsum gyis// 'bras bu med par 'chang sgrol bgrod// bsrung ba'i rgyal po gcig
tu dril// nye ba'i dbang po rang gnas gzir// dug dang sbyor ba byad gzhug 'byin// las dang sbyor ba gshog cing gcod// tsit+ta'i dkyil nas rnam shes 'phrog/ lus med dbang po yid kyis 'joms// de med
sbyor ba yug pa brkyang// rang gshed rang bdud rang la ldang// rang rgyud rang gnas gsum gnyis gcig/ gnas dang slong dang rkyen dang gcod// 'pho dang bgrod dang srog sdud bcas// las de chos nyid rang
grol yin// mtha' ru lhun grub bsreg dang sbyar// nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi la// bsreg mnan gcod pa'i 'khor lo bca'// mngag dang gzir dang bstab dang dbul// las gnyer gtad mthar zor dang
mnan// rang gi ye shes gsal zhing 'bar// me dang tsha ba bsreg cing bdo// sbyor ba mngon du gsad dang 'pho// dkar nag las de gab sbas gsang// las tshogs rgyas pa lhun gyis grub// rgyud kyi rang bzhin
bdun nam gcig/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// blta spyod 'khor lo dam tshig dbang// las rim sbyor ba 'brel bcas yin// gzhi lam 'bras bu lhun grub gcig/ phyi nang gsang ba bshad pa'i
mtha'// kun 'dus rig pa'i mtshon char bshad// srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las/ dngos gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des rgyud

kyi don 'di rgyas par bshad do// ma byung ma skyes ye shes sku// 'gag med bde chen khyab gsal sku// lhun grub spros bral phyag rgya'i sku/ khyab gdal thig le nyag gcig sku// ma 'gags kun gsal spang blang
med// sna tshogs rol pa bya btsal bral// nam mkha' yongs la mdung bskor ba// sangs rgyas mdzad pa kho thag chad// gnas pa rang rgyud drug dang ldan// sum cu gnyis rtsibs bde chen gnas// 'bru bzhi yan
lag 'pho dang bcas// 'bru drug longs spyod gsal dag 'bar// brgyad dbus bzhi ldan chos 'khor lo// lam nyid don ldan 'bras bur smin// bcu drug bzhi ldan sprul pa'i gnas// bzhi rtsibs gsal ba rdzong
la gnas// drug rtsibs 'khor lo mdo gsum 'dzin// rang bdud rang gshed mnyam pa'i don// bde ba'i rgyal po rang gsal yin// spyod pa las kyi 'khor lo mtshon// lnga brgyad phral nas sum cu
gnyis// de dag rang rgyud gnas pa yin// gnas pa'i 'khor lo thod par bca'// thod par snying po bcud sdud byed// las dang srog dang bla sdud la/ khyams khang gshed kyi gsang mdzod yin// rig pa srog tu
bgrod byas la// dpa' bo gri mo lang tsho la// sbyangs pa gsum dang lha bgod la// sngags kyi drod ldan brtul zhugs blang// de bzhin rgyal rigs nyid la bsngags// bcu gnyis bcu drug bar la brtag/ gong
bzhin brtags la brtul zhugs blang// rkyen gsum rang rgyud drug bkod la// sbyang bsregs dbab bskyil thig ler gsal// sme ba don dang mnyam sbyar la// brtul zhugs rnam gsum longs spyod ldan// skye ba

med pa'i dbyings su sgrol// spyi dang khyad par yan lag gsum// bsrung dang ma bsrungs bde dang sdug/ bde chen na rag dong sprug gi/ las kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// rtsa ba kun 'byung 'khor lo ni// gsang chen

mchog tu dril ba'o// yang gsang sbyor ba drug gnyis lnga/ gol dang smin pa'i las kyang// brda don dril ba ma yin pas// ha la nag po sbrul 'dzin ltar// sbyor ba bcu bdun dag dang ldan// don gnyis mngon du spyod pa
yis// bla chen sprul pa yang sprul chags// rtags med kun 'byung drug dang ldan// 'bras bu 'joms pa'i las bzhi yin// chu dril zor 'phang du bas gzir// chu rgod gnam thog ri ltar 'bebs// dmar len
sngags kyi mthu bsdus nas// las kyi 'khrul 'khor mtshon char 'bebs// snying po kun gyi mthu dril nas// 'bru brgyad dmod pa'i lus dang sbyar// rigs sogs las dbang gnod pa'i gdon// sngags kyi brdeg

pa drug dang ldan// ltar 'jug phyir 'byung zhen pa zhe sdang gzhi yang bzhi// kun 'byung rtag med khong nas ldan// gang rung mtshon cha kha sbyar bca'// brjod pa skabs dang sbyar la spyad// 'og la rjes gcod bsreg pa

brdeg/ kun 'joms sbyor ba'i rgyal po yin// gru bzhi cha mnyam rus sbal ltor// ye shes lnga yi thig drangs la// mgo dang mjug mar thig rkang gdab// de bzhin lto gnyis thig rkang drang// thig bzhi rgya gram
legs par gdab// lto bar 'khor lo bcu gnyis bca'// thig bskor rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum rgya gram ldan// byang khog stod kyi 'khor lo gnyis// rtsibs bcur bla chen sprul pa'i
sngags// g.yas pa'i rtsibs chen bcu bzhi la// yang sprul 'joms pa'i spu gri gnas/ g.yon pa'i rtsibs chen bcu bzhi la// chags sdang 'joms pa'i spu gri gnas// de bzhin bskyed pa'i 'khrul mig
bzhir// bcu gnyis rtsibs 'gyur rtags med dang// kun 'byung sngags kyi gcod pa dgod// de yis bsad pa mchog la sbyar// g.yas g.yon bab lnga'i bco lnga'i rtsibs kyang rtags bdun la// srung
ba'i rtags med kun 'byung bkod// lte ba smad kyi 'khor lo bzhir// rtsibs bdun de bzhin rtsibs dgu bcu// bcu gcig rtsibs dang ldan pa la// mi 'khor 'khor 'jug den pa la// brdeg pa'i drag sngags
tshan re gnas// yan lag lo tog 'joms pa bzhi// kun la rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// lag g.yas bcu drug spogs dang gzir// lag g.yon rtsibs dgu gzir ba'i sngags// rkang g.yas rtsibs bcu thabs kyi
sngags// rkang g.yon bco brgyad du sal 'joms// chu rgod 'khyags pa ri ltar 'bebs// 'og la rjes gcod 'khor lo bsreg/ rgya gram yang log bcu gnyis la// rtsa ba brgyad dang bcu gnyis bsreg/ gdug

pa'i sngags dang rdzas bsreg ldan// bla chen bzhi dang chags ldang bzhi// mi mthun 'khor lo kha sbyar bsngags// sprul pa yang sprul kha sbyor brdeg/ kun 'byung rtags med de bzhin bsdebs// rus sbal lto bar

bsad la sbyar// chu dril gzir ba'i 'khor lo sbyar// zor dang du ba kha sbyor la// dbab dang bsrung ba rus sbal yang// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ kun 'byung rtsa ba'i sngags

'di bton to// srog la hri shag rbad// tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la thun rmugs rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun shag rbad/ nr-i tsit+ta breng breng hur thums dza/ srog la thun gzir shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la yaM

yaM rbad/ nr-i tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la mA ra ya rbad/ nr-i tsit+ta hur breng dza/ tsit+ta gzir nan/ srog la myogs rtsal rbad/ yaM yaM hur tsit+ta kham shag rtsa la myags hab tang hab tang ro myags dza/ kring kring hi nan/ yal

yal tsit+ta rbad/ ha la ha la tsa ma ri kham shag rbad/ ha la ha la yaM yaM tsit+ta breng breng dun dun dza/ de ba dza dun sa/ nA ga snying gzer thun phroM phroM/ hril hril/ shar shar phob/ nA ga dza yaM/ snying gzer shar phroM phob/ dza

yaM phroM shar hril khaM shar hril phob/ nA ga u nan dza yaM phob ya hri da ya phob/ ra mi tsit+ta khaM shag srog la hur thums yaM khaM shag raM thun tsit+ta raM/ nges pa'i don dang ldan pa'i gdeng// nyams rtags phyi ste spyod yul
min// de yi las thig rdzogs par bshad/ rargabraTakaH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa thugs kyi las 'di bshad do// dmar len sngags kyi dmod pa la// dgu gsum gang rung thod pa bya// 'khor

lo rim pa bzhin du bskor// dbus kyi 'khor yug pho brang du// bde ba'i rgyal po nam 'kha'i 'bru// phyi rim bar khyams 'khor lo brgyad// mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// kun gyi dbus su rgya gram ldan// phral
la rtsa ba'i 'bru brgyad dgod// gnyis pa sa khams drug gnyis rtsibs// mnan pa stobs kyi 'bru yi dgang// me khams de bzhin bsreg pas dgang// chu khams de bzhin lo tog 'joms// rlung
khams bcu gnyis bsad la shis// 'degs dang drod mtshams thams cad gzir// g.yeng dang drod mtshams 'bras bu srun// drod dang chu mtshams rnam shes phrogs// g.yeng dang 'degs mtshams gdug pa
gzir// kun kyang rus sbal kha sbyar la// lnga na las rdzogs gdug par gtad// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ drag sngags 'di bton to// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/

dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ nr-i hur thums dza/ dgra bo'i srog la thun gzir sbur nan// dgra bo'i srog la raM thun tsit+ta rbad/ kha raM dz+wa la raM/ nA ga u nan snying gzer phrom shag kham hril phob yA/ sarba u

nan/ thum ril sbur nan sha truM 'drid phyung rbad/ sarba sha truM stam+b+ha ya na sha ya nan rbad/ tsit+ta breng breng rtsa la dun dun/ srog hur thums dza/ sa nA ga ha la ha la yaM yaM snying gzer sbur nan/ phral la las kyi skabs su

bca'// dman pa las kyi sbyar ba bshad// gzhan yang yan lag las gsungs pa// rno myur pho mo'i lto ba ru// ye shes thig le'i ngang las 'char// 'phen dang slaung ba dbugs kyi rta// mtshon cha mu khyud lnga dang
ldan// dbus su gru gsum rgya gram phyi// bcu gnyis rtsibs bsnol bar khyams zlum// dbus su gru gsum brnag pa bstan// gnyis pa rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// bcu gnyis phyi nang gsad pa'i

'bru// bar 'khyams lto sbyor sgrub pa'i sngags// kha sbyor bcas la dong rtsar mnan// sngags kyi yan lag spogs pa yin// gdug pa'i klu la gtad par bya// dgra bo'i srog la hur thums rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag

dza// dza shag breng ta tsi ta thums hur dgra bo'i srog rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thums tsit+ta hur breng dza shag rbad/ brnag pa rno myur stobs dpag med// yan lag rno dbal mtshon cha yin// gzhan yang phung byed

sdig pa'i las// las kyi rim pa sngar bzhin las// khyad par lha srin dkrug pa'i las// sdig pa chen po'i lto ba ru// mu khyud rim pa lnga dang ldan// rgya gram bcu gnyis rtsibs dang khyams// lha srin lto dkrug las

kyi mchog/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang spu gri dgod// kha sbyor dug chu tsha bar ldan// sngags bzlas gdug pa'i klu la gtad// drag sngags sbyor ba dril ba brdeg/ ya rngubs e shag dun myags ka rmugs// dgra bo'i srog

la shag breng dza/ tsit+ta hur thums rbad/ sbyor ba gang brtsam mtha' ru bsngags// spogs pa drag po'i las su bshad// 'bru bzhi las kyi rim pa ni// dur khrod dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i
mtshams bcad la// dur khrod rgyu la thod pa bya// mu khyud bzhi dang ldan par bskor// lte ba gru gsum mA ra nr-i// gnyis pa rdo rje rgya gram la// ye shes sprul pa las bdag yum// gsang ba'i snying po

'bru bzhi dgod// gsum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// mtshan ma gcod pa'i spu gri dgod// phyi yi rtsibs bcu'i rtse mo na// nyi ma gcod pa'i 'bru bcu dgod// mtshon cha bsnol ma'i bar du ming// srid pa'i

rus sbal lto bar bca'// sngags bzlas klu la gnod pa mnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las drag sngags dril ba 'di bton to// e dun ka yaM dgra bo'i srog la breng breng rbad/

nr-i srog la dun dun rbad/ khaM shag rtsa la rbad/ srog la myogs rbad/ khyer phyung mug ti ling shag ling dza/ nyin gsum mtshan gsum sbyor ba brtsam// 'bru bzhi rtsa bzhi gcod par bshad// gzhan yang log tog
gzhom pa ni// lta zor gzir gsum dril la dbab// gcan zan dar ma'i thod pa la// gdug pa gsum gyi khrag gis bsku// khrag gsum dug sna sngo snar bcas// sbyor ba sbal pa'i gsob tu bca'// yul dbus

gdug pa'i rten la gzhug/ bco lnga dgu gsum bzhi la brtsam// mdung gang dmar thag sa sros dbab// lha srin 'byung ba dkrugs la dbab// e yaM ka dun srog gzir trig nan/ raM shar yaM phob dril phroM b+h+yo/
spogs pa med pa'i las su bshad// gzhan yang thog rgod drag po'i las// nye bar gnam thog dril 'bebs pa// 'ug sgong sbrul shun ming bcas dang// gser sogs rgod snying mda' dang dar// me long gri
rgod thod sbos sman// sum bsgril drag po gcig bsdebs pas// gzhung 'phen gnad 'phen gnad la dbab// 'bum phrag bzlas la brgya bar bstim// gong gi dus tshod nyer bar 'phang// gnam thog chen po'i

las kyi mchog/ ka yaM e dun phroM shar sing bkrol/ dral chems yaM raM khas b+h+yo mA ra ya rbad// bde ba'i rgyal po sbyor ba'i mchog/ rig pa'i klong nas 'phen cing 'joms// gzhan yang ltas ngan dbab pa'i

las// bya dang gcan gzan thod chen la// ltas ngan khrag gis kha mig bya// brnag pa'i mkhar dang ming rus bris// bdun khri bdun stong bskor re thun// tshes dang za ma skar ma ni// nag po sme ba gcig la
gtad// them 'og 'gram bres lam du mnan// dgra bo sarba yengs dum ling/ hab phob nan// drag sngags las kyi rgyal po mngag/ gzhan yang srung ba'i las 'di gsungs// dur khrod ras sam shog gu

la// sbyor ba lnga dang tsha ba dug/ las kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// phyi rim rgya gram rwa bzhin ldan// yang logs mu khyud zlum po chu// tha ma rtsibs chen bcu gnyis ldan// srid
pa'i khyams khang lto bar bca'// gnas shing dgod pa 'di lta ste// gru gsum gang 'dod snying po ming// zla gam gsum la stong pa'i ming// rgya gram rtsa ba'i 'bru bzhi dgod// mu khyud rbod gtong

gdug pa'i ming// bcu gnyis rtsibs la spu gri sbyar/ kha sbyar dar dang sngon dmar bsdam// dur ma gru gsum ling+ga mnag/ phyag rgya zil gnon gsal byas la// zhag lnga bskul zhing mchog phur gdab// nad pa

bdug la phying pas dgab// thon nas bka' rten gnyan sar mnan// gnod pa kun gyi sbyor ba gcod// drag sngags sbyor ba las tshogs brgyad// sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha tham/ 'drid phyung shag rbad srog la breng

shag dun/ dun e raM hur thum dzaHdzaH sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan/ khaM shag rtsa la rbad sa nA ga dzaH sa nA ga thum/ sa nA ga rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags kha thums/ 'drid phyung shag rbad/ srog la hur thums rbad/

khaM dz+wa la raM/ a rba sha truM nan/ 'drid yaM bzlog sbur nan trig nan/ e ka yaM shig 'drid phyung/ khaM shag trig nan/ sbur nan/ sarba sha truM stam+b+ha ya na sha ya nan phaT/ las rnams rgyas pa'i rim pa ni// che ba dril ba'i
las tshogs 'di// thun mong spyod pa'i las su bshad// srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las thun mong gi las bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par gyi sbyor
ba'i las 'di gsungs so// brda' don thabs kyis dgrol ba'i las// ba dang 'o ma zho dang mar// zhun mar snum gyi snying po bcud// snying po la sogs bzhi gnyis ldan// yengs med bstan pa bgrod pa'i

stobs// dmar len sngags kyi snying phyung yin// gong mthun rgyu las 'khor lo bca'// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyad// gdug byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// srid pa'i khyams khang srog sdud bca'/ khyams

khang lto na brnag pa'i gzugs// spyi gtsug snying gar mtshon cha bca'// mu khyud bzhi dbus ming rus bri// phyi rim rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu gnyis spu gri mtshon// mu khyud ming rus lto sbyar
bsad// rus sbal lto na mtshon cha'i rtsibs// rtse mo nang bstan spu gri bzlog/ phag mo'i lus la mnan pa'i sngags// 'bru bzhi srog dang a mu ka/ bskyod pa'i yan lag dbugs la zhon// don gnyis bsdus la

sbyor ba bya/ kha sbyor dur ma brnag pa'i gzugs// rgyu rkyen drug cus byas kyang tsog pur bzhag/ snying gar mchog phur ya mas gdab// bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar brdeg/ rab kyi rkang thon bsnol mar
gcod// 'bring gi bcu bar bsnol mar brdeg/ dman pas brgya bar bsnol mar gcod// dug lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// gsang lam sgo dgu rtsa lam 'asngug/ bde ba'i ye shes rang la gsal// 'pho ba
gsum gyi brda dang sbyar// dmar nag rtog pa'i khrag dkyil nas// bsdu ba'i yi ge gsum gyis 'phrog/ tsa na'i 'bras bus rten la thim// thod par snying po bcud sdud bya// klu la bcud par 'gran

zlar gtad// gzhan du bcud dang spu gri sbyar// yi ge byin can steng du brtag btab kyang// phyag rgya chos sku sprul bsam yas// thob cing bgrod pa sngags kyi stobs// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi// sku
gsung thugs rdo rje las/ mchog gi drag sngags 'di bton to// srog la rtsa khrag snying thums ril nan ri shag rbad/ nr-i srog hur thums dza/ bsad pa'i sbyor ba drag po'i las// nye bar gcig dril bsdeb

pa'o// gzhan yang gab sbas brnag pa'i las// rgyal blon stobs can yul srung la// rten gyi gzugs brnyan rgya shog la// phag mo dang ni sdig pa'i lto ba ru// mu khyud rim pa bzhi bzhir bskor// dbus su ling+ga

lus la bca'// nr-i dang rgya gram rtsibs bcu drug/ rtsa ba spu gri ming rus khams// 'chas la ling+ga'i steng du brnag/ nyin zhag phrugs gcig gsum du brnag/ mtshon cha'i brdeg thabs snga ma bzhin// rngam tshig lus

bskyod lu mar gtad// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dgra bo'i srog la hur long rbad// nr-i rtsa khrag thibs hur thums dza// ming dang gzugs kyis rims dal 'bebs// rgyal ba'i ye shes brnag rnam mang yang par
bshad// gzhan yang mdze rims dbab pa'i las// sbal pa'i lto bar brnag pa'i gzugs// snying gar nr-i dza ya mA ra ya rbad// bkod la mdze can khrag gis bsku// dkar nag gdug pa lto sbyar la// sdig pa phag

mo'i lto ba ru// mu khyud bzhi bzhi rgya gram rtsibs// gong bzhin bkod la kha sbyar bca'// klu nag sdig pa'i snying gar gtad// drag sngags 'bum tsho dgu ru sbyar// de yis mdze rims yams su 'babs// thod pa

mdze can dmar chod la// spos chen gu gul bdud rtsis bsang// drag sngags sbyor ba gnyis su bsdeb// e ga tsa thun khrag yaM rngubs shig srog la baM ril raM shag rbad/ dza nA ga dzi la baM hur thums dza/ nr-i dz+wa la dzi

baM tsit+ta khas/ nA ga raM baM nan/ dz+wa la 'bar ba'i las su bshad// gzhan yang lo tog 'joms pa'i las// nye bar spogs med gcig tu dril// sde brgyad kun gyi mthu bsdus nas// thod pa gsum la ming gzugs
yul// sbyor ba bsdus la gta' ma gzhug khrag dang phur pa mon thod du// sngags bstim 'bum rdzogs dbab pa brtsam// dug khrag bya phag gsur chen brun// du bas gzugs gzir lcags phur gdab// rang

nyid phyag rgya zil gnon bsgom// drag sngags sbyor ba dril la brdeg/ e ka ya rngubs shag mugs ru myags/ phrom phroM shar shar/ hri nA ga snying gzer sbur yaM thun ya shag hril b+h+yo/ khyad par gdug pa'i rten la
gzir// lha btsan bstan la the brang gzir// 'jig rten log rtog 'joms par bshad// srog dmar len gyi rgyud las/ khyad par gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o////// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po mchog nye bar dril ba 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten dregs pa'i mthu bsdus nas// nag po bde ba'i 'bru la dril// rno dbal mtshon cha'i rgyal por bca'// sngags kyi lus la spu
gri gdags// rang gnad phyag rgya 'jig cing 'pho// sngags pa bon po rigs med la// rang bdud phyag cha rang bdud 'bebs// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni// chos sku bde ba'i rang bzhin las// bde ba'i ye shes
rang shar ba// bde ba'i thig le mnyam par rdzogs// gnas pa'i 'khor lo bde bas 'degs// bde ba chen pos 'khrul pa 'joms// dge bcu ma yengs mtshan brjod pa// bdud dang gshed ma rlung las

bslang// gzugs brnyan 'khor lo ma yin te// gang yin snying gi 'khor lo la// dwangs ma bzhi la gsang gshed bzhi// rtsa phran brgyad la phyi nang gshed// mdud pa bzhi la mtshon cha'i dbal// rtsa phran yang
logs 'chi bdag bdud// rtsa sgo gzhan tshogs b+h+yo rbad nan// 'dus pa gsum la yab yum e// dkar nag chags pa rten gzhi'i 'bru// bskul bas rang rgyud gshed du ldang// ma yi khong nas rnam shes

'phrog/ 'bru gsum lcags sder 'dzings pa'i tshul// rtsa dang srog bcad lus srog dbye// tsit+ta'i dkyil nas 'bru gcig sdud kyang 'phrog cing sdud// de yis rang gshed rang la 'bebs// de bzhin lus kyi 'khor lo

la// phung po lnga la srog bdud gshed// gtso bo gsang ba'i gshed bzhi ldang// rnam shes tshogs brgyad phyi nang gshed// yul brgyad de bzhin gshed mo brgyad// bzlas pa'i rkyen gyi rgyud las ldang// skye mched
bcu gnyis 'chi bdag bdud/ khams chen bco brgyad sgrol ging bdud// yan lag bzhi la bla rkun bzhi// so dang sgal tshigs sha za'i tshogs// bzlas pa'i rta bskyod yi ge bskul// rang gi bdud po rang la
dbab// gshed rgyud phyi yi bdud du dbab// b+h+yo bzhi gnad kyis gang bsgrub pa'i// mkha' 'gro gzhan tshogs gzan la 'bebs// phyi rgyud bdud kyi 'khor lo bshad// de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'khor lo

yang// zhe sdang sdig pa'i lto ba dang// phrag dog bse yi sbal pa la// ltor bar sngags pa'i gzugs bris la// snying gar mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// rgya gram bzhi dang rtsibs bcu drug/ mtshon cha phyi nang brtse sprad

la// ming rus snying po rten la brdeg/ gshin rje la sogs gang 'grub pa'i// rnam shes 'bru re dbus su 'pho phob kyang// mchod rten nag po'i 'og tu gnan// las 'di gu h+ya a ti rgya// de nas bcom ldan 'das

nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las rang gshed skul ba'i drag sngags 'di bton to// srog la rbad/ thums ril rbad/ rtsa khrag tsit+ta phyung/ nr-i srog la hur thums dza/ bod pa dngos a mu ka/ rnam shes
'bru re dbus su dgod// bdud dang gshed po rang las ldang// ho phan srog 'dzin las su bshad// srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las rang gshed rang la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//[ 。]// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo lcags thag mgo dgu ma'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba'i bka' las 'das pa dang// mtshams med lnga la spyod pa dang// dgon pa'i gnas su phra ma dang// dam chos dge
bcu smod pa dang// bden pa'i don la log lta spyod// de tshe sngags kyi dmod pa bor// rten gsum sngags kyi 'khor lo bca'// lus srog gnam thog 'bras bu 'joms// rgya shog dar ram ro ras la// phag mo

sdig pa'i lto ba ru// thig bzhi brnag pa'i snying gar bskor// gru gsum rgya gram rtse mo dgu// de bzhin nang du rtse bstan dgu// rgya gram e grangs rtsa ba brgyad// mtshon cha'i rtse la spu gri'i so// phyi nang mtshon cha
bsnol mar dgod// dbus dang mtshams su brnag pa'i gzugs ming yang/ kha sbyor tshon skud dong rtsar brnag/ rang nyid che ba'i nga rgyal nas// mdun na lcags thag mgo dgu ma// dbu dgu steng ma bya yi

dbu// dur bya khra dang bzhad kyi dbu// nang khrol glo snying za zhing rngam// bar gyi dbu gsum dud 'gro'i dbu// dom dang dred dang chu srin dbu// rtsa gcad khrag dang nang khrol za// rtsa ba'i dbu gsum khro mo'i
dbu// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing la// mche ba zang yag mi ro za// spyan nas khrag 'dzag dug rlangs shangs// sku stod zhing lpags thod pa sbrul// sku smad re lde dril bu khrag/ g.yas dgu

mngon bsgral snying khrag 'dzin// g.yon pa dgu na thod zor bskyod// stag dang spyang ki ba glang mon// dred mo snel ma khyi dang phag/ 'thom nag g.yas pa dug khrag zor// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i snying gar
brdzis// 'gro ba bsgral phyir gar stabs 'gying// skra dang kha spu me ru 'bar// de la bka' bsgo bskul zhing mngag/ dgu bskor thun gyis mngags pa yi// las grub mtha' ru gzir la mnan// brag dmar srin

mo'i sgrom du gtad// dus bzhi las kyi kha gso bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las rno myur spu gri'i drag sngags 'di bton to// e baM raM khraM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ dgra bo'i srog la thun
rmugs ling shag rbad/ stobs can thams cad nye bar 'joms// rno myur las kyi brnag par bshad// gzhan yang lo tog gzhom pa'i las// dme thod nang du me long bsar// gser dngul zangs lcags rdo nag
bzhag/ ra dmar nal bu khyi nag snying// steng du gling bzhi rtsibs brgyad dgab// de steng srin mo mgo dgu'i sku// mthing nag dar gyis bkab la bzlas/ khrag sna gsum dang dug bsres la// ling+ga
ming byang g.yag ru gzhug/ smyug ma tshigs gsum smin pa la// ltas ngan sgro yis bsgron la bzhag/ zhag lnga'i bar du drag sngags bzlas// gser mde'u zhu zhing 'phan chad na// mda' bcas blug la dgra la

brdeg/ srin mo drag tu bskul la 'phang// drag sngags sbyor ba brtul zhugs bstud la yang bstims// e baM raM khraM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ hur tog phroM shar dza/ laM raM sma sha hril hur khaM sho yengs phroM shar seng khrol b+h+yo/
gnam thog chen po dbab pa'i las// nye bar gyur pa'i sbyor ba bshad// gzhan yang srin mo g.yel ba na// grog mkhar rgya tshil sa dmar la// bong bu'i bdud rtsis legs sprus la// srin mo mgo dgu'i gzugs
brnyan bca'// snying gar gru gsum snying po gzhug/ drag sngags bzlog la stobs kyis gzir// srin mo bos la khrag gis bran// phur pas bsdigs la dbang du bsdus// srin mo bka' nan zhabs 'og

gzhug/ gzir ba'i sngags 'dis khri ru brab// phur pa 'dril la be con brdung// e ka ya ma baM raM khraM shig tsit+ta rngubs/ ya ma rag sha hur thums dza/ dun dun trig nan/ de yis ma mo dbang du bsdus// rang

dbang med par las la mngag/ sngags dang bdud rtsis srin mo gso// ling+ga ming rus brnag par gzhug/ zhag gsum thun brab ro khung mnan// 'byung ba dkrugs la gnam sa sbyar// drag sngags brgya bar thun du

brang// lus srog tsit+ta'i sgo phye nas// lha dang rang sngags bdud du 'bebs// sha lpags go cha bral nas bshig/ rtsa dang srog zungs bcad nas skems// tshe srog dwangs snyigs phye nas sdud// brnag pa'i las kyi

mtha' ru phyin// drag sngags sbyor ba bskul la brdeg/ e khraM baM rngubs raM ta tsit+ta khraM/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra rbad/ hur thum dza/ kun gyi mtha' ru 'di sbyar na// brnag pa'i lus srog 'byed pa yin// srog dmar
len spu gri'i rgyud las srin mo shel gyi dmod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ba thams cad kyi mchog tu dril ba 'di gsungs so// thabs ldan bde ba'i

snying po mchog/ byin rlabs kun 'dus drag po'i brda// lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang nyid las// zil gnon phyag rgya sngags kyi mchog/ snying po srog dang brda mi sbyar// tsit+ta'i dkyil nas 'bru gcig 'phrog/ dug
rlangs zhen pa'i stobs dang dbyung// las dang sbyor ba nus pa gcod// spyi dang sgos srog rang gnad 'phrog/ rten gyi mtshon cha gnas su dbab// phag mo sdig pa'i lto ba ru// mu khyud gsum bskor rgya
gram e// nyi shu gnyis rtsibs gdug par ldan// gru gsum gang gnod gzugs dang ming// rgya gram de bzhin rtsa ba'i sngags// mtshams dang gsang mdzod re'u mig/ nyi shu gnyis la spu gri'i
so// lto sbyar phag thod dug khrag brnag/ zhag gsum sngags bzlas bsreg la mnan// gang 'dod ming dang snying po bsdeb// gzir dang dug dbyung srog 'phrog gcod// spyi srog sgos srog 'bru gsum
dbrog/ 'bru gsum mtha' ru sbyor ba gcod// 'di med las sogs yug pa brkyang// 'di de bde dang smin pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las srung ba'i mchog tu dril ba'i

drag sngags 'di bton to// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ snying gzer sbur nan/ ha la ha la tsa ma ri phyung/ e hur thums dza/ khaM shag rbad/ shrI badzra kro ta/ A+oM ya ma ya/ dun ting gi la ya/ ma ma ru lu ru

lu ma/ tir ti ka du/ ru tra da/ dun ting me/ de ba a/ rak+sha ra/ rak+mo ma/ ru tra nr-i/ yak+Sha k+Sha/ yaka mo k+Sha/ rA tsa tsa/ mun mun pa/ badzra sA d+hu tri/ haM shaM tri/ ru ti ru/ sa nA ga phu/ dza ya dzaH ra ti ra/ ya ru sta sta/ pra ti

ya sti/ rtsa ba spu gri rno dbal mtshon// bgrod pa'i phyag rgya stobs med na// rang gcod 'ching ba'i rgyu ru 'gyur// stobs ldan bgrod pa'i gdeng ldan na// rno myur sbyor ba kun 'joms yin// rtsa ba bcu gnyis
dmar len mtshon// las kyi mchong chen rang bstan shis// mtha' ru bdug bran bum pas sbyang// phyi nang nad bkrus ye shes chus// phyag rgya gcig pas nus pa bskyed// drag po'i rang bzhin btsan thabs
gzir// 'chi med dus kyi sbyor ba 'joms// 'di ni srung ba kun gyi mchog/ rgyal ba'i thig le 'dus par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sme gsum
tsha chus rgyu byugs la// gdug pa'i me la bdug la bca'// dug dang bse yi sdig sbal gnyis// lte bar brnag pa'i dbang po dgod// snying gar mu khyud bzhis bskor la// gru gsum zla gam rgya gram
rtsibs// gdug pa'i ra bas de bzhin gdams// gri skud mdze yams mche ba'i mtshon// rgya gram gab sbas rtsa ba'i sngags// drug gnyis nang ldan gsod pa'i mtshon// zhe sdang bzhi stor mnan gzir

brgyad// dbus dang ra 'ug ming rus khams// zla kham lha dang srung ba'i ming// rtsibs mchan mtshon cha gnod pa'i ming// dug khrag tsha ba'i stobs bskus la/ kha sbyar thod chen rgya gram e// gru gsum ming rus

gdug pa'i srog/ brten drug sa spyad sor brgyad dod// thod par bsdus la 'brub khang rtsang// skye ba'i rtsang la mthing nag dgab// rang lus phyag rgyar gsal byas la// zhe sdang kun khro khams gsum sgrol// sdang
dang gnod byed ming rus dbye// zhag gsum rngam tshig drag pos bskul// dbugs kyi rta bskyod yul la 'phang// gsang sgo bu ga rten la 'jug/ dkar nag rgyu la yi ge bslang// srog bdud mtshon

cha rang gshed bskul// sngags kyi dbab kyis srog zungs gcod// 'od 'phros khrag dang bag chags skyems// dwangs ma'i thig les gnyis med grol// tsit+ta khrag sbal tsa na'i 'bru// rno myur mthu gsum 'bru yis

'phrog/ kun gyi rnam shes rten la rbad// 'khor lo thod pa gzir la bca'// 'dra'i sdig sngal [\[]sbal [\]]lto bar gzhug/ gnyan sar srog gzir pho nyas dgug/ thod steng rtsang phur dgu thog dbang// las tshogs

dmigs pa go ba bzhin// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las sgrol ba drag po'i sngags 'di bton to// oM yaM raM baM khraM shig baM dun/ dgra bo'i srog la thum ril rtsa rbad/ tsit+ta rbad

hur thums dza/ srog la sha truM stam+b+ha ya nan/ sbyor ba kun gyi rgyal po 'di// gab sbas mthar thug tsit+tar bstim// ma rig gnad mtha'i sbyor ba yin// srog dmar len gyi rgyud las khyad par rnam pa gnyis kyi le'u
ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las thams cad kyi rjes gcod du sbyin bsreg gi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// man+Dal phung sa dug chu yis// tshad dang ldan pa brtsig par

bya// dug dang tsha ba khrag gi byug/ phung sa grog mkhar ro bsregs sa// sme ba dang bcas thab khung bca'// rgyas pa'i steng du zhi ba'i thab// de steng dbang ste kha khyer ro// dang po mtho gang mdzub kyis dman// kun

stengs e yi thab khung la/ khru gang kha khyer gsum du bca'// thod pa me ri rtsang dang ldan// zla gam rgya gram rtsibs bcu drug/ mtshon cha sngon po re kha dmar// tha ma me 'od thod pa bcu// phur pa bcu dang ldan par

bca'// ling+ga'i snying gar khru gang shing// yam shing lcang ma se ba skyer// drag po'i shing dang gdug rtsub drag/ 'o ma sbrang dang bu ram 'bras// gur gum gla rtsi g+hi haM mtshal// sha chen rta sbrul nya sbal sha// nyung dkar

til nag gri bo'i khrag khyi phag spyang tshil sha sna chang// dug gi ril bu brgya ming sbyar// bdag lus hom khung bum pa la// lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsal bya// thab khung mdun du me lha ser// me dar gun phreng

g.yas g.yon na// bka' sdod mngag na las byed pa'o// bla rkun rgyun blang yang rgun bslang thun gzir dbab// mtshon brdeg stabs la me la dbul// lan grang brgya'am nyi shu gcig/ nyin dang mtshan gyi gung la
brtsam// rdzas rgod bdug la phying pas dgab// khrus dang lha ru nye bar sbyar// rtsang phur bskor la chags pa dbral// thun dbab mtha' ru thal 'jim 'phang// gang brtsam las kyi mtha' ru gdags// rnam

bzhi'i las de lhun gyis grub// lta spyod dman pas 'ching bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags 'di bton to// swA hA swa sti yang shAn+tiM/ ba shaM hri ya/
puSh+tiM ba ra/ mA ra ya rbad/ las 'di bya ba kun dang ldan// bsreg pa'i las te snying po'i mchog/ srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las brnag pa'i rjes gcod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis las thams cad kyi kha gso 'di gsungs so// mon nam gri bo'i thod pa ru// ling+ga'i ming rus khrag sna brnag/ thod pa dug chu dpa' bo'i don// zhag gsum thun brab brgya ba rgyas bstim// dmod pa'i

rngam tshig bskyod pas dbab// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags 'di bton to// dgra bo'i srog pa baM ril kha thun yaM rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun shag rbad/ dgra bo'i

srog la gzer thun raM thun rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya thun rbad/ skya rengs brnag pa'i yul la 'phang// tsha tsha dgu gling gyur la dbab// rgyu srog drag po'i sbyor ba bya// srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las
bskyod pa zor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i ye shes rang yang 'char ba'i don 'di gsungs so// bde ba'i gnas la rang gnas pa// lus sems bag dal mnyam
gnas la// ma yengs ma bskyod rang sar gnas// sgra med brjod bral tshig bral stong// rang sems ma bcos gnyug mar gnas// blo zhan gzung ba'i rim pa yis// lus la sems 'phrog ye shes te// ma bskyod
ma bslad spros med pa// ma bcos chos kun lhug par gnas// bde ba rang nyams brtan pa yin// chos dbyings bskyod du med pa'i ngang// rang byung rgyal po bde chen nyid// sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs

rgyas// yin pa med par khyab gsal ba// snang ba chos sku lhun grub yangs// byung tshor ye shes rang rig gsal// bya med bgrod thabs bsam yas pa// rtag chen mi 'gyur stong pa nyid// skye med rnam dag kun gyi
dngos// bde chen nyid las gzhan med pa'o// srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las bsam gtad rang grol gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas rig pa khyad par can gyis stan las langs nas
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ snying po don gyi rgyud 'di la bshad pa'i yan lag du dang ldan/ che ba'i yon tan gang ltar lags// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas bcom ldan 'das khrag
'thung gi rgyal po bde ba chen po des/ chos nyid kho na'i byin rlabs las// yan lag dang po rgyas par gsungs so// rgyud kyi rang bzhin dgos 'brel yin// 'brel ba rang byung rang rig
las// 'bras bu sangs rgyas lam gyis 'brel// lam zhes bya ba gnyis yin te// zhi ba byang chub lam gsum dang// dmod pa drag po'i lam nyid do// de dag bshad pa gsum du rig/ 'khor ba

rang grol man ngag dang// gnas pa rang rgyud man ngag dang// bde ba kha sbyor man ngag go// dang po bshad pa 'di lta ste// bdag nyid zil gnon lhun gyis grub// phung po de nyid gtso bo gshed// gsang bdag

ya ma rus sbal khyung// 'byung ba gsum lnga shes rab gsal// rnam shes phyi nang gshed brgyad grub// skye mched bcu gnyis 'chi bdag bdud// khams la gying chen bco brgyad rdzogs// yan lag bdud kyi pho nya

bzhi// so dang sgal tshigs sha za'i tshogs// 'dzin pa rang grol lam gcig 'grub// rang byung ye shes ye sangs rgyas// gnyis don rgyas bshad che ba'i ngang// snying la chos kyi 'khor lo nyid// dwangs ma bzhi nyid

si ri brgyad// drug [\[]brgyad [\]]gnyis bcu drug ya ma'i klong// gshed bdag yab yum gsang gshed pa'i// brgyad la phyi nang gshed kyi tshogs// gzhan la 'chi bdag ki kang tshogs// lhun grub sangs rgyas rang

las 'char// skye med rnam dag stong pa nyid// ye shes rang gsal che sangs rgyas// bde ba chen po'i don rgyas pa// thabs dang shes rab mnyam rdzogs pa'i// rig pa bde ba gsal sbyangs la// rkyen gsum rang

sdud gnas sbyangs bsregs// bde ba'i ye shes 'od du 'phro// gnyis sprad ru bzlog khams lngas sbyangs// dga' bzhi bde skyes bgrod pa thob// nyi zla thig le mnyam pa'i sku// sangs rgyas spyi gzugs stong pa'i
mchog/ ge sar lhun grub 'khor rnams rdzogs// byang chub myu gu bde sangs rgyas// gnas gsum mnyam nyid gcig tu gnas// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis su// ye shes 'khor lo bde ba bsdu// yongs su

gyur nas bde chen sku// grub par bya ba'i yul la gzud// yongs su gyur pa'i chos skur gnas// zhi ba byang chub lam du bshad// dmod pa drag pos grol ba ni// phung po rnam shes gsod pa'i gshed/ khams dang
skye mched 'chi bdag bdud// tsit+ta sngags tshogs mtshon cha med// chags pas rang bdud bslu ba'i gshed// ma lus kun gyi sdig pa bgos// nye bar gyur pa'i yan lag yin// zhing bcu'i srog dang rnam shes

sdud// thugs rje rgyun gyi sgrol ba yin// rtog pa gnas sbyangs sngags kyi 'od// mngon par sangs rgyas bde ba'i mchog/ mtha' gsum gcig gi ngang du bshad// srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las rgyud kyi don
bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// snang srid pho brang gdal ba la// lhun grub sangs rgyas kun 'dus
pas// bde ba chen po'i ngang la gnas// ye shes 'od kyi gang bu las// 'pho ba thabs kyis gar bsgyur bas// rtog 'dzin rang grol bde sangs rgyas// sbyor ba sna tshogs rol par 'dus/ khro bo'i
gar dgu tshul dgu 'bar// rgyan dgu chas dgu bde ba gcig/ nam mkha' rgya mtsho rin chen me// sa gzhi ri rab kun mnyam rdzogs// rgyu med 'bras bu ye sangs rgyas// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis med
grol// rkyen med las tshogs bsam dpag dka'// rang sngags dbugs rgyun las la slong// rten med dmod pa bskul bas 'pho// chos nyid pho brang bde bas mnan// rten can rang las bdud gnad
bslang// gsum gyis srog bsdus bar snang dgag/ sbyor ba thun mong 'khor lo rdzas// sa yi dmigs drug rten la mnan// rten drug gnas pas bde chen bgrod// bde ba'i rgyal po rang la 'char// sbyor sgrol bya
ba kun spyad kyang// 'bras bu ye nas sangs rgyas nyid// 'dod chags bde ba chen por gnas// ye shes 'khor lo yongs rdzogs sdud// rdo rje gsang ba'i lam las drang// gnyis med bya ba mo la
gzud// 'dod chags nyid ni ye shes te// phyag rgya bsten pas rang grol ba'o// bskul ba'i rkyen dang de nyid las// bde ba'i ro yis gang zhing 'bar// gnyis su med pas mnyam sbyar bas// dbugs dang tshor
ba zhen chags bral// chos sku 'gag med lhun gyis grub// srog med srog kyang gcad du med// srog nyid ye nas rgyun mi 'chad// ma g.yos g.yos med g.yo ba med// ma sbyangs sbyang ba med pa'i mchog/ zil

gyis gnon pa'i sa ru bstan// sa ni sra byed rdo rje'i sa// srog ces bya ba 'khrul pa ste// 'gyur ba med par lhun gyis grub// ma btsal bgrod thabs med pa'i sar// thig le gcig gi ngang nyid las// bde lam
'jog po brgyad ldan pa'o// rang nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ khams gsum rnam thar sku gsung thugs// mtshan ma dag nas 'bras bu grol// pha rol phyin drug rnam
dag phyir// rigs drug mngon par sangs rgyas grol// zhabs bzhi skye mched rnam dag nas// tshad med bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul rkang// sku chen rngams pas phung po'i bdud// bcom nas ye shes lhun gyis
