grub// 'bras bu chos nyid rnam dag grol// phyag rgya tshul dgu chas dgu yis// chags sdang lnga dang skye mched bzhi// mtshan dang dpe byad gnas su grol// ngo bo nyid du ye sangs rgyas// yon tan 'phel 'grib med
par bshad// srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud las yon tan che ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor la gdams pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho chos sku byang chub
sems// lhun grub gdal ba'i pho brang nas// ye shes thig le rdzogs pa'i sku// sna tshogs snang la ngos gzung med// e ma rang byung skye 'gag dben// gnas med 'gyur ba med pa las// las kyi

sbyor ba du ma kun// snang stong gnyis med lhun gyis grub// e ma 'khor gyi dam can kun// nga yi bka' rgyud dam pa zung// nga yang dam las mi g.yel bsrung// grol bas rang byung lhun gyis grub// e ma gab
sbas gsang ba'i don// rig pas bgrod pa'i bde ba thob// rmongs pas rang 'ching 'khor bar 'khyoms// bgrod pa'i rtsa las yang dag 'byung// don ni rnam pa gsum du bsdeb// spyi dang thun mong khyad par
ro// spyi la gsum du yang dag ste// lus dang spu gri 'dod pas bsdeb// gzir bzlog rang bsrung gzan la dbab// dang srog gshed rtsa srog lus 'byed// gzir dang srog dbrog sbyor ba bcad// gnyis pa thun
mong las 'di dag/ bsgrub pa rgyun dang gsad pa dang// drag po gang sbyor dbu ru bton// sngags dang 'khor lo man ngag bsdeb// gsum pa man ngag drag po nyid// bcu gnyis lus la dmar len po// bsdebs
pas kun 'jom shis pa'i mchog/ 'bru brgyad lus las drag po'i so// bsdebs pas rno dbal yul la gcod// 'bru bzhi lus la brgyad spu gri// btags pas rno myur rang gcod yin// mchog dang phag mo nye
bar bsdeb// srin mo dam sri rang gcod gnyis// mtshon cha bsnol mar bsdeb na rab// gsang sngags ngo bo 'khor la gdams// bsrung ba'i mchog dang gsad pa'i mchog/ bskyed pa thun gyi drag sngags

bsdeb// nyin dang mtshan mo'i mtshams su bya// don gnyis dngos su 'grub par gsungs// 'khor gyi tshogs rnams nga la nyon// rgyud rgyal drag po spu gri 'di// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i// sangs rgyas

sems dpa'i chos srung kun// dam tshig dka' thub sdom la gnas// ting 'dzin drag po rngam par nges// ye shes rig pa'i pho brang nas// bde ba'i thig le rtsol dang bral// dbang phyug mnga' brnyes rol pa'i
rgya// mtshon cha me rlung stobs dpag med// de yis thams cad 'joms shing 'pho// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya yin// nga yi rgyud rgyal sbu gri 'di// gsang ba kun gyi snying po gdams// gsang ba'i

gsang brtud yang gsang gter// yang gsang mchog gsang snying po'i don// rtsa ba bshad pa rtsa ri bka'// dgongs don spu gri'i mthar thug rgyud// 'dir 'dus kam pa kyi ba lcags// spu gri thog mda' gnam lcags gzer// skyi

'dang ri bo rbab chen dug/ chen po lnga ltar kun 'grub 'di// nye ba'i 'khor la gdam pa zung// nga yi gsang rgyud spu gri 'di// bgrod pa gsum thob rang shugs thob// skye med rtsol bral rgyud la ldan// ye grub
brjod pas gsang lam grub// dkar nag mtshams nas thim zhing bgrod// gnad kyi yi ge rang rgyud slong// rtsa srog dbugs rgyun gcod par byed// las dbang khrag dang bag chags

skyems// dwangs snyigs bye nas gsang sgor bgrod// ye shes bde ba'i thig le sku// sangs rgyas sa la ye sangs rgyas// snyigs ma bag chags tsa na'i 'bru/ khrag sbal dang bcas dkar nag nas// yi ge gsum gyi
gnad kyis 'phrog/ thod pa gsang mdzod rten la sdud// dam pa'i 'khor rnams legs par zung// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// dpal chen
nag po'i rgyud drag sngags de kho na nyid/ srog dmar len spu gri las// 'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// snying po'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI karma tsa tu sh+tsa kra gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ yum chen mo dang gnyis su med pa'i mkha' la bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ 'khor khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ ma mo dang/
mngag gzhug dang/ 'bangs la sogs pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa chen po la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo dang gnyis su med par gyur/ skye 'gag dang bral ba'i
don 'di ston to// ye nas ma skyes gshin rje chen po'i tshogs// rnam dag dbyings kyi rang nyid rnam par dag pa la// gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa
yi// kun gyi ye shes thas cad 'dus pa ste// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// sems can ma lus mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs// 'khor ba'i nyes skyon thams
cad tshar gcod phyir// 'dod chags 'dus pa'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag/ bye ba phrag brgya dpag tu med par yang// 'dul ba'i dbang gis de lta bu yi gzugs su bstan// zhes gsungs pas 'khor gyi khro bo
dang khro mo la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa
la// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog bstan// bstan pa dam pa 'di gsungs pas// thams cad sgrol ba ngo mtshar che// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yum dang gcig du 'dus te/ 'di
skad ces gsungs so// sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med dpag tu med// thun mong ma yin 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rmad du byung// mi dge bcu dang mtshams med tshar gcad

pa// zug rngu mi mnga' chos nyid rmad po che// chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul pa'i sku dang gsum ni don dam kun tu sbyor// phyogs bcu bde bar gshegs pa thugs kyi dpal// yang dag ye shes
dpal yin 'jam dpal yin// zhes bstod de gnyis su med par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa de la 'khor gyis de bzhin du gsol ba la dgyes te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// zhi ba gnyis

med chos kyi ngang nyid las// snying po gnyis med byang chub sems pa'i don// thams cad 'dus pa'i bla med dam pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta e h+ye hi ta thA ga ta pra ba

ti// bo d+hi satwa d+harma d+hA tu// e h+ye hi dzaHhU~M h+ye hi h+ye hi hU~M hU~M hU~M/ zhes brjod nas brdas mtshon par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi phyogs su sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs pas phyogs la phyogs su bltas te// rang bzhin gyis sgrol ba'i nus pa can du gyur te/ thams cad kyang sgrol bar gyur to// de nas yum gyi tshogs thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen
po'i brda 'dis bcom ldan 'das la bskul lo// e ma'o phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi// ye shes 'dus pa'i phrin las mchog/ bla med theg pa nges pa la// sbyor ba mchog gis bshad du gsol// zhes
bskul bas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug gi 'khor mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad dang bcas nas sku'i rgyan

gyis brgyan te/ so so'i btsun mo'i dgyes pas sku'i nyams su bstar bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ba spu langs te 'di skad ces ched du brjod do// sku gsung thugs rnams 'gro
ba so sor 'dul// ngang gi zhi ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba so sor 'dul// de phyir mchog gi rgyal po 'di bshad do// zhes gsungs pas// 'khor rnams rab tu dga' mgur
rangs par gyur te 'di skad ces gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba rang rang 'dul// dbyings las 'dren pa rdo rje gsor byas te// 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad pa ngo mtshar che// zhes brjod
do// sku la zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khro bos 'dul bar mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ khra dang spyang ki srin mo mu stegs rnams// bdud dang log

'dren thams cad tshar gcad phyir// chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu sprul nas phrin las mdzad// ces gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di skad du/ e ma'o che ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa la// ngang gis

khro bor bstan pa 'di lta bu// ngo mtshar rmad byung sprul pa 'di lta bu// rab tu mi srun 'dul ba ngo mtshar che// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bskul bar 'di skad ces gsungs so/ khyad par

rim par bstan pa'i khro gnyer ni// ye shes dbyings kyis kun la khyab par ston// khro bo bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu la sogs// ston pa mchod phyir khro bo mang po bstan// ngang khro kun khyab shugs khro rang rang 'dul

ba yis// bye brag so sor rab tu shes bya la// mtshan ma drag po zhi ba dbang dang rgyas// go rims bzlog ste rab tu bshad par bya// lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs can la// 'khor ba gcod byed rtse mo can// gru

gsum e yi pho brang a// zla gam rnam gsum dbang gi tshul// mu khyud dad can rgyas pa phyi// rnam bzhir ldan pa'i 'khor lo la// rab tu mdzes pa'i thig gdab bo// dbus su ma he'i zhing gdan la// rtse dbus

zhing rkyang re re'o// rus pa tshogs kyi dba' rlabs brag tu spungs// rak+ta khrag gi dba' klong mtsho lta bu// gnam lcags ngur mo rab tu ta la la// dur khrod rab tu brgyan pa de bsham mo// dbus su khro rgyal gshin

rje gshed// sku ni nag po dug 'dra la// dbu gsum dkar dmar mthing ba ste// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// rtse la me 'bar rked nas zhag kyang 'dzag/ rtsa ba chu ste sdang mig rab tu bgrad// phyag drug
phyag mtshan bsnams pa'i thor tshugs ni// sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags lcags kyu g.yas// dung chen mdung thung gsal shing g.yon// zhabs bzhi thur du bstan pa ni// brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'gro ba dbang du

sdud// sku stod glang chen ko ba zhing phrag la// sku smad stag ste sham thabs tsham ngam can/ e yi pho brang dbus su'o// yum yang yab dang sku mthun te// pho brang dbus su g.yon du'o// zhal gcig phyag gnyis che ba

can/ khram bam b+han d+ha bsnams pa'o// rtse la khro bo yab yum bcu// rab tu khros pa'i sdang mig can// go rim bzhin du dgod par bya// zla gam dur khrod ma mo ste// sgo la de bzhin bsrung ba'o// de la rim pas

mgu bar bya// zhes brjod de/ 'di sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo// o~M a kro many+dzu shrI mu~M/ hU~M badzra kro d+ha b+hid nan hU~M/ o~M badzra bi tA li rak+Sha maM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/

o~M ru ru dun/ o~M dza dza ya ba/ o~M ya shug b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu thams cad 'khrugs te// g.yos so// 'gul to// ldeg go/ chem mo// 'ur te/ g.yo 'gul du gyur te/ 'khrugs
par gyur to// de nas yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gsol ba gdab ste/ gsol bar zhus pa/ e ma'o rab tu blo ldan khyod// 'jig rten 'khrugs par mdzad pa'o// dbang med las kyis mnar ba
la// bder gshegs gsung du gsungs pa ste// rab tu bde bar mdzad du gsol zhes glengs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ste 'di gsungs

so// oM badzra nA la ka la hU~M badzra ga ta pra be sha ho/ zhes gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu 'jam par gyur to// gyur pas sems can thams cad slar sngon kho na bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan

'das gshin rje gshed chen po la skyabs su dong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgyas mnyes par bya ba 'di gsungs so// rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag bya ste// sgeg mo g.yon du
gnas par bya// bskul ba'i ting 'dzin brlan pa la// bskyod pa byang chub lam du drangs// gnas nyid bder gshegs skyed pa'i rkyen// rtse mo o~M la phaT du bstan// zhes gsungs pas// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad rol mos mnyes par gyur to// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las zhi bar
bya ba 'di ched du brjod do// rab tu dkar ba'i yul dag la// mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dang bas mgu ba'i las byas zhes// bla med rgyal bas rab tu bshad// sa gzhi dkar ba rab mnyam la// gru
bzhir ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs brgyad pa// mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya// dkar dang ldan pa'i zla ba la// gcig nas gsum nas mgo btsugs la/ khams gsum rab tu
mgu bya'i phyir// nyams su lon par byas la bsgrubs// dbus su ye shes bdag po la// shar du nag 'joms chen po ste// lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya// nub tu khro bo dmigs pa la// byang du bdud 'joms dgod

par bya// shar lho lho nub nub byang dang// byang shar mtshams su dgod pa ni// glang mgo khro tshe gcod sbyong rje// las grub brgyad de go rim bzhin// steng 'og dmar po brag dgon bsgroms te dgod// zla gam
lam mo gsum rnams so// sgo sgor sgo srung ma rnams bri// de yi yum dang bcas pa rnams/ khro bo nyid dang sku mthun pa'o// sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la// sgeg mo g.yon du bsten byas

la// sngags g.yog mdzes par tshogs byas la// mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par bya// ske tshe thal ba rus pa la// dzam+b+ha la yi gzugs lta bur// byas la snying gar bri ba ni// a ma pa la si ti'am// gang 'dod pa

yi yi ge de// phaT dang swA hAs dam ltar bya// ming byang gong ltar bri byas la// gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bzhag/ de la 'di yang rab tu brjod// oM a kro badzra shAn+tiM na ga badzra swA hA/ oM a kro te ka shAn+tiM ba la bu~M
zhes brjod la snying gar brgyab na/ thams cad mgu nas dang ba'i sems kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas zhi ba'i las byas zin nas/ phyogs bcu'i gdug pa zhi bar bya ste/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na
las 'grub pa yin no// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad zhi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rgyas par bya ba 'di ched du brjod
do// gser las grub pa'i yul dag la'ang// dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas te// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la// ba yi chag
chag btab byas te// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas// thig 'di gdab pa rab tu brtsam// gser las grub pa'i thig skud la// dpal ldan 'phel ba'i sems dang bcas// slob ma dam pa las grub par//
bsams la thig 'di gdab par bya// pho brang gser la rtse mo g.yu// rdo rje rtsig pa gser las grub// gru chad sgo rnams lcags las grub// rnal 'byor sngags pa blo ldan pas// thig bzhi re'u cha brgyad du
'gyur// mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can// de la sogs pa bsam par bya// rin chen skyil krung 'dug byas la// dbus su gsang sngags bdag pos te// phyogs phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams// snga ma bzhin du

bsgoms nas kyang// rang sngags skyes bu de bskyed do// o~M a kro te ka puSh+tiM ba la na hU~M/ o~M a kro puSh+tiM ti ba ta na s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas bdag po yab yum la/ 'khor rnams 'bru re ba las sam/ rang rang bskyed pa

dam pa ste// sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin gsal// bzhugs dang brtan dang mchod pa dang// phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi// las kyi bya ba ma lus par// thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya// skyed dang grub pa'i
'bras bu ni// rgyal ba bsnyen te thag mi ring// rang grub 'bras bu de la sogs// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// dngos grub dam pa rab ster zhes// 'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad// de nas
gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas nas// sa zhag gser las grub pa la// gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya// phyi gan gan rkyal mnan byas la// nang hU~M puSh+tiM a bu tse swA hA/

snying gar bris nas brjod bya ba// snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste// bla med dam pas rab tu bshad// o~M badzra puSh+tiM A yu ba shang shrI puSh+tiM swA hA zhes brjod na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa las bzhi

'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bdag nyid dbang gis 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di
brjod do// zangs las 'brel ba'i yul dag la// rang dbang med de dbang bsdus nas// 'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag
la// dkyil 'khor snga ma dag dang 'dra// legs par khod snyoms zin pa dang// thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// lte ba can la rtsibs brgyad pa// kun du zlum pas rgyas pa mtha'// lte dbus gzhu bdungs bris
byas la// de steng bdag po dam pa gzhag/ thams cad ma lus mchog tu 'gugs// sa pa la yang thogs pa med// zhes ni yang dag bla med des// bshad par bya ste rab tu bstan// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya
ba// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam// sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams// gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams// ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// bsgrubs na
'grub par bshad pa'o// de dag 'gugs par gyur pa na// phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bsdu dang 'dren pa byang chub lam// 'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir// yungs kar rkang rjes sa'am gzhan/ khrag
gsum thal chen bsres byas la// ga'u'i nang du blugs byas la// ga'u gnyis ni kha sbyar te// skud pa dmar po zangs la sogs// bcing ba bsdams te dkris byas la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog tu gzhag/ yungs
dkar zangs gnyis bsreg byas te// dud pas ga'u de la bdug/ de la bdugs par gyur pa dang// bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing// lan grangs khri tshad du ma ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la sogs

rnams// 'gugs par gyur na phal pa gzhan// smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs// o~M badzra a kro many+dzu shrI ba shang ma hA sarba ti la bru~M/ lan grangs mang du brjod byas na// ci ltar bsams pa thams cad
'gugs// rgya shugs bskus pa'i khu ba dang// ma yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// snga ma bzhin du bkug byas na// 'gugs par 'gyur zhes dpa' bos bshad// yang na rang gi lag pa'ang rung// zhes gsungs
pas thams cad ma lus par 'dus te// dper na phyogs thams cad nas mtsho la sbrang ma 'du ba bzhin du 'dus te bdag gi dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam
dpal gshin rjes gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las// dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gshin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzad de/ rang
bzhin gyi mthu can 'di gsungs so// 'byung byed ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la// bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// yum yang de bzhin de yi'o// yab yum gnyis med byin brlabs

las// thig skud rgyus pa lcags las byas// de ni las kyi thig ces bya// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud can// gru chad ldan te dur khrod

rgyan// mdzes par bris te gzhan na min// sten pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas// bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya// o~M a kro te ka hU~M a/ hU~M badzra be tA li rak+sha maM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/

hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad g.yos so// rab du g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul

'gul// rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// ldeg ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du rab tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem// kun du rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur// kun du rab tu 'u 'ur ro// dbus mtho na

mtha' dma'// mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi gsang sngags
gsungs pas bdag cag spro lags so// 'jig rten du 'di lta bur mthu can la bdag zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems

can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen por 'du mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// o~M shrI pa ra yak+sha gu ya/ sarba ta kri badzra kA la rU pa ma ra na phaT ces
gsungs pas/ 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang/ mthu che ba la sogs pa thams cad btul nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang// gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la// rang
sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las// phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin// de bas nan tan bskyed byas te// drag po'i tsham ngam bshad par bya// 'jig rten bcud kyi gdug pa kun// tsham ngam glog ltar 'gyur ba
las// ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya// e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni// rtag par
bsgoms te de bzhin gshegs par bya// rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni// gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod grub bar ro// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa der byas

te// sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang// ga'u pad+ma dam pa dang/ kham pa rdza yi 'ji ba yis/ khrag sna gsum dang gi wang ngo// de dag phrin las mchog yin te// grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bla med dpa'
bos yang dag gsungs// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun// 'dul bar 'gyur te the tshom med// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las drag po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan

'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rang bzhin 'phags pa kun du shes rab ste// de bzhin rnam par mi rtog

yin pas na// 'di gnyis chos kyi sku zhes rab tu bshad// chos kyi longs spyod 'dul ba'i don la rgyas// 'gro ba'i don rdzogs ma lus skur 'byung dang// bdud dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir// mtshan

dang dpe byad gzugs su sprul nas ni// ma lus tshar gcod don du 'di gsungs so// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud zlum por bcas// sbrul gyis rgya gram dag gi mtha' bskor la// lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri bar

bya// de yi steng du ka pA la gnyis la// gcig la gshin rje dbu drug pa yi gzugs// gcig la yum chen khro gnyer gzugs bris la// nang du dgra bo rkang rjes sa dang ni// bri dang de bzhin khrag sna gsum// thal

chen rgya shug bskus pa'i khu ba dang// brdzis la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// bcug la skud pa dkar pos bcing// dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag par bya// o~M ya mAn+ta ka/ hrI Sh+tiM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka badzra kro d+ha phaT

phaT a/ zhes brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ yab yum sku mdog mthing nag la// dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes// dbu la thod pa rlon pas brgyan// sku la sbrul nag chun po dang// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum

tshul du bzhugs// phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// g.yas kyi dang po sdigs mdzub la// rgyu zhags lcags kyu bar tha ma// dung chen tri shUl gsal shing g.yon// de ltar cha lugs gsal ba dang// dbyangs

'di blang bar nan tan bya// hU~M rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung gshin rje gshed/ khams gsum dbang sdud rtags su zhal gsum po// dbyings nas sprul pa'i yab yum lhun gyis grub// las ngan 'khrul pa'i sems
can gdul dka' ba// gdug pa de dag 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pa lan grangs mang du brjod/ des ni brtan par bzhugs
par 'gyur/ khrag chen rgod khrag sha dang tshil// chen po la sogs gtor ma bsham/ de ni dkyil 'khor thog dag tu// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba las// sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas// o~M badzra

ha sta ba ba he ha dA na hrI Sh+tiM che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ che ge mo hasta ba pri ti ni ra te sa hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ nyin zhag gcig la lan 'bum bzlas// nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas// de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa

dang// gtor ma'i las dag brtsam bya ste// bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang// phyogs bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs// ma lus rdzogs pa'i phrin las bya// de ltar phrin
las rdzogs pa dang// yang nas yang du bstab pa bya// de ltar bstab pa byas pas na// dgra bgegs dbang 'gyur smos ci dgos// de nas yang 'di ched du brjod de gsungs so// o~M nga ni phyogs bcu dus gsum
gyi// bder gshegs thugs kyi sras yin par// bdud dang srin po log 'dren rnams// ma lus tshar gcod byin rlabs te// mgon po gshin rje nyid kyi sras// don rnams thams cad ma lus pa// de nyid du ni
bsgrub par bya// dgra rnams thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir// phrin las rdo rje can gyis mdzod// zhes brjod cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhes gsungs so// dus dang dus dang zhag

grangs ni// nyi ma gcig la stong rtsa gcig/ nam gyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig/ tho rangs thun gcig brgya rtsa gcig/ srod kyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig/ de ltar nyin zhag gsum bar du// bzlas pa zhag grangs tshang bya

zhing// phyag rgya bca' zhing gzugs la brdeg/ nya la byas na gdon mi za// oM mA ra na kha da sarba hrI Sh+tiM ya man/ hu~M hu~M tre kha da pa ra na pa la hu~M hu~M phaT phaT swA hA/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dgra bo'i

gzugs la brdeg go// oM badzra hU~M khaM s+pha ra na phaT/ hU~M A be sha a/ hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a/ yang phyag rgya gong ma bcas la/ o~M badzra kro d+ha nI la tan+t+ra hu~M hu~M/ hrI Sh+tiM kr-i ta nan/ hu~M hrI Sh+tiM bi kr-i ta nan nan zhes brjod la/

bdag gi lag pas dbang bskur ro// yang phyag rgya bcas la// sngags 'di la yang lan grangs mang du bya'o// oM badzra tsan+Da hrI Sh+tiM badzra sti ra baM/ kha hi hu~Mhu~M che ge mo dbang du sdus shig/ hril hril zhes lan grangs mang

du brjod do// rdo rje rgya gram gyi phyag rgyas brdeg go/ yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/ oM badzra kang ka ma ka la ya na hU~M phaT phaT a/ zhes 'bum bzlas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas brdeg go/ yang

phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'di brdeg go/ o~M badzra a gu sha tre tha sti ra ba~M hu~M hu~M phaT phaT che ge mo mA ra ya dza hU~M zhes dbang du sdus shing// hu~M hu~M phaT phaT zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do// rdo rje

gdengs pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dbang du bsdu'o// yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go/ o~M hu~M hu~M phaT phaT 'dus 'dus rang rang ya~M ya~M ra~M ra~M hring hring du ba b+h+yo hu~M phaT che ge mo dun b+h+yo zhes bzlas la/ kha T+wA~M
gi phyag rgyas brdeg go/ de ltar las de dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas la// bzlas pa byas na las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar nges zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags dbang sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed/ bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i phrin

las bsgrub pa 'di/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// lnga phung yan lag gzhom pa dang// dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang// 'bras bu rgyal bar bsgrub bya'i phyir// nan tur phrin las bshad par
bya// dang po'i las ni rgyas dang gsad// dgug dang gtad dang bcing dang dgrol// sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus kun// phrin las 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dang por btsal ba'i btsal thabs ni// rnam pa drug

dang ldan pas btsal// stag mo gad la mchong stabs dang// seng ge gangs la 'gying tshul dang/ khwa spyang gzan la rgyug tshul dang// bya rgod gzan la 'bab tshul dang// dom chen rmi lam rmi tshul dang/ khwa
skeg thang shing snyeg tshul gyis// ro yi phung po btsal bar bya// ri la 'dug na 'gying bas btsal// sribs la 'dug na mchong bas btsal// gdags la 'dug na 'dug pas btsal// 'or na 'dug na 'babs
pas btsal// brag la 'dug na rmi bas btsal// nags la 'dug na snyegs pas btsal// rgyal rigs yin na seng ge stangs// bram ze yin na stag mo stangs// rje'u rigs yin na bya rgod stangs// dmangs

rigs yin na dom gyis bya// ma ning yin na spre'u yis bya// dog la yin na khwa spyang stangs// de ltar ro yi tshol stangs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal// brtag nas 'ongs pa gyur pa dang// gshin rje rgyal
po'i tsham ngam bya/ khro bo bcu yis stang stabs kyis// ro la kun tu bskor byas la// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag/ de ltar gzhag pa'i las byas nas// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa

byang shar mtshams su bstan// lag pa g.yas pa lho yi phyogs// lag pa g.yon pa nub kyi phyogs// rkang pa g.yas pa shar gyi phyogs// rkang pa g.yon pa byang gi phyogs// de ltar gan rkyal bzhag byas la// da ni
phur pa dgod bya ste// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lag gnyis rkang gnyis pho mtshan dang// lkog ma de bzhin snying ga dang// lte ba pus mo dpung pa gnyis// gru mo de bzhin long bu
gnyis// mtshog ma de bzhin spyi bo dang// dku dang de bzhin mchan khung gnyis// dpral ba rnams su gdab byas la// phur pa de dag lha yi skur// rab tu brtags te goms pa dang// rang bzhin gnas nas
gshegs pa dang// ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang// gzugs brnyan nang du bkod pa gsum/ tshad pas gdungs pa'i bye ma la// mar zhu de bzhin thim pa bzhin// gnyis su med par shes bya la// gong du

bstan pa'i lha rnams ni// rnam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi// de las gyur pa'i yul rnams ni// brgyad po rang du shes par bya// sgo ma lus la grags pa'o// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i phyir// steng 'og khro

bo de las gyur// de dag kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma mo gsum gyis nga nyid de// yab ni kun la khyab pa la// yum ni kun la sdud pa ste// bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do// phung po kun la khyab pa la// mnyes pas
phul phyin lha yi tshogs// 'gro drug kun la ma lus snang// de ltar las rnams zin pa dang// zhag grangs du bya dam yang bca'// dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi// rnal 'byor chen pos ting 'dzin gsal// de
ltar byas nas mi la sogs// thams cad dbang du 'du bar gsungs// dgra bgegs la lta smos ci dgos// drag po'i phrin las grub 'dod pas// dgra bo'i ming byang bris byas la// bam gyi kha yi nang du

gzhug/ rdo rje rgya gram rgya yis gdab// he ru ka yi phyag rgyas mnan// yungs kar rgyal pos drag tu brdeg/ rgya shugs bkus pas drag tu blugs// nyi ma bzhi la drag tu brdeg/ sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi
bcad// dam rdzas mchod pa shin tu dgram// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drag tu bya// yengs na bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yeng bar mi mdzad khro bos gsungs// des ni las kyi 'bras bu yang// shin tu zad pa

med pa ste// mkha' la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul// chu la bying med mngon shes ldan// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ro langs kyi sgrub pa la/ ngan sngags kyi phur
bus gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'di ched du brjod do// ye shes 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed steng na// ye

shes nyi ma gsal ba'i thig phran gdab// mu khyud zlum po sbrul gyi zhags pa bri// stegs bu phyogs mtshams phur bus bskor bar bya// de ltar bris pa'i dkyil du dgod pa ni// o~M ni dbus kyi lte ba la// shar du

hri la lho ru staM// nub phyogs hu~M la byang du ha// byang shar mtshams su dza zhes pa// shar lho tri la lho nub me// nub byang a la rab tu rten// rten pa'i yi ge de bkod nas// dbus su bstan par bsgom

pa ni// gshin rje ste sku dmar nag la// dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drug/ dbu la thod pa tshal gyis brgyan// zhal g.yas smug nag g.yon ljang ba// dbus ni sku dang rab mthun pa// sku la thod pa brgyan gyi

tshal// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa// yab kyi sku la rab 'jug pa// g.yon phyogs gnas pa gong ma bzhin// o~M a mr-i ta ta ka sarba a mr-i ta kro ta hU~M phaT// o~M a mr-i ta kro Ta hU~M phaT/ de ltar yab yum
gsal bar bskyed// pad+ma'i gdan la rab bzhugs pa'o// 'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa ni// bskyed pa gong ma'i rim pa'o// rtag tu bzlas pa bsnyen pa'i sngags// mi drag mi bul mi zhan par// ting 'dzin

gsal bar bsgom byas te// zhi la 'tshe ba'i ting 'dzin la// ri rab dbus kyi lte dbus la// rab brtan 'og gi go go [\[]bgos [\]]nas// rdo rje tshe yi dbang stsol te// phyogs bcu gdug pa'i tshe 'dren te// gdug

pa ma lus 'gug par 'gyur// tshe'i snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas// o~M sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra a ko A yu pha la si ti ni bru~M a/ des ni tshe yi dbang thob nas// sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang// bskal pa ma zhig
bar du ni// lo lnga lon pa bzhin du gnas// de nas bskul ba'i gnas 'di gsungs// e ma'o phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa yis// ye shes rgyal po'i thig le 'di// gsang chen rmad du byung ba ste// rgyu drug
'khor ba'i sems can rnams// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ chos kyi sku 'am chos kyi dbyings// don dam tshig dang mngon sum pa// dngos po mtshan ma thams cad las/

khyab pa'i mya ngan thugs rje che// phra mo sems kyi rang bzhin te// gti mug mun pa sel ba ste// nyon mongs dri ma kun dang bral// shin tu sad pa mya ngan 'das// thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshin rje ste// rdo rje tshe'i
rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'o// zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rngam pa'i zhal nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma'o phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ye nas
dben// bder gshegs thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// phyogs bcu'i stong khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas// thabs dang shes rab kyis ni dbang

bskur na// bdud dang srin po log 'dren tshe bsdus te// dbang bskur gnang ba des kyang byin bskyed de// shar phyogs dri za'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig/ o~M badzra ku la e swa shwa ra na ha ha ho ho hU~M hU~M/ zhes ni
dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// rdo rje rigs las grub pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis// mgon po gshin rje tshe dbang bskur// de nas rin po che'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir 'di
gsungs so// e ma'o rin chen 'chang ba kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang byed pa// gtso mchog khyab par byin brlabs te// mi 'gyur rigs kyi tshe thob nas// lho phyogs gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe

drongs shig/ o~M rat+na ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/ rin chen dgyes pa'i dbang bskur bas// khyad par byin brlabs thob gyur cig/ de nas pad+ma rigs kyi tshe'i dbang 'di yang gsungs so// e ma'o khro gtum rngam

pa'i tshogs// pad+ma rigs kyi dbang phyug ste// snang ba med las lhun gyis grub// rdo rje 'chang gis dbang bskur bas// klu 'dul tshe yi dbang thob shog/ pad+ma ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/ lhun gyis grub pa tshe yi
dbang// thogs med dam pa thob par shog/ de nas las kyi rigs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di brjod do// e ma'o rang bzhin mtshan ma med pa yi// ye shes lnga ldan phrin las gtso// gnyis su med pa las kyi
rigs// las rnams thams cad dbang bskur bas// gnod sbyin gdon las tshe drongs te// gnod sbyin bgegs 'dul dbang thob shog/ o~M karma ku la A yu he he ho ho ha~M/ zhes brjod pas thams cad tshe'i

dbang nyid du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// tshad med bzhi yi thugs rjes kyang// nyon mongs dgra rnams zhi gyur cig/ ces phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe'i dbang
bskur ro// 'phags pa las bzhi'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'jam dpal tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid de/ mtha' byed 'byung ba de nyid

kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ngo// gshin rje las kyi phrin las 'di// myos dang mgo 'khor byed pa dang// yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed// log 'dren rnam pa drug tu bstan// log 'dren mthar byed

dkyil 'khor ni// bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de// yi dwa gas kyi ni gos la bri// sum brtsegs ldan pa'i mu ran la// dbyangs kyi yi ges kun tu bskor/ hrISh+ti'i sngags kyis gnon byas la// tha la thod pa

gtang bar bya// de nas sngags kyi dgang bar bya// ya ma na te ra tsa'i tshogs// sa ste 'byung byed do yi rten// me ste thams cad sreg pa'o// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed skur bskyed la// yum yang de ru bsgom

byas la// phyogs bcu gdug pa thams cad kun// ma lus tsham ngam drag par bya// bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar// sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs te// bde zhing yid 'ong gnas dag las// rab tu sdang mig sdang
sems bcas// sgra dang bcas pa'i sems spangs te// nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar// rgyun dang dus su bstan pa'o// bar bar bskul ba'i las bya zhing// bcol ba'i las dag rab tu brjod// de

nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo gshin rje'i tshogs thams cad yum btsun mo dang gnyis su med par byas te/ bzlas pa'i sngags 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo// oM hr-I Sh+t+ri bi kri tA nan/ hu~M hu~M pa na a nud

b+ha ba/ sarba d+harma tsa tsAr+ya a ti ba haM/ o~M la~M ya~M a~M/ badzra bo d+hi ta thA ga ta kro d+hi shwa ri/ a byi ta badzra kro d+hi shwa ri/ he he ha~M ha~M/ sngags 'di rab tu brjod byas pas/ kha dog che zhing lus po che ba dang// rgya dag yongs su
ma chad thams cad nam mkha' ste// gsal ba'i shes rab thams cad nam mkha' 'dra// mthar phyin sngags kyi lung la mkhas par bya// de yi sbyor ba thams cad dgyes skongs shing// dbang sdud sngags ste drag

po'i las dang sbyar// mi dmigs gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag rgyar gnas// sgrol dang mthar phyin phrin las gnas su bstan// ting 'dzin rim pa 'di dag ldan par bya/ khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin

dang/ sgyu ma la dbang bsgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ go 'phang chen po la sbyar ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang// rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting

nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab kyis 'dod chags sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ye shes kyis gti mug sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yon tan gyis nga rgyal 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'bad pa med pa'i brtson

'grus kyis phrag dog 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de dag 'joms pa'i sngags ni 'di dag go/ pradz+nya ku la/ dz+nyA na ku la/ d+ha ka ku la/ gu na ku la/ bIr+ya ku la/ b+hu ta ku la/ badzra ku la/ pad+ma ku la/ karma ku la/

rat+na ku la/ sarba ta thA ga ta ho/ zhes brjod nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// dper na me dang 'od bzhin du// 'od la sbrang ma 'du na yang// me lce'i drod ni 'od la yod// 'od kyis sbrang 'tshig ci bzhin du// skyon
gyis dri ma thams cad dang// bdud dang mu stegs log 'dren dang// mi mthun pa yi dgra dang bgegs// shes rab thabs kyis gzir gnon pa'i// me lce dang ni sbrang ma 'dra'o// tha dad pa yi mi mthun
pa'ang// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid// 'khrigs pa med cing sgrol bar byed// mi skye ye shes ral gri yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal dral byas nas// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa yi// rgyu dang rgyu ma

yin pa yi// nyon mongs sems can mtho ris gnas// bsgral ba'i zhing du smos pa de// de la de bzhin drag tu bya// rigs dang lo grangs mthun pa la// de bzhin byas na skyon pa ste// de dag yongs su shes par
bya// las dang bya ba rtsol ba rnams// nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sad// de rtags dka' ba mi 'gyur te// mi la ya yi 'og gos la// gi wang dag gis bris byas te// 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang

sngags dang// gang bya spel la bris byas la// rak+ta dag gi kha chus bran// thub pa drug gi snying po bri// gsang ba'i sngags 'di drag tu brjod// o~M hriSh+t+r-i kro d+ha bi kri ta/ hriSh+t+r-i kro d+hi ma ra ta/ pra sang he te ba mu ka he hang

he hang/ kA la rU pa hu~M hu~M phaT phaT// a/ de skad gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas// dgra dang bgegs dang mu stegs dang// bdud dang srin po ma lus rnams// gzir cing gnon pa drag tu bya// mi mthun phyogs kyi

'byung po de// gdul bar bya ba'i don ched du// khro bo'i sku ru bsgom byas te// thams cad bsgral bar bya ba yi// rang bzhin grub pa 'di gsungs so// o~M pra mA rta na/ na mo badzra badzra ki mo na ta/ a hang pra khu ma

khu ma mo mu sti swA hA// de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang bzhin gyis ni dbang du 'gyur// bdud rnams dag ni khro zhing gtum// srin po dag ni 'jigs shing rngam// mu stegs log 'dren rgol bar byed// de

dag 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir// phrin las dam pa 'di brtsams so// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// dbus kyi phro [\[]pho [\]]brang lte ba la// bdud rnams 'dul ba'i snying po bri// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs

stengs su// dri za dbang bsdu'i snying po bri// lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// mu stegs sgrol ba'i snying po bri// nub kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// klu rnams tshar gcod snying po bri// byang gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo

la// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dbang sdud bri/ hu~M bi g+ha nan/ hu~M rak+Sha nan/ o~M tir ti ka nan/ o~M mar na nan/ mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lte dbus su// mtshams kyi bgegs gnon snying po bri/ hu~M d+ha hu~M pAH hu~M lA/

hu~M swA/ gru chad rnam pa bzhi po la// thod pa rlon pa bri bar bya// mu khyud thod pa'i phreng ba gtang// phyi rol sbrul gyis yongs su dgang// de ltar dkyil 'khor zin pa dang// rnam par 'tshe ba'i gzugs rnams kun/

kham pa rdza yi ga'u la// gzugs su yongs su bri bya ste// dbus su yongs su gzhag par bya/ kha dog dmar pos bcings nas ni// rtse gcig phyag rgya bcas byas la// gsang sngags 'di yang 'bum khri brjod// o~M

pra marta na mo ha sra badzra dza ki mo na d+ha a hang pra khu ma mo tha tha swA hA/ na mo do gi kha d+ha mu pra pa tha byi tha u ste ni nan sarba ta ta na phaT/ phyag rgya de dang bcas pas brdeg/ zhag gsum bzlas pa byas na ni// bgegs
dang log 'dren dbang du 'dus// gzhan yang de bzhin bzhugs pa'i khro// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang// smug nag ljang nag kham pa dang// so so'i cha lugs rngam pa'i gzugs// mgon po gshin rje nag

po yis// bgegs dang log 'dren gzir cing gnon// rngam pa'i zhal du 'di bstabs so// o~M che ge mo kha ram khA hi/ o~M hriSh+t+r-i che ge mo kha ram khA hi/ oM kA la rU pa che ge mo kha ram khA hi/ hu~M hu~M phaT

phaT a/ nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas// de nas phyag rgya gsum bcas te// yang nas yang du gzir cing gnon// phyag rgya de dang gsang sngags 'dis// lan grangs stong rtsa gcig tu brdeg/ o~M hriSh+t+r-i badzra ya

ya na pa rna su put+ta hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a/ las dang rdzas dang sngags dang ni// phyag rgya brtson 'grus ma yengs par// 'bum mam grangs ni ci mang du// yang nas yang du nan tan bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam
dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las log 'dren mthar byed kyis mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

gshin rje'i bdag nyid des mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo// gnod sbyin mthar byed phrin las 'di// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// bzlas pa'i

snying po bri bar bya// ya ste skyed pa me ste sreg/ tos la snying rje ru la chags// n+dza ni 'byung byed yab kyi gsang// yo la kun 'byung ta la bsdu// bdag nyid las kyi mthar byed sku// yab yum gnyis med rol pa

las// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro// 'dzum dang bcas pas yul la 'bul// byang chub bla med sangs rgyas la// mchod cing ci ltar mdzad par ltar// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du// ting 'dzin 'du ba
nam mkha' 'dra// zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa can thams cad spa gong ste bred nas myos par gyur te/ dper na mi ra ro bzhin no// de nas nan tan gyi phrin las 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung

dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo// gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa/ khro bo chen po hU~M sgra can// las rnams mthar byed phrin las sku// gnod sbyin sdang sems ldan pa kun// bar chad bya bar sems pa

ste// de dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// sku mdog nag po chen po ste// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// thod pa tshar gsum dbu rgyan can// phyag g.yas zhing chen g.yon b+han d+ha// spyan gsum mche gtsigs

zhabs kyang brkyang bskum ste// mi mthun bgegs dang sdang ba'i dgra// ma lus dbang sdud phrin las mchog gi sku// mi sdug tshul 'chang dregs pa'i khyo shug ldan// zhing chen g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// zhe sdang dbang
sdud stag gi sham thabs can// nyon mongs dbang sdud glang chen ko rlon can// 'dren pa'i khro rgyal gdug 'dul dam pa 'di// dus ngan tha ma'i sems can 'dul dka' ba// nyon mongs dbang sdud dpal gyi zhal
du stobs/ 'gro ba ma lus thugs rjes dbyings la dgod// zhe sdang shugs 'chang khro bo'i gtso// gdug par gyur pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad pa// nga rgyal la sogs rtag tu dug gsum sku// ye

shes ngang las thams cad rdzogs par mdzod// o~M badzra hriSh+t+ri bi kri tA na na/ ta thA ga ta ya ma ra tsa hU~M phaT a/ zhes pa'i sngags dang bcas la bdag nyid las mthar byed kyi skur bsgoms la phrin las bcol zhing

gnon pa drag tu bzlas pa'i snying po bzlas so// de'i dus su sbyin sreg byed na phrin las brtsam par bya ste/ me thab e yi dbyibs 'dra la// bang rim sum brtsegs kha khyer can// ngos la me yi phreng ba gtang/ kha

khyer rdo rjer ba la// mu ran thod pa'i phreng ba ste// me ste bsreg bya 'chang zhes pa/ kha dog nag po shin tu rid// phyag na zhugs gling bgrang phreng dang// be con ril pa thogs pa ste// tshul bzhin spyan drangs gdan
bzhugs bstod// dbang dang phyag tshang gshegs pa rnams// gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya// gnyis 'og rang bzhin ya ma'i sku// gnyis med spyan drangs bzhugs la bcol// sbyin bsreg phrin las zin pa

dang// bcol bskul dag kyang rab tu bya// rdzas ni dug dang lan tshwa dang// ske tshe sbrang rtsi yungs nag dang// gu gul nag po la sogs pa'i// lcags 'dra'i rdzas la rab tu bsngags// bdag nyid lha yi skur

bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa yi// sngags 'dir rab tu rtse gcig bzlas// o~M hU~M ya khang me tra ha mu kha hriSh+t+r-i ya ma ra tsa phaT hU~M/ phyag rgya zil gnon phyag rgya bca'// dkyil 'khor bskor zhing
gsang sngags bzlas// bdag nyid nub kyi phyogs 'dug ste// las kyi mthar byed skur bsgoms la// gsang sngags mi bul mi drag par// bzlas na myur du 'grub pa ni// yid 'khrugs myos nas dbang med
'gyel ba dang// rab tu brgyal nas thal bar 'jig pa dang// de rnams mi 'grub pa ru ngas ma bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i khro bos gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i
rgyud las/ gnod sbyin mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen pos mthar byed 'byung ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo// srin po
mthar byed phrin las 'di// dkyil 'khor bsgom pa bya bar bstan// ya ste rgyu la ta ste rkyen// yo ni kun tu bskul ba la// ni ni sdud pa'i don yin te// ri zhes bya ba lhun stug pa// ya la 'dus te k+She
la thim// bdag nyid chings zhes bya ba'i sku// dbu gsum po la phyag drug ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser nag/ phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// g.yas pa ba su ta yi zhags// g.yas par

gsal shing tha ma lcags kyu'o// g.yon gyi dang po chu srin bar ma ka ta ri// tha ma rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa'o// sku stod glang chen ko rlon la// sku smad stag gi sham thabs te// zhing chen g.yang gzhis

sku la brgyan// gzhan yang dur khrod rgyan mchog rnams// ma lus sku la rdzogs pa la// bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di blang bar bya// mi shigs rdo rje gar gyi bdag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gshin rje ste// phrin las rgyal po

grub pa'i las// o~M dang a~M dang hU~M zhes pa// o~M ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs// a~M ni lce yi steng du la// hU~M ni thugs ka nyid du'o// de las 'od zer rab spros te// bdag lus nam mkha' lta bur gyur// phaT
ces bya bar rab brjod pas// 'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis khebs// de nyid sreg pa ma yin te// yid kyi ye shes me 'bar ba// gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa// kun gyi stong pa de yin no// ji ltar mkha'

la mtshon snang ba// nam mkha' nyid las byung ba ltar// sngags kyi 'phro 'du btang ba yang// sems las byung ba nam mkha' la/ rnam shes stong pa'i ngang la 'du// bdag nyid chos kyi skur bsgoms la// zhe sdang

'phro 'du mang byas la// bskyed pa'i sngags ni drag tu bzlas// o~M ma hA daM Sh+t+ro ta ka pe ra a ra ne tsa na ka ta khai che ge mo la dus zhes pa dang// sngags gong nas 'byung ba dang// spel te las byas na gdon mi za'o
zhes gshin rje khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las klu mthar byed kyis gnod pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang khro bo chen po gshin

rje gshed kyis mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo// ya ma mthar byed phrin las ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma 'dra bar dmigs// bzlas pa'i snying po 'di yang bri// ya

ste 'byung byed k+She yis sreg/ ya ni yang dag tsa ni skems// ni zhes pa ni khug cig pa'o// ra zhes bya ba bsgral ba la// ma las skyes byed slar sdud pa'o// bdag nyid ya ma mthar byed sku// sku mdog ljang nag zhal

gcig phyag gnyis pa// sku la thod pa phyed tshal brgyan// dbu yi skra ni kham nag la// ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ste// phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to 'phyar// g.yon pa phyag na zhing chen za ba'o// sku stod glang chen ko

rlon la// sku smad stag gi sham thabs can// dur khrod me dbus bzhugs pa la// yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom// bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin me 'dra la// bzlas brjod rlung 'dra g.yo zhing bskyod// lce la nyi ma'i

dkyil 'khor la// steng du bzlas pa'i snying po dgod// tha ma dbyangs dang bcas pa la// hriSh+t+r-i sngags kyi phreng ba gdab// phar 'phros rnam shes 'gugs par bsam// tshur bsdus gshin rje nyid la thim// 'phro
'du bzlas pa de dag kun// gong du bshad pa dag la yang// de dag rab tu sbyar zhes bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i khro bos bskul ba 'di gsungs so// o~M ya ma las kun
'jigs par byed pa ni// thams cad dbang sdud ya ma mthar byed sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang// zhabs gnyis dor thabs klu rgyal gnon// sku la sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa ni// bgegs

rnams 'dul zhing rtag tu 'chi bar mdzad// sku la thod pa'i phyed tshal brgyan pa ni// 'gro ba thugs rje phyogs gcig dgongs pa'i rtags// dbu skra ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ni// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud
pa'i rtag/ phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to bsnams pa ni// dgra bgegs 'jigs pa che las sgrol ba'i rtags// g.yon pa zhing dbyug phyag na bsnams pa ni// thugs rjes sems can mya ngan lam la 'jog/ ko

rlon g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni// dug lnga ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rtags// stag gi g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni// dug gsum gnas su bsgral nas chos kyi sku// skye med ngang las g.yo bskyod mi

mnga' yang// zhe sdang phrin las bya ba'i dus la bab// o~M hriSh+t+r-i ya ma ra tsa sarba ma ra ya nan dza sa ma ya zhes brjod cing zhe sdang dang ldan par ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa dang sbyar te las byas na gdon mi za'o// de

dag ni 'di 'os pa tsam gyis ma yin te yang dang yang du 'dris par byas la nan tan gyis ma byas na 'phral du phra mo tsam gyis 'grub pa ma yin no// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ya ma
mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang las phran tshegs bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo// zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor
la// pad+ma'am 'khor lo gang yang rung// yang na rin chen dra ba la// dra mig rnams ni 'dug par gnas// rin chen phur bu nang du bltas// de ru bri'am gzugs par bya// tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pas
bskor// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khru gang thur du brkos byas la// ga'u kha sbyar nang du ni// yungs kar blugs la bzlas pa bya// rtags la ma yengs 'phro 'du yis// rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par

bya// o~M badzra kA la da du kha la/ pra marta na hU~M phaT/ sle kha sle kha phaT phaT ces bzlas la// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgoms la/ sngags ni nus tshad du bzlas na 'grub nges so// yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub
pa'o// de nas 'khor khro bo la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o/ dbyings las byung ba dang// mkha' la rgyu dang sa la dbang ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i
dbyangs 'di bdag cag len lags so// ye shes mkha' ldan ma mo'i dpal// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i phrin las can// dpal gyi phyag brnyan rak+ta'i dri snom ma// ma mo khyod ni kun gyi gtso mo
dpag tshad brgyad khrir rgyug/ bud med lus la 'jigs byed tshul 'chang ba/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho'i gting nas skems// mig nas zhag 'dzag ri rab thal bar rlog/ skad cig tsam la stong khams dbang du

sdud// 'jig rten lha chen brgyad kyang 'dar yed yed// che ge mo zhig dbang du sdud par byed// bud med gzugs can dus la bab// che ge mo o~M trag rak+sha/ hriSh+t+r-i ya ma ma ma nan zhes bskul ba ni dbyings kyi ma
mo'o// nam mkha'i gting dpag yangs la gnas bcas shing// bar snang khams la rgyu ba'i tshogs/ khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud// lcags kyi bya khra lta bu ni// ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin/ kha
'bar stong gi gtso mo ste// 'jigs byed rnams kyi dbang byed ma// srid gsum dbang du sdud pa mo// gzigs pa'i go 'phang nam mkha' 'dra// gshegs shing bzhugs pa glog pas mgyogs// g.yas kyi gshog

pa brdabs pa yi// bdud dang srin po rdul du rlog/ g.yon gyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis// dgra bgegs 'byung po dbang du sdud// dam tshig can gyi dus la bab// o~M ma ra trag rak+sha/ tri yo ya ma ra tsa ka ka ru pa

hriSh+t+r-i dza zhes bskul ba ni mkha' lding gi tshogs so// ya ma na ste grub pa mo// la la lag na rgyu zhags 'chang// la la lag na thod phreng 'dzin// la la zhing chung ba su 'dren// la la me khyer rgya mtsho skems// la la

'gugs byed nyams pa 'dzin// la la sbrul nag zhags pa 'dzin// la la pho nya 'gugs shing 'dren// sngags pas bos shing gdungs pa'i tshe// dam tshig dus la bab bo sa ma ya// sdang bar sems pa'i snying nas

drongs// brtse ba'i tshogs kyi dus la bab// o~M ka ha trag rak+sha/ rat+na ka la hriSh+t+riM swA hA/ zhes spyan drangs zhing bskul ba ni gter bdag gi tshogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces

gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po las bzhi 'khor lo 'di/ dus phyi ma la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na// nga yang thugs dam las mi g.yel la/ 'khor khro bo dang/ khro mo la sogs pas kyang/
nga'i thugs dam rjes su bsgrub par mdzad pas/ dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku la bsdo ba la sogs pa la dam tshig 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das
khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjes/ dus tha ma la 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa la dga' nas/ yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mjug bskul ba dang gnang
ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// de nas 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa rnams kyis/ ngag mthun

pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso// las bzhi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'di la// ngo mtshar rmad byung bstan pa la// bdag cag the tshom 'tshal ba
rnams// bder gshegs gsung gi ngo bo yis// zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad du gsol// 'phags pa zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// las bzhi zhi bgyi ji ltar lags// 'khor lo zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// gsang
ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags// rnam dag dbyings las bzhengs nas ni// zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo gzhan la gdug par
mdzad pa yis/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung phyung ste/ 'di skad 'khor la bka' stsal to// rigs kyi 'khor rnams zhu ba yi// dmigs rnams zhu ba rab tu legs// 'phags pa zhes su bstan pa ni// gdug pa
ma lus kun las 'phags// ye shes sems dpa' 'byung ba'i gzhi// dpe yis de la bskrun du med// las bzhi zhes su grags pa yang// de la las ni rnam pa gnyis// thabs dang shes rab 'dus dbang

dang// sku gsum phrin las 'dul ba ste// thabs dang thabs su 'brel ba la// shes rab 'brel bas yum zhes bya// chos dang longs spyod pa yi sku// 'dul dbang las zhes bya bar grags// de la bzhi zhes bya ba

yang// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mngon no// zhi ba bya ba'i nges tshig kyang// ting 'dzin rim pa byams pa la// 'phro 'du dkar la 'tsher ba ste// thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang// mi mthun pa rnams zhi bya'i phyir// de

phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o// rgyas pa gser ltar ser ba la// ting 'dzin sprul pa mang por khyab// phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don byas te// bskul ba'i sa la gzhes pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te// bdag
gi ba spu'i bu ga nas// kun tu zhugs te rgyas pa la// tshe dang dbang thang dpal la sogs// thams cad rgyas pas rgyas zhes bya// de la dbang gi nges tshig kyang// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad
nas// bdag gi yid la bsams pa kun// yab yum sprul pa'i khyad par las// ci 'dod thams cad dbang du sdud// las dang bya ba ma lus dang// bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms pas// 'du bar 'gyur ba

gdon mi za// de la drag po'i phrin las kyang// gshin rje gshed dang gshed bdag mo// yab yum khyad par sprin lta bu// nam mkha' khebs pa byed pa ltar// gnyis med byang chub khyad par las// 'phro 'du 'od
zer sprin lta bu// nam mkha' gang bar khyab pa la// khro bo'i sprul pas khebs gyur te// 'jig rten rdul du bshig nas ni// gdug pa ma lus kun btul te// slar bsdus yab yum sku la bsdu// de
ltar nas dang yungs 'bru tsam// ma lus kun du 'gengs byed cing// dmigs pa gang na gnas pa dag/ btsal te slar yang 'gugs la sogs// 'di dang 'di zhes bya med par// 'khor ba tshang nas sprugs
bsams te// drag po'i phrin las grub par bsam// 'khor lo zhes su bstan pa yang// mi 'khor 'khor phyir rtse mo 'phro// lte ba 'khor la rtse mos gcod// de phyir 'khor lo zhes su grags// gsang ba zhes su

grags pa yang// kun la mi bstan rtsa ba ste// thun mong kun gyi ma yin pas// de phyir gsang ba zhes bya'o// de la rgyud ces bya ba yang// tshang zhing 'brel bas btags pa dang// breng chags dgos pa sgrub pa

yi// de phyir rgyud ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// nyi ma bzhi la las bzhi zhig/ gsungs shing nges par bstan pa ste// dngos po ci la bsgom par bgyi// zhi ba la

ni ji ltar bgyi// sngags rnams ji ltar bzlas par bgyi// phrin las nges par bstan pa ste// rgyas pa dag la ji ltar bstan// sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu// dbang la ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// sngags rnams
brjod pa ji lta bu// drag po'i las su bstan pa la// lha ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// phrin las rnam bzhir bstan pa des// las ni ji lta bu zhig 'grub// gzhi'am
gnas ni ji lta bu// de dag ji lta bu yis bri// nges par bstan pa'i man ngag la// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan khro 'dul des// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang bsgom lha
rnams sku mdog dkar// yum yang de dang 'dra ba la// phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams rigs dang sbyar// bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka ru// sku mdog gsal bar bsgoms nas ni// bzlas pa'i sngags 'di mgu bas

bzlas// ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ che ge mo ba lu ka shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo k+Sha ra tsa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ya ta yo ni ri ya k+She ya/ che ge mo pa la mu sti shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che

ge mo ma ra ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mi drag mi bul mi zhan par// ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan byas te// nyi ma re la rim bzhin sbyar// grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o// phrin las nges par grub pa ste// bsgom par bya

ba sku mdog ser// yum yang de dang 'dra ba la// phyi ma rim bzhin sbyar bar bya// gser lta bu yi ting 'dzin la// 'phro 'du byang chub sems lta bu// phyogs bcu ma lus don byas te// bdag gi phung po ma lus

dang// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel bar bsam// de tshe sngags 'di bzlas par bya// ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya// che ge mo pra ma ya/ puSh+tIM ku ru swA hA/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo ka kha puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/

ya ta yo ni ra yak+She la/ che ge mo zhig sa sti puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo zhig mA ra ya puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA// de tshe rang rig ting 'dzin gyi// mthu dang ldan par byas te ni// sngags dang bzlas pa byas

na ni// 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// lha yang sku mdog zangs lta bu// yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom// lha rnams gzhung bzhin bskyed pa ni// mthar byed 'byung ba'i

bzlas pa'o// ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ che ge mo hu~M hU~M ba shang ku ru swA hA/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ kA la rU pa swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma

ya che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ kA la rU pa hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ sngags kyi bzlas pa byas na ni// bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// 'du zhes gsungs te gdon mi za'o// lha ni sku mdog lcags lta bu// mthing ga rab

tu khros pa la// gcer bu ral pa gcig ste 'jigs// ma rungs 'dul ba bsgoms nas ni// bzlas pa 'di ni drag tu bzlas// ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya che ge mo a mu khaM pra ma ya ni hU~M phaT/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/

che ge mo a mu kha~M mu ra tsa ya hU~M phaT/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo a mu kha~M rak+ta tsa ra hU~M phaT/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo a mu kha~M mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms la// sngags kyi phreng
bas thog 'gyur na// mngon shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// zhi ba'i dus su bzlas pa yis// dang pos sems ni g.yos par 'gyur// gnyis pas yid la 'byung bar
'gyur// gsum pas dkar po'i ngo bo dang// bzhi pas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// rgyas pa'i dus su bzlas pa yis// dang pos dpal yang 'phel bar byed// gnyis pas dbang thang skyed par byed// gsum pas
gzi byin rnyed 'gyur te// bzhi pas tshe ring ma lus rgyas par 'gyur// dbang gi dus su bzlas pa yis// dang pos sems kyang g.yos par byed// gnyis pas 'jug par nus pa ste// gsum pas dmigs pa
dbang du 'du// bzhi pas thams cad dbang du 'du'o// drag po'i bzlas pa byas pa yis// dang pos mgo ni 'khor bar byed// gnyis pas yid 'khrugs gsum pas khrag tu skyugs// bzhi pas gdon mi za

ba'o// gzhi 'am gnas su bstan pa ni// bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de// yi dwags kyi ni gos la bri// zhi ba pad+ma zla ba la// rgyas pa glang po'i rgyab tu bya// dbang ni bud med snying gar te// dgug pa seng ge

dre'u dang gnyis// dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis// smyo 'bog sha ba'i rgyab tu bya// lkugs pa lug gi khong du gzhug/ bskrad po rnga mo'i rgyab tu bya// gsad pa skyes pa'i snying ga ste// gnon pa ri rab 'og

tu bya// snag tsha'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang/ khrag sna gsum dang byi la'i gcin// pho rog dag gi sgro rtsa la// shi ba'i skra las pir byas la// gang brtsams 'grub par nges par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das

brtsam pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin mchog de la 'di skad ces gsol to// nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la/ khro bo'i bzlas pa ji ltar lags// yum gyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags// ma mo'i sngags rnams ji ltar

lags/ khro bo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// zhe sdang 'joms mdzad khro bo des// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ khro bo yab yum lce la gzhag/ ma mo sngags kyi mthu byin che/ khro bo mang po 'od 'phro ba'o// de

yi bzlas pa 'di dag go/ oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa pa tsa te ni hUM phaT/ oM oM hUM pe tA li rag+sha man/ oM ro ga mdun b+h+yo/ tsa mun ta kyi kyi ma b+h+yo/ nam gru ma pa ya ti b+h+yo/ oM oM oM/ kro d+ha badzra pasmi/ badzra

kro d+ha ma la/ badzra kro d+ha ti s+tha/ badzra kro d+ha kang+ka/ badzra kro d+ha smig sha/ badzra kro d+ha rag khang/ badzra kro d+ha ta ki ni/ badzra kro d+ha rag+sha/ badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha/ badzra kro d+ha kuN Da li/ badzra kro d+ha kri ta/ badzra lo ka badzra pasmi/ badzra shu

la/ badzra ku lan/ badzra kang+ka/ badzra mu la/ badzra sri ta/ badzra ba mu/ badzra shu la/ badzra sma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam
dpal ye shes sems dpa' khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la// tshe zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ yungs kar bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// de yis las ni ci zhig
'grub// phur bu zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// dang po dam bca' ji ltar lags// bcom ldan khro bo'i rgyal po la// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// tshe zhes bya ba'i don 'di
yang// chos nyid spros pa med pa la// kun tu mi 'gyur nam mkha' 'dra// bskyod med dus kyis bshig tu med// 'gro ba 'khrul pa'i ngo gang la// bag chags ngan pas bslus pa yis// tshe la bar chod 'ong bar
gsungs// de phyir tshe yi bsgrub pa gsungs// yungs kar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang// bag chags 'khrul pas gnod 'gyur ba// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po ste// de dag 'dul ba'i don du bstan// de ni las

kyi 'bras bu yang// sngon nas las ngan mthu rtags te// mi mthun pa de 'gugs par byed// de nas yungs kar rgyal pos bya'o// phur bu zhes su bstan pa yang// bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// gnyis med mkha'
la gnas bsams te// phur bu zhes ni de la bya'o// phyogs bcu'i thugs las skyes pa ste// de phyir phur bu zhes su bstan// dang por dam bcas 'di ltar ro// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// mtshams

med lnga ni kun spyod cing// gos ngan re ba gon pa dang// zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe// de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung// dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe// lha mo'i nang na 'od zer can// 'phags pa'i nang na 'jam dpal

gnyis// 'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub gzhan// rigs 'dzin kun la ma yin no/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// nges par dbang du ma gyur pa'i// dang po 'das dang da ltar gyi// phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang
med// dgra bgegs 'bum mam stong yang rung// de ma thag tu brlag par byed/ khrag gi char yang 'bebs par byed// ces gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad tshar bcad de/ drag po'i
phrin las grub par gyur to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje gshed po la 'di skad ces bstod do/// 'phags pa khro bo 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang

bzhin las// tshad med bzhi yi ngang nyid rnam dag pas// bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ston cing// tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis sgrol bar mdzad// ma he'i steng
na zhabs ni brkyang bskum gnas// las kyi dbyug pa dag gis rdul du rlog/ klu yi rgyal pos sku la brgyan pa ni// snyan cha mgur dang dbu dang phyag zhabs rnams// yan lag lnga la nges par dkris te
gnas// dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du 'bar// spyan gsum gnyis med rnam thar don la gzigs// mgo bcad phreng bas dbu yi rgyan du byas// ljags dang mche ba glog ltar 'gril zhing 'bar// 'jigs

byed drag po'i zhal spyan rab tu bgrad// mi lpags rlon pa dag gis stod g.yogs shing// stag lpags rlon pas sku yi rgyan du byas// de 'dra'i sku mdog 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'chang// ngo mtshar rmad byung che la phyag
'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas gnyis su med par gyur to// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud phyi ma
rim par bkod pa rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya ma rA dza br-i sh+tsi ka ma hA ba la gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bkod pa'i snying po mkha' dbyings rnam par

dag pa'i klong/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ rdo rje snying po dregs pa 'joms pa nyid dang/ dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ ma skyes lam la 'dun
pa rnams dang/ sa la gnas pa'i sems dpa' rnams dang/ rdo rje khro bo dregs pa rnams dang/ khram thogs kyi bdud pho mo dang/ gri thogs kyi ging dang/ zor thogs kyi ma mo dang// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa
can rnams dang/ phung byed mngag pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag la stsogs pas yongs su bskor te thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen
po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ chos nyid mnyam pa chen po ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pa zhes bya bar lhun gyis grub par kun la khyab par mdzad do// des 'khor rnams sems 'drogs par gzigs nas

'khor rnams la rang bzhin 'di bstan to// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// ma skyes ye nas gnyis su med// rgyu dang rkyen med rang byung ba// de las kun 'byung thabs bsam yas// thams cad nga yi rang bzhin

las// ma g.yos mi g.yo cir yang gsal// snying po nyid la g.yo ba nyid// ces gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gis de kho na nyid so so ma yin pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas rdo rje snying po dregs pa
'joms pa des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kun gyi rang bzhin rdo rje nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// gsang sngags kun gyi ngo bo nyid// che ba'i yon tan
rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen po la sprul pa snang ba'i tshul 'od zer bye ba sa ya phyogs bcur bkye'o// 'od zer de dag

gis zhing khams thams cad du khyab par mdzad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa brgyud de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba/ rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du mdzad de/ rtsol

ba dang bral ba'i lam mngon du gyur par gsungs so// de nas rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes khyod// mi rtog dbyings las sku
bzhengs la// 'khor gyi tshogs rnams dbang sdus shig/ ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa la bzhugs te/ 'byung ba lnga

ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang/ mtha' dbus med pa'i pho brang/ 'bras bu'i lam thams cad kyi snying por rig pa snying pos zin pa'i thabs chen po bgrod du med pa'i lam khyad par can/ stobs kyi

stobs las khyad par du 'phags pa/ rmad du byung ba'i stobs dang/ nges pa'i sbyor ba du ma rol par 'char ba/ rab tu khros pa'i tshul 'chang bas 'jig rten gyi khams gang bar mdzad pa/ thabs kyi nges par sbyar
ba'i stobs kyis las thams cad gtan la phab ste/ las ma yin pa las spyod pa thams cad kyi srog dang/ las dang nus pa thams cad gnad la bor te srog dbang du bsdus so// des 'jig rten gsum po rab

tu g.yos so// ldeg go rab tu ldeg go// 'ur ro rab tu 'ur kun tu 'ur ro// chem chem mo// 'jig rten gsum po 'jig la khad do// 'khor thams cad brgyal te dbang po nyams so// de nas bcom ldan kyis stobs kyi
stobs khyad par can du gyur nas srog gi dngas ma gsal bar mdzad de/ de ma thag tu 'khor rnams myos shing dran pa nyams pa las log ste/ shin tu bred cing mi bzod pa chen por gyur nas/ rang rang

gi srog gi snying po thams cad dngos su phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rngam pa'i sgra chen po bton te// srog dang las thams cad yi ge gnyis la bsdus te/ rang rang gi srog gi snying po thams cad nus
pa'i mthu can du byin gyis brlabs te/ dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas dregs pa de dag kun kyang gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun du gyur to// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po

sdig pa stobs chen gsang ba'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho mi shigs rdo rje'i sku// zil

gyis gnon pa'i ye shes khyod// 'khor gyi dregs pa dbang bsdus nas// dkyil 'khor chen por lhun rdzogs pa'i// drag po'i sngags rgod 'jug tshul gang// phyag rgya zil gnon ji lta bu// drag sngags mtshon cha ji
ltar lags// de bzhin dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni// dam tshig phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// stobs chen bka' rgyud ji lta bu// ye shes chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'chang chen po des drag sngags yongs su bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsang tshig sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di rgyas par gsungs so// drag po'i sngags rgod dmod pa dag/ rgyu dang rkyen
la rag ma lus// bsnyen bsgrub byed gol mthar ma lhung// re dogs brod pa'i g.yang sa med// rdzas dang sbyor ba'i 'phro 'du bral// mchod dang rdzas la rten mi 'cha'// chags sdang rgyu rkyen dbyer
med 'joms// sa dang lam la bgrod pa med// de bzhin lha yi ngo bo ni// ting 'dzin grims pa'i phrin las min// gzhi rtsa med pa'i ye shes te// rgyu dang rkyen la rag ma las// smin dang ma smin nye ring

med// phyag rgya gsal bas lhun gyis grub// phyag rgya rdzogs pas zhing khams rdzogs// phyag rgya grol bas ngang du thim// che ba rang byung rgyal po ste// zil gyis gnon pa'i ye shes yin// drag po sngags kyi mtshon cha
ni// brdung dang ngar 'thar ma yin te// mkhas pas bya ba thams cad bzhin// rgol ba thams cad mi 'jigs gcod// de bzhin drag sngags gsang ba 'di// bde gshegs thams cad bka' 'dus
nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rgyud de// rnam pa yi ge'i ngo bo la// sangs rgyas mthu yi ngar 'thar bcug/ stobs dang nus pa kun 'dus pas// mkhyen pa nyid kyang brlags par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor yongs
rdzogs thig le che// 'byung bzhi ye nas rnam dag klong// lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal med khang// rtog tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// ma lus 'dus pas thig le che// snang srid dbang gi dkyil 'khor

du// ma bskur bskur med ye nas bskur// skyes bu rig pa'i rtsal ldan la// dbang mchog chen po rgyun tu gnas// dka' thub dam tshig sdom pa'i don// chos rnams ma lus kun gyi gzhi// ngo bo chos sku byang chub
sems// 'khor 'das lhun grub ngang rdzogs la// dam tshig chen po de nyid gsung// phrin las ma btsal rol pa'i rgyan// sgyu ma lhun grub rol par shar// dus gsum rgyal ba'i byin brlabs stobs// ma lus

'dus pa rdo rje'i bka'// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu'i rgyud// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dam tshig dbang// las rim bsgrub pa gsang sngags dang// ngo bo 'brel bcas rgyu dang rkyen// rang bzhin gnas dang mngon
byed pa// gsang sngags rgyud kyi nges pa bshad// ces gsungs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsang tshig sngags kyi sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin dngos// gsang sngags ngo bo de nyid gang// 'jig rten 'jig rten
'das pa yi// dregs pa mthu stobs ldan pa kun// bka' bzhin nye ba ji lta bu// lhun grub phyag rgya chen po yis// drag pos gdul bya gang lags pa// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba'i don rgyas par bshad do// bskal pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la// lho yi 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ru// bde ba'i dbang phyug ded dpon zhes// rigs kyi bdag por grags pa
zhig/ grags pa sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas// bgrod pa ma thob dpe las mtshon// brda' don ma grol lhug par spyad// rigs ngan mo la grogs su spyad// sha khrag keng rus rnams la rol// 'jig rten dregs pa

sha khrag bsten// sngags tshig phra mo'i stobs dang ldan// rtag pa'i khro bo yod par bsgoms// lus che yan lag rags la bltas// don gyi gdeng stobs ma rnyed par// dngos po la ni sgra bzhin spyad// gsang
sngags bka' bsgo log pa yis// dus ma yin par tshe zad nas// na rag rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams myong// tshad mes mnar te bde bas brel// bskal pa bzhi nas brgyad gnyis

'khor// tsha grang gnas nas bskal pa bzhir// 'khor zhing sdug bsngal zad pa'i mthar// nyi tshe nye 'khor kha 'khor nas// bskal pa gnyis su sdug cing 'khyams// de mthar phyi nang sgrib pa'i gnas// skye ba
gnyis dang dud 'gror gnas// de mthar rdzu 'phrul lus blangs te// gshin yul 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba'i// lcags mkhar bcu drug bcu gnyis 'obs// thod mkhar chen po'i pho brang du// las kyi gshin rje

nag por gyur// bdud dang ma mo srog gcod ging// gdug pa can gyi ded dpon gtso// phung byed nag po tshe srog bdag/ lus che yan lag rags la rngam// skra dang ba spu ag tshom rtsub// mgo dang snying gi phreng

bas brgyan// ko rlon zhing lpags gos su gyon// mtshon cha me rlung dug dbal 'phro// myur du gsod cing sha rlon za// mngal du 'tshubs shing rak+tar 'dzag/ thod rus 'bru mar 'khrug cing 'thung// ded dpon bzhi
yi 'khor la rbod// chags pa'i rgya mtshos myos par byed// chags pa'i me dpung rang rgyud bsreg/ de yis 'jig rten phung byed pas// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs brgyud nas// bka' bgros rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs

bkye// stong pa'i rang bzhin de stong bkye// stong pas nag po'i sde ma stongs// sangs rgyas rdul snyed zhing khams 'khod// des ma thul te rigs gsum mngags// ya ma badzra ha ya'i sku// rang rang lag cha 'khor

sprul nas// nad dang mtshon cha'i char phab gzir// sha khrag ro dang bdud rtsir gyur// ma thub sde gsum rgyal la khad// des ma thub nas bka' bgros te// khro bo sme ba brtsegs pa mngags// rdo rje srin po 'khor
dang bcas// nag po gdug pa bsgral bar gzas// ye shes me yi sras mchog sprul// nag po tshe srog bdag po yi// dkar nag tsit+ta'i dkyil du gzas// btab pas khro bo sme brtsegs rgyal// rdo rje srin po'i
'khor brlags nas// bde gshegs kun gyi dgongs pa bsdus// gsang sngags ngo bo de kho na// dngas ma chen po lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga nyid de rtogs pa'i// rigs lnga'i gtso bo spyi gzugs

can// nag po cha mthun brjid pa'i sku// zil gnon phyag rgya chen po nyid// stong nyid ma skyes 'gag med pa'i// lhun grub ye shes thams cad mkhyen// lhun po ri rab lta bur brjid// rnam thar dbu gsum sku

gsung thugs// rgyud drug 'khor ba sgrol ba'i rtags// pha rol phyin phyag ye shes drug/ skye ba rnam bzhi dag pa'i rtags// tshad med zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul bzhi// sra byed brtan pas thams cad gnon// gnyen byed

skyom zhing sdud pa'i dbang// gsal byed khrag chu bag chags bsreg/ yaM gyis rkyen med rang shugs ldang// snang byed go 'byed khebs 'og chub// rgyu rkyen thabs la rag ma lus// bde ba'i sku nyid stong dpag

med// stong las kun 'byung bsam dpag dka'// nag po gdul phyir sna tshogs sprul// ya ma badzra khyams khang khyung// de bzhin rigs ldan seng ge stag/ gdug pa ye shes khro chung 'bar// tshul dgu chas dgu
rgyan dgu dang// gar dgu rtags dgu rngam sgra dgu// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje 'phen// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub brdeg/ nag po gel pa bsgyel te gnan// pho nya sprul pa gdan du bting// nag po brgyal

te 'dar ba de// zhal du rngubs te snam nas phyung// 'khor rnams dbang bsdus mdangs dang phral// nag po brgyal sangs smre sngags bton// e ma sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku// rdzu 'phrul rmad byung ngo mtshar
che// bdag cag rgyal ba'i 'khor bgyid pas// srog dang ma phral bran du zhog/ 'khor la thugs rje ma chung bar// bka' la thogs shig bka' bzhin bgyid// ci bcol las rnams bka' bzhin nyan// dkyil

'khor chen po'i srung ma bgyid// 'khor gyi las skal gang la bskos// de nas rdo rje khros pa'i skus// gtum khro mi bzad 'jigs pa'i tshogs// nga yi bsgo ba'i las rnams kyis// sangs rgyas bka' 'khor bsrung
la skyobs// bstan pa 'jig na dregs pas sgrol// rnal 'byor can gyi phrin las gyis// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor chen po'i srung mar gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa
stobs chen/ gsang ba'i rgyud las rU tra btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas mthu stobs kyi bdag po rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ho sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin

dngos// ye shes dbyings las sprul pa yi// phrin las rdzogs pa'i ye shes khyod// las rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ru// brnag pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud// sdig pa nag po stobs chen gyi// las kyi rnam grangs ji lta
ba// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba'i don bshad do// snying po'i don gyi gsang rgyud la// rtsa ba yan lag gnyis su bshad// rtsa ba'i las ni
gsum du bshad// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang// dregs pa stobs kyis gzhom pa dang// gdug pa 'dul ba'i las su gsungs// gsang ba mchog gi sbyor ba la// stobs can dang ni stobs med las// srog
la 'khor lo bskor ba dang// drag po thun gyis gsod pa dang// gdug pa klu la gtad pa yis// rten can rten med thun mong gis// gsang ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs par bshad// dregs pa stobs kyis gzhom pa
la// stong srog gcig tu bsdu ba dang// rang rang gnad kyis gzir ba ste// dgug dang srog 'phrog gzir dang gsad// mtha' sdud las rnams rdzogs pa ste// sbyor ba gsum gyis las sbyar nas// mis byas
mis ma byas rnams dang// nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhir gnan// stobs bshig dug dbyung kha bcing zhing// zug pa dbyung dang gsang lam dgag/ de bzhin gdug pa 'dul ba yang// stobs chen lha dang drag
po sngags// rten 'brel rdzas dang 'tsho byed sman// phrin las sbyor ka'i bcud kyis gso// ma grub spogs dang log gnon gyis// las kyi sbyor ba rdzogs par bshad// yan lag sbyor ba bstan pa ni// dbab

gcad sprul pa'i las kyis re// rnal ma lto bzlog 'byung ba dkrug/ de yis las rnams 'grub par byed// stobs ldan bgrod thob lhar gsal bas// rno myur stobs chen ngar ldan yin// de dang mi ldan rang 'ching

bas// ya bag sha yi sbyor bas bshad// 'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ dngos gzhi sbyor ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan

'das la gsol pa/ kye ho 'bar ba'i rgyal po ste// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes khyod// snod bcud 'byung bzhi lhun grub pa'i// gzhal med pho brang dam pa gang// skye med don nyid skyer shar ba'i// phyag rgya'i
dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// rtog tshogs rnam dag 'bras bu gang// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor la rgyas par bshad do// rang bzhin mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang// lhun grub ye shes gzhal
med khang// rin chen dur khrod brtan par gnas// phyi nang gnyis med gdal khyab gsal// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dbyings// zla gam dmar po dbang gi tshul// lhag pa'i ye shes thod mkhar

bzhi// lcags 'khor bcu gnyis bcu drug 'obs// rdo rje'i phreng ba gru chad bzhi// bar khyams dmar po sgo khyud ldan// gru bzhi sgo la rta babs ldan// rtse mo gnam lcags 'bar ba mtho// lha brgyad klu brgyad zhing

dang ro// dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang sbrul// glang chen 'brug dang seng ge stag/ rus sbal chu srin gnam lcags thog/ zhing dang zhing chung thod pa khyung// kha khyer lha mos mdzes par byas// ma bskyed
dbyings nas ye nas gsal// drag po e yi pho brang du// klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag stong// phyogs skyong ma he nyi zla'i gdan// dbus su zil gnon lhun grub sku// mthing nag dug chen ha la'i mdog/ dbu
gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas pa ku mu ta 'dra bas// ro nye za dang rngam par gzigs// g.yon pa rA ga gnyan khri gsol// dbus mthing dgra bgegs sa bdag za// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri

g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub 'bar// glang chen ko rlon dur khrod chas// sbrul dang rin chen tsit+tas brgyan// dbu la rigs lnga khro bo'i sku// dregs pa'i snying dang nA ga'i mgos// do shal khro bo'i chas

ka rdzogs// de bzhin dbyings nyid khros pa'i sku// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings// mthing nag snying stobs gri thod 'khyud// gtso bo'i thugs kar ya ma'i sku// zhe sdang rdo rje smug nag 'jigs// 'khor lo

tsit+ta phyag na bsnams// ya ma'i thugs kar dregs pa che// nga rgyal rdo rje ljang nag rngam// rdo rje snying phreng phyag na bsnams// dregs pa'i thugs kar khyams khang ste// phrag dog rdo rje 'jigs pa'i sku// spyi gtsug

'dab chags ku mu ta// 'dod chags rdo rje zil gnon sku// ro nye 'dren pa'i stobs dang 'dren// phrag gong khyung mo sngo nag gnyis// nu mar seng ge dpung par stag/ sta zur sbrul nag ce spyang rngam// khro chung mang
pos sku la gtams// thod khar gshed bzhi pho nyas gang// bdud dang mon pa ki kang tshogs// rgyal ba gcig gi ye shes las// du ma las la rgyug 'phro ba// rang las byung zhing 'phrul bar snang// don dam
gnyis med gcig tu rdzogs// rtog tshogs rnam dag rdo rje'i skus// srid gsum las dang sbyor ba dang// ma gdon 'bum sde zil gyis gnon// zhi khro gshin rje phur pa dbang// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po

dang// the brang gnyan dang gnod sbyin btsan// bkrag mdangs tshe srog sdud pa dang// mdze 'dre sa srin klu srin dang// gcan gzan gdug pa kha 'ching dang// dmod pa'i dug dang rigs bzhi'i dug/ thams cad

'joms shing zil gyis gnon// rtsa bcad khrag skems srog zungs gcod// mgo gcod tshe srog rten 'brel 'chang// srid pa'i rus pa 'cha' ba dang// mkhris pa 'byin zhing sha khrag rol// bla dang drod dang rlan

dbugs 'bral// shes pa dngas snyigs 'byed par byed// 'bras bu chos sku zug rngu med// byed rtsol g.yang sa'i kho thag chad// ma bcos de nyid gnyug mar gnas// 'khor ba dong sprug ka dag gling// snang stong
