gnyis med ye shes sku// mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs

pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ho 'bar ba'i rgyal po che// che ba lhun grub ye shes khyod// mtshon cha'i rgyal po nor bu yi// phreng ba'i rnam pa ngo bo
gang// rang bzhin nus pa ji ltar lags// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// so dang dkrugs dang bcun pa gang// yang dag dpa' bos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag

sngags kyi ngo bo 'di dag bshad do// skyob pa'i don gyi gsang sngags bshad// rang bzhin stong pa spros dang bral// skye ba med pa'i ye shes yin// rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan yi ge ste// ngo bo lha yi sku ru bshad// dus

gsum rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rnams// yang snying dril ba rtsa ba'i sngags// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gter// bzhi gcig bzhi gnyis bzhi gsum yin// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo nyid// chos sku skye med rnam dag
las// thig le nyag gcig spros bral ba'i// a ni ma skyes yi ge'i mchog/ 'gro don rdzogs pa'i 'greng bus brgyan// e yi ye shes las byung ba// dregs pa dbang bsdus srog snying 'dus// phyag rgya zil gnon

sku ru bsgom// a yi ye shes las byung bas// sbyor ba las kyi rgyal po kun// sprul pa tshe bdag nag por rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// rlung gi stobs kyis 'phen skyed pa// gshin rje ya ma rA dzar
rdzogs// ma yi ye shes las byung ba// bskyed dang sdud par byed pas na// ma mo rdo rje khros mar rdzogs// he yi ye shes las byung ba// dgyes pa'i gar dgu gdug pa 'joms// bya khyung rgyal po snying po
rdzogs// dun gyi ye shes las byung ba// srog dang dbang po las bsdus nas// las kyi 'chi bdag chen po rdzogs// snying gi ye shes las byung ba// gdug pa ma lus gnas su 'joms// khyung mo smug nag gnyis

su rdzogs// khrag gi ye shes las byung ba// dregs pa 'joms pa'i rdo rje rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// bsreg cing skem byed gnas su spor// zhe sdang gdug pa sbrul nag rdzogs// ma yi ye shes las byung

ba// pho nya las la mngag pa ste// bdud mo khrag gi ral par rdzogs// tsa yi ye shes las byung ba// snang srid srog dang bla bsdus nas// rus sbal rngam pa'i sku ru rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung bas// las kyi

rlung gis 'phul zhing sgrol// srog bdag shan pa'i sku ru rdzogs// de ltar lha yi ngo bor shar// nus pa me rlung las kyi mtshon// dug gi me dpung lta bur bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di
dag sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste// mi 'gyur rtsa ba'i snying por bshad// e myags ya rngubs mug shag
dun// e yi ye shes las byung ba// stong srog yig 'bru de nyid de// rigs lnga'i spyi gzugs zil gnon sku// myags kyi ye shes las byung ba// dmigs med yum nyid chos kyi dbyings// ya yi ye shes las byung

ba// me long ye shes ya ma'i sku// rlung gi stobs kyis rab tu 'gugs// rngubs kyi ye shes las byung ba// mnyam nyid ye shes rdo rje'i sku// phyi dang nang gi dbugs rgyun gcod// mug gi ye shes las byung ba// nan

tan ye shes khyams khang sku// srid gsum lto ru 'chang bar byed// shag gi ye shes las byung ba// kun rtog ye shes mkha' lding sku// srog lus dngas snyigs 'byed pa'o// ka yi ye shes las byung ba// las kyi

gshin rje sprul pa gsum// las rnams thogs med ye shes so// dun gyi ye shes las byung ba// rgyan gyi lha brgyad srog gshed bzhi// pho nya sprul pa bsam 'das te// rnam pa yi ge ngo bo lha// sngags ni shes skyob

smin byed 'joms// 'di la 'jig rten dngos grub mchog/ ma lus 'byung phyir snying po'i don// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi gter// mi zad sngags kyi yon tan mdzod// rin chen rgya mtsho nam mkha' sa// rim pa
du ma'i don gcig rdzogs// rtsa ba sngags kyi lus su bshad// so ni spu gri du ma ste// bsad pa bsrung dang dbab dang sprul// gang byed sngags kyi sham bus 'grub// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje

gshed po sdig pa stobs chen las// gsang sngag bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// kye ma rdo rje khro bo'i sku// gsang sngags bshad pa de ltar na// ngo dmar gdug pa
bsgral ba yi// gsad pa'i sbyor ba ji ltar bya// yang dag dpa' bos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gsang ba mchog gi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// thog mar shes ldan
smin byed mos// bla med byang chub rjes bsgrub pa// bstan pa spyi yi blo sred can// bgrod thabs stobs ldan chen po yis// bdag don ma yin bstan pa'i don// dkon mchog bla ma'i don ched du// bstan pa'i
bar chod byed pa dag/ bsgral na bla med byang chub myur// de ma yin na mnar med na// las kyi rU tra srin por 'gyur// dur khrod gnas sam brag ri'i ngogs// dben par 'dug la bsam gtan bya// phung sa

gsum gyi sa blangs la// gri rgod khrag dang dug chus spru// 'brub khung gsum brtseg rtsang gis bskor// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// sme khrag dug gis rab byugs steng// dug khrag rdo sol de dag gis//
mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// dbus su gru gsum ldan pa la// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// rtsa ba lus kyi yig 'bru dgod// ra mtshams bris la sngags kyis bskor// phyi rim mu khyud zlum po
la// shan pa gsod byed spu gri dgod// tha ma mu khyud dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni lnga gnyis gcod// rtse mo nang du bstan byas la// yang gsang bcu gcig gsang sngags dgod// srid pa rus sbal lto bar

bca'// gri rgod khrag dang nyung dkar dag/ las kyi thod pa kha g.yel dgang// 'khor lo gru gsum steng du yang// kha sbyar rtsang dmar bzhi la brgyang// 'brub gnas nang du thod ngan du// ling+ga bris la sme dud

bdug/ mtshon cha rtsibs kyi bar bar du// bla yi sprul pa brgyad dang ni// yang sprul bcu gnyis bri zhing dgod// bla rtags gang byung rtags sbyar brdeg/ phyag rgya zil gnon skur bsgoms la// zhag grangs bdun
nam bcu bzhi'am// nyi shu gcig tu brnag pa bya// bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar brdeg/ drag sngags dbugs kyi rta zhon nas// gsang lam dgu nas tsit+tar thim// srog dang shes pa dngas snyigs

'byed// snying po stong ngam brgya bar du// drag po thun gyis gsad pa brtsam// mtshon cha bsnol ma'i sngags rdzogs nas// gdug pa gnas pa'i sa ru gnan// de yi drag sngags 'di lta ste// e myags ya rngubs
mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i srog la breng shag thum ril/ dun dun nr-i hur thums nr-i dza/ dgra bo'i srog la breng breng dza dza thuM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta thuM ril shag rbad/

dgra bo'i rtsa la thum ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la ka dum ling thums ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la khaM nan thuM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la gzir thuM

ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la yaM shig thuM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun gzir thun b+h+yo/ gsad pa drag po mchog gi las// sbyor ba rkyang pa 'di nyid do// sdebs na mtshon cha bsnol ma ste// gang mos sngags kyi spu grir bsnol// de yis las kun

'grub par 'gyur// bla chen bzhi dang sprul pa brgyad// yang sprul bcu gnyis chags sdang lnga// gang byung rtags sbyar drag sngags gdags// srog la hring shag dza tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ srog la thun mug dza tsit+ta breng

shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM dza tsit+ta breng breng thun shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la dza thun gzir shag tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun gzir tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la yaM yaM nr-i dza tsit+ta

breng shag rbad// rtags dang sbyar ba spu gri ste// brgya stong skabs su brab par bya// de ltar drag po'i las rdzogs nas// 'byung ba'i lto gshag gshin rje la// bskal pa gsum gyi bar du gtad// thugs kyi stobs
kyis mnan nas kyang// gdon mi za ba'i pho brang gdab// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ gsad pa mtshon cha'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba stobs can bsgral ba'i las 'di dag gsungs so// mkha' lnga khyab pa'i don bsdus nas// gzung 'dzin chos kyi dbyings su bsgral// drod thob stobs can rnal 'byor

gyis// phung byed sdig pa stobs chen gyi// gyad gnon 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba brtsam// srin po gdug pa'i thod pa ru// gti mug ka la'i tsit+ta ru// stobs can a mu'i rdzas dag la// ling+ga bris te gzhug par

bya// phung sa'i 'brub khung dag tu yang// rtsang bcas gting du bca' bar bya// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// phung byed sdig pa'i lto ba ru// stobs chen gyad gnon 'khor lo bca'// phyag rgya zil gnon ting

'dzin gyis// drag sngags rngam la 'tshig par bzlas// bya khyung stobs chen 'bar ba yis// nam mkhar mthing gi phya ra bshig/ rus sbal stobs chen lto ba ru// mun pa'i dmag bsdu stobs kyis gnan// rdo rje
stobs chen khros pa yi// dregs pa'i zhe sdang 'joms par byed// ya ma rA dza khros pa'i skus// gnam lcags Ur mo so brdar bcad// drag po sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// rang gshed rang la 'bebs
par byed// bdud bzhi sdig pa kha dgu yis// rnam shes rtsa bcad me mar gsod// srog dang shes pa dngas snyigs 'byed// dug dang rtsang phur zangs lcags phyes// gnad la dbab cing rang gshed bskor// de yi

drag sngags 'di lta ste// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka du na// dgra bo'i srog la breng hur thums dza rtsa khrag snying thums ril raM shag rbad/ srog thum ril dza rtsa khrag hur raM/ snying thun rbad srog la mA ra ya b+h+yo/

bsad pa mchog gi drag sngags te// bdun nam dgu'am bcu bzhir bya// drag po'i thun dang nad kyi rdzas// yang nas yang du brdeg par bya// sarba rtsa spur srog nag snying gzer breng shag raM rbad// sbyor ba bshig

pa'i sngags su bshad// gal te las de ma grub na// 'khrul 'khor lto ba dkrug par bya// e ya shag myags dun rngubs ka mug/ dgra bo'i srog thuM ril nr-i hur dza thums khrag snying la thums raM shag rbad/ srog la

rtsa khrag thuM ril dza snying thun hur raM srog la rbad mA ra ya thun b+h+yo// sngags kyi lto dkrug nag po ste// kun la byas na snying khrag 'dzag/ las kyi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// 'khor lo dril la tsit+tar gzhug/ gdug pa'i
gnas sam bka' rten nam// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'og tu mnan// bskyod pa kha gso rgyun mi gcad// ban+de bon po mu stegs dang// las kyi rgyal po rtags 'gor dang// seng ge kha 'thab la sogs pa// sdig
pa stobs chen 'di yis 'joms// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ stobs chen gyad gnon gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo klu la gtad pa'i phyir/ 'chi bdag par bu nag po'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dben pa'i gnas sam nA ga gnas// gnyan ra gdug pa'i sa phyogs su// gro ga shing shun dar dkar
la// a mu ka yi gzugs bris la// yan lag rigs bzhi za bar bri// sbal pa khong stong nang brub la// klu yi dmod pa 'bum phrag gsum// rdzogs dang ri lur sngags shing gdab// kham sa'i par bu kha sbyar

gzhug/ klu yi nor brgyad dang bcas pa// sngon dmar skud pas gril la bzhag/ tshes drag re bas gril nas kyang// nyi ma phang du khyer la gtad// klu bdud shan pa'i ting 'dzin bya// klu yi dmod pa 'di dag

go/ nA ga hu ya ba ling nA ga shig ro la thib thib/ dum pa le che ge mo thun sod zung// nag po klu yi dug mda' ste// zhe sdang khros pa'i dmod par bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa

stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ klu'i dmod pa nag po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ma rdo rje 'chang rgyal ba// gsad pa'i sbyor ba de ltar na// 'jig rten lha
srin dregs pa can// gtum po gdug pa 'di dag kun// stong srog bsdu na ji ltar bsdu// srog snying dbrog dang gzir gnan dang// bshig dang khab cing byang dgrol dang// dug mda' dbyung ba ji ltar
lags// dam tshig brdar dang zhi ba dbang// yang dag dpa' bos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dmar len yang gsang ba snying po don gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs
so// stong phrag brgyad cu'i gdon gyi rigs// dug lnga'i shes pa yul 'dzin pa// lus ngag sems kyi 'du byed kyis// dregs pa zhes su gnas par bshad// dregs pa'i de nyid shes gyur na// dregs pa rang

gshed rang gis byed// de yi 'khor lo 'di lta ste// dur khrod rgyu la rdzas byugs la// gti mug lto gshag mu khyud bzhi// e dbus drag po dbang dang ldan// phyi rim las kyi rdo rje ste// yang logs mtshon cha drug

gnyis rtsibs// de bzhin mtshon cha brgyad gnyis ldan// de la drag sngags 'joms byed gnas// dbus dang zla gam srog dang ming// sna tshogs rdo rje rtsa sngags lus// phyi rim thams cad srung ba'i so// nang
logs gzir dang spu gri ste// mtshams dang mu ran gcod pa'i don// bkod pa kha sbyor thod par bca'// gsal ba gsum ldan zhag gsum gzir// mtha' ru bka' rten la sogs gnan// 'pho ba med pa'i
las zhes bshad// de yi gsang sngags 'di lta ste// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ sarba tsit+ta yaM shag hur khaM 'drid nan/ gzir rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan// ha la ya ma thun gzir/
hu thums dza/ shag rbad/ gzir rbad/ lus dang spu gri srog dang snying// bsdebs na nges par gcod par byed// snying po brda sbyar gzir bya'o// de yis las kyi sbyor ba 'joms// chos nyid ye nas lhun gyis

grub// ye shes dkyil 'khor rang bzhin med// sprul pa sna tshogs log rtog 'dul// tha snyad tshig rnams don gyis stong// de don ldan pa bud+d+ha nyid// gsad dang gnan dang srog kyang med// bden don ma rtogs
dregs pa yi// sems ni rlung gi khams te mchog/ srid gsum sha khrag srog dbugs 'byin// khams gsum gnas bskyod rlung gi yi ger gnas// de don bod pa ming dang rnam shes ni// nges par bstan pa 'di

lta ste// shrI badzra kro d+ha hUM/ ya ma la/ ma ma ru lu ma/ dun ting ki la ya ta/ ru tra d+ha/ d+he ba a/ rak+Sha ra/ rag mor/ dun ting me/ rA dza tsa/ shu la dza/ mu na mu na pa/ ya k+Sha k+Sha/ yag mo k+Sha/ haM shaM tri/ ru tra nr-i/ ru tri ru/

badzra sAd+hu tri/ sa nA ga phu/ aM ku sha dza/ trig nan hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya nan/ baM staM b+haM/ rog sarba phyung rbad/ byA d+hI sarba pa taM haM/ tsi shaM a mu kaM che ge mo nan/ 'drid rbad/ kha tham srog gzir nan/

hUM hUM/ sa ma ya dam dam/ byer rbad phaT/ shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ lus dang spu gri ming dang bcas// sbyor bas las kun 'grub par byaid// dmar len yang gsang mchog gi las// spyi dang sgos kyi rang gnad

yin// stong srog gcig tu ma 'dus na// nyung dkar spang la gtor ba 'dra// bsdeb la sarba sha truM bsdeb// so so'i sgos kyi mtshan nyid can// zhi khro gshin rje phur pa dang// ma mo srin mo srin po bdud// mu stegs
rgyal po btsan dang dmu// rU tra srin po srog bdag ging// gnod sbyin pho mo 'gong po lha// phug bdag sri can gdug pa gsum// snying po brda sbyar gzir zhing gcod// dmar len yang gsang mchog tu
bstan// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ dmar len yang gsang mchog gi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ba'i
sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gsal ba gsum ldan sngags pa yis// 'khrul 'khor rim pa rdzogs pa dang// rtsa ba spu gri'i bsdeb bshad pa// dmar len yang gsang skabs kyis te// phra mo'i sbyor ba bshad bya

ba// rtsa ba bod pa gzir zhing srog/ mA ra ya yi skabs sbyar ba// klad du dgug pa yang dag bshad// mtha' sdud sbyor ba rdzogs pa ni// ling+ga la sogs gnad kyis te// dregs pa rang gnad gshed ma yin// drag
po'i spu gri'i dod dag tu// bshig pa'i spu gri'i so brtag pa// spyi dang sgos kyi bshig pa ste// mis byas de min byas pa nyid// bshig pa'i sngags su yang dag bshad// bshig pa sbur nag 'grub kyang
mchu yis 'grub// spyi yi tha ma gcod byed bor// 'bru drug sngags kyi spu gri gdab// rdo lcags zangs phur gzugs la gdab// gru'am gdug pa'i dug rnams 'byin// mun sel sngags kyi rtsa rgyud dag/ gcod
byed logs su kha tham brjod// 'byung po bgegs dang mi ma yin// gcan gzan gdug pa kha chings yin// sngon dmar tshon gyis klu gzugs sam// gnod sbyin nad kyi mtshon du bya// kha tham logs su byad
dgrol gdags// byad du bcug las nges par thar// shin tu bgegs rnams bka' nyan na// dbang sdud dam pa de bzhin bya// yang na 'bru gsum sbyor ka yis// dregs pa gnam thar skyel bar byed// gtsang
gtor sngags bzlas bsngo ba dang// shAn ting ku ru mthar sbyar na// mi srun dregs pa zhi bar 'gyur// phyi ma gsang mnan rang gshed mthar// nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi la// mnan pa'i las rnams rdzogs

par bya// dug shing phur pa byin brlabs te// shin tu mi bgrungs dregs pa can// mngon du rdzas rgod du bas gzir// de yis myur du brlag par byed// phur gdab rdzas bdug khro mo 'khor lo yang bskor// sarba du

raM u nan gzer phyung sbur nan srog la myog rbad/ srog la kI li kI la ya/ trig nan bi g+ha nA na/ snying gzer sbur nan hur thums dza/ myags thums ril rbad ya/ de bzhin lha sngags rdzas dang ni// sbyor ba sdebs
pa'i las 'di dag/ dregs pa 'joms pa'i mchog tu bshad// bshig pa'i sbyor ba bshad bya ba// rgya shog 'khrul 'khor lcags mkhar dang// zhing gi ka ba ldan bris la// rtsa sngags bshig sngags rim pas

dgod// rtsa ba spu gri'i bar dag tu// spyi yi sgo dang a mu ka/ sbyor ba rdzogs dang gnan pa re// rdzas rgod sa sogs du bas bdug/ khyad par bshig pa'i las su bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje sdig

pa stobs chen gyi rgyud la/ srung ba khyad par kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs lhun

grub sku// dug gsum 'joms pa'i ye shes khyod// 'gro ba'i lus la gdug pa'i nad// rtsi ti dz+wa la nyam nga ba// slong ba'i rgyu rkyen ji ltar lags// nad kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// de nyid gso ba'i sbyor ba
gang// yang dag dpa' bos bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par bshad do// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// sa yams drag po dz+wa la'i nad// 'gro ba yongs la khyab pa'i
rgyu// spyi dang khyad par bsrung bya nyams// mtshams med nye ba na rag gnas// las ngan smin nas gnas ngan ltung// las kyi rnam par smin pa bshad// 'byung bzhi 'khrugs pas nad bzhi
rgyas// 'du ba rnam bzhi rgyas par bshad// rigs dang rang gi thabs las dang// rtsol ba byad kyi gtad khram dang// rang gi gtad khram gnad gzir log/ nA ga thug phrad ces bya ba// bar chod gdon bgegs
'phral gyi rkyen// nad rigs zas dang sngags kyis brtag/ phan gnod gang tshe nad rigs brtag/ zas dang sngags kyis phan gnod med// rnam smin sgrib sbyong dge ba bya// rigs bzhi gdol pa kha 'thor
gyi// 'jug pa nges pa'i nad rtags ni// rgyal rigs mgo nas 'jug par nges// sha skam mdog dmar zug pa che// rje rigs lag pa g.yas par 'jug/ tsha shing za dang rtse bar byed// bram ze lag g.yon khrag

chu ste// dmangs rigs rkang g.yas zha grum g.yo// gdol pa rkang g.yon rnag la 'jug/ kha 'thor kun la khyab pa ste// zhus pa'i mtshan nyid lnga phrag gnyis// lus skam gzer che khol bur 'khor// rus pa'i nad

du bshad pa yin// lus kun lci zhing bem la gnag/ sha yi nad du shes par bya// sha mkhrig mdog skya rtse zhing za// pags pa skyi la zhugs pa yin// lus sbrid sgyid lug tsha zhing skrang// rtag tu khrag 'dzag gdong pa

dmar// lci zhing myog po khrag nad yin// glo snying na zhing 'dar ba dang// snying mi dga' zhing dran pa nyams// khong skyur don la nad zhugs pa'o// stobs shor sgyid lug nyal nyal po// sgyid zhum stobs la zhugs

par bshad// dbang po mi ldang khu ba med// dngas snyigs bye ba bcud la zhugs// mgo skrang 'thom zhing 'khor ba dang// mig gi gsal la skra byi na// klad pa dag la zhugs par bshad// rtag tu kha chu mig chu
'dzag/ sbug gi chu ni dmar la rtsigs// chu la zhugs pa yin par bshad// yan lag 'khums dang rengs pa dang// zha grum chu ba'i nad du 'dod// gso ba'i thabs ni du ma ste// nad la sman te klu la
sngags// rnam smin tshogs rdzogs 'tsho bar gsungs// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ klu nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
snying po don gyi man ngag/ gdug pa klu la rang gshed dbab ste gsod pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// rigs bzhi gdol pa kha 'thor rigs// kun 'joms sbyor ba'i rgyal po ste// gdan gsum ldan pas gsal

gsum bya// rgya shog dag la 'khrul 'khor bri// dbus su drag po dbang dang ldan// phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi gnyis gsum// yang rim mtshon cha bcu gnyis rtsibs// de bzhin sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// thod phreng
me ris brgyan pa bri// dbus su gang dmigs gzugs dang ming// gnyis par rtsa ba'i snying po lus// gsum par khyad par drag po yi// gzir 'joms srog 'phrog myos shing 'joms// mtshon gyi
rang gshed shi phrad dgod// bzhi pa rtsibs mchan sum cu la// shi 'phrad kun 'joms rgyal po dgod// rus sbal lto bar rdzogs par bca'// 'khrul 'khor rgyal po'i sbyor ba la// bdud rtsi 'o ma khrag gis

byugs// kha sbyar phag thod srad bus gril// lto sbyor khri yis ngar glud la// sngags pa'i steng 'og logs su bzhag/ phyi ma kha sbyar thod par gzhug/ phyag rgya gsal bas rngam tshig bzlas// drag po gnod pa'i sa chu
dang// bag zan bsres la gdug pa'i gzugs// rgya shog gzugs la ming spel gzhug/ bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar brdeg/ thun brdeg mtshon brab dud pas bdug/ bsreg dang gnan pa la stsogs

bya// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsang bar bshad// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ sa nA ga trig nan/ phu hur thums dza/ sa nA ga tsa tri su me srog la breng breng rtsa la dun dun/ spur nan khaM shag rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta

ro myags rbad/ srog la mug ti rbad/ dug phyung khrag shig rbad/ tsa tri ma ma dbugs la thang gzir rbad/ srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags pa tham 'drid phyung trig nan sa nA ga tsit+ta rbad/ sa nA ga snying

gzer sbur nan rbad/ pa tsa 'drid ma thi pa ra/ sa nA ga tsa tri thun gzer rbad/ nA ga tsa tri dun nan/ nA ga tsa tri sbur nan/ mA ra ya nan/ gsang sngags dug gi spu gri ste// rang gzhan drag po btsan thabs
kyis// gdug pa 'joms shing dug rlangs 'byin// yang gsang snying po gsang ba ste// rang gzhan drag po btsan thabs kyis// gdug pa 'joms shing dug rlangs 'byin// yang gsang snying po gsang ba ste// kun
'joms sbyor ba'i rgyal por bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gsang ba'i rgyud las/ shi phrad kun 'joms nA ga rang gshed dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum

pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma 'jigs byed rdo rje'i sku// gdug pa'i nad kyi mtshan nyid dang// sngags kyi sbyor ba de ltar na// rigs bzhi dug dang
nad dang ni// sdong zla brtag pa ji lta bu// rmi ltas brtag pa ji ltar lags// yang dag dpa' bos bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba'i don legs par bshad do// klu
dang gnyan dang sa bdag gi// dug gis zin pa 'di lta ste// rgyal rigs dug gis lci zhing 'thibs// rje rigs dug gis tsha zhing bsreg/ dmangs rigs dug gi yang zhing g.yo// bram ze'i dug gis grang zhing
'dar// gdol ba'i klu la dug gsum yod// reg pa'i dug gis gzer bar byed// kha rlangs dug gis myos par byed// mthong ba'i dug gis za 'phrug byed// nad gzhi'i brtag pa 'di lta
ste// rgyal rigs mthong ba'i dug gi nad// lus kyi sha yang bem por 'ong// 'thibs shing ra ba bzhi la na// nyi ma'i gung gnyis lus mi bde// bram ze bsam pa'i dug nad ni// lus skrang mdog skya sbom por

'ong// drang zhing bsil la snga dro na// chos brgyad dag la lus mi bde// rje rigs kha rlangs dug nad ni// lus tsha sha 'dar dgong ka na// dmangs rigs reg pa'i dug nad ni// lus 'dar se rgod snying rlung

'dra// nyi ma nub nas na ba 'ong// dug sel sman dang dug 'joms sngags// sbyor ba gnyis su bsdebs na 'tsho// sdong zla brtag pa 'di lta ste// rgyal rigs klu yi gdon gnod na// rtag tu rgyal po dkor bdag
gnod// bram ze rigs kyi gdon gnod na// sa bsen klu bsen mtsho sman gnod// rje rigs klu yi gdon gnod na// klu btsan drag btsan yam shud gnod// dmangs rigs gdon na dam sri gnod// rang rang

gnad kyis gzir zhing bsad// rmi ltas mtshan ma 'di lta ste// btsun pa a tsa ra dang ni// mon dang bu chung spre'u khyi dang// bya dang 'bag seng lha khang dang// bud med nag mo ral pa can// na chung gzhon nu grogs

mo dang// sring mo bud med bya pho dang// ri dwags sha dgo la sogs pa// rta ba skyes pa brag dmar chu// kha brgyad sbrul dang ba lang mdzo// bong bu ra lug khyi dang chu// sbrang bu la sogs rigs bzhi'i rtags// de

dag dbang sdud btags na thub// tshur la 'du dang 'ju na ngan// so mtshams 'das na 'gro ba dang// rtag tu thur la rgyug na ngan// gru dang glang po zhon pa dang// dmag dpon byed dang ri la 'dzeg/ bzang ba'i
rtags su shes par bya// yid kyi dbang po 'khrul pa'i yul// rmi lam don la bden mi bya// rang nyams dbang po drod la brtag/ ces gsungs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs

chen gyi rgyud las/ nad dang dug dang sdong zla dang rmi ltas rtags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma phyag rgya chen po'i sku// skye med
dbyings las rol pa yis// rang bzhin dbang du bsdus de nyid// 'khor la nges par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa rigs bzhi'i gnyen po/ phyag rgya rdzogs pa
'di bshad do// skye med dbyings las rol pa'i sku// phyag rgya zil gnon spyi gzugs can// rigs bzhi sprul pa gyad gnon brgyad// phyi nang srog gshed khro chung bcas// ma bskyed dbyings nas rdzogs par
bya// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rang lus tha mal phung po dag/ hUM las ye shes me yis kyang// lus kyi dngos po bsregs nas kyang// gsang sngags ye shes me 'od kyis// rnam rtog ma rig nad dang
dug/ sgrib pa'i phung po sprin ltar bsreg/ yang nas yang du nan tan bya// shes pa'i ngo bo zil gnon sku// bskal pa me dpung 'bar dbus bsam// yang na tha mal lus nyid kyi// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo

la// e la gsang sngags phreng bas bskor// rtsa chen bzhi dang rtsa phran brgyad// sngags las 'od zer 'phros pas ni// 'od zer dang bcas yig 'bru yis// dngas ma'i rtsa dang rtsa phran dang// sha dang pags pa rus
mi gnas// nad dang dug rlangs kun ded de// ba spu'i bu ga la stsogs par// sngon dmar du ba lta bur bsam// rlung dang shes pas nad rnams 'byin// 'dus pas e las phyag rgya gsal// phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i

rim pa'o// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe// sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs// gnas su spros te dmigs pa dgug/ sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po ru// sa dang chu dang me rlung gis// 'byung bzhi'i

gnyen po'i mtshon cha yis// srog 'phrog gzir zhing bcad gtubs nas// thod pa'i 'khrul 'khor nang du 'chang// kun la srid pa'i khyams khang nas// sngags kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du bya// rgyal rigs bya khyung
stobs kyis bshig/ rje rigs phyag na rdo rjes bshig/ dmangs rigs gdol pa gshin rjes bshig/ bram ze khyams khang lto bar bshig/ phyag rgya rdzogs dang sems dpa' rdzogs// gang zag shes pa'i stobs

dang sbyar// kun la srid pa'i rus sbal te// sngags kyi phreng ba 'gyed dang sdud// yul la dmigs pa gsum du sbyar// rang bzhin lha la dmigs pas ni// sgrib byang rdzogs pas dbyings su thim// drag po'i ngan

sngags skyin thang 'bru// spu gri du mas gcod byed mtshon// bdug skud rdzas rgod du ba yis// klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag dang// ma mo rgyal po the'u rang btsan// klu bsen mo dang dam sri dang// mdze 'dre la
sogs 'joms par byed// rang bzhin dbang sdud ting 'dzin te// 'phen pa'i rta zhes dpa' bos bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ gnyen po lha'i rtog pa

bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma yang gsang rnal 'byor che// lha yi rtog pa de ltar na// phrin las sbyor kha rdzogs mdzad

pa'i// phyag rgya bsam gtan kha chings mchog/ bum pa'i sbyor ba ji lta bu// phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa'i// sreg pa me yi sbyor kha gang// dregs pa stobs kyis gnan pa yi// las rim rdzogs pa bshad
par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi las 'di dag bshad do// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal bshams// rin chen bum par rin chen bcud// sna

dgu'i chu dang dri zhim dgang// dri dang snying po 'tsho byed dgang// kha rgyan mgul chings me tog mdzes// bdag nyid phyag rgya'i skur bsgoms la// thugs ka'i snying po 'od bcas 'phros// dngos rtog bsreg sbyang
gzhal yas khang// gdan la rdzogs pa zil gnon sku// lhun gyis grub pa'i lha rgyud bsam// yid kyis sprul te mchod phul nas// gsang sngags brgya stong bzlas shing bstim// lha rnams 'od kyi gong bur

zhu// bkrus pas nang du zhen chags sbyong// spyod pa sngags kyis bsrung bar bshad// snying gar phyag rgya sngags gsal bsang// rtsa rgyud dag cing zhen chags sbyong// 'khor lo rgyun gyi khrus su bshad// rnam rtog
bag chags 'dzin med grol// lta ba chos nyid khrus su bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags kha tham srog gzir/ sbur nan/

'drid phyung/ hri shag rbad/ spyi chings sgo yi kha chings mchog/ phyag rgya bsam gtan srung ba de// srung ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang sred pa'i sbyor ba bshad// yid mthun gnas su rdzas bsags

la// maN+Dal dkar po dri spos ldan// thab khung zlum po dbus su ste// khru gang kha khyer mdzub gang la// sor bzhi zheng du rnam par brtag/ khru gang thur brkos pad+ma brgyad// 'khor yug dkar pos mdzes par

bya// lcang ma glang ma phang ma la// hom shing khru gang pa ru bya// yam shing sor brgyad de nyid la// dbyibs dang kha dog dkar la zlum// 'bras bu nas chan rtsi mar dang// me tog dkar po gu gul dkar// 'o ma
dang bcas mchod pa dbul// me lha dkar po lha rgyud dkar// rim pas bskul te sngags res dbul// zhi bar gyur cig brjod cing mdag/ thal 'jim zhi ba'i gnas su sba// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi

ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya hu ra khaM baM ri la sa nA ga shAn ting a mu ka dz+nyA na sarba shAn ting ku ru swA hA// tshogs bsag sgrib sbyang bla med 'grub// nyams pa bskang
zhing dngos grub myur// 'jigs pa brgyad las nges par skyob// phan gdags zhi ba'i sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang gdug rtsub tshar gcad phyir// drag po dmar len sbyin bsreg bshad// sa gsum 'khar gong

chu gsum la// maN+Dal khru gang dpangs su brtsegs// dbus su khru gang me thab bo// kha khyer gsum ldan thur la brko// kha khyer mtho gang mdzub gang tshad// sor gnyis zheng du gtsang thod la// rgya sol khrag gis
nag por bya// sna tshogs rdo rje rlung gi 'bru// phyi rim 'khor lo sreg pa'i sngags// yang logs bsreg rdzas dgram par bya// ming byang ri lu brgya dang brgyad// mchod rdzas gnod rdzas gsod pa'i

rdzas// tsha ba'i rdzas dang myos pa'i rdzas// mthun rdzas la sogs dgod par bya// rgya gram steng du ming byang khar// tsher ma can dang dug shing brtsig/ khrag dang dug gis rab tu bran// thab khung ri las me lha

bskyed// mchod 'bul me lha'i thugs ka ru// ye shes rang gsal stong bdag med// chos sku'i ngang las phyag rgya'i sku// bskyed la bla rkun rbad cing sdebs// bskul dang bcas pa drag sngags bcus// rdzas kyi

mchod pa me sbar bsreg/ rkyen gyi sbyor ba 'phro 'du min// rtsol bral ji bzhin lhun gyis grub// nam mkha' 'khor lo spyi 'joms gcod// sbyor ba rdzogs dang dril thod gnan// drag po tshar gcod sbyin sreg

mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags 'di dag sku gsung thugs rdo rje las thon to// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ sa nA ga du raM/ sa nA ga u nan gzer phyung/ srog la dun raM tsit+ta breng

shag thun rbad e raM/ gnod byed 'byung po dz+wa la raM mA ra ya phaT phaT/ rdzogs dang thod par rdzas blug la// bka' rten 'og gam dur khrod gnan// drag po tshar gcod 'khor lor bshad// de nas dmar len yang

gsang mchog/ gnan pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'khor lo ling+ga thal ba rnams// gang yin thod par blugs nas ni// tshes gcig dang ni bcu drug la// sbyor ba mkhas pas gnan par bya// zhi khro gshin rje phur pa
rnams// 'khor lo rus sbal thod chen gzhug/ ma hA man d+hal 'og tu gnan// ma mo bdud mo srin mo rnams// nyan thos thod gos bka' rten gnan// bdud dang mu stegs mgon po rnams// g.yag rur 'obs

khung sgo drung gnan// rgyal po dge bsnyen dkor srung rngams// spyang thod sgo lam srang khar gnan// btsan dang srog bdag gri bo rnams// sha ru spyang thod gong gsum gnan// klu bdud mo dang phug bdag mo// bon
po'i gos gtums lha khang gnan// the brang chags 'gong gshin rngog rnams// glang rur bcug la lam mdor gnan// sri can chung thod them 'og gnan// sa bdag klu gnyan mdze 'dre rnams// 'khor lo phag
pa'i lto bar gzhug/ phag thod bka' rten gad gnod gnan// log nag rdo rje rgya gram ldan// lam las rin chen ri rab brtan// rus sbal lto bar stobs kyis gnan// gdon mi za ba'i pho brang gdab// gdug

pa'i stobs kyis gnan par bshad// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// e dun ka yaM/ sarba tsit+ta gzir nan/ hUM laM staM b+ha ya nan/ che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ dregs pa gnan pa'i 'khor lor bshad// 'phags pa
'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po sdig pa nag po stobs chen gsang ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las sbyor ka'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa/ rigs bzhi gdol pa'i nad dang dug/ 'khor du byas pa'i nad rigs gang// chu dang khrag la brtag pa gang// zhes gsol pas yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa/ babs lugs me dbal za gu

dang// 'brum phran nad dang smyo 'bog ni// rgyal rigs klu yi 'khor gyis so// snying mi dga' dang 'gro snying 'dod// ngu 'bod phya sangs khyer ba dang// gzhan la rgol zhing 'thibs sdang sla// bram ze'i nad du shes

par bya// glu len gar byed mig rtsa grung// dmangs rigs nad du shes par bya// sha mdangs bar na zug gzer che// brtse dang tsha 'phrig 'ong ba dang// skabs su glo bur glang thabs 'ong// rje rigs gnod pa'i

rtags yin no// spyir ni klu gnyan sa bdag dang// klu srin la sogs nad rtags gzir// khrag dang chu la brtag bya ba// chu ni ngal dub chang ma 'thung// mang po ma smras nyal po min// 'byung ba ma 'khrugs pa la
brtag/ dngas pa'i snod du rtse shar gtang// log pa'i dus su brtag par bya// kha dog dag la nad gzhi brtag/ mar khu'i mdog 'dra byung ba na// mkhris pa sha yi mdze nad yin// 'o ma'i mdog tu byung ba

na// rlung nad rus pa'i mdze ru 'gyur// chu rtsa 'dra ba byung ba na// bad kan nang khrol mdze nad yin// ram po 'dra ba byung ba na// 'dus pa kun khyab nad du bshad// ga gon shun pa lta bu dang// spur long 'dra dang
ba trang mdog/ 'byung ba ma 'khrugs chu yin te// lus la nad gzhi med par 'dod// dmar la rtsig po sig sig po// 'gyur mdog med par 'dug pa na// chu ser nag po yin par bshad// gzugs la gdon

gyi brtag pa bya// nya 'dra sbal 'dra rus sbal 'dra// pir 'dra chu srin 'dra ba dang// dpag bsam shing 'dra gdug pa gsum// zhing sa khang sa dur sa dang// byad kyi sa dang rtsol ba brtag/ rnal ma lto log gyad

'gyur brtag/ sa chu me rlung 'khrul 'khor brtsi// 'khyil ba'i gzugs dang thig le dang// rtse gsum gzugs brnyan byung ba dang// nya mig dang ni mun pa 'dra// dmar la sdang dang sna tshogs gzugs// rig pa
can gyis brtag par bya// rgyal po rje'u bram ze dmangs// klu rigs gdon la brtag pa yin// dmar ser ku ya mi mngon na// klu gnyan sa bdag gnod pa yin// gzugs rnams med na bskol la blta// de

yis gtan la phebs par 'gyur// khrag la brtag pa 'di lta ste// rtsa la gtar zhing brtag pa dang// chu ser brtag pa 'di lta ste// dmar ser dag ni sla bar 'tsho// skya nag gnyis po dka' bar bshad// lus kyi
gnad nas khrag ngan dbyung// khrag med gso bar ma bshad de// chu ser sngo skya byung yang spang// khrag ni dngul chu lta bur 'dril// shin tu gso ba dka' bas spang// khrag ni dang po bar ma dang// tha

ma gsum pa rim pas shes// gzugs brnyan brtag pa ma yin te// rlung mkhris bad kan khrag mdog brtag/ spyi gtsug smin mtshams sna rtse dang// rkang dang snying ga mthe bong dang// lte ba mtshan ma zin pa
ni// gnad kyi mkhar brgyad shor na yang// phyi ma mdun dang g.yon zin sla// rgyab tu zin dang g.yas pa dka'// sha dug spu dug rus dug gsum// rnam smin lus la rdzogs pas spang// zhes gsungs
so// 'jam dpal gshin rje zla gsang nag po sdig pa stobs chen las/ nad gzhi brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// sa yams 'byung ba'i
gnad 'khrugs na// rdzas dang sman gyi sbyor ba gang// yang dag dpa' bos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba'i don 'di gsungs so// sbyor ba'i rdzas la nus pa'i

mthu// bsam mi khyab pas bcud kyis gso// dri ma chu dang zil pa gsum// yig 'bru bdud rtsi mtshon cha dang// 'byung gzhi'i gnyen por rab brtags la// sbyar te khong du gtang ba na// tshe ring sha 'jam skad

gdangs snyan// gdug pa'i nad dang dug las thar// bsku dang byug pa'i las byas na// spyang dug sbyang tsher ra chu dang// btsod khu tsha sna sbyar ba dang// ra dug long brdol gu gul dang// mu zi dri ma ldong ros

dang// ti tsha mar dkar ba bla dang// gu gul nag po ra gzhob dang// ra tshwa rgya tshwa kha ru tshwa// ga pur gla rtsi shing kun dang// dbyi mo srub kha ldong ros tsha// sna tshogs phab dang mu zi glum// sbyor ba rdzogs pas bsku

dang byug/ gdug pa'i nad dang dug las thar// zug rngu'i nad 'joms chen po ste// srung ba'i mchog tu yang dag bshad// de nas rtsa sbyang rtsa bkru ba// sngon du khrus sogs rdzogs par bya// zas dang spyod lam sna

sel la// pad+ma dul ma kun khyab dang// ser tshur ha shig rdo dang ni// gla rtsi ma gi ta dang ni// dkar po chig thub mtshal dang sbyar// chang dang sbyar la khong du gtang// gdung bar kun khyab pad+me dang// sdig srin nyi

dga' chang sbyar nas// nye drod drag por de bzhin gtang// rjes ni gar chang tsho khus bcad// 'byams nas lus zungs khrag byung na// chu bskol dom mkhris btab pa dang// rgya sran me tog chu ser btab// grang

'byams rlung la lo yib gtang// rtsa rnams bkru bar mi rung ba// rtsa mdud can dang grang rlung can// lus zungs zad dang rgan po gzhon// mkhas kyang shin tu spang bar bya// rtsa rnams bkrus pa'i yon tan

ni// dug nad rgyas dang rma rnying byer// chu ser don la thebs pa dang// bud med rtsa nad sgur po dang// mdze nad rgyas pa'i nad rnams sel// gzhan yang rtsa sbyang bshad bya ba// pad+me ngan rog ru rta

dang// tsha ba gnyis dang chig thub sbyar// chang las sbyar te tshangs par byug/ 'di zhes rdo rje spyi bor 'joms// sna sel chang gis bya bar bshad// rjes ni tsho khus bcad pa ste// chu ser tshan de ma zad par// rjes

chod tsha ba spang bar bya// chu ser 'dren bshal chen po ste// tsha ba chu ser nad rnams sel// gzhan yang kun khyab ba zho dang// ske tshes gdong gi chu ser 'dren// pad+me kun khyab zo sha dang// gser gyi me tog sbyar

na yang// yan lag chu ser 'dren par bshad// gzhan yang bcud len sman bshad pa// dkar po chig thub sbal rgyab dang// rgya mtsho gser gyi bye ma dang// man 'dzi ra dang tsan dmar dang// 'bri ta sa 'dzin

mon lcam dang// seng ldeng tsan+dan mar khu dang// sho ma bye ma yang leb tu rab sbyar la// so sor gtong ngam dril la gtong// sha dang rus pa rtsa khrag dang// glo snying mkhal ma nang khrol dang// chu ser nag po tha dag

skem// gzhan yang bcud len sman sbyar ba// tsan+dan dkar po seng ldeng dang// bdud rtsi dam pa chur gdus nas// mar dkar 'o ma sbrang rtsi mar// sbyar na chu ser nag po skem// lus kyi stobs ldan bkrag rgyas

'gyur// seng ldeng so ma ra dza dang// tsan+dan dkar po 'bras bu gsum// nim pa ma hA nim pa dang// ka ra sbyar na chu ser skem// seng ldeng 'o mar gdus pa dang// 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul dkar// tha skar

rdo rje so ma ra// cong zhi sbrang rtsi ka ra sbyar// bcud len chu ser nag po skem// skabs su chu ser 'dren bshal gtong// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// bcud len sman gyi sbyor bar bshad// mthong ba'i dug

gis zin pa na// ga pur chu yis btab nas kyang// skyer pa'i khaN+Da byug par bya// mkhris pa sna tshogs lcigs gzhug dril// kha rlangs dug gis bzung bas na// khong dug bu ra gtang bar bya// rtag tu phyi bshal
nang bshal bya// mchin rtsa gtar zhing khrag ngan gdon// bsam pa'i dug gis zin pa na// tsha ba gsum gyi sman mar gtang// drod bsten bsil ba'i zas sman spang// reg pa'i dug gis zin pa na// a ru ra yi

sman mar gtang// 'byung ba'i nad rnams gso ba'i phyir// rtsa bkru gtar zhing khrag ngan gdon// mu zi sman mar rtag tu bza'// sha mdangs par dang nang khrol gyi// chu ser thams cad skem par byed// seng ldeng

sman mar dag gis ni// rus pa rkang gi chu ser skem// a ru ra yis 'byung ba snyoms// dan ti'i mar khu'i sbyor ba yis// chu ser nag po 'joms par byed// gzhan yang chu ser 'dren par byed// kha ni yon por
song ba na// mi yo'i ngos nas chu ser dbyung// mig sle mas lcibs ngag nas dbyung// mtshul pa 'gags na sna bshal bya// tsha ba gsum dang tshad de drang// gre ba 'gags na glo rtsa gseng// ka ra
rgun 'bru shing mngar btags// 'byung ba 'khrug pa'i nad dang dug/ gso ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis// chu ser nad rnams 'joms par byed// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po'i sdig pa stobs chen
gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'tsho byed sman gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dregs pa 'joms pa'i bcom ldan 'das// bstod dang gsol
btab gnad bskul zhing// mchod pa bstab tshul bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dregs pa 'dul bas lha rnams la bstod cing thugs dam gnad nas skul ba 'di gsungs

so// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// drag po e yi gzhal yas nas// klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag stong gi gdan// phyogs skyong ma he brdzis pa'i khri// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan steng na// dug lnga
brkam chags 'joms pa'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid// ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po zil gnon sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing

rngam// g.yas dkar klu rgyal zas su za// g.yon dmar klu 'bum gnyan khri gsol// dbus ni mthing la rngam pa yis// sku dgrar bsdaus pa'i dam nyams dang// sa bdag sde brgyad lha srin gyi// dbang po lnga dang

tsit+ta gsol// phyag drug mtshon cha 'bar ba yis// zhe sdang klu gnyan sa bdag dang// dgra bgegs mgo lus tshal par gshag/ dbu la bdud dang srin po dang// btsan dang mu stegs rgyal po yi// thod pa'i phreng

bas rgyan du byas// klu chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// do shal snying dang phreng bas brgyan// rgyal rigs snyan gyi grong khyer brgyan// rje rigs mgur chu tshangs skud brgyan// bram ze'i rigs kyis phyag gdub
dang// dmangs rigs zhabs gdub lhu tshigs brgyan// rigs ngan gdol pa zhabs 'og bting// ba su rigs drug zas su za// mche ba dgu khri rtsang phur gtams// spyan nas 'jigs pa'i me 'bar

zhing// shangs nas rlung nag 'tshubs ma ldang// dbu skra sma ra ba spu las// gdug rtsub dmar nag me chen 'bar// sku dgrar bsdo ba'i dam nyams dang// gdug pa'i sa bdag klu gnyan bsreg/ gang la bya ba khyod

shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho skoms/ sbyin sreg byed na gdug rtsub me yi zhal du stob// sdang ba'i dgra dang
gnod pa'i bgegs// mchod par 'bul lo kha ram khA hi// zhes sbyar// g.yon gyi phyogs na yum chen mo// ma gcig rdo rje khros ma ste// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// gdug pa'i ral pa mun ltar

gtibs// ral ba'i zar bu re re la// gser g.yu me tog rgyan cha 'phyangs// gdol pa'i klu dang thod pa yis// dbu dang phyag zhabs lhu tshigs brgyan// zhal nas mi ro rta ro 'brul// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu

lu// shangs nas rlung nag 'tshubs ma ldang// g.yas pa dgra snying phyung 'khyud la// g.yon pa snying khrag gtso la stob// drag tu bskul zhing rbad tsam na// ma tshogs 'bum yang gzir zhing sngangs// ma mo'i skyin thang

dgra la 'bebs// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho skoms// zil
gnon thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'byung ba sa yi dngas ma las// rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo ste// 'jigs byed ya ma rA tsa ni// sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la// rngam zhing dregs pas dgra bgegs 'dul// rna
ba'i grong khyer sbrul gyis brgyan// tshangs pa'i mgo bcad do shal byas// g.yas pa 'khor lo rtsibs bcu yis// dgra bgegs mgo lus tshal par gshog/ g.yon na tsit+ta dmar po bsnams// 'gal byed tsit+ta
khong nas 'byin// drag tu bskul zhing rbad tsam na// bdud dang srin po'i don snying 'byin// btsan dang 'gong po srog bdag 'joms// dug lnga'i gdug pa khros pa yi// sa bdag klu gnyan gzir zhing

bsreg/ gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho skoms// ya ma rA tsa'i thugs kyi

dkyil 'khor nas// 'byung ba me yi dngas ma las// rin chen rigs kyi khro bo ste// dregs pa phyag na rdo rje'i sku// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba yis// phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'i rtags// zhal gcig rngam

zhing gtsigs pa yi// dregs pa can dang lha srin rnams// srog dang phral nas zas su za// tshems dang mche ba gtsigs pa yis// gdug pa'i klu gnyan zhal du gsol// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse dgu yis// ye shes dgu
ldan nyon mongs 'joms// g.yon na tsit+ta'i phreng ba yis// dbang chen dregs pa bran du 'khol// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs kyis// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs zil gyis gnon// dbu dang phyag zhabs lhu

tshigs rnams// sbrul dang rin po che yis brgyan// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang
bla mtsho skoms// dregs pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'byung ba rlung gi dngas ma las// las kyi rigs kyi khro bo ste// rus sbal rngam pa'i mi zan ni// nyon mongs lnga yi rtsa ba gcod// skye ba med
pa'i khams su sdud// thugs kyi gsang mdzod chen po ru// lha srin ming gi snying po 'chang// dmigs pa'i dam nyams dgra bgegs kun// lcags sder 'bar ba'i stobs kyis khug/ spyan mig nyi ma'i 'od kyis

bsreg/ rtsa bzhi dngas ma'i stobs kyis non// dmod pa drag po'i chang pas chod// mchod rten drug gi stobs kyis non// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i

sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho skoms// spyi gtsug gdug pa 'dul byed pa// 'byung ba chu yi dngas ma las// pad+ma rigs kyi khro bo ste// bya khyung rgyal po mthu bo
che// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gshog pa la// ral gri mtshon cha spu gris gtams// mtshon cha'i gshog pa brdabs pa yis// gdug byed ma lus gshog cing gtub// spyan mig nyi ma'i gzigs stangs kyis// bag

chags rgya mtsho gting nas skems// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchu dbal gyis// gdug pa'i klu rgyal spyi nas 'dren// gru gsum gdangs pa'i zhal bgrad pas// gdug pa'i klu rgyal khong du gsol// gang la bya ba khyod

shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho skoms// yang sprul dug gi khyung chen gnyis// spu dang gshog

pa mtshon cha me// klu bdud klu srin bsreg par mdzad// stag dang seng ge rngam pa yis// nyams pa'i sha khrag srog la rol// zhe sdang gdug pa'i sbrul nag gi/ kha nas me 'bar stong khams bsreg/ dgra bo'i khang

pa rming nas bshig/ dug sbrul rlangs pa dgra la gtong// dgra bo'i khong du dug mda' rgyob// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog

dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho skoms// shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi nas// bla 'gugs mon pa chen po bzhis// dam nyams dgra bgegs bla khug cig/ mon mo 'jigs byed bzhi dag

dang// bdud pho bzhi dang bdud mo bzhi// sdang ba'i dgra bgegs bla khug la// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral bar mdzod// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rum na// 'chi bdag bye ba dgu khri bzhugs// las kyi mtha'
sdud khyod yin pas// nyams pa'i dgra bgegs myur du sgrol// 'byung bzhi nam gyi 'og shed na// sgo med lcags mkhar bcu bdun dbus// thod mkhar 'jigs pa'i pho brang nas// gshin rje tshe bdag nag po
bzhugs// las kyi mtha' sdud khyod yin pas// dmigs pa gang yin myur du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba choms// lus srog dbang po dngas snyigs phye// rtsa rgyus khrag dang bla mtsho
skoms// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ thugs dam bskul ba dang bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying pos

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho phrin las rdzogs pa yi// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po che// stobs chen gyad gnon rgyal po khyed// gdug pa gsum po log gnon dang// yan lag sbyor ba rgyas
par shod// ces gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dri ba'i don rgyas par bshad do// sngags kyi nus pa stobs med na// dam tshig bshags pa ting 'dzin bsar// mtshon cha rno ba ngar dbyung

zhing// dmigs pa myur du ma chod na// sngags kyi so btags spu gri bsnol// shi sa bstan dang rno la myur// bsgrub dang rkyang pa shes pas brdeg/ sngags zlos cis kyang mi thub na// sbyar ba'i 'khrul 'khor bzlog
cing dkrug/ rgya shog rgyu las dme khrag byug/ 'khrul 'khor dug dang khrag sbyar bris// cha lugs bzlog cing ting 'dzin gsal// bshig ching sdud pas rten la 'dug/ thun brdeg phur gdab zhag gsum
bsngags// bsgom dang sngags bzlas phrin las bcol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'khor lo bzlog cing dkrug pa 'di gsungs so// e myags ya rngubs/ mug shag dun/ sa nA ga

trig/ phu dza thums hur/ du me tsa tri nA ga'i srog la breng breng rtsa la dun dun/ kham shag sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga ro myags tsit+ta rbad/ mug ti srog la rbad/ khram shig dug phyung rbad// dbugs la thang gzer tsi tri ya
ma rbad// thun rbad srog la b+h+yo// phrin las rdzogs nas dur khrod dam// bka' rten byin can 'og tu mnan// ya bag sha ya ha la dug/ bya ba kun 'grub brlag par 'gyur// stobs med byas na rang 'chi

bas// rtsa ma ha ri zhes byar bshad// gzhan yang lo tog gzhom bya na// bam chen mi yi thod pa ru// dgra bo'i yul dbyibs zhing sa brub// sngo dang rtsi shing rdzing yur dang// ser srung yul lha bcas pa
gzhug/ mnol khrag dug dang nyungs dkar brab// tha ma dgra yi yul dbus gzhug/ gang zhig dmigs pa'i lo 'bras brlag/ gal te phebs par ma gyur na// sa bdag snying la phur bas gdab// dud bdug

rdzas bsreg drag rtsal bya// 'jig rten brlag par yang dag bshad// de yi gsang sngags 'di dag go/ e dun ka yaM rA hu la trig nan/ phroM phroM hril hril shar shar phob phob/ ma ra tsa sha trig nan/ phroM phroM rag mo
phob/ ting rmugs khrag la rag sha dum/ ya ma nA ga gzir nan/ drag tu phroM phroM shar shar hril nan phob/ 'bras bu lo tog 'joms par bshad// gzhan yang yul khams srung byed na// nyungs kar

glang ru thal chen gtor// zil gnon bya khyung gshog pa mes// sprin rnams shing gi phung po bsreg/ sder mo mchu yi dregs pa bcom// e dun ka yaM/ sarba sha truM s+t+wam b+ha ya nan hUM phaT/ pa tsi tong pa sho sha ya/ mo ha

b+ha ta ya hUM phaT/ 'bras bu yul khams bsrung bar bshad// gzhan yang ltas ngan las byed na// spyang ki sreg pa ri bong dang// mon pa'i tsit+ta dbang po lnga// gzugs la sngags sgor 'bru gsum la// sngags
bzlas gza' skar 'dzom pa la// dgra bo'i gnas la tshud pa na// ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur// e dun ka yaM/ ag chos khong dril chum rbad myag du ling has phob// ag mo ka ti khug chug khu bo hi

btson phob khu le phob du ling has phob/ ti khron khug chug myos ti a i du ling has phob/ mus khu ldi mug khor bu myags/ du ling has phob 'ub thub du ling has phob// ltas ngan sbyor ba rdzogs pa ni// rang rang

sngags dang rdzas kyis 'grub// ltas ngan sprul pa'i sbyor bar bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po zla gsang nag po sdig pa stobs chen gyi rgyud las/ yan lag gi sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi

shu pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ e ma sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku// che ba rang byung rgyal po khyod// stobs chen gyad gnon bka' yi rgyud// drag po mngon du phyung ba 'di// dang po gang nas ji
ltar byung// rgyud don bstan pa ji ltar lags// yongs su rdzogs dang gtad pa gang// zhes gsol pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba'i don rgyas par bshad do// dregs pa 'joms pa rdo rje'i bdag/ longs spyod

'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang// byang sems sprul pa'i rig pa 'dzin// lha dang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma// bdud dang srin po sha za'i tshogs// nyi zla dbang phyug dkor srung gza'// smyo byed byad stems gnod sbyin

klu// gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun kun// nga yi bka' rgyud rol pa 'di// rnam rtog mtshan ma rang grol ba'i// rdo rje bde ba chen po 'di// chos nyid skye ba med dbyings nas// bstan pa'i snying po nges pa'i

don// stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag brgyad// thabs dang shes rab snying po'i bka'// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pa// snying po nye ba 'gro ba'i lam// gsang ba nges pa'i bka' rgyud phyung// stobs chen lhun
grub zil gyis gnon// chos sku lhug par rang gsal ba// yang dag dgongs pa gnyis med grol// 'brel pa bzhi yi don nyid rdzogs// chos dang chos can chos nyid gcig/ rnam shes gzung 'dzin rang snang
shugs// lta spyod man ngag thabs cig dang// 'khor 'das snang srid don dam gcig/ bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras 'das// rang bzhin bdag nyid chen por rdzogs// so ma lhug par rdzogs
sangs rgyas// ma skyes skye med gnas las 'das// skye 'jig 'gag pa stong dpag med// bde ba'i ye shes ro gcig mnyam// e ma mi 'gyur stobs ldan gdeng// bgrod thabs shI la ldan pas long// seng ge'i
rgyal po bkur bar bya// nor bu'i phreng ba bar mi gcad// gnas dang grogs po yid 'ong bsten// dgon pa'i gnas su mi g.yel bya// gsang sngags nus pa 'byung bar bshad// tsha gsum rus dang myos pa

yang// drod dang dbang po rang nyams brtags// e ma bka' rgyud rol pa 'di// lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal// sna tshogs gzhan dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun kun// snying po don gyi
bka' rgyud gtad// 'di la 'jig rten dngos grub mchog/ ma lus 'dus pa'i stobs dpag med// 'di la yun gyi don ldan pas// che bas che ba'i yon tan rdzogs// snying po 'di las gzhan med pas// snying po
don gyi rgyud du bshad// ces gsungs so// de nas 'khor mang po dga' mgu yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// bde chen ngang las thabs kyi
bye brag 'char// gnyis med 'bras bus khams gsum rgyas btab nas// mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i sku la 'dud// e ma mi rtog dbyings las rdzogs pa'i sku// phyag rgya zil gnon dregs pa 'joms pa'i
sku// dbang sdud gtum rngam chen po'i sku la 'dud// skye med dbyings las thugs rjes don mdzad pa// dug gsum nad sel sman gyi rgyal po ste// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po khyed la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ces bstod

do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rgyal po zla gsang nag po sdig pa stobs chen gyi gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad cing rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// 'phags pa 'jam dpal

gshin rje zla gsang nag po'i rgyud mchog tu gsang ba sdig pa stobs chen zhes bya ba lha'i yul du grags pa rdzogs so//// sngags dang/ mtshon cha dang/ bka'i bdag po gsum gyis phyag rgyas btab po// rgya rgya

rgya/ rab tu gsang ba'i rgyud 'bras bu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba/ seng+ga la'i lho phyogs gyad kyi yul du dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis/ u rgyan dpal rang byung gi mchod rten d+harmA tsakra chos
kyi 'byung gnas nas/ mkha' 'gro ma la zhus pa rim par brgyud pa/ bal yul gyi slob dpon ba su d+ha ra dang/ ban chung rdo rje khri gtsug gis bsgyur ba rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ ya ma kr-iSh+Na gu h+ya ta twa kha thun tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje nag po gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi rgyud kha thun zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshed po yab yum la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ya mAn+ta ka nyid chos sku'i ngang las gzugs sku zhal gsum phyag drug par bzhengs te/ phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub

pa'i gzhal yas khang phyi nang yongs rdzogs gsal ba'i pho brang ye shes las grub pa'i 'og min gyi gnas na/ yum be twa li dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de'i dus de'i tshe na 'dus pa'i 'khor yang ye

shes dang las las grub pa dang thabs cig pa las/ dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i ngang las bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs las rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs so// kye ma
ho// 'khor 'das thams cad 'khor lo'i ngang// 'khor lo thams cad 'jam dpal don// de nyid rig pa byang chub sems// bde ba chen por sangs rgyas so// oM a ho/ zhes bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal

kha thun gyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal chen po des/ srid pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i dus de'i tshe

na gsod byed ya ma rA dza zhes bya ba/ ri rab kyi 'og chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na gnas pa la sogs pa'i bdud dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ ma mo khrag 'thung dang/ lha ma srin rnams shin tu gdug pa che

bar gyur to// de rnams kyis srid pa gsum gyi sems can thams cad za zhing gsod pa dang rngam par gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das ya mAn+ta kas/ yum be tA li dang gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad de/ sras ya
ma rA dza sprul nas gsod byed ya ma rA dza'i lcags mkhar bcu bdun gzer ba las/ de rnams shin tu dngangs te srog dang bral ba snyam du gyur nas/ 'jigs pa'i sems kyis bstod pa ni/ gtum chen dregs pa
chen po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang byed bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// khro rngam gdug pas srid gsum thal bar rlog/ sgrol byed sku mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khor// gtum chen rab 'bar

gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces smras te/ sngags rnams sor bzhag ya ma rA dza du man ta ka ra na pre ta dza ya a mu kaM snying la gum rbad dza/ ni dza shag pa bam ril
snying gong ma ra na nag po ya ma srog la phra su ga bam ril rbad/ ma ra ni rbad rbad/ bdag gi smod pa rig par bcas// dpa' bos bzhes su 'bangs su mchi// zhes dbus kyi gsod byed chen pos smras so// de
nas sras mchog ya ma rA dzas bka' stsal pa// nga la bstod pa phul ba yis// phan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyis// nga yi lha la bstod pa dang// 'khor bcas khyed kyis srog snying phul// zhes gsungs

so// de'i dus su lha gang yin snyam ste/ nam mkha'i dbus na yar bltas pa las/ srid pa gsum gyi rtse mo na gzi mdangs dang ldan pa'i lha ya mAn+ta ka mthong ste/ shin tu bred pa'i dbang gis bstod pa ni/ nyi ma
'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od stong phyogs bcur 'gyu// gdug byed mtshon cha mang pos bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rab brjid gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes smras te/ dbus kyi yi dwags dang gshin rje

rnams kyis rang gi snying po phul ba ni/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya hUM phaT/ ces phul lo// de nas sha zan dmar po yab yum gyis smras pa/ oM

rnal ma rnal te gsod la rngam gshos la mer sris la chum thum bis thum/ lcags kyi skra gcig mas dgra bo'i snying phyung zhig/ de'i tshe ma mo dang khrag 'thung rnams kyis rang gi dmod pa phul te smras pa/ ma ma e ka

dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha mu ta snying la ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ e ka dza ti mi tsa ro la baM ril rbad trag rag sha thuM ril rbad/ rak+mo te kum dza dza kha la ma li b+h+yo b+h+yo/ re ma ti snying la baM ril rbad/ thun mugs snying la rngubs rbad/

ya ya mon tsin d+ha na ma la b+h+yo dza dza/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo ma ma tsit+ta rbad thuM/ snying la tshal ba med baM ril rbad/ ces smras so// de'i dus su gza' rA hu las smras pa/ rwa hu tshal pa mu[×] me pa sha mi ki kha ta hUM

nan lam staM b+ha ya nan/ zhes smras so// de nas yang khram bdag bcu gnyis dang lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis smras pa/ oM ya ma rA dza sa do me ya b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu baM ril rbad nan/ oM dug nur dug nur che ge mo tshal pa

nan tshal pa nan/ oM snying gshogs me kha lo mu lo tsa thun nan/ oM sa ti ru ru grang kra ra tsa nan/ a mu kaM mA ra ya nan/ oM a kro d+he ka many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa k+Sha ya nan sa du baM rbad ru lu hUM dza/ ru la tsa pa ya

ni ti sha ru ni nan/ a mu kaM mA ra ya nan/ ni mA ra ya/ ni ma ra du/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa baM ril// daM duM nu hUM phaT/ badzra tsi duM ling rbad/ mu ya ma mu ya ma snying khrag tshil rbad/ ya ma rA dza sha truM mu tshil hi

gug/ ling du la ling rbad ling/ a mu kaM chom ling swA hA/ bdag cag bstan pa bsrung bar bgyi// zhes smras so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig snying po bsgrag pa ni/ oM hrIHSh+t-IHbi kri ta na na sa ma ya hUM
hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bka' stsal to// dam chu blud nas mna' bsgags te/ bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas te zas skal du bstan pa bshig pa'i dgra bo'i srog dbugs byin te/ gtor ma dang dam rdzas phog nas
bka' las mi 'da' bar bka' bsgos pa ni/ oM ya mAn ta ga hrIHSh+t-IHmany+dzu shrI sa ma ya u ne u ye dza/ zhes bka' stsal to// ma mo khrag 'thung thams cad kyi snying po'i mgo yon tan gyi sngags kyis

gnan pa dang gshin rje'i mgo gnan pa 'bru bzhi pa bka' stsal pa/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn+ta ka ya ma rA dza/ zhes bka' stsal to// ya mAn+ta ka zhes pa ni/ gshin rje'i mgo gnan par bka' stsal to// de
ltar thams cad btul te bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas nas 'jig rten pa bde ba la bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur to// 'jam dpal kha thun gyi rgyud las/ dregs pa btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas thugs las sprul pa'i sras ya ma rA dzas gsol pa// e ma ho// sems can kun la gnod byed
pa// btul nas dam tshig bkod pa ni// kye ma shin tu ngo mtshar to// de las rjes su bsgrub pa ni// gsang sngags ji lta'i rim pa dang// de dag btul ba'i rim pa rnams// las la bkol na ji ltar
bkol// las kyi kha tshar ji ltar gdags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor// bcom ldan 'jam dpal bsgrub

'dod pa'i// rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa yis// dben pa chen po'i gnas nyid du// phrin las bzhi yi dkyil 'khor la// lha yi phyag mtshan be con dgod// bu don don du gnyer nas grub// dang po bla ma mnyes

par bya// de nas phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob nas// dam tshig dag dang yang dag ldan// bdag nyid yab yum bskyed byas la// spyan drang mchod nas dngos grub blang// yid bzhin lta bu'i bsnyen pa grangs// oM

a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag bcu ru bzlas byas na// dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun gyi rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste gsum
pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dur khrod dag gis gnas 'dug la// bdag nyid yab yum 'phro 'du las// mdun du sras mchog bskyed par bya// kha ni lhor bltas 'brub khung du// ling+ga bcug

la thun gyis brab// rgyun du yon tan snying po grangs// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya mAn ta ka pany+tsa d+he ro ni hUM phaT/ de nas sngar gyi yon tan la// ma mo khrag thun 'bod rbad gsad// dril ba'i sngags kyis bsgrub par
bya// gsod byed gtor ma rgyun du gtang// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun gyi rgyud las sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// las la sbyar bar 'dod pa na// thun dang
'khor lo gang rung bya// gza' skar ngan pa dag la gtad// zla ba mar ngo dag la bya// ro tshas ras la mi khrag dang// sbyar rtsi ldum bus snag tsha bya// skad sna bzhi yis gsod byed bstim// bya rog

'ug pa'i sgro rtsa yis// bcu gnyis rtsibs chen bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i las sngags 'di btags bskor// a mu kaM pra ma ya hUM phaT/ a mu kaM rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ a mu kaM mu ra tsa ya hUM phaT/ a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM

phaT/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pas bzlas// dmar thag chad nas rgyun gtor gtang// khri las mi mang mi nyung bya'o// yang na de bas thun la bya'o// thod pa nag po yin nges la// 'gram pa g.yas g.yon ltag pa

dang// mtshog ma bzhi ru sngags bris la// dmar thag dril ba'i thun gyis brab// mtshan mo gsod byed drag sngags bsnun// bdag nyid sku ni rgyan gcig bskyed// ya ma rA dza brgya rtsa gdon// khram bdag bskul

zhing gshed bdun rbad// ya mA ra dza bskul byas la// seng ldeng phur pa snying la gdab// oM ya mAn+ta ka k+ShaM Ar+ya a tsa la k+ShaM/ oM ma dug tsa tsa tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad/ ma dug ka ya ma k+ShaM/ a mu ka srog rtsa la mugs

tig rbad/ rtsa rtsa ra tsa rbad/ ma mo khrag la don ting mugs// srin po'i rus la chom chom tshal/ gshin rje'i khram la lhan lhan thob// dgra bo khram la khram ri li li ni dza rbad/ rnye kre d+ha de na bla nge b+ha ba ta che ge mo mA

ra ya rbad/ ces pas phur pa gdab par bya// de nas de nyid yum bskul la// ma mo khrag 'thung snying po dang// khrag thun 'di yis dbab par bya// mgo 'phyang ma dza dza/ dun mug bla rtsal dza dza/ rtsa bo che la dun
dun mugs/ nang khrol smad lnga la rtsal baM/ dun baM dun ri li li rbad/ khrag dang dug gnyis bsres la brdeg/ de nas gsod byed bskul byas la// drag sngags bdag gis sngar ltar brdeg/ de yi yum dang ma

tshogs bskul// khrag thun dag ni brdeg par bya// dgra bo khrag thun mugs/ oM mu ya mug ti rngubs che ge mo la cho cho/ bal hu bal hu spu snying gong rtsa thun nan/ bal thun nan/ che ge mo nan/ khrag thun long

khrag/ a mu kaM khong khrag la ya/ nad rnams so sor btang ba dang// ban+de la sogs gsad pa ni// man ngag dam pas bya ba yin// thun drug dril ba'i man ngag la// mda' yis gzir bar bya ba ste// 'ug pa ma

yi mda' zor ni// zla ba zad khar 'phang zhing bskul// dug gis myos byed rak+tas 'jig/ nyung dkar mtshon la khram shing brab// dang la phur pa gdab par bya// sngags pa nang 'gras rtag 'grogs na// ro langs

rak+sha nag po bya// yang na thugs kyi srung bzlog bya// las rnams grub nas dur khrod du// drang srong sngags dang dmod pas gnan// gtor ma gtang la phrin las gzhol// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun
gyi rgyud las// byad par las la bkol de gsad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// las kyi kha tshar rim pa ni// rnal 'byor bkra shis 'dod pa ni// tshe yi man+t+ra 'di ltar

bya// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka kA la rU pa A yuHpha la sid+d+hi b+h+rUM dza// zhes pas tshe yi bsgrub pa bya// tshe yi dngos grub chen po thob// gzhan yang ser ba dbab 'dod na// dung dkar phroM b+hu ti phroM/ yug ti smin trag du

tsar shar sha lta hril phob/ nyung dkar dag la sngags te 'phang// gzhan yang ser ba bcad pa ni// oM kA la rU pa tsa ya bi dong sa sho sha ya mo ha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ ti shuM shu ma li ti di bi ri hi ha ya ru ru ti swA hA/

phe ska na ya phaT/ skye 'gram nyung dkar dag la bsngags// gang 'ong phyogs su gtang byas na// 'chad par 'gyur te the tshom med// snying dang 'dra te shin tu zab// gzhan yang ltas ngan 'bebs 'dod na// ya ma ni
ra kya kyed trab 'ur phob// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun gyi rgyud las/ las kha tshar gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor gyis bstod pa ni/ e ma ho// yab gcig

'jam dpal gshen rje gshed// dbu drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis te// zhabs kyang rnam pa drug du bgrad// gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan dang ldan// ma mo gshin rje kun gyi
bdag/ lha mchog nyid la dad pas bstod// ces bstod par gyur to// 'jam dpal kha thun gyi rgyud las 'khor gyis bstod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ma

ho nga yi rgyud 'di ni// rgyud kyi snying po de kho na nyid ces bya ba ste/ rgyud thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa yin pas/ shin tu gsang zhing sba ba las// kun la bstan na 'jig 'gyur la// zhig nas sems can

dmyal bar skye/ 'on tang na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dgra dar ba'i dus su/ sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan du bstan pa yin pas shin tu brnag cing gzung bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun gyi
rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su bzung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// gshin rje nag po gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgyud 'di 'jam dpal gyis 'og min du gsungs nas/ rgyal po
dza zhes bya ba bsod nams bsags pa de la babs/ des bkra shis bde ldan gyi dga' rab rdo rje la/ des 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la/ des gtsug lag dpal dge la/ des ba su d+ha ra la/ des yang dbang
gter la/ bka' re re las spel du mi rung ngo// rgya rgya rgya////

rgya gar skad du/ ya ma kr-iSh+Na kha thun gu h+ya ta twot+ta ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje nag po kha thun gsang ba de kho na nyid phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed
po khros pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed po nyid rang bzhin gyi gnas na bzhugs pa las/ thugs mchog ya ma rA dzas gsol pa// kye kye/ bcom
ldan 'jam dpal khros pa nyid// khyad par thun gyi phrin las ma yin pa'i// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba gang// bdag la rim par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ 'jam dpal khro bos bka' stsal

pa// spyir na 'jam dpal nag po'i yang// 'khor lo bskor thabs bsam mi khyab// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de la phye bas dgu ru 'gyur// dbye ba dgug pa bskrad pa dang// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram
dang// dug gsum ar la gtad pa dang// bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs gyur te// rgyud chen zla gsang la sogs pa'i// 'dod pa yin te 'dir ma gsungs// de ltar mang du bskor gyur na// sngags pa dag la

rkyen yang 'byung// ro langs bskor ba bshad gyur kyang// bskor na rang nyid brlag pa yin// de yang 'dir ma smos pa'o// gal te 'khor lo bskor gyur na// 'dir ni bskor thabs rnam pa drug/ phyi dang nang dang

gsang ba las// phyi yi phyi ltar bskor ba dang// phyi yi gsang ltar bskor ba dang// nang gi phyi dang nang gi ni// gsang ba phyi yi phyi dang phyi'i// gsang bar bskor ba dag dang drug/ de dag phyi ni dgug pa la// de

dag gsang ba gsad pa'o// de dag phyi ni g.yon skor yin// nang gi g.yas su bskor ba'o// de ltar 'khor lo bskor thabs drug/ bskor bar shis pa phyi yi phyi// mi bskor ba ni rnam pa lnga// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i
rnal 'byor pa'am// bsod nams ldan pa'i rgyal po'am// de lta bu yis bskor ba las// bskor na rang la gnod par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun phyi ma'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo'i dbye ba

skyon yon bsdu thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa// phyi yi phyi ltar bskor ba ni/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ che ge mo zhig pra ma ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma dang po'o// ya me do ru Na yo

da ya che ge mo zhig mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa'o// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya che ge mo zhig rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa'o// ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya che ge mo zhig mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa'o// de nas

phyi'i gsang ba ltar bskor ba ni/ ya ma ra ni ts+tsha yak+She ya che ge mo pra ma ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma dang po'o// ya k+She ya ra ni yo da ya che ge mo mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa'o// ya da yo Na ru do me ya/ che ge mo rak+ta tsa ra ya

hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa'o// ya ma do sa dza rA mA ra ya che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun phyi ma'i rgyud las/ phyi'i phyi dang phyi'i gsang ba ltar bskor

ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang nang gi phyi ltar bskor ba ni/ ya ma me dA k+She/ che ge mo pra ma ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma dang po'o// rA dza sa do che ge mo mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa'o// ru Na yo ni/ che ge mo

rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa'o// ra ya ts+tsha ni che ge mo ma rA ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa'o// nang gi gsang ltar bskor ba ni/ ya ma k+She da me/ che ge mo pra ma ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma dang po'o// ra ni ts+tsha ya/ che ge mo mu

ra tsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa'o// ra ni yo na/ che ge mo rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa'o// ru do sa tsa/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun phyi ma'i rgyud

las/ nang gi phyi dang nang gi gsang ba ltar bskor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i phyi ltar bskor ba ni/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// ma rA dza sa do me ya/ rA dza sa do me

ya ma/ dza sa do me ya ma rA/ sa do me ya ma rA dza/ do me ya ma rA tsa sa do// che ge mo pra ma ya hUM paT/ nyi ma dang po'o// ya me do ru Na yo da/ me do ru Na yo da ya/ do ru Na yo da ya me/ ru Na yo da ya me do// Na yo da ya

me do ru/ yo da ya me do ru Na/ da ya me do ru Na yo/ che ge mo mur tsa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa'o// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She/ da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yo ni ra ya k+She ya da/ ni ra ya k+She ya da yo/ ra ya k+She ya da yo ni/ yak+She ya

da yo ni ra/ k+She ya da yo ni ra ya/ che ge mo rak+ta tsa ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa'o// yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma/ k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ yats+tsha ni rA ma ya k+She/ ts+tsha ni rA ma yak+She ya/ ni rA ma yak+She yats+tsha/ rA ma yak+She yats+tsha ni/ ma yak+She

yats+tsha ni rA/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa'o// gsang ba'i gsang ba ltar bskor ba ni/ k+She ya tsa ni rA ma ya// zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ g.yas su bskor ba gsang ba'i gsang// gong mas sbyar la shes par
bya// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal kha thun phyi ma'i rgyud las// 'khor lo gsang ba'i phyi dang// gsang ba'i gsang ba ltar bskor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bka' stsal pa// de ltar
'khor lo bskor ba yang// dang po bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// de nas mdun rogs bud med bsten// de nas sum cu rtsa gnyis pa// dril lam yang na bcu bdun dril// de bzlas nyi shu drug dag la// 'khor lo

rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa// sbyar rtsi ldum bu dug khrag gis// pho rog sgro rtsas dpe chung bzhin// bris la bden pa grub pa yi// smon lam btab ste nyi shu bdun// de tshe nyi ma dang por bskor// mtshan mo dril la thun
gyis brab// nyi shu brgyad la gnyis pa bskor// nyi shu dgu la gsum pa bskor// gnam stong nyi ma bzhi pa bskor// tshes gcig thun bya dgong ka ni// dur khrod dag tu gnan pa bya// lan gsum bar

du spogs shing bya// de la zla stong yar ngo la// sa ma ya dang sum cu rtsa gnyis dril// zla smad 'khor lo bskor la gnan// phyi yi phyi nang gsang ba zab// nang dang gsang ba bskor bar dka'// bsnyen rdzogs grub
pa thob nas bskor// des ni gang yang brlag par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ sras mchog ya ma rA dzas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud 'di ji ltar bdag gis gzung bar bgyi// zhes gsol pas/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud 'di ni gshin rje nag po kha thun de kho na nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma zhes bya bar bzung zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir bcang zhing sba bar bya/ bsgrub par bya'o

zhes gsungs so// gshin rje nag po kha thun de kho na nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma las sgrub pa'i man ngag dang/ rgyud bzung zhing bcangs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// gshin rje nag po kha thun gyi rgyud de kho na nyid phyi ma zhes

bya ba rdzogs so//// gu ru ba su d+ha ras gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po che la/ b+ha sa ya'i dgon par gnang ba'o// rgya rgya rgya// a+thi+-i/ bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// gu ru ba su d+ha ra la// zhus te
gtan la legs par phab// su la ma byin bla ma'i bka'// yang dben logs la sbas pa yin// las 'phro can dang 'phrad nas kyang// dam la gnas pas spyod par shog///

rgya gar skad du/ shrI A yuHpa ti kA la ru dra tan+t+rA b+h+ya ba kr-i ta tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal tshe bdag nag po drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal tshe bdag nag po phrin

las thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i snying po can/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin
de/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong/ sems nyid kyi gnas/ rang byung ma bsgribs par gsal ba'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'khor dus gsum gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ sa
la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ nyid kyi ngo bo las sprul pa'i lam la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin rnams dang/ sku'i tshogs dang/ nye bar gnas pa'i 'khor gshin rje'i gshed kyi dge 'dun du ma
dang/ khrag skyugs pa ma mo'i tshogs dang/ khams gsum pa lha'i tshogs dang/ 'thom pa bdud kyi tshogs dang/ phung byed mngag pa'i tshogs dang/ ma skyes lam la lta ba'i tshogs dang/ 'byed pa mi mnga'
ba'i thugs rje chen pos thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dun par gyur nas gsol ba btab bo// lhun grub gdal ba'i pho brang nas// bde chen mnyam pa'i
ngang nyid las// rdo rje 'chang ba rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor rnams yongs su 'dun par gzigs nas/ chos nyid mi g.yo
ba las bzhengs nas/ dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur ro// chem chem rab tu chem mo// 'khor thams cad rab tu brgyal
bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la gzigs nas/ nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di bstan to// e ma chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// rgyu rkyen med pa'i rang byung sems// thams
cad 'byung ba'i snying po las// thams cad thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrol// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor de rnams rang gi rang bzhin mthong nas/ sems yongs su grol bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

'chang chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma rdo rje snying po khyod// snang stong gnyis med ye shes skus// sna tshogs sbyor ba rdzogs pa'i bdag/ yin par bdag cag yongs mi rtog/ rgyu rkyen med par 'byung mi
'tshal// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje brdar gsor bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te// 'khor thams cad skrag nas rang rang gi srog gi snying po mdongs gsol du phul

lo// bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje des/ srog gi snying po thams cad skye ba med pa'i dbyings nam mkha' drag po'i 'khor du bsdus te gcig tu dril lo/ las thams cad sgra'i dang po'i dang po la bsdus te
gcig tu dril lo// de nas nyid kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos pa'i 'khor bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu des/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'di btab bo// kun gyi rang bzhin nyid las

byung// sems nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod// mi rtog rang bzhin ting 'dzin las// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde
bar mnyam pa'i ngang las bzhengs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskul bar dgongs nas/ phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin chos sku mnyam nyid

las// lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang brtag/ ye shes chen po'i gzhal yas khang// kun 'byung mi g.yo brtan par gnas// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rin po che// rta babs twa ra rgyan rnams ldan// klu brgyad lha brgyad tshangs
pa'i zhing// rus sbal glang chen stag gzig 'brug/ zhing dang zhing chung thod pa sbrul// gnam lcags khro chu chu srin thog/ rgyu ma'i gling bu keng rus brgyan// e yi pho brang thod mkhar bzhi// lcags

mkhar bcu gnyis bcu drug ldan// khyams dang gru chad sgo bzhir ldan// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par gnas// de la gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i sku// rgyal chen sa yi pho brang du// klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag

stong// lto 'phye phyogs skyong bzhi dang brgyad// ma he brgyad dang nyi zla'i gdan// nag po dug chen bskyil ba'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthing nag dbus// klu

gnyan sa bdag zhing chung sbrul// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje g.yas// be con gtun shing sdigs mdzub g.yon// glang chen zhing stod stag lpags smad// dbu la rin chen gzhal yas nang// rigs bzhi klu brgyad thod

pas mdzes// bdud srin mu stegs rgyal po btsan// mgo dang tsit+ta do shal byas// rin po che dang nor bus mdzes// snyan cha mgur chu phyag zhabs sbrul// bdud mo mthing nag thod sbrul brgyan// tsit+ta b+han d+ha
'khyud dang stobs// thugs kar gsod byed smug nag gcer// rigs bzhi'i rgyan dang thod pas mdzes// 'khor lo tsit+ta g.yas g.yon gnas// zhing dang sbrul dang lhu dum 'bul// ya ma'i thugs kar badzra

ni// ljang nag rdo rje snying phreng bsnams// klu brgya'i gdan la gnyan khri gsol// rin chen dbu rgyan rigs bzhi'i mdzes// gdug pa 'joms mdzad dregs pa'i sku// dregs pa'i thugs kar rus sbal gnas// sme

ba thig le khrag dang dug/ mtshon cha'i spu la sder mo lcags// tsit+ta 'od kyi gsang mdzod na// lha srin mi yi snying po 'chang// dbu la bya khyung gdug pa 'dul// spu dang gshog pa mtshon cha me// mchu dang sder mo

gnam lcags 'bar// nyi zla khro chu'i spyan dang tshems// gdug pa za zhing zhe sdang sbrul// phrag sor khyung mo smug nag gnyis// spu dang gshog pa mtshon cha me// gdug pa za zhing de bzhin 'brul// nu mar seng ge
brjid pa gnyis// mtsho cha spu gri sder mo dbal// 'phrul gyi gshog pa khro chu'i so// dgra bgegs za zhing lhu dum 'phrul// sog par stag chen rngam pa gnyis// mche ba rtsang phur sder mo lcags// glo

snying nang rol snying khrag 'thung// sta zur zhe sdang gdug pa'i gzugs// dug sbrul me 'bar dug khrag zags// dug lnga brkam chags bsreg cing 'joms// gang dmigs rtsa khrag klad khrag 'thung// dug sbrul rlangs pa dgra la

'phro// mgur dang zhabs kyi long bu'i bar// ye shes khro bo tshon gang ba// raM yaM karma tsakra 'phro// sur+ya'i gdan la phyi nang srung// ye shes 'khor lo nyi ma'i 'od// thams cad glo snying nang rol za// phyag rgya chen po
brtan par brjid// dbus na brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// thugs kyi sprul pa mngon phyung ba// mon pa dug chen dregs pa'i lus// dbu dgu phyag dgus tsit+ta bsnams// phyag dgus bla dang don
snying khrag/ drod dang dbang po lus srog 'bral// bdud bzhi pho nya las la bskul// sha chen rak+ta keng rus 'cha'// dbugs srog bkrag mdangs tshe srog 'chang// yum dang bcas pa thod mkhar bzhir// lhun
gyis grub pa'i tshul du gnas// lcags mkhar phyogs bzhi'i gzhal yas na// srog gcod phyi yi mon pa gshed po bzhi// dug mda' lcags gzer gnag la 'tsher// khyab pa spyi bcings so bdar gnag/ pho brang

phyogs bzhir lhun gyis grub// lcags mkhar brgyad kyi khyams khang na// lus kyi sprul pa gshed po bzhi// yum dang bcas te tshogs brgyad 'joms// sgo med bcu drug lcags mkhar na// kaM ka sha za dregs pa'i

tshogs// mngag pa gzhan tshogs lhun gyis grub// dregs pa'i las dang sbyor ba'i grangs// bzhi dang bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyad// de bzhin lnga dang bcu drug brgyad// snying po don la bcu gnyis gsum// de yi
snying po mchog bsdus lnga// dbang gi brtul zhugs bgrod dang lnga// de srog dam tshig gnyis dang gsum// chos nyid mi g.yo bsam gtan lus// rdzas dang 'dod pa bskul ba'i rkyen// srog dang las dang e ka
la// bsdus nas rang dbang gtso la phul// byin rlabs ngar bcas thig ler bstim// sangs rgyas kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs pa'i tshul du lhun gyis grub// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/

khro bo gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags 'byung ba'i gleng gzhi 'di gsungs so// rtsa ba mi 'gyur byang chub sems// gcig ni kun gzhi'i rang bzhin yin// chos kyi
dbyings ni skye med pas// sangs rgyas sku gsum ye shes thugs// sems dang lus la bag chags brtas// snang dang srid pa'i chos rnams kun// byang chub sems dang dbyings su 'dus// mtshan mar
