mi gnas rang bzhin gcig/ spros med bde chen dag pa'i sku// 'gag med rang bzhin dag pa'i gsung// ma bsgrib don rnams rdzogs pa'i thugs// sems lus bag chags gsal ba dag/ bde dang sdug

bsngal gnyis kar snang// don gcig byang chub sems las byung// 'gro ba'i rgyud la bag chags las// rgyu rkyen skye med bag chags las// 'byung ba rnam shes phung por 'dzin// snang srid mi rtog rgyu rkyen
bral// bde ba skye med ngang gis stong// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu gcig tu gnas// chos sku mi gnas ye shes sku// don gcig rig pa yang dag 'brel// 'khor 'das snod bcud stong zhing dben// sems can sangs
rgyas gnyis su med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgyar gsal// dbyings las ye shes rig pa yi// rang bzhin lhun grub phyag rgyar gsal// rgyud drug gnas pa'i

'gro ba dang// mya ngan 'das pa'i sangs rgyas don// rgyu 'bras dbyer med chos skur gsal// ye shes rol pa'i phyag rgyar bstan// rang byung thugs kyi rol pa las// drag sngags ye shes rol par shar// ye shes

bde ba'i thig le las// drag sngags thugs rje sprul par shar// chos sku bde ba'i dbyings nyid las// drag sngags sprul par rang byung shar// skye med rnam dag rang bzhin las// drag sngags skye ba'i cho 'phrul

shar// sbyor ba kun 'byung rdzogs pa'i gzhi// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags 'byung ba'i gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sku skye ba med

pa'i ngang las/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul drag po mngon du byung ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po nye bar sbyor ba ni// dur khrod gnyan ri'i dben gnas su// 'brel pa gsum dang ldan pa yi// grogs dang

dpa' brtul dmod pa bca'// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// nye bar gcig tu dril bsdebs pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po ni// tshe srog bdag po ya ma dregs// srid pa'i khyams khang tsit+ta la// dngas ma bzhi

dang si ra brgyad// rtsa bran drug dang brgyad gnyis phyi// mdud pa gsum dang srog shing gsum// ldan pa'i thig le 'od kyi tshul// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dbus// pa thag tshon gang rang sgra'i 'od// kun 'dus
snying po bcu gnyis gnas// dbus kyi nam mkha' skye med las// steng 'og dngas ma bag chags tshul// brten pa'i sbubs na dgyes dang bdud// drod kyi sbubs na ma gshin 'bru// chu yi sbubs na rus sbal

dregs// rlung gi sbubs na me dang bskyed// kun gyi steng 'og rtsa dang rlung// ye shes lnga yi 'od du gnas// mdud pa bzhi yi 'brel chen la// mi 'gyur rno dbal mtshon cha'i sngags// srog la gnyis dang breng shag
gnyis// hur thum gnyis dang hri dza gnyis// srog 'phrog stobs kyis drag sngags gnas// phyi rim 'brel chen rtsa brgyad la// bshig dang byad 'grol dug mda' 'byin// zhen bzlog gsang lam zug pa
'byin// thams cad gzir zhing rang gzir nas// yang logs bcu gnyis rgya mdud la// gdug pa'i snying gzer rdzogs par gnas// si ra bcu gnyis sbubs dag la// gab pa sngags kyi phreng bas gang// de
bzhin phyi yi bcu drug la// dbang sdud sngags kyi de bzhin gang// dngas ma bzhi yi mtshams bzhi la// srog bzhi lo thog 'joms pa yi// drag sngags gnam lcags thog chen gnas// rus sbal lto ba'i gsang
mdzod la// lha srin mi yi snying po sba// 'bru re bsdus nas gong bur gnas// de las yon tan du ma 'byung// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gang brtsam 'grub// gang mos las la nye ba yi// nye bar gcig
tu dril bsdebs pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po ni// yang dag rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ste// zhing ras la sogs rgyu bzhi la// thig skor bzhi dang ldan par bskor// bar khyams sprul bcas rdzogs byas

la// dbus la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi dang// de bzhin phyogs mtshams brgyad du brtag/ srid pa'i khyams khang lto ba na// rgya gram rlung ri sbag mar gnas// dang po tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang// zur thig de

bzhin cha mnyam la// dbus su gru gsum zla kham gsum// phyi rim phyogs bzhir rgya gram rwa// dbus kyi snying po phyogs bzhi la// 'khrul mig lcags mkhar gsum gsum gnas// rgya gram mtshams bzhir khrag gi

mtsho// rlung ri rtsa ba 'khrul 'khor yin// yang logs zlum po mu khyud chu// skyom zhing g.yeng ba sdud cing 'thibs// lto sbyor las kyi 'khor lo yin// yang logs dbus mtshams phyogs brgyad du// rlung ri rdo rje rtse

mo re// snying po 'khrul mig gnyis gnyis ldan// las rnams rdzogs pa'i spu gri gnas// rlung ri gshed kyi 'khor lo yin// zur brgyad mu khyud 'khrul 'khor bcas// gsod byed drag po rngam pa yi// drag po las

kyi 'khor lo yin// byang khram snying po spu gri sngags// rtsa ba gcig tu dril ba yin// gru gsum ming rus zla kham lha// bsrung ba kun ldan rdzogs par bri// rgya gram bzhi yi 'phrul mig la// rtsa ba'i snying po

drag sngags dgod// 'khor yug rbad dang bsad pa'i sngags// gang bsgrub lto sbyor gnas mthun dgod// phyi rim rdo rje rtse brgyad la// ming gi 'bru gsum dang por bri// gsod cing gnon dang 'phen pa yi// spu gri

so gsum rdzogs par dgod// mtsho gling bar khyams rwa dbus la// sdang dang gnod pa de bzhin bri// ming gi 'bru gnyis srog dang sbyar// gang 'dod mtshams su de bzhin blang// b+hu ra nA ga gdug pa'i ha la'i

mtshon// b+hi la khong 'dus khong dregs can// 'bar ba kA li ya ma'i klong// kyo bA kAM b+ha gur b+ha sha/ yaM raM e du tsa ma d+hi// mA ra ya ni sbyor ba'i mchog/ lto sbyor bcas la thod par gzhug/ zhag bdun sngags sbyor

sgrol ba dril// rus sbal pho mo'i 'khrul 'khor bca'// thod pa rgya gram rus sbal ltor// sbyor ba kun ldan klu la gtad// sngags kyi rtsa ba dril la brdeg/ zhag gsum nyin gcig nyin zhag gnyis// gsad dang

gnan pa zor gyi dus// rig pa bde bas ya ma'i klong// 'khor la rtsa ba'i sbyor ba yin// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka he dun ya hri myag thuM ril shag ya// dgra bo'i srog mA ra ya myog rbad/ srog s+t+wam b+ha
ya nan/ srog la thun b+h+yo// gsod pa drag po'i rtsa ba las// phrin las sbyor ba'i rgyal po yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po mngon du phyung ba

las// gsang chen sngags kyi dmod par dril// yang gsang chen po'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod ras sam shing ras la// mu khyud bdun dang ldan par bskor// de la bri zhing dgod pa ni// dbus su gru gsum drag po

las// brnag pa pho mo'i ming rus bri// zla kham bsrung ba de bzhin bri// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// 'dren pa'i stobs kyis 'bru bzhi dgod// mtshon cha'i rgyal po bcu gnyis la// khro bo stobs kyi 'bru

gcig dang// tshe srog sdud pa'i snying po gcig/ khong khrag 'brel ba'i 'bru lnga la// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri bcu// dgod pa'i gnas mthun lho sbyor dgod// phyi rim mu khyud bzhi po la// rigs bzhi sbrul gyi

ra bas bsdam// lnga pa thod pa'i phreng bar gnas// drug pa sreg pa'i me ri 'bar// de dag tshe srog 'chang ba yi// rus sbal lto na gnas par bri// srid gsum lto na 'chang zhing gsod// tshe srog bdag po'i lto na
yang// mi 'gyur brtan par ye gnas pa'o// de bzhin las kyi 'khor lo bca'// 'khor lo lto sbyor thod par bca'// thod pa'i 'og ma me ri e// steng ma rus sbal rgya gram e// sbyor ba kun ldan gru gsum
rtsang// drag sngags dmod pa zhag bdun bzlas// bcu drug gam ni tshes gcig la// gnan sngags thod par gdug pa gnan// nya stong las kyi dmod sngags bskul// sngags kyi dmod pa 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma

he dun snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM mA ra ya rbad/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba thams cad gzir ba'i las 'di gsungs so// phrin las kun gyi rtsa ba yi// gsang chen gcig tu
dril ba 'di// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i bcud// klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa dang// ma mo rgyal po btsan the'u rang// mdze rims drag po yams kyi bdag/ snying gzer bdun gyi 'khor los gzir// sbyor ba
sna tshogs rdzas kyis byug/ srid pa rus sbal lto bar bri// mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// de bzhin 'phrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// tha mar 'phrul mig rtsa sbubs bdun// stobs can gzir ba'i 'khor lo

yin// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus dang rtsa sbubs drag po la// sa dang nA ga'i snying po sdu// gnyis pa'i 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// rtsa ba'i snying po bcu gnyis dgod// phyi yi 'khrul mig rtsa bdun
la// snying gzer bdun gyi spu gri dgod// mthing nag dar dang thod pa bca'// bsgom bskul dong gzhug rtsa bcas sngags// dmod pa'i thun dbab hom shing bsreg/ zor thun mtha' ru gnan gzir bya// rang
yang phyag rgya gsal bar bsgom// de yi gnod byed 'joms shing gzir// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka dun dza raM rag sha ru thuM/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying

gzer 'drid phyung rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la myog rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer dun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM bzlog rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sarba u nan gzer phyung
rbad/ thal 'jam gnod par thun zer brdeg/ gzir ba stobs kyi rgyal po yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa lto dkrug gis gzir ba 'di gsungs so// man ngag drag po sbyor ba 'dis// khyad

par mdze rims gso ba'o// de yi sbyong ba 'di lta ste// shog bu gru bzhi cha gnyis la// thig skor rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum snying po ming// zla gam ma mo btsan rgyal po// phyi rim 'khrul mig

bcu gnyis la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags 'bru bcu gnyis// tha ma rtsibs chen bcu drug la// lto dkrug sbyor ba'i spu gri gnas// rdzas kyis byug la thod par bca'// gru gsum rtsang bcas zhag bdun brab// gsal

gsum phyag rgya bstan pas gnan// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka dun dza raM shag ru thuM/ sarba du raM i nan 'drid phyung/ tsit+ta snying gzer thuM ril shag rbad// de yis dz+wa la 'joms pa yin// de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ba thams cad kyi mthar drag po rjes gcod kyi sbyin sreg 'di gsungs so// gdug pa gsum la sogs pa gzhom pa dang// byad dgrol bsreg dang snying gzer gdug pa'i

las// rgyud kyi snying po spogs pa med pa 'di// bkra mi shis pa'i sa la maN+Dal bya// khrag dang dug chu tsha bas chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum khru gang nag por bya// zla gam gsum gyi mtha' ma thod par

bskor// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis bya// lcags mkhar bar na rdo rje rkyang pas gtams// de yi phyi rim rtsibs chen nyi shu la// gcod pa'i mtshon cha rtse mo phyi ru bstan// de yi phyi rim thod pa'i phreng bas

bskor// tha ma me ri raM dang ldan par bya// de bzhin zhing ras rgyu la gcod pa'i 'khor lo bri// gru gsum kha khyer mdzub gang mtshon chas bskor// dbus su gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs gzhag/ gang
gnod ming dang snying po sa chu sbyar// zla kham gsum la gnod pa'i ming dang gzugs// 'khrul mig drag po dmod pa sngags kyi lus// rtsibs la bsreg cing gzir ba'i spu gri dgod// gzugs brnyan snying gar
hom shing zur gsum gzug/ zhag lnga thun brab drag sngags gtum par bzlas// zhag gsum bsreg cing gzugs ling gtubs la bstab// sha chen rta sha spyang ki dar mi'i sha/ dug chu 'o ma sgo sna chang dang
khrag/ mchod pa phul la thun gyis brab// me dbal gsad la gnad kyi rdzas rnams bsreg/ gang dmigs bdug cing phying pa gtsang mas dgag/ nyin dang mtshan mo lan grangs bdun du
bdug/ bum pas bkrus la lha yi sku ru bskyed// drag sngags gsal la mis ma thos par bzlas// brnag pa thon nas nam mkha'i 'khor lo dang// thal ba ming gzugs mchod rten gnod sar gnan// lhag ma

rjes shul gar gnod zor du brdeg/ gsang sngags sbyor ba drag po 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka dun dza raM raka sha ru thuM/ sa nA ga du raM u nan gzer phyung raM tsit+ta sbur na raM/ srog la myog shaM rbad raM// de dag sbyor

ba'i mtha' sdud yin// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ thun mong gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po mngon du phyung ba'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba 'di

gsungs so// phrin las drag po'i rtsa ba 'di// rtsa ba rnam pa gnyis su gnas// phan gnod las kyi rim pa bzhi ru bkod// gsad pa mchog dang lo thog gzhom pa gnyis// snying gzer dgu dang nyi shu rdzogs pa

yi// gsang ba mchog gi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// zhi khro gshin rje phur pa ma mo dang// bdud dang mu stegs the brang rgyal po btsan// gnod sbyin srin po lha min dud 'gro sri// klu gnyan sa bdag dkor srung grul bum
ging// las dang srog gi snying po bcud du bsdus nas dril// shes rab rtsal dang brtul zhugs ldan pas spyad// blo chung rtog pas rang yang 'ching bar 'gyur// nyams dga' rang sems dben pa'i dur khrod
du// dpa' brtul drag po sngags kyi dmod pa bor// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa 'di lta ste// shog bu gru bzhi mtho gang la// thig skor rim pa bzhi dang ldan par bskor// dbus su gru gsum bla sems ming dang

rus// phyi rim gcod pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// de la rtsa ba'i snying po me rlung skyin thang gnas// de yi phyi rim mu khyud zlum po la// bsgrub pa gzhan gyis rbad dang gsad pa'i sngags// yang logs mkhar

gyi 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// ral gri rdo rje rgya gram bsnol mar gnas// ral gri bsad pa'i spu gri rgya gram gnon pas mdzes// de gnyis rus sbal khra mo'i lto bar bri// kha sbyor bcas la dug dang khrag gis

byug/ mtshon cha'i mtshams dang zla gam gru gsum la// brnag pa'i ming rus mA ra ya rbad bri// sngo dmar dang bcas thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ pho thod nang du mA ra ya rbad bri// thod pa 'og mar brnag pa'i ming rus
bri// rtsang bcas gru gsum kha khyer sum brtsegs gzhug/ tshe bdag bsgom la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// zhag bdun drag sngags dmod pa rngam tshig ldan pas bzlas// bar bar bskul gyin brnag pa'i yul la
rbad// gzir zhing btab la thod pa bca'// klu gzir gdug pa'i gnyan la gtad par bya// drag sngags dmod pa rtsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di// lha srin kun gyi mthu dril drag po yin// drag po sngags kyi

dmod pa 'di lta ste// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la myog mA ra ya rbad/ srog s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ srog la thun b+h+yo/ 'di dag mi 'gyur bsad pa'i sbyor ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan

'das kyis lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru bzhi la// dbus su rus sbal khong stong dbyibs dang zlum por bri// yan lag lnga dang mjug ma lto ba na// gcod pa drag

po'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// 'byung bar bris la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// srog bzhi gnad kyi 'bru dang chu dril dbab pa dgod// sbal pa'i lto ba'i dbus su

yul gyi ming dang ser ba phob ces bri// de yi 'og tu yul lha ser srung gzir phob ya nan bri// byang khog stod na gza' yi gzir sngags bri// mjug mar yul lha de bzhin gzir sngags bri// lto ba g.yas su ma

mo'i gzir sngags bri// lto ba g.yon du sa bdag klu gnyan gyi// rang gnad gzir la dbab pa'i drag sngags bri// mtshon cha dug dang khrag gis ngar blud la// sbal pa pho mo lto sbyar thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dgun

zla gsum gyi nya stong nyin zhag phrugs re bzlas// dpyid zla gsum la zhag gsum chu dril bzlas// dbyar zla gsum la rten gzhi'i sbyor ba bca'// thod pa dong bur khrag dang dug blugs la// nya dang stong dang nyin

zhag lnga ru bzlas// tha chung stong la rten gzhir gzhug/ skya rid sbom mthon rgya mdud kha 'dren tshul// gzir thab du ba drag po gzir dang bzhi// tshil gsum brun dang mnol khrag du ba'i rdzas// dug chu sngo sna 'o ma

drag po thob// nag gsum khrag dang nyung dkar thabs kyi rdzas// lcags dang seng ldeng phur pa gzir ba'i rdzas// drag sngags lus la dbab gzir bzhi// gza' dang ma mo yul gyi lha btsan dang// klu gnyan sa

bdag gzir la dbab pa'o// ma phebs drag po'i sbyor ba stobs zhan na// rgya tshil mnol khrag khyi khrag ri bong khrag/ dug rgod dril lcags gdab pa'i phur pa la// dang po sngags bzlog drag tu spog pa bya// des

ma phebs na drag sngags 'byung ba dkrug/ rdzas kun bsreg la du bas lha 'dre dkrug/ rgya mdud dbus kyi rta las chu mig dkrug/ gri mo yug mo mnol mo'i don mngal khrag/ tsha yi rgyal po sbal pa'i gzugs la
brdeg/ drag sngags spyi dril sgo bzhi so sor brdeg/ spogs pa'i rgyal po gsang ba dam pa yin// las kyi rgyal po spogs pa mchog tu gsungs// de yis ma phebs sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// rtse gsum chu gsum
mtshal gsum tsha ba gsum// mche ba can dang 'dab chags ltos 'gro gsum// rta gsum gzer gsum sngags gsum sdebs la dbab// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma he dun

snying khrag ra ma tsa ya// ma hA de wa ma ma rak+sha sa nA ga phroM phroM hril shar phob/ ma ma trag rak+sha kha mu tra gzir nan hur kham phroM shar shar phab hril phrom/ ma hA ya ma rA hu la srog la gzir nan phroM shar hril phob/ de wa

yu nan gzir ya phroM shar hril phob/ sa nA ga srog la hur thuM gzir nan phroM shar hril phob/ ya tsa ma ra khrag snying du na he ma ya ka ye/ phob shar hril phroM phroM gnas sha rag ma ma de ba ha ma ma sa ra bra phob/ e ka ya ma

rA hu la ma hA nan srog la gzir hril phob shar phroM/ pra ma sa ra na sa nA ga gzir thuM nan/ phroM hur shar srog hril shar phob/ ya tsa he dun trag sha rag mo tra mu kha ma hur nan kham shar phroM gzir hril phob/ khrag ra

snying ma yu gzir ya de nan shar ba hril shar phob/ e ka he dun pra ma sar ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ phroM ya de ba ma ra ga sa nA ga rA hu la/ sarba u nan yaM yaM phroM phroM shar shar hril nan gzir phob b+h+yo/ gzir zhing
mthu dbang stobs bsdus la// rnam grangs lnga dang ldan pa'i las// 'di dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// lo thog 'joms la shis pa yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod byed thams cad gzhom pa'i las

snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// mdze rims drag po'i gdug pa dang// ma mo rgyal po mdze 'dre can// snying gzer drag po'i stobs kyis gzir// 'khor lo drag po bca' ba ni// rten pa

shog bu gru bzhi la// cha gnyis dur khrod sme bas byug/ rus sbal lto bar thig skor bzhi// bskor la dbus su gru gsum la// zla kham sbrul gyi ra bas bsdams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi// thod mkhar rdo rje

ra ba me// phyi rim gnam lcags 'khrul mig brgyad// rlung ri rgya gram dbus na bri// yang logs rtsa sbubs nyi shu gcig/ gdug pa sreg byed ye shes me// 'od kyi gong bu gnas la 'pho// de la gnas shing dgod

pa ni// gru gsum dbus na sa nA ga/ gang gnod ming dang bcas pa bri// zla kham gsum la sdang ba'i ming// lcags mkhar brgyad dang thod mkhar bzhi// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// rtsa sbubs nyi shu rtsa
gcig la// snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig dgod// drag sngags 'khrul 'khor me dbal mtshon// 'khor lo mtshon chen me dbal sngags// drag mo sngags rgod gdug pa'i mtshon// thod chen dril phreng drag po'i

stobs// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho las// mtshon cha kha sbyor dug chu ngar// sngon dmar bcas dang phag mo'i ltor// dug khrag bskus la thod par gzhug/ mi rkang lcags khri kha la brdeg/ gsal gsum dang
ldan sum stong bskul// nya stong mar gyi ngo la sbyar// tha chung bzhi la rab tu brdeg/ zhag gsum shin tu brtson par bca'// de nyid dong bur thod pa mnan// mi ldog gyad dang dregs pa

bsgom// thod mkhar steng du gdug pa'i rtsang// nyi shu gcig dbus mchog phur btab// gang gnod gzugs brnyan snying gar brdeg/ rgyun du drag sngags brgya brgyas bsrung// a shA bi lI'i sbyor tshul can// snying

po ngang dang shugs kyis grangs// dug lnga brkam chags rtsa ba gcod// ha la nag po zhen chags 'brel// sngags kyi rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// drag la 'dril zhing sgra spangs pa// sgra ni gtum zhing lce bar

gnas// drag po gtum chen dregs pa yi// drag sngags mtshon cha 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka dun dza raM rag sha ru thuM/ sa nA ga snying gzer dza/ sa nA ga snying gzer dug phyung rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta rbad/ sa

nA ga snying gzer thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer dun raM rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM raM thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer raM thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta myog rbad/ sa nA ga

snying gzer thun ril/ sa nA ga snying gzer rtsal rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer nan 'drid rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer breng shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta khas rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer khrag thibs rbad/ sa nA ga

snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer hi nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer u nan rbad// sa nA ga snying gzer e nan rbad// sa nA ga snying gzer srog la dun dun rbad// sa nA ga snying gzer srog la dun dun
shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta tsit+ta ru thuM shag rbad// rigs bzhi rgyud la zhen pa dang// ba so kha 'khor gdug pa kun// brkam chags las kyi du gzhugs na// drag po sngags kyis 'joms shing
'byin// gdug pa la sogs 'joms par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snying gzer dgu pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// snying po rtsa ba'i man ngag bcud// gsang chen rtsa ba dril ba'i las// drag
po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i bcud// snying gzer gdug pas thams cad 'joms// shi phrad sngags kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag skyob gzhan bsrung gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud mo rgyal po btsan// klu gnyan sa

bdag the'u rang gri// ma lus 'joms byed rgod kyi sngags// b+hi la'i khong 'dus khong dregs can// b+har b+ha nag po ya ma'i klong// khyad par sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod ro ras zhing ras la// mu khyud lnga ldan
rus sbal ltor// dug khrag sna tshogs sbyar te bri// gru gsum 'khrul mig thod mkhar bzhir// de 'og lcags mkhar bang rim brgyad// yang logs gnas pa'i rtsa sbubs dgu// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug
'bos// drag po sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus su gdug pa'i snying po med// zla kham ma mo rgyal po btsan// the brang gshin rngog snying po ming// thod mkhar
'dren pa'i stobs kyis 'bru// phyi rim lcags mkhar dregs pa brgyad// yang logs rtsa sbubs snying gzer dgu// phyi rim mtshon cha kun 'joms dgod/ kha sbyar sbyor ba kun ldan dang// gsal gsum zhag bdun

brab cing gzir// bzlog cing 'byin pa shugs kyi mchog/ gcod cing 'byin pa spu gri mtshon// bsreg cing g.yeng bas me chu rlung// sdud cing 'chang bas sa yi mkhar// gzir zhing mnan pas thog chen sa// rtsa
bar bcas pa mtshon la me// rtsa ba gcig la yal ga stong// 'bar ba nag po zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po dug ngar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi dum bur bsdus// bdud nag rag shA ya ma'i klong// e kA pho
brang thod pa'i gnas// 'khrul 'khor dang bcas re bas gril// hom khung bsdus la stong stong bzlas// gsal ba khyab par stobs kyi lha// rdzas dang lta ba sbyor ba'i sdebs// 'dun pa mchog ldan yin pa

brtag/ dbang bcas bgrod pa go mtshon mchog/ rigs la rgyun du stong stong gzug/ nya stong sbyor ba drag po brtsam// thun mong bsrung ba sbyor ba brgya// mngon zhugs sbyor ba drag po nyid// gsad pa'i sbyor ba spu
gri dang// drag po rtsa ba bcu gnyis bsdeb// dmigs pa'i ming rus khams sbyar la// gang gnod zhen pa stabs la gtad// mkha' 'gro'i gzas kha dgra la 'pho// drag po thog zer sbyar ba'i mchog/ gser gyi

dgu thog gnam lcags thog/ ri rgyal sbal chen spu gri me// drag sngags sbyor ba gnyis su bstan// e ka he dun ya ma rak+sha ka dun dza raM/ sa nA ga ma trag snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga tsa tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga du

ma snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga k+She tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga kham shag snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga srog tig snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga thuM ril snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga

snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sarba u nan kham shag gzer thum ma tsit+ta breng shag snying gzer sbur nAn/ e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la snying gzer rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la u nan/ khaM

shag gzer thun tsit+ta breng shag snying gzer sbur nan/ dgra bo'i srog la thun mugs thibs b+h+yo/ snying gzer dgu pa'i mtshon cha yis// dmigs pa gang yin mi 'chor gcod// brda dang snying po 'pho zhing sbyor// shi

phrad drag pos gzir zhing gnan// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs ci rigs sbyar// drag po me dbal gcod pa'i mtshon// brnag pa'i tsit+ta'am shi ral// rang gcod sbyor ba'i rgyal po 'dis// don gnyis mngon du byed pa
yin// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ khyad par sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po gsang ba'i

sbyor ba las// rtsa ba gnyis su shes par bya// gsad pa dang ni srung ba 'o// gsang ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis// bsam gtan rang rgyud lto sbyor gnyis// de bzhin gso ba bzhi gnyis ldan// bshig dang byad

dgrol zug pa dbyung// zhen pa bzlog dang gsang lam dgag/ dug mda' khong nas dbyung ba'o// gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// tsit+ta 'od kyi pho brang nas// dngas ma bzhi dang se ra brgyad// mdud pa bzhi

brgyad sul bzhir gnas// tsit+ta phyi nang nang khrol dang// phyi yi lhu tshigs sgo dgu rus// dbang po sngags kyi spyod yul brtag/ dngas ma bzhi yi sbubs dag la// 'byung bas bskyed pa'i yi ge gnas// mdud pa

bzhi yi 'brel chen la// gcod pa spu gri rno dbal gnas// si ra phra mo brgyad sbubs na// khyad par sbyor ba'i sngags brgyad gnas// mdud pa brgyad dang bcu gnyis na// khrag dang bag chags yi ge gnas// nang
khrol lnga dang sgo dgu na// zor thun skyong ba'i spu gri gnas// rtsa bzhi dngas ma'i mtshams bzhi na// srog bzhi lo thog 'joms pa gnas// bskul gyin gcod pa rang gcod de// mi 'gyur ba yi sbyor ba

yin// dbugs kyi rtas bskyod yul la 'phang// bsrung ba la sogs kun grangs na// tsit+ta'i gnas na dngas snyigs 'don// dbang po srog gi thig ler gnas// rten la thod par snying po bsdu// drag sngags sbyor

ba 'di lta ste// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la nr-i dza hur thums shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya khaM shag dza thuM rbad/ dgra bo'i srog raM yaM hur stam b+ha ya nan/ las 'di mi 'gyur
bstan pas na// bsam gtan ye shes 'od 'phrog pas// dman pa gdug pa'i rgyud bskul nas// dman pa'i yi ge rtsa srog gcod// dngas ma sdud nas dbang po 'pho// mnan pa nam mkha'i khams dang sbyar// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po stobs kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// sngags dang 'khor lo man ngag sdebs pa'i las// dur khrod rgyu la sme bas thang ba bya// dbus nas grangs la thig skor lnga ru bskor// phyog
bzhi tshangs pa'i thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// dbus su gru gsum 'khrul mig bzhi dang mtshams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi dang mtshams// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi gnyis ldan// lcags mkhar bar

khyams gshed bzhi'i khang pa yin// de yi phyi rim mu khyud zlum po la// stobs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba 'joms pa'i gnas// yang logs chu yi khang pa mu khyudazlum po la// khyams khang gnas su bsgrub pa'i snying po
rdzogs// tha ma'i 'khrul mig drag po bcu gnyis la// mtshon cha'i rgyal po rlung ri skyin thang gnas// myos pa stobs 'brel rno dbal kha sbyor yin// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus

dang mtshams kyi gsang mdzod gru gsum lngar// bla sems chags pa'i snying po ming rus bri// lcags mkhar bzhi la 'dren pa'i 'bru bzhi dgod// de yi phyi rim lcags mkhar brgyad po la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags 'bru

brgyad gnas pa dgod// de yi phyi rim mu khyud zlum po la// thams cad gzir dang bshig pa'i spu gri dgos// yang logs khang pa mu khyud zlum po la// gang bsgrub bsnyen rbad bsad pa'i sngags rnams dgod// tha

ma drag po 'khrul mig nyi shu la// dgug dang thun brdeg gsad dang mnan pa'o// drag po skabs dang sbyar ba'i spu gri drag po dgod// zhing bcu ma lus gtan nas bsreg cing 'pho// 'khrul mig nyi shu rtsa gnyis

mthar// drag po khyams khang mchog gi gnas// de yis thams cad 'joms shing 'pho// 'khor lo lto sdebs me dang rlung// spu gri mtshon chen gcod dang 'bigs// srung dang skyob pa kun byed pa'o// ngar skyob ldan

pa'i 'khor lo la// dug khrag ngar blud kha sbyor bca'// ga'u dang bcas drag po'i gnas// 'khrul 'khor drag po gsang ba'i stobs// stobs chen tshe bdag tsit+ta la// snying po dngas ma sgra ru gnas// rtsa ba'i drag
sngags skabs dang sbyar// phyi rim gang bsgrub bsnyen dang rbad// gsad pa la sogs skabs kyis sbyar// 'od kyi gong bur gsal bar bsgom// man ngag gsang ba thugs kyi bsdeb// zhal gyi dmod pa bzlas pa'i

tshul// e nas drangs la spu grir bsgyur// gang bsgrub bsnyen pa sbyar la dgug/ spyan drang la sogs gzhung dang sbyar// rbad pa de bzhin steng du bsdeb// de bzhin drag po thugs ka la// spu gri dang bcas snga ma
bzhin// 'dod pa'i ming bcas mtshams su bsdeb// rno dbal spu gri kha sbyor yin// dmod pa ngag gi sngags rnams bsdeb// mnan pa la sogs gnyan sa ru// las tshul gzhan dang 'dra bar brtag/ sngags

rnams gang 'dod skabs dang sbyar// man ngag lto bsdeb drag po yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrung ba thams cad kyi mchog tu bshig pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i

mchog/ gsang chen rtsa bar dril ba'i las// dmod pa'i mtshon cha 'di lta ste// dur khrod shing ras shog bu la// mu khyud rim pa bzhi dang ldan// rlung ri las kyi 'khrul mig la// dbus su lcags mkhar 'khrul
mig bzhi// mtshams bzhir rdo rje'i ka bar ldan// phyi rim lcags mkhar 'khrul mig brgyad// zhing gi ka bas mtshams brgyad 'degs// yang logs mtshon cha rtsibs bcu gnyis// las kyi me ri 'bar ba'i
tshul// mtshon cha khang pa de dag la// gnas shing dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus nas brnag pa'i snying po ming// zla gam de bzhin rdzogs par bri// lcags mkhar bzhi yi khang pa ru// srog dang las

sdud dgyes dang bdud// 'bru bzhi'i sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ khong 'khyud lcags mkhar brgyad po la// gshin rje ma mo'i snying po gnyis// mkha' lding dregs pa'i snying po gnyis// sreg byed ma dang sdud byed

gnyis// rus sbal ya ma'i snying po gnyis// lcags mkhar bang rim re la dgod// mtshon cha'i khang pa bcu gnyis la// dug lnga'i sbyor ba bshig pa yi// drag po spu gri mtshon cha dgod// me la snying po spor ba
dgod// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha me dbal sngags// sbyor ba'i rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// me rlung las kyi mtshon cha dgod// rdzas rnams bskus la kha sbyar dril// dur mar bcug la re bas gril// rtsang bcas

gru gsum skyer pa'i stan// zhing lpags steng nas drag pos gdab// lha bsgom sngags bzlas thun brab brdeg/ drag tu bskul gyin yul la rbad// bdun nam lnga ru nya stong tsam// sbyor ba thon nas 'khrul 'khor
dril// tshes gcig dag dang bcu drug la// spogs pa med pa gnan par bya// zhi khro phur pa gshin rje rnams// 'khor lo rus sbal thod chen gzhug/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'og tu gnan// mkha' lding dregs pa
klu rgyal rnams// 'khor lo tshe bdag lto bar gzhug/ 'brong chen thod par ro khung gnan// ma mo bdud mo srin mo rnams// 'khrul 'khor nyan thos thod par gzhug/ bka' rten byin chen 'og tu mnan// bdud

dang mu stegs mgon po rnams// 'khrul 'khor g.yag ru g.yas par gzhug/ ro khang sgo srung 'og tu gnan// rgyal po dge bsnyen dkor srung rnams// 'khrul 'khor spyang ki'i thod par gzhug/ khyi tshang lam gyi
bzhi mdor gnan// btsan dang srog bdag gri bo rnams// sha ru spyang thod gong gsum mnan// klu bdud dam bdud phug bdag rnams// bon po'i thod par lha khang gnan// the'u rang chags 'gong gshin 'gong
gnan// glang rur bcug la lam mdor gnan// sa bdag klu gnyan mdze 'dre rnams// 'khor lo phag mo'i thod par gzhug/ phag thod bka' rten 'og tu gnan// bon po rigs gnyis 'dzin pa rnams// khyi thod

bcug la khyi tshang gnan// sri gnon chung thod them 'og gnan// ting 'dzin sbyor ba bdag dbang bsdu// sa yi sbyor ba gnan pa'o// drag sngags me rlung mtshon cha'o// sarba sha truM hur thuM yaM shag nan gzir rbad
b+h+yo// bar snang nam mkha' mchod rten rten// 'khrul 'khor me rlung kun 'joms yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byad dgrol ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po rnal ma btsan thabs dgrol ba'i
las// drag po byad dgrol las kyi rim pa 'di// drag po hom gyi 'khor lo maN+Dal sa la bya// 'byung ba rten gyi 'khor lo bar snang rten la bca'// gcod pa sngags kyi 'khor lo zhing ras rgyu la

bca'// maN+Dal gru bzhi khrag gis 'thas par byug/ dbus su gru gsum khru gang 'dom re la// kha khyer gsum la rtsang bcas zla kham thod pas bskor// de yi phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// tha ma thod phreng
me ris de bzhin bskor// dbus kyi gru gsum gzugs brnyan snying po raM// kha khyer gsum la gzugs dang me ri rtsang// gang gnod grogs dang bcas pa rdzogs par bri// 'khor lo drag sngags bris la

dgod// gru chad bzhi la drag po'i rdzas rnams dgod// hom shing btsug la mthing nag dar gyis dgab// drag po byad dgrol ba yi 'khor lo yin// 'byung ba stobs kyi 'khor lo bca' ba ni// rgya shog rgyu la sme
ba'i rdzas rnams bsku// thig skor gsum ldan mu khyud zlum por bya// dbus su rgya gram 'khrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// yang logs brgyad gnyis rtsibs dang ldan// tha ma gru gsum dbyibs la gdug pa'i ra bas

bsdam// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// rgya gram dbus su gnod byed ming gzugs raM// rgya gram ra bzhir yaM dang de bzhin ming// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba drag po'i sngags// bcu drug rtsibs la

byad 'grol spu gri mtshon// thig gnyis bar du me rlung a mu ka/ kha sbyor bcas la bar snang mkha' la brdeg/ lnga ru gzir la me sbal thun gyis gzir// myos pas bran la rdzas bsreg dmigs pa bsgyur// gtsang
mas bkab la sngags kyi thun gyis gzir// drag po khyad par byad dgrol gsang ba'o// rnal ma bkrol na du ba phyid pa sngags kyis brab// thun brab bskus la cha lugs rgyan cig gsal// btsan thabs drag po e

yi ga'u ru// drag po'i rdzas bsreg brab cing bdugs la bsku// phyag rgya brtan par bskyed la kun 'joms drag po brdeg/ las kyi rgyal po byad 'grol sngags kyi rgya// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma

ka dun dza raM sad kar ya/ sarba u nan gzer phyung du raM tri tsa sbur nan srog la hur yaM shag/ ya ma ta ra tsa sa nA ga k+Shi tri sarba du raM yaM thuM shag phyung/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zug pa dbyung ba'i sbyor ba
'di gsungs so// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo drag po bri// thig skor rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gnod byed ming dang gzugs// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis drag po rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs chen bcu gsum
spu gri drag po dgod// ngar blud kha sbyor thod pa dong du bca'// drag sngags brdeg pa'i dus su gsal ba gsum// gang dmigs lus dang gnas khang bskor la brab// thod khrag thun thim gar dmigs zor du

'phang// mtha' ru 'khor lo sgrub khang steng du bca'// tha chung mar ngor drag po las de brtsam// rtsa ba'i sngags dang gang 'dod spu grir sbyor// sngags kyi rgyal po gsad pa 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka

dun dza raM sad ka ra ya/ sarba du raM dri yaM 'drid phyung srog la gzir nan phyung// zug pa ma lus 'byin pa'i sbyor ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhen pa bzlog pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod

rgyu la 'khrul 'khor bca'// thig skor gsum ldan dbus gru gsum// dbus su drag sngags gsang mdzod ming// phyi rim rtsibs bcu spu gri sba// phyi rim 'khor yug b+h+yo dang ming// kha sbyor thod chen ngar ldan
bzlas// khrag dang dug thun gang dmigs bzlog/ 'khor lo thun brdeg lam du gzhug/ dbang po dril zhing sngags chus bsku// brgya yis rdzogs nas 'khor lo glang rur gzhug/ zur thun mtha' ru bka' rten

'og tu gnan// drag po sngags kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// e ka ya na dun dza raM sad ka ra ya/ sarba sha truM e nan yaM 'drid b+h+yo// me rlung stobs kyi 'khor los bzlog pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang

lam dgag pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// drag po las kyi sbyor ba 'di// 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su pho brang zlum po snying po 'bru drug dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i drag sngags
dgod// yang logs bcu gnyis rtsibs la gsang lam drag sngags dgod// rtsibs chen gang gnod ming dang sbyar// 'khor lo dril la 'brang chen rwa ru gzhug/ khri brgyad bzlas la lam srang them 'og

gnan// rgyun du brgya brgya dus drug nar mar spyad// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma ka dun dza raM sad ka ra ya/ man tra du ma ma hA ra ga du raM thuM li rbad// drag po gsang lam dgag pa yin// de nas
yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi dug mda' khong nas dbyung ba 'di gsungs so// bkra mi shis pa'i thod pa dur ma la// spyi bo nas brtsams mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum gnod byed khrag

gis bris// de yi phyi rim 'khor yug gang gnod sngags// yang logs gdug pa sbrul gyis bskor// tha ma me ri nang du bstan pa bri// thod pa gling bzhi pa la mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su dregs pa lnga yi snying

po bri// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// yang logs rtsibs brgyad rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// mtha' rtsibs bcu drug mda' yi spu gris mdzes// thod pa kha sbyar dug sna khrag snas dgang// drag
sngags khri bdun drag po thun gyis bskul// phur pa gnyis kyis gzugs la gzer du dbab// sngags ni drag la bar ma chad par bzlas// thod pa'i 'khor lo dug shing me la bdug/ mtha' ru mon thod ka li
rak+tas dgang// gri khrag dug chu nam gyi gung la 'phang// steng 'og sbyor ba dkyil 'khor 'og tu gnan// gdug pa thams cad khang nas 'byin pa'i sngags// e ka ya ma ka dun dza raM sad ka ra

ya// man+t+ra g+hu h+ya sarba duM nan 'drid phyung// drag po thod pa mngon phyung 'dis// srung ba kun gyi rgyal por bsngags pa yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ba thams cad bstan pa 'di gsungs so// drag

po srung ba'i mtha' sdud du// thams cad gzir zhing srung ba yi// drag po las kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// dur khrod rgyu dang sbyor ba dben// mar gyi ngo la bri ba bca'// rang yang dregs pa'i sku ru gsal// gzhan
tshogs dbang sdud las la mngag/ 'khrul 'khor bang mig nyi shu brgyad// gsang mdzod mun khang dbus dang lnga// mu khyud 'khor yug bzhi dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum lcags mkhar bzhi// yang logs bzhi

gnyis bcu drug mtha'// srid gsum 'chang ba'i lto bar bca'// lcags mkhar rlung ri chun 'khor bcas// gsang mdzod mun khang me rlung 'obs// mtshon cha spu gri thog chen gzer// skyi 'dang las kyis sdud cing

myos// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus kyi lcags mkhar gling bzhi la// 'dren pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// phyi rim mtsho gling lcags mkhar brgyad// drag po rtsa ba'i 'bru brgyad dgod// lcags mkhar bcu
drug dregs pa'i gnas// mtshon cha'i rgyal po spu gri dgod// thams cad bsreg cing stobs kyis gnan// drag tu sbyor bas gdug rtsub 'byin// srog dbugs sdud cing drag por gnon// rang dam srog nas gang
dmigs 'dren// nus pa 'brel zhing sbyor ba gcod// der bzhag stobs dang spu gri'i gnas// mtshon cha'i nus pa stobs dpag med// gsang mdzod lnga la dmigs pa'i ming// bsdus la kha sbyar bzhi yis

brdeg/ dben gnas gsum du gzir zhing bskul// drag po gnam sa bar snang sbyar// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma he rag sha dun sad ka ra ya/ sarba i nan 'drid phyung tsit+ta khaM shag srog gzir
sbur nan rbad ya// drag po bsrung ba kun gyi mchog/ sbyor ba thams cad 'dril zhing 'grub// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las thams cad kyi mthar rjes gcod kyi sbyin bsreg 'di gsungs so// drag po'i
sbyor ba sreg pa'i las// gang gnod sa la maN+Dal khrag gis byug/ dbus su gru gsum kha khyer gsum dang ldan// phyi nang chag gang mdzub gang de bzhin 'phags// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsibs chen nyi shu

gnyis// mu khyud zlum por b+han+d+ha lnga gnyis gcig/ tha ma me ri raM dang bcas pa'o// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gang dmigs gzugs la khru gang hom shing gzug/ kha khyer zla gam gzugs

brnyan me ri rtsang// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis drag po rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs mtshon cha spu gri sreg pa'i sngags// mu khyud b+han+d+har sbal sbrul nya yi sha/ sha chen tsha ba dug gi ri lu brgya// brun gsum

tshil gsum dug chu 'o ma khrag/ sngo sna chang dang mar nag bdug rdzas dgod// zhing ras rgyu la gong bzhin bris la bskul// bdun nam dgu ru dmod sngags bzlas shing bskul// pho nyas mtshon brdeg drag po'i
las la bstab// bskul dang drag sngags bcu yis bsreg rdzas bstab cing dbul// gang dmigs bdug la gtsang mas khrus byas dgab// thun rjes shul du brnag pa'i zor thun dbab// 'khor lo thod pa seng

ge'i khog par gnan// phyag rgya chen po lus dbang srung ba'i mchog/ drag sngags bsreg pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka he dun ya ma rak+sha sad ka ya/ sa nA ga du raM tri tsa du me u nan/ gzer phyung/ srog la hur/
tsit+ta breng shag ram/ myog thums rbad/ bag med sbyor ba kun 'joms yin// drag sngags yan lag du ma kun// sbyor ba gang brtsams gcig gis 'grub// sbyor ba bsdud la brtsam na nye// ye shes thig le 'od

dang sbyar// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las// gsang ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gsang mchog gi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// sbyor ba'i rtsa
ba rnam pa gnyis// gsad pa mchog dang gso ba'i las// gsad pa'i las ni bzhi gnyis ldan// de bzhin gso ba bzhi ru bkod// khyad par bcu gnyis sbyor ba'i mchog/ las gsang thabs gsang bgrod

pa thob// gsad pa sngon 'gro 'di lta ste// byin chen bde ba'i gnas mchog tu// gsang ba mchog gi sbyor ba brtsams// b+hi la'i khong 'dus khong dreg can// ha la nag po tsa ma rI// be ga ta yi 'jig rten na// ya

ma rak+sha bde ba'i klong// sgyu ma'i phung po gnas sbyangs la// rin po che yi rgyal sar 'don// thugs kyi snying po gnyis med 'phang// gzhan tshogs lhar bskyed tshogs la rol// bdag dbang bde ba thob cing

bgrod// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'dul khrims nyams pa'i gos blangs la// rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dug chu bsku// cha gnyis byas la thig gdab brtsams// zil gnon phyag rgyas dpang gzug brjid// drag
sngags dmod pa stong dang sbyar// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// nyi shu drug nas 'khrul 'khor bca'// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru bskor// dbus kyi pho brang bde gnas su// sku yi gzugs brnyan bris la

ming// zla gam gsum la srung ba'i lha// phyi rim bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs 'khor yug 'bod rbad gsad// bri dang phyi nang gong ma bzhin// tha ma'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gsod cing gnon pa'i
spu gri dgod// srid pa'i rus sbal lto na gnas// dug dang khrag gis ngar blud la// rje'am yul srung thod par gzhug/ rtsang bcas dong du mthing nag dgab// mi dmigs ngang las ye shes

kyi// rol pa'i phyag rgya chen por 'pho// drag tu bskul gyin shugs kyis drangs// mkha' khyab rdo rje'i sbyor ba bsdeb// dmod pa'i lus la spu gri gdags// ming rus mi sbyar khams la spyad// rgya mdud brtsegs

pa'i lto ru gnan// yang na dkyil 'khor chen po yi// 'og tu bka' yi byin bsdus la// rin po che yi lto ru gnan// bshags dang dge ba rgyun mi 'chad// mtshan bzang dus drug rgyun mi gcad// 'byung ba lnga yi
mdangs bsdus la// rin po che yi rgyal sar brtan// rgyu yi snyigs ma'i srog bsdus la// dbus kyi 'bub gnas gzugs la dbab// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi khongs su

gzhug/ dmigs pa dag pa'i tshad mas gdon// rig pa'i drag sngags 'di lta ste// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ gu ru nr-i srog la myog thum ril mA ra ya rbad/ srog s+t+waM b+ha ya gzir nan/ srog la thuM

ril thun myog b+h+yo/ bgrod pa med pa'i phyag rgyar bstan// seng ge khog bshig sbyor ba'i mchog/ gzhan yang drag po'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod gnas nas dpa' bo yi// zhing sogs ras dang rgyu blangs la// sbyor ba
gsum dang ldan par bya// de la gcod pa'i 'khor lo bri// dbus nas thig skor lnga ru bskor// dbus dang 'khrul mig lcags mkhar bzhi// mtshams bzhir zhing gi ka ba bzhi// yang logs mig brgyad mtshams

brgyad sprul// bzhi pa 'khor yug bsrung ba'i gnas// tha ma 'khrul mig nyi shu la// gcod cing gnan pa'i yi ge gnas// dbus dang zla kham bsgrub bya'i gnas// bcu gnyis 'khrul mig rtsa ba'i sngags// 'khor
yug nang du bsnyen pa'i sngags// bar du rbad sngags bsad sngags mthar// phyi ru mgo bstan brgya brgya bskul// bsnyen pa khri yis bos la gzir// sngags ni me dbal 'khor lo mtshon// 'khor lo

me dbal mtshon chen gyis// zhing bcu sdig can bsreg cing 'joms// 'khrul mig rtsa ba nyi shu gnyis// gsang mdzod mun khang gnam lcags 'bar// rus sbal lto na mtshon cha me// 'od kyi gong bus 'khrug cing

gsod// drag po sngags kyi gcod pa'o// e ka he dun ya ma tsa ya/ nr-i srog la dun rmugs sa ma myog mA ra ya rbad/ srog gzir s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ srog la baM ril thun b+h+yo/ sngags kyi 'od dang 'bar ba'i me// gdug
pa rang gshed rang la 'bebs// mtshon cha ngar blud me la bdug/ khri bzhis sbyor bas dril la 'phang// thon nas stag gi 'dzum par gnan// drag po rdo rje dme thabs yin// gzhan yang gsad pa drag po
las// shog gu gru bzhi mdzub gang la// sme ba lnga yis thang pa bya// ni rang su yis skya bcad la// thig skor mu khyud rim pa bzhi// gru gsum ming rus zla kham lha// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i
sngags// mu khyud zlum por 'bod rbad bsad// rtsibs mchan bcu gnyis gcod cing gnon// myos pa stobs dang bral ba yi// drag po stobs kyi 'khrul 'khor yin// don ldan sbyor ba sngags pa 'jams// rabs

chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ mun pa'i gling du gnan par bya// drag po mtshon cha 'di lta ste// e ka he ma ya dun tsa ya khrag ma sting ra dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ dgra bo'i srog stam b+ha ya nan/ dgra bo'i

srog la thun rbad rmug b+h+yo/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// gcod pa kaM pa spu gri'i tshul// gzir stobs ldan pas bsam dpag dka'// 'joms pa'i stag mo kha 'thab yin// gzhan yang drag po'i sbyor ba

nyid// rgya shog gru bzhi cha gnyis la// sme ba lnga dang tsha ba bsku// dbus nas mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// rus sbal khra bo'i lto ru bri// dbus su 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// ming rus rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// yang

logs bcu drug spu gri dgod// kha sbyor thod pa rtsang bcas dang// lha bsgom sngags bzlas drag tu bskul// bdun du brtsams la thod pa bca'// mu khyud 'bod rbad gnan sngags bskul// khri stong brgya bar rang

gshed dbab// mtha' ru srin mo'i sgrom du mnan// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka he ya ma dun tsa ya khrag raM snying dgra bo'i srog hur thums mA ra ya rbad/ srog s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ srog la thun rbad/ rmugs b+h+yo/

drag po seng ge'i 'chi sbyor yin// gzhan yang gsod pa drag po'i las// rigs min gzhan gyi sbyor ba gzhom// pho nya gzir zhing slar bzlog pa// drag sngags nus pas gzhan dbang sdud// mu stegs can gyi lus
srog 'bral// dred mo ral pa gsig pa yi// zhabs mas 'khor lo'i rgyu byas la// sa dkar cong zi rus pa bsku// dbus nas thig skor lnga ru bskor// dbus su ming rus zla kham lha// mu khyud gdug pa 'khrul
mig sngags// mjug nas bzlog la spu gri sbyar// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// g.yas g.yon mgo phyogs mjug ma la// 'phen pa stobs kyi sngags gzhi dgod// rang sngags ming bcas bskor ba bri// phyi rim
rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// gcod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// dag dig kla klo'ithod par gzhug/ sbyor ba kun ldan bdag dbang sdud// sngags pa stobs kyi 'og tu gnan// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta

ste// ya tsa ma ra khrag snying ma ya dun he ka e srog la dun rmug rbad b+h+yo/ srog la khaM shig b+h+yo/ srog la breng shig b+h+yo/ srog la ya shig b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la gzir kham hur thuM yaM shig mA ra ya rbad/ srog s+t+wam b+ha ya
nan/ pho nya rang gshed dbab pa yin// drag po las kyi sbyor ba yin// gzhan yang gsang ba'i rim pa ni// ni rang lpags shun khru gang la// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsum sbyor la// mdog dang ldan par
skya gcad bya// zhing gi srad bus thig gdab brtsam// dbus nas thig skor lnga ru bskor// thig mdud rgya gram 'khrul mig bzhi// phyogs bzhir 'khrul mig bcu drug gcod// mtshams bzhir gsang mdzod drag
po'i gnas// yang logs mtshon cha nyi shu gcod// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi bcu gnyis// lcags mkhar 'khrul mig brgya bcu drug/ gsang mdzod mtshams bzhi dbus
dang lnga// dbus mtshams bsgrub bya tshe srog sdud// 'khrul mig bcu drug spu gri mthun// yang logs bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// 'khrul mig bzhi bcur gab pa'i sngags// gcod cing 'joms pa'i spu gri

ldan// lnga pa mtha' yi bzhi bcu la// thun bzhi dbang sdud gsang ba'i gnas// drag sngags rgyal po skabs dang sbyar// kha sbyar sngags pa tsa lo'i mgor// rtsang bcas lha bsgom dmod pa bzlas// thon nas ru bzhi
'khyil bar gnan// drag sngags gnam lcags sbyor ba yin// de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// yang gsang 'phrul gyi snying po mchog/ bde ba gnas kyi

mchog ldan du// 'dus byas la sogs dge sogs brtsam// sngon du 'gro ba'i chos de bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bstan pa yin// snying po dang bcas gsal brtags pa// rdo rje chu bo'i bka' mi bcag/ rgyu la tsha

bas kha dog dbyung// tshangs pa'i thig gnyis rgya gram gdab// ru thig gnyis te re mig skyong// thig skor mu khyud lnga dang ldan// dbus su rtsa ba'i 'khrul mig brgyad// phyogs bzhi 'khrul mig gsum gsum

drangs// mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mun khang bzhi// gsum pa las kyi rdo rje la// rgya gram sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// bzhi pa mtshon cha bdun gnyis rtsibs// lnga pa rigs bzhi ra bas bskor// 'khor lo dam pa kun

dril ba'o// de la dgod pa'i 'bru rnams ni// dbus su gu ru phyag rgya'i sku// brjid pa'i tshul gyis skyil krung bzhugs// gzhan yang spyi gtsug gcer bu ring// zla gam ming rus gsang mdzod bzhi// bla sems

'chang ba gshed kyi mdzod// phyogs bzhi 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// mgo phyogs me rlung nam mkha'i 'bru// mjug mar bya khyung bdud mo dregs// g.yas su bdud dang gshin rje khyung// g.yon du las byed ma mo
srin// 'bru gsum sbyor ba bcu gnyis lus// g.yas g.yon rnal ma de bzhin bzlog/ rgya gram bzhi yi snying po la// 'og phyogs srog dprog thams cad 'gugs// mjug ma lha dang lus srog 'byed// rwa g.yas
mkha' 'gro gzan la 'bebs// g.yon gyi rwa la gzir ba'i sngags// 'bod rbad gsad dang de bzhin sbyar// sgrub dang thun mong go rim sbyar// rtsibs la lus srog gcod pa yi// yang gsang spu gri

bcu gnyis mchog/ thams cad sbrul gyi ra bas bskor// kha sbyar dur ma dong dang chang// rten bzhi khyu mchog rwa dang lnga// dang po srog dbrog bsnyen pas dgug/ gnyis pas gzir zhing rang dbang bsdu// nub
gsum pa la rbad cing bzlog/ bzhi pas rang gshed bdud du dbab// lnga pas rtsa srog gcad cing dbye// gcig gis gzir la rten kun bca'// khri yig klu gzir 'khyil bar brtag/ rkang 'dom phyogs

bzhir thod mkhar gdab// dbus su khyu mchog khru dor gnan// drag sngags khri tshor rngam par bzlas// drag sngags sbyar ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma he dun snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ ya ma ta raM dun dun sarba tsit+ta breng

shag ka dun raka shag/ e ya ma srog la dun dun dza dza/ e dza raM ya ma tsit+ta breng shag pra be sha ya srog la thuM ril ya ma tsit+ta dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs thun b+h+yo/ sarba tsit+ta ru thuM sbur nan gzer thuM trig nan/ khaM

shag thun b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la breng breng/ tsit+ta dun rmugs yaM shag mA ra ya rbad/ gnan pa mi shigs staM b+ha'i mchog/ ru bzhi rdo rje'i rgya gram yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gso ba'i sbyor ba 'di

gsungs so// de dag sbyor ba bzhi yin gyi// drag po las kyi mtha' rgya ru// mchod rten dkar nag sbyor ba dang// bka' rten bka' la srung ba dang// gnod byed ma lus dbye ba'i phyir// drag po'i snying gzer bcu
gcig bsngags// de dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir// shi phrad drag po kun 'joms bsngags// srung ba kun gyi rgyal po ru// phyag rgya bsam gtan mchog tu gsungs// mtha' ru rjes gcod sbyin bsreg bya'o// de

dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod sa la sogs pa la// rdzas bzlog nag po'i bka' rten bca'// gdan khri glang po sbrul gyi brda// bang rim bzhi la stag dang gzig/ dom dang seng ge 'debs shing rngam// bum
pa drag po rtsibs bcu gnyis// 'khor lo mtshon cha 'brug gis 'degs// char khebs bya khyung gdug pa za// dregs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// 'khor lo e steng rdzogs pa'i
'bru// bum pa'i rtsibs la rtsa ba'i sngags// bang rim dang po gab pa yi// gsad pa bshig pa'i sngags kyis mdzes// gnyis par rgyan gyi yig 'bru'i mdzes// gsum par mgo dgu'i drag sngags dgod// bzhi

par dbang sdud sngags dang ldan// dmigs pa'i snying po brda ming sbyar// khams dang bcas la de bzhin sbyar// gdan khrir thod pa brnag pa bsdu// yang gsang gzir dang snying gzir dgod// snying po 'bru re ming
dang bcas// rgya shog gro ga dug khrag gzhug/ skabs dang sbyar la las kun bya// stobs chen dregs pa dang por gnan// bdud dang rgyal po bar du gnan// mi rigs gdan khri thod par

gnan// snying po 'bru re ming srog kun// gro ga mngal khrag dug gis bris// brgya brgya skabs dang sbyar la las kun brtsam// brgya brgya mtshon cha bsnol mar brdeg/ me tog dang bcas lta bur brtag/ bskor

zhing bsrung dang bsad pa'i las la shis// gzhan yang rdzas bzlog kyang log dkar por bca'// dur khrod phung sa g.yul bkye sa// dug chu mnol khrag gdug pa'i sha// tsha ba sme ba ldan byas la// khru gang rus sbal
chu srin 'brug/ sbrul dang phag mo sdig pas 'debs// bum pa mtshon cha drug gnyis rtsibs// drag po nang du e yi dbyings// 'khor lo bdun brtsegs dregs pas 'degs// char khebs gong bzhin gdug pa
za// dug chu thal chen sa dkar gyis// mdog dang ldan byas drag sngags dgod// bum par tshe bdag yab yum gsal// phyogs bzhir bla 'gugs mon pa bzhi// khri 'phang 'chi bdag bdud kyi tshogs// gdan

khri'i 'og tu brnag pa bsdu// maN+Dal dbus su zhag lnga bzlas// bskor ba rnal dang phyin ka log/ bsrung dang gsad pa'i skabs su bya// mchod rten snang stong ye shes sku// gsal bar byas la rtag tu bzung// sbyor

ba kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM dza/ tsa khrag snying thun ril rbad/ sarba tsit+ta gzer thum trig nan/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gsang ba mchog gi las 'di gsungs so// snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku// rig pa thabs kyis 'grol ba'i mchog/ phyag rgya chen po stobs dpag med// bde ba'i lam la bgrod pa'i phyir// gdug
byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// gsang ba drag po'i mtshon cha bca'// thig skor bzhi ldan dbus gru gsum// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis yang logs rtsibs// tha ma gdug pa'i ra bas bskor// de la dgod pa'i rim pa

ni// gru gsum ming rus zla kham lha// 'khrul mig sngags dang spu gri rtsibs// dug chu tsha ba myos pa'i khrag/ kha sbyar thod pa dang rtsar bca'// zhag bdun gsad pa gzir ba phye// thod pa ling+ga 'khor lo chas// klu

gzir sa sros 'byung ba gshed// thod mkhar dang bcas pho brang gdab// brgya rtsa brgyad du gnan sngags bzlas// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya dgra bo'i srog la hur long rtsa rbad/ breng shag myog rbad/

s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ thun rmugs baM ril b+h+yo/ gsad pa mchog gi sbyor bar gsungs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lo tog bsrung ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// yul khams snang ba'i bcud bsrung na// seng
ldeng sor brgyad phur pa la// lcum gzhog brgyad la sngags tshan re// rtsa ba mi 'gyur bcu gnyis dgod// rtse mo logs gsum spu gri re// bris la zhag bdun dar gril bzlas// mtha' ru zhag
gsum bzlas la gdab// yul dbus phyogs bzhi'i ri rtse la// mchod rten re yi lto ru sba// rgyal dang phur pa rta pa lag/ dbyar zla 'bring por de bzhin sbyar// sku re byin gyis de bzhin brlab//

ston zla tha chung ston la bsdu// gdong bzlog rang mda' rang la 'phang// lha gsal sngags bzlas drag la 'dril// e ka he dun snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ sarba sha truM s+t+waM b+ha ya nA sha ya phaT/ las rnams kun gyi mchog bsdus
pa// yang gsang sbyor ba'i mchog tu gsungs// gzhan yang srung ba'i mchog tu ni// klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa yi// ya nga ba yi nad dar na// rgya shog rgyu las lto sbyar bri// dbus nas thig skor ye shes
bzhi// bdud bzhi dug rlangs bzhi 'joms bskor// dbus su drag po bub gnan bzhi// ma mo rgyal po mdze 'dre can// rtse yi gsang mdzod gsum la gnas// sa dang nA ga dbus su bsdu// phyogs bzhir gsang
ba'i 'khrul mig ni// lcags mkhar gsum gsum rgya gram la// rtsa ba drag po lus dang ldan// mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mun khang bzhir// gdug pa gsum gyi gzugs bris la// lus srog dbrog pa'i 'bru dgu
dgod// mu khyud gsum par gdug pa'i gzugs// tha ma phyi yi mu khyud la// 'khrul mig rtsa sbubs bcu gcig gnas// dmigs pas bkug cing mtshams su gzir// gnyis 'joms drag sngags bcu gcig
gnas// rus sbal rtsa yi 'khor lo ni// yon tan 'phel 'grib sna tshogs 'byung// spu gri mtshams su 'dod pa bsgyur// gcod pa bcu gcig gsad la sbyar// drag po las la mngag pa yin// mkha' 'gro zas la
'pho ba'i tshul// gdug pa'i gnas su brnag pa'i gzugs// bsdus la ming rus snying po khams// gcod pa spu gri mtshams su sbyar// dkyil 'khor dbus su rtsang bcas brnag/ phyag rgya zil gnon gsal byas
la// dmod pa nyin mtshan khri khri bzlas// 'khor lo thod pa sngags kyis bskul// cha lugs bzlog la mnol khrag brdeg/ kun 'joms bcu gcig lus srog 'bral// gdug rtsub bcom dang zhen chags
gcod// yid kyi dbang po 'khrul pa yi// brkam chags rgyun gyi srog phrogs nas// gsang mdzod mun khang gzugs la bsdu// me rlung stobs kyis 'khrug cing 'pho// rkyen med sbyor ba'i stobs dpag med// srid

pa'i khyams khang lto ru 'chang// mngag gnad mda' yi sbyor ba yin// mgo gcig dong rtse gnyis pa'i tshul// rgyud gcig dang bsgrig sngags kyis dbye// gsang ba'i thod pa 'khor lo sngags// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i
tshul gyis dbye// ming rus khams sogs sngar bzhin brnag/ spu gri drag po gsum du bsgyur// yang gsang mchog gi snying po bcu// drag po me dbal stobs dpag med// sbyor ba phag thod steng dang

'og/ rdo rje rgyal po bzlas pa bya// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ srog la breng shag thum ril dun dun dza/ sa nA ga srog la breng breng dza dza/ thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga tsit+ta thum ril shag/ sa nA ga rtsa la

rbad thum ril shag/ sa nA ga duM ling thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga srog la hur thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga khaM nan thum ril shag/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga du me ma ma srog gzer rbad rbud thuM ril
shag/ sa nA ga tsa tri shu la gzir nan thuM ril shag/ ro ni tri yang shig nan gzer thuM ril shag/ snying po 'bru gsum 'bru drug bdun// 'phos pas a mu ka dang sbyar// dgu dang bcu gcig bcu dang

gsum// gzir zhing gnan pa mchog la sbyor// snying gzer bdun la rbad dang nan// brnag pa'i rtsa rgyud khams la brdeg/ dgra bo'i srog la breng shag thum ril dun dun dza/ dgra bo'i srog la breng breng dza dza thuM

ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la dun dun shag rbad/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta thuM ril shag rbad// dgra bo'i rtsa la thuM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la ka dum ling thuM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thum ril shag

rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la khaM nan thuM ril shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la snying gzer sbur nan thum ril nan/ dgra bo'i srog gzir thuM ril nan// dgra bo'i srog la yaM shig/ thuM ril nan/ 'di dag sbyor ba dam pa
ste// lus can mchog gi sbyor ba yin// 'od zer sngags kyi rta la bskyon// 'phen pa stobs kyi dbugs kyis 'dren// 'dril ba rang shugs khams dang ldan// srog gi yi ge rang las blangs// 'gugs 'bral

bshig pa rang nyams ldan// srog dang rtsa rgyud lam bcas yin// gang stong gnyis dang lci la myur// 'brel chen bzhi dang 'byung bzhi smin// sangs rgyas khams dang bde bar ldan// rig pa stabs dang bgrod par
bcas// de ma yin na rang 'ching bgrod// sngags kyi yon tan dpag tu med// rtsa ba gcig la don gnyis ldan// dril dang bcas pa gcig tu gnas// gtor dang las phreng de bzhin bsdeb// dbye ba bsdu ba
bsdus te brdeg/ che ba gsum 'dus bsam dpag dka'// u bu na yi gnas chud bzhin// zin pa 'chor bar mi byed 'joms// mkha' 'gro gzhan tshogs zhen chags kun// bzas kha dgra la spo zhing

bsgyur// rno dbal mtshon cha thebs la gzir// rang gnad rtog pa'i rgyun las bzlog/ thod pa gzir gsum mtha' ru bca'// sbyor ba kun ldan de nyid gzir// sa sros lam du stong dang sbyor// rdo rje gsang ba'i
lam du drongs// gang gnod gdug pa'i lag tu gtad// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba yin// gdug pa gsum dang byad bsrung dang// btsan dang rgyal po mdze 'dre dang// bsdongs nas dbye ba sngags
kyis brdeg/ sngags pa rgyal blon yul srung rje// thod pa khams dang sbyar la bsdeb// bsdebs la drag sngags bcu gcig bsnan// drag sngags bcu gcig yang gsang yin// gzhan yang srung ba bcu gcig
las// rgya shog gru bzhi cha gnyis la// dbus nas mu khyud drug tu bskor// dbus su gru gsum thod par bskor// gnyis par 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// thod pa'i phreng bas kun la bskor// gsum par 'khrul
mig nyi shu bya// bzhi par rtsibs chen sum cu gnyis// yang logs phyi rim thod sbrul me// dbus su gang dmigs gzugs dang ming// gnyis par rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// gsum par khyad par drag po

yi// gzir zhing srog dbrog myos shing gnon// drag po btsan thabs spu gri dgod// bzhi pa rtsibs chen sum cu gnyis// shi phrad gug 'phul drag po 'bru// yang gsang mchog gi drag sngags dgod// rus sbal lto

bar rdzogs par bca'// 'khor lo rgyal po gzugs brnyan la// bdud rtsi 'o ma khrag gis byug/ kha sbyor tshon skud thod nang gzhug/ lto sbyar khri yis ngar blud la// sngags pa'i steng 'og bar snang bca'// de
yis thams cad bsrung ba yin// shi phrad stobs kyi 'khor lo yis// gsad dang bsrung ba las kun 'grub// gsang ba dregs pa'i las brtsam na// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba sngar bzhin las// dbus su brnag pa'i

ming rus khams// snying po 'bru bdun 'pho zhing 'phang// rbad bzhi spu gri ming rus sbyar// nyi ma bzhi dang mtshan mo bzhir// drag sngags 'khor lo bskor zhing gcad// gnod sar gnan la bzas kha 'pho// srog

la thun rbad b+h+yo zhes 'phang// drag sngags sbyor ba gnyis su brdeg/ e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags rbad/ khrag la myogs ti ya shag rbad/ srog la mugs ti rbad/ dug phyung bram

shig rbad/ kham shag thum ril myag rbad/ tsa tri ma ma dbug la thang gzer rbad/ tsa la hur thum rbad/ srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ srung ba'i rgyal po shi phrad la// bgrod pa gsum gyi rtsa ba dang// bdun pa la sogs sbyor
ba gdams// gsad pa'i skabs su gsal byas la// 'khor lo thod pa'i ling+ga ming// hom khung re thums zhabs 'og bca'// gsang sngags mnan gzir zor thun brdeb// mtha' ru gang gnod de nyid sba// drag

sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dgra bo'i tsit+ta ro myags rba dgra bo'i srog la myog ti ya shag rbad/ srog la mugs ti rbad/ kham shag thuM ril myag rbad/ dug phyung khram shing rbad/ dbugs la thang gzer rbad/ rtsa la
hur thuM rbad/ dril dang gtor ba nyin dang mtshan// rdzogs nas gzir zhing ling+gar gdab// mnan pa rbad rbud mnan bzhir sbyar// s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ kha gsol las kyi thun bskul nas// brab cing

'phang ba'i drag sngags brdeg/ dgra bo'i srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ nA ga gu hA tsa ma rI/ ti pa ri bya sarba ti/ rU pa s+ya swa so ri kA/ su men ta yi khu ba bzhin// ha la tsa ma ri yi stobs// 'joms byed stobs kyi 'khor

lo yin// gzhan yang bsrung ba kun gyi mchog/ de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rin chen bdud rtsi dri dang chu// rdzas dang bcas pa'i stegs bu la// lha bsgom sngags bzlas rtag tu bkru// yan lag bum pas bsrung
ba'i mchog/ zil gnon phyag rgya'i skur gsal bya// rdzogs pa'i lto ba'i srog bsdus la// drag sngags brgya brgya rgyun du bzlas// bsam gtan rtsa ba'i bsrung ba'i mchog/ dbu la nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i
sngags// rtsibs bzhi 'dren pa'i snying po e// thugs kar rig pa'i 'khor lo sngags// rtsibs bzhi'i dbus na 'bru lnga'i mchog/ lte ba 'byung ba'i 'khor lo sngags// rtsibs bzhir he dun ya dang ma// gsal

bas stong gsum dbang du sdud// 'khor lo rgyun gyi bsrung ba'i mchog/ drag po sngags kyi dmod pa ni// snying po ngang dang shugs kyis grangs// rngam tshig drag po gtum po'o// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa

ya/ stobs kyi drag sngags rtsa ba la// rno dbal mtshon cha kun 'joms sbyar// sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha thams srog gzir bur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad/ sbyor ba kun gyi mtha' sdud du// gsang chen las kyi rtsa ba
'di// 'khor lo sbyin bsreg lto bsdebs na// gcod dang 'bigs la sogs pa'i las// bsrung dang bskyab pa kun byed yin// thabs rnams ldan dang mi ldan pas// bya ba kun 'grub brlag par 'gyur// 'di
dag bde dang smin pa'i las// 'bigs dang gcod la sogs pa ste// bsrung dang bskyab pa kun byed pa'o// gsang chen 'phrul gyi 'khor lo 'di// gdams shing grol ba'i rim pa ni// rgyu la rdzas kyis byang bar
bya// bar snang 'khor los las kun byed// sa yi 'khor los bsreg cing 'joms// thig skor gsum ldan gru gsum dbus// zla kham dmar po 'brug nas brnag/ phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// snying po 'khrul mig
gsum gsum drang// rtsa ba'i drag sngags kun gyis lus// yang logs rdo rje'i rgya brgyad la// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis bcu drug la// drag po thabs kyi spu gri dgod// mtshams nas zla kham dbus gnas su// don
gnyis sdud la ming sogs bri// rdzas ldan bar snang kha sbyar bca'// las kyi rgyal po gcod pa yi// bar snang mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yin// phung sa gsum gyi stegs bu la// khrag dang dug gi chag chag
gdab// bam gyi srad bus lnga ru bskor// drag po 'khor lo kha khyer gsum// phyi nang chag chag dbus mtho gang// dkar dmar mthing nag ldan pa la// rtsang dang thod pa de bzhin me// mthing nag

ling+ga hom shing dbus// phyi rim rgya gram phur pa'i ming// yang logs rtsibs la rtsa ba'i sngags// rgya gram rtse brgyad spu gri ming// gdug pa'i khrag dang dug gis bri// phyi rim thod phreng me ri'i mtha'// sreg pa sa yi

'khor lo yang// rus sbal srid pa'i lto bar bri// dug dang khrag gis sme ba bya// sha sna tshil sna mar khu chang// dug sna ri lu lha yi grangs// nyung dkar nyung nag skye tshe 'bras// zangs phye lcags phye rdo phye thun// pho
nyas gzugs gtub bstab pa bya// drag sngags bcu yis bsreg rdzas dbul// rgya gram ra yi 'dab brgyad du// bsreg pa'i spu gri gzugs la dgod// drag sngags sbyor ba me dang 'dra// e ka he dun ya ma snying

khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs dza/ tsit+ta hur thums dza la raM/ dgra bo'i srog la breng shag rbad// nra tri rak+sha rbad/ kham raM dz+wa la raM/ bsrung dang gsad pa'i las kun la// tshul bzhin sbyar na rno la
myur// drod dang mi ldan rang la gcod// bcu gnyis rnal ma rtsa ba gcig/ yan lag spu gri ming sbyar na// las 'gyang sbyor ba shis la bde// rig pas bde ba'i klong las 'phrang// de ma yin na rang 'ching
rgyu// drag po rjes gcod 'khor lo me// brnag pa kun gyi rgyal po yin// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ yang gsang mchog gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi 'jam dpal rdo rjes
bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ rdo rje snying po rang byung ba// drag po sngags kyi dmod pa la// snying po don gyi ngan sngags kyis// gsad gso dbab gcad gzir gnan gyi// rtsa bar dril ba ji ltar

lags// rdo rje snying pos rdzogs par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags thams cad kyi snying por dril ba/ srog dmar len gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni// thun

mong khyad par gnyis su bya// thun mong rim pa lnga dang ldan// 'bru bzhi phyi yi 'khor lo dang// kun 'byung rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang// gab pa thugs kyi 'khor lo dang// phag mo khong yan 'khor lo dang// phung byed
sdig pa'i 'khor lo dang// yan lag lo thog 'joms pa dang// lnga ni thun mong sbyor ba gsungs// dmar len sngags kyi snying bton nas// sbyor ba gsum du dril bsdeb dang// mtshan ma mngon phyung sbyar ba
ni// dmar len mar gyi zhun mar 'dra// de ni stobs chen drag po yin// 'bru bzhi las kyi rim pa ni// dur khrod dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang sems dben pa'i mtshams bcad la// brtul zhugs dmod pa
drag po bzlas// dur khrod rgyu la tsakra bca'// mu khyud bzhi dang ldan par bskor// lte bar gru gsum bsnol mar bri// gnyis par rdo rje rgya gram la// e dun ka yaM 'bru bzhi dgod// gsum pa rdo rje

rgya gram la// srog dang breng breng ni srog gsum// la dang dun dun bzhi pa ste// srog la rbad dang kham shag drug/ rtsa rbad bdun pa srog la brgyad// yang logs rgya gram rtse gsum la// myog dang rbad dang khyer dang

phyung// mugs dang sting ti li dang shag/ long dang rbad rnams rwa rer dgod// srid pa rus sbal lto bar bca'// kha sbyar rdzas kyi sbal par bzhug/ de yang mchan skud phag mo'i ltor// gnyan nam mchod rten nag

po la// nyin gsum mtshan gsum gang brtsams 'grub// kham shag rtsa rbad/ srog la myog rbad/ khyer phyung mug ti ling shag long rbad// rtsa ba kun 'byung 'khor lo ni// gsang chen rtsa bar dril ba ste// yang gsang

sbyor ba drug gnyis lnga// bde dang smin par byed pa'i sngags// ha la nag po dug 'dzin ltar// sbyor ba bcu bdun bag dang ldan// don gnyis mngon du spyod pa yis// brdeg pa'i drag sngags 'di lta ste// bla chen

bzhi dang sprul pa brgyad// yang sprul bcu gnyis chags dang bzhi// gang byung bsad pa'i sngags bzhi bsdeb// rtags med kun 'byung don gnyis drug/ de bzhin lo thog gzhom pa bzhi// chu 'dril zor 'phang du ba
gzir// chu rgod 'khyags pa rdzogs pas 'grub// dmar len sngags kyi mthu bsdus nas// las kyi 'khrul 'khor mtshon char bcas// snying po kun gyi mthu dril nas// 'bru brgyad dmod pa'i lus dang
sbyar// gsang chen dmod pa'i las bcu yi// rigs rtsol las dbang gnod pa'i gdon// sngags kyi brdeg pa drug dang ldan// lta 'jug phyir 'byung zhan dang bzhi// kun 'byung rtags med khong nas ldang// gang
rung mtshon cha drug sdebs la// brjod pa skabs dang sbyar la spyad// rtags med kun 'byung gcig tu dril// kun gyi rjes gcod bsreg cing gzir// rgyal ba'i thig le mthu dril sngags// kun 'joms sbyor ba'i

rgyal po yin// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo rgyas pa ni// gru bzhi cha mnyam rus sbal ltor// ye shes lnga yis thig drangs la// mgo dang mjug mar thig rkang gdab// de bzhin lto gnyis sna drangs la// thig bzhi rgya gram
legs par gdab// thig mdud 'khrul mig drug gnyis lnga// cha mnyam gru bzhi legs btab ste// mu khyud rim pa gsum gsum bskor// dbus kun gru gsum pho brang re// byang khog dbus kyi pho brang

gnyis// g.yas pa mtshon cha rtsibs bcu la// gcod pa'i ral gri bcu dang ldan// g.yon la rgya gram bcu dang ldan// ral gri thun gzir 'bru bcu'i gnas// rgya gram de bzhin yaM yaM rngubs// bcu bcu steng 'og
bsnol mar gcod// g.yas su rtsibs chen bcu bzhi la// gzir dang tsit+ta rtsa sbur gnas// g.yon na rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// yaM breng dun dza srog dbrog dgod// srid pa'i khyams khang stod na

gnas// de bzhin bskyed pa'i 'khrul mig bzhi// 'khor lo mu khyud gsum dang ldan// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis de bzhin bcu// bco lnga rtsibs dang rtsibs bdun na// bla chen sprul pa yang sprul dang// chags sdang
'joms pa'i drag sngags te// mtshon cha'i rgyal po re la gnas// rus sbal khog smad lto ba'i rdzong// rin po che yi 'khrul mig bzhi// rtsibs bdun rtsibs dgu de bzhin bcu// bcu gcig dang ldan 'khrul mig
la// mi 'khor 'khor 'jug don pa la// brdeg pa'i drag sngags tshar re gnas// lo thog 'joms pa'i 'khor lo bzhi// yan lag bzhi la gnas pa ni// lag g.yas 'khrul mig drag po brgyad// rtsa ba'i drag
sngags kun la gnas// phyi rim bcu drug 'khrul mig la// sbogs pa gzir ba'i drag sngags gnas// lag g.yon 'khrul mig sngar bzhin las// phyi rim rtsibs dgu zor gyi sngags// rkang g.yas brgyad dang
rtsibs dgu la// dgu la thabs kyi spu gri gnas// rkang g.yon rtsibs chen bco brgyad phyi// du pa'i stobs kyis dbab pa'i sngags// yan lag chu rgod drag po yin// mgo la phreg pa'i 'khor lo ni// rim pa
gsum ldan dbus rim gsum// rgya gram bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan// rgya gram rtsa sngags bcu gnyis bsreg/ kun gyi mtha' ru 'di sbyar bya// kun 'byung las kyi 'khor lo la// gdug pa'i ra ba sreg dang

ldan// snying po brda ming rus khams sbyar// las skabs sbyor ba'i rig pas gzung// gang byung 'khrul 'khor lto la sbyar// gnyis gnyis kha sbyar nye ba'i rgyu// dril ba'i mtshon cha sngags blangs nas// sbyor ba
mchog gi spyod yul rab// sngags la ngar blud me la bdug/ kun kyang rus sbal lto bar bca'// rtags re blangs la sngags re gzung// kun 'byung rtags med bsnol mar brdeg/ sngags kyi dbye ba 'di lta

ste// e myags yA rngubs mugs shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i srog la hri shag dza/ tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun rmugs dza tsit+ta rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la nr-i hur thum dza tsit+ta breng breng thun shag rbad/ dgra bo'i

srog la thun gzir shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la thun gzir dza tsit+ta breng shag rbad rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la yaM yaM ni dza tsit+ta breng shag rbad nr-i dza mA ra ya rbad/ hab tang hab tang ro myags dza kring kring hi nan yal

yal tsit+ta rbad/ ha la ha la tsam ri kham shag rbad/ ha la ha la yaM yaM tsit+ta breng breng dun dun dza/ srog la gzir nan myogs rtsal rbad/ yaM rngubs tsit+ta khaM shag rtsa myags rbad/ de badzra dun sa nag ra gzir thun phroM phroM

hril shar shar phob/ hur yaM hril b+h+yo khrom shar shar thun b+h+yo/ raM yaM phroM shar hril kham shag kham phog/ nA ga de ba yun na/ sa tsa gzir nan shar shar hur yi/ hril hril phob/ hur yaM kham shag raM

gzir thun rbad/ tsa myags thun raM rbad/ kun 'byung rtsa ba'i sbyor ba mchog/ las kun so sor bsdeb pa yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di gsungs so// sbyor ba'i rgyal po

dmar len gyi// drag po thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di// ni rang gos la rgyu blangs te// sbyor ba kun ldan be ga ta// khru ba chags pas snag tsha bya// 'khrul 'khor rim pa bzhi ru bskor// drag po dbang sdud phyag rgya'i
ming// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo lcags mkhar brgyad// ye shes las dang tsa ra bdud// mkha' lding dregs pa rus sbal yum// dngas ma kun 'byung snying pos dgang// yang logs mu khyud bsnyen rbad gsad// phyi rim
phyogs mtshams 'khor lo brgyad// yan lag 'khor lo bzhi gnyis ldan// mu khyud gsum gsum drag po dbus// tha ma gdug pa'i ra bas bskor// yan lag rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi// bod pa ming gi 'bru bzhir
ldan// sa khams rgya gram 'bru bcu gnyis// me khams 'bru bcu gsad pa'i sngags// chu khams drug gnyis srog dbrog 'bru// rlung khams bcu gnyis thams cad gzir// 'debs dang drod mtshams bcu drug
rtsibs// lo thog 'jom pa'i spu gris dgang// de bzhin g.yeng dang bskyed pa'i mtshams// rtsi thog 'bras bu srun pas dgang// drod dang chu mtshams bcu gsum rtsibs// thams cad sreg pa'i 'bru yis
dgang// g.yeng dang 'debs mtshams bcu gnyis rtsibs// gdug pa gzir ba'i 'bru yis dgang// gang bsgrub 'brel la khar sbyar bca'// srid pa'i khyams khang lto na gnas// dar ldan thod pa dong du

bca'// gang byed spu gri zhag gsum brtsam// yan lag so so kha sbyar la// thon nas gdug pa'i klu la gtad// bde ba'i rgyal po gdug pa'i mtshon// dmig pa'i rtsa dang khong du 'phang// drag sngags dbye ba 'di

lta ste// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thum tsit+ta breng shag mA ra ya rbad/ dgra bo'i srog thun gzir hur kham breng shag sbur nan s+t+wam b+ha ya nan/ sarba u nan thuM ril sbur nan sha truM

'drid nan sa nA ga thums hal hal yaM yaM sbur nan hur thuM/ raM thun ro myags tsit+ta raM khas ca thang rak+sha thibs rbad/ yul 'dir ser ba e nan ka phroM/ ma tsa hril hril de ba gzir phroM/ nA ga shar shar phob ser ba sha

truM s+t+waM b+ha ya nA sha ya phaT/ drag po dmar len gab pa yi// brnag pa thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// gzhan yang yan lag sbyor ba ni// rtsa ba gcig tu dril ba ste// phag mo'am sdig pa'i lto bar bca'// dril gtor kha
sbyor thod pa gsum// gang rung zung du 'brel bas gcod// snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku// gsal gsum don bzhi yang dag bzhi// bdun pa gsum dang sdebs bzhir ldan// mi g.yo rtsal med

rang snang shugs// yul dang 'phrad na shugs kyis 'char// rtog med spyod pas 'chi med grol// las gsum sbyor bas rkyen med bsdu// snying po dngas snyigs 'byed cing sbyor// gcig gis mkha' khyab rten la'ang

bsdu// 'bru gnyis tshul du snang ba'ang 'byed// rtogs pa ru bzlog 'khor rgyun gcod// bde lam 'jog pa rgyan ldan pa'o// rten pa'i 'khor lo 'di lta ste// dur khrod ras sam shog bu la// gsod pa'i rgyal po

gdug pa 'joms// phung byad phag mo'i lto ba ru// mu khyud rim pa lnga ru bskor// dbus dang zla gam dbang bdun gsod// mun khang gsang mdzod tshe srog 'chang// phyi rim rgya gram 'khrul mig brgyad// sna tshogs

rdo rje ra brgyad ldan/ rtsa ba'i 'khor lo snying po mchog/ phyi rim lto sbyor mu khyud zlum// gang sgrub bsad pa'i sngags kyis gang// me dbal 'khor lo gshed kyi 'bru// rno dbal mtshon cha lto sbyor yin// yang logs
mtshon cha rtsibs bcu gnyis// dmar len srog gi spu gris dgang// rno dbal 'khor lo stobs dpag med// gcod cing 'bigs par ngar bcas yin// thams cad gdug pa'i ra bas bsdam// zhe sdang gdug
pas khong nas skem// mdze yams drag po'i 'khor lo yin// gdug pa kun gyi sbyor ba mchog/ phag mo mtshon cha sna tshogs spu// klu gnyan sa bdag za yin bskul// gnam thog mdze rims gri lkugs
gtong// dmar len srog gi sngags kyis mdzes// 'khrul 'khor rdzas dgu'i thang pas byug/ khams dang snying po ming rus rnams// gsang mdzod mun khang lnga la bri// khyams dang mu ran gnod pa'i

gdon// 'khor lo kha sbyor thod par gzhug/ steng la pho yi thod pa la// sbrul dang rgya gram me ri ldan// gnon cing gzir ba'i sngags kyis dgang// dmar len sngags kyi dmod pa dbab// dang la rnal mas gcod

cing 'pho// kha gso 'khor lo thod pa dang// drag sngags rnal bzlog bsnol mar brdeg/ thon nas gnas kyi 'og tu sba// nya stong thod pa ling+ga dang// brgya brgya mtshon cha bsnol mas gcod// rtags thon cher

gnod klu la gtad// rtsa rgyud bcad pa'i sbyor ba ni// nyin zhag gsum dang phrugs gcig bzlas// thon nas 'khor lo thod pa gzir// dug shing me dang dud pas bdug/ 'khor lo rkyang pa rdzas kyis gril// rdzas

kyi phag mo'i lto bar gzhug/ sbyor ba kun ldan klu la gtad// sngags kyi rgyal po shugs kyis grangs// ma byung sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// 'khor lo dug dang tsha ba khrag/ sme ba lnga dang mnol khrag bsku// sngags
rnams dug dang ming rus khrag/ dkrug sngags lugs dang lugs min bri// rgyu rkyen ling+ga dbus mtshams lnga// lus dang yan lag 'byung ba dkrug/ lha srin gnad la bor te gsod// gdug pa'i

snying gang kha ru gtad// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dza srog la hur thums rbad/ thums hur la srog dza shag breng ta tsi dgra bo rbad/ dgra bo'i

srog la breng shag hur thums shag dza tsit+ta rbad/ srog thum hur la dza shag breng tsit+ta rbad/ phag mo khang yan nye ba'i rgyu// rno dbal mtshon cha rnal ma yin// gzhan yang sbyor ba drag po'i las// sngon du 'gro ba sngar

bzhin las// khyad par lha srin dkrug pa'i las// sdig pa chen po'i lto ba ru// mu khyud rim pa lnga dang ldan// dbus la sogs pa snga ma bzhin// bcas pa drag sngags dkrug bzlog dgod// gsang mdzod lnga la

ming rus khams// zla kham gsum la srung ba'i lha// rgya gram 'bru brgyad drag po'i sngags// snying po 'bru brgya rtsa ba dkrug/ 'khor yug lha srin gang bsgrub sngags// mtshon cha'i rtse mo bcu gnyis la// dmar len

spu gri dkrug la dgod// sbrul dang mu ran gnod pa'i ming// kha sbyor zhing ras rgyu la bri// lcags kyi sdig pa'i lto bar gzhug/ mgo dgu kha dgus gcod cing za// sha khrag drod dang rtsa la rol// lag dgus len

byed lag dgus gcod// bla dang dbang po srog rtsa sdud// rkang pa dgu yi dur chad rko// rkang pa dgu yis gzir zhing gnon// lcags kyi sder mos tsit+ta 'byin// dug gi sme bas myos shing rlom// dug gi rlangs pas

gsod cing bsreg/ mchi ma khrag dang kha chu dug/ rnga ma mtshon cha'i lo ma yis// gdug rtsub rtsa dang srog rtsa gcod// gsod pa'i sdig pa lto sbyar la// thod pa kha sbyar nang du bca'// mon nam rabs chad thod nang
gzhug/ gsum mam phrugs gcig drag sngags las// dug lnga brkam chags yul la rbad// rgyal blon stobs can dngas snyigs 'byed// 'byung ba lnga yi 'og tu gnan// stobs chen 'byung ba'i dgra la

gtad// gdug pa gzir la dgra zla bsko// dbang chen phyag rgya de bzhin brtag/ ka la ka ba pho mo byed// sna tshogs rdo rje gru gsum sprul// snying po ming bcas brda gsum bsdu// drag sngags dkrug pa 'di lta

ste// ya rngubs e shag dun myags ka mugs// dgra bo'i srog la shag breng dza tsit+ta thuM hur rbad/ sdig pa lto sbyar dkrug pa'i las// kun gyi mtha' ru spogs pa yin// de dag thun mong sbyor ba'o// de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das kyis khyad par gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// brda don thabs kyis grol ba'i las// ba dang 'o ma zho dang mar// zhun mar snum gyi snying po'i tshul// snying po'i sbyor ba gsum dang ldan// gsad
gso dbab pa'i las chen yin// gsad pa khyad par sbyor ba dag/ g.yang min brtan dang grol dbang dag/ stobs ldan sbyor ba'i snying phyung 'di// gang thun rgyu la 'khor lo bca'// rdzas dang thang

pa'i sbyor ba yin// dpa' brtul drag po'i stobs kyis spyad// gdug byed phag mo'i lto ba ru// srid pa'i khyams khang srog sdud bca'// khyams khang lto na brnag pa'i gzugs// spyi gtsug snying gar mtshon cha

bca'// mu khyud gsum dbus ming rus bri// phyi rim rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu gnyis spu gri mtshon// rus sbal lto yi phyogs mtshams las// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtse mo na// gsang ba drag po'i
spu grir ldan// phag mo'i lto nang rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtse mo nang bstan spu gris gang// 'khrul mig khyams khang rus sbal dgang// gnan pa'i drag sngags mtshams su brdeg/ bskyod pa'i bcu gnyis yan lag
mgo/ don gnyis bsdus la sbyor ba brtsam// kha sbyar dur mar brnag pa'i rten// rgyu rten drug bcas tsog pur dgab// snying gar 'debs byed sor gsum sar// bsgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar

brdeg/ srid pa gsum gyi srog bsdus la// sngags dang spu gri thems la blang// ya bag sha yi sbyor tshul can// rtsa dang srog zungs gcod cing bsreg/ ho ban srog 'dzin dngas snyigs 'byed// srog gi thig le bde
lam bgrod// cig shos thod par sdud cing gnon// 'debs skyod yang 'phul ya yi las// zhag gsum dmar len dmod pa bor// rngam tshig drag pos rang gshed bslang// lus srog phral nas srog gzir

bslang// phur pa khri yis snying la gzir// phur pa byin can gzer du gdab// gdug pa myos brlams brgyal te 'gro// gsum dang lnga na rdzi yal srubs// thod mkhar rten gyi rten 'brel lta// brnag pa'i rgyud la

gnod cing 'joms// dbang chen dregs pa pho mo 'khol// srog gi thig le nyid du 'gyur// ki kaM las kyi rim pa yin// stong nyid ma skyes bde ba 'god// bde ba'i ye shes nyid du 'bar// thig la bde ba'i spros

dang bral// kha gso mthu ru zor de bsreg/ drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e myags ya rngubs mugs shaka ka dun// rtsa la myogs tsit+ta khas rbad/ khas tsit+ta myogs la rtsa dza shag/ breng la srog rbad/ srog s+t+wam b+ha

ya nan/ srog la thun b+h+yo/ bde byed tshangs pa'i gnas su dbab// dmar len snying phyung sbyor ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// thams cad sku gsung thugs
bdag nyid// ye shes rig pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// tshe gnas dbang po lo thog 'joms// las kyi brnag pa snang snang min// rim pa gsum ldan phag mo'i ltor// dbus yul rgya gram rtsa ba zlum// rtsibs chen
brgyad gnyis sbyor ba bzhi// kha sbyor yul srung la sogs rten// thod chen phag thod spyang ki rdzas// bdun 'bum nyi khri 'bum gcig brtag/ rtsang dang skyer phur gta' la gzer// zor thab du ba
spogs dang rnal// khrag sna dgu dang sme rdzas dgu// khrag dug zho dang seng ldeng lcags// gzugs brnyan dkar nag klu gnas sar// mon thod nang du dar gyis gril// 'bum gcig bcu bar rten la

bstim// dbyar dpyid tha chung ra ba nya// ston zla gsum la ha gsum brgyad// bzhi dang bcu gcig nyi shu dgu// gang rung lo thog 'bras bu sdud// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// phroM phroM shar shar hril nA ga snying

gzer rbud/ raM thuM yaM shig hril b+h+yo/ phroM shar hril b+h+yo/ phroM shar raM thun b+h+yo/ nA ga snying gzer sbud/ yaM shig thuM shar/ drag sngags sbyor ba rgyal po yis// sman dang rtsi thog 'joms pa'o// thams cad zungs thub snying
po mchog/ byin rlabs drag po kun 'dul gsang// bde ba nyams kyi lhun grub gsal// thams cad zil gnon sngags dang yul// snying po srog dang brda' ming sbyar// gzir zhing myos byed dbang po 'chal// yi
ge gnad kyi srog 'phrog la// las dang sbyor ba rgyun gcad bstim// rten gyi mchog la gnas su dbab// phag mo'i lto bar rgya gram e// nyi shu gnyis rtsibs gdug par ldan// gru gsum gang gnod gzugs dang
