ming// rgya gram de bzhin rtsa ba'i sngags// mtshams dang gsang mdzod rtsa sbubs ming// nyi shu gnyis la spu gri sba// lto sbyar dug khrag phag thod brnag/ zhag gsum sngags bzlas bsreg la gnan// gang gnod
ming dang snying po bsdeb// gzir la srog dbrog sbyor ba gcad// spyi srog 'bru gsum gnad kyis dprog/ sgo dgu'i brda ming stobs kyis gzir// kun gyi mtha' ru gru gsum gyi// las dang sbyor ba rang gshed

gcod// e myags ya rngubs mugs shag ka dun/ sarba tsit+ta gzir thuM u nan/ kaM shag snying gzer 'drid phyung trig nan raM shag rbad/ sngags kyi yan lag spu gri yis// rno myur bcas te 'joms par byed// bgrod
pa stobs kyis dbang med na// rang yang 'ching ba'i lus su 'gyur// thams cad 'joms par gdon mi za// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar len las kyi kha gso thun gyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs

so// las rnams kun gyi mchog bsdus pa// rtsa ba gcig tu dril ba yin// las kyi gnad dang bskyod pa'i thabs// bar mtshams sbyor ba kun dang ldan// ri nag dur khrod sme gri mnol// g.yul bkye'i sa chu khrag

blangs la// stegs bu chag chag zor thun bca'// ri sho gro ga mnol khrag ming// zhing ras rus chen zhabs ma la// dug dang tsha ba brnag pa'i rten// bcas la thod chen 'thom nag dong// drug las sbyor ba sor
bcu gnyis// tsog pu spyi tshugs brnag pa'i brda// skye tsher re ba mthing nag skra// gsal gsum mchog gi thugs sngags bskor// rang nyid che ba'i don dang brdeg/ drag la 'dril ba bar mi
bcad// dang po dgu ling bzhi bskor bya// gung srod tho rangs drag tu bskor// dgu thog lcab chen gzer 'debs tshul// rnal mas lus kyi dbang po bshig/ bzlog ste cher dril thun bzhir brnag/ sha rus khrag
chu 'joms shing skems// dkrugs te thun sngags drag bzhir brdeg/ rtsa srog dbugs rgyun gcod cing 'pho// ma yengs gdengs gsum phye gsum brun// dgu skor thun gyis brdeg thun ldan// dbang po rnam shes
khams dang rten// 'pho ba gsum gyi brda' phan yin// bskor phyogs g.yas g.yon dbus mthar sbyar// mtha' ru gdon gsum gang rung brnag/ gdug pa me dang me thod klu// zor thun las gnyis bsdebs la
brtsam// de yi 'pho tshul gnyis dang ldan// ma yengs brten dang grol bas 'phang// ra nag chad pa seng ge kha// gang yang dogs pa med par 'joms// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun sngags drag po 'di

gsungs so// e myags dgra bo'i srog la bam ril kha thun yaM rbad/ ya rngubs srog la hril myags thun shag rbad/ mugs shag srog la gzer thuM ram thun rbad/ ka thun srog la mA ra ya thun rbad/ dus tshod nyin

gnyis de bzhin mtshan// brdeg pa dang po'i las de'o// dun ka shag mugs rngubs ya myags e/ dgra bo'i srog la hur thuM dza/ rtsa srog dbugs la raM thun rbad// de bzhin bzhi ru bra bskor bsdeb// 'joms pa

drag po'i dbus de bzhin// e rngubs tsit+ta hur thuM rbad// myag mugs tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ ya shag tsit+ta rag thibs rbad// ka dun tsit+ta rngubs shag rbad// de bzhin bzhi bskor sngags kyi sgo// drug gis las kyi
gnad du 'bebs// bskul ba bzhi skor bla sngags bzhi// zla gcig dus bzhi rtag tu bya// kun 'joms drag po me dang 'dra// dug khrag gnyis ldan bde ba'i nyams// rten gcig shes pa dngas snyigs
'byed// dang por yul ldan dmigs pa brtag/ bgrod pa'i stobs kyi gdengs gsum ldan// dpa' brtul stobs ldan dmod pa brtsam// rang nyams shugs ldan gang brtsam smin// ye shes nyon mongs bde dang
smin// rang 'chings thabs grol ldan dang min// bden pa gnyis 'dzin don med yal// bde ba'i rgyal po rang las shar// ma bcos bcos med bcos dang bral// e yi ye shes las byung ba// chos sku nam

mkha' las drag rdzogs// ka yi ye shes las byung ba// las dang sbyor ba smin cing rdzogs// ya yi ye shes las byung ba// phul zhing bskyod de srog dbugs rdzogs// myags kyi ye shes las byung ba// srog sdud
las smin thar bar rdzogs// rngubs kyi ye shes las byung ba// bsreg skyems khrag rgyas 'bras bu rdzogs// mugs kyi ye shes las byung ba// don gsum ma yengs che gzhi rdzogs// shag gi ye shes

las byung ba// 'bral ba gsum dang thar pa rdzogs// dun gyi ye shes las byung ba// 'chi bdag rang bdud snang gsal rdzogs// 'brel chen bzhi ni bgrod pa ste// yi ge sngags kyi gsang tshig nyid// che ba bzhi

yi grangs don yin// rtsol bral rang nyams shugs kyis spyad// drag la 'dril zhing che ba'i stobs// yin par rtog med rang shugs ldan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla rkun pho nya bla la mngag pa 'di gsungs

so// thugs kyi sprul pa mngon byung ba// shar gyi phyogs nas bla 'gugs pa// dung gi mon pa seng ge'i mgo// dbu dgu spyan dgu zhal dgu gdangs// phyag dgu zhabs dgu tsit+ta dgu// zhabs dgus stong khams bla
la rgyug/ spyan dgus dgra bo'i bla nas 'joms// snying dgus dgra bo yid la 'dzin// phyag dgus tsit+ta khong nas 'byin// zhal dgus kha mngar med par gsol// ljags dgus khrag la myos shing 'thung// dgra

bo bla dang phrol la shog/ ka li dun ting tsit+ta ro myag srog la thuM ri li li b+h+yo/ lho yi phyogs nas bla 'gugs pa// lcags kyi mon pa stag gi mgo/ dbu dgu spyan dgu zhal dgu gdangs/ phyag dgu zhabs dgu tsit+ta
dgu// zhabs dgus stong khams bla la rgyug/ spyan dgus dgra ba'i bla nas 'joms// snying dgus dgra bo yid la 'dzin// phyag dgus tsit+ta khong nas 'dzin// zhal dgus kha mngar med par gsol// ljags

dgus khrag la myos shing 'thung// dgra bo bla dang phrol la shog/ ha la ha la dun ting ro myags srog la thuM ri li li b+h+yo/ nub kyi phyogs nas bla 'gugs pa// bse yi mon pa dred kyi mgo/ dbu dgu spyan

dgu zhal dgu gdangs/ phyag dgu zhabs dgu tsit+ta dgu// zhabs dgus stong gsum bla la rgyug/ spyan dgus dgra bo'i bla nas 'joms// snying dgus dgra bo'i yid la 'dzin// phyag dgus tsit+ta khong nas 'byin// zhal

dgus kha mngar med par gsol// ljags dgus khrag la myos shing 'thung// dgra bo bla dang phrol la shog/ rak+sha hu ti dun ting ro myags dgra bo srog la thuM ri li li b+h+yo/ byang gi phyogs nas bla 'gugs

pa// gser gyi mun pa khyung chen mgo/ dbu dgu spyan dgu zhal dgu gdangs// phyag dgu zhabs dgu tsit+ta dgu// zhabs dgus stong khams bla la rgyug/ spyan dgus dgra bo'i bla nas 'joms// snying dgus dgra bo

yid la 'dzin// phyag dgus tsit+ta khong nas 'byin// zhal dgus kha mngar med par gsol// ljags dgus khrag la myos shing 'thung// dgra bo bla dang phrol la shog/ karma b+ha ti dun ting ro myags srog la thuM ri li
li b+h+yo/ drag po mtha' sdud skyod cing 'dril// pho brang thig le bde la bzhag/ yon tan lhun grub rin po che// rtsa ba gcig la yan lag 'byung// sbyor ba du ma las kyi gnad// dmar len sngags kyi
mthu dril nas// 'khor lo mtshon cha'i rgyal po'o// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ dmar len snying po don gyi man ngag gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis yon

tan thob par bya ba'i rim pa 'di gsungs so// tshe srog bdag po'i don ngag ni// rnam grangs lnga dang ldan pa'o// dbye ba ngo bo yon tan dang// las dang 'bras bu nges par bshad// dbye ba dag pa rnam pa

lnga// rang bzhin lhun grub tshe bdag dang// ye shes lhun grub zil gnon dang// phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshe bdag dang// thugs las 'khrungs pa'i tshe bdag dang// las las grub pa'i tshe bdag go/ yon tan rin

po che lta bu// kun 'byung 'phel 'grib med par gnas// lhun grub tshe bdag dngas ma lnga// rgyu rkyen 'phro 'du rtsol dang bral// phyag rgya chen por lhun grub pa'o// zil gyis gnon pa'i tshe bdag ni// snang srid ye
shes rtog las 'das// rtog bcas 'khrul pa ru bzlog phyir// rin chen gzhal yas lhun grub na// stobs kyi gdan la de bzhin grub// rang bzhin gsal ba'i ngang nyid las// ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i
sku// lhun po ri rab brtan ltar brjid// srid gsum sbyor ba zil gyis gnon// bdud mo kha 'bar gsod byed mas// myos byed khrag skyugs ma mo'i tshogs// ma lus zil gyis gnon cing 'joms// gsod byed
bka' yis byin brlabs gnon// dregs pas gnyan dang sa bdag pho mo gnon// bya khyung klu bdud klu srin gnon// khyung mos sa bdag sa srin gnon/ seng ges rgyal blon stobs chen gnon// stag gis dud
'gro gdug pa gnon// zhe sdang gdug pa'i sbrul nag gis// sngags dang dmod pa rigs bzhi'i klu// tsha ba'i nad dbal zil gyis gnon// srid pa'i khyams khang rus sbal gyis// srog dbugs bkrag mdangs

tshe srog 'chang// rang bzhin chos sku skye med las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul lhun grub skus// skye ba las kyi 'khrul pa yi// brkam chags skye med ngang du grol// dngas ma'i thig le bcud la bsdu// snang srid bde 'gro ma

lus kyi// tshe srog yi ge gnyis bsdus 'chang// phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshe bdag gi// gdan las yab yum bya khyung dregs// rgyan gyi sngags dang gab pa'i sngags// las srung drag pos 'joms pa yi// sprul pa'i tshe
bdag nag po ni// zil gnon thugs kyi sprul pa ste// dbu dgu gnad dgu mi nad 'joms bdud yin// theg pa dgu yi don ldan nas// 'bras bu rigs lnga ye shes bzhi// sprul pa sna tshogs bsam dpag
dka'// las kyi tshe bdag nag po ni// 'byung ba rten gzhi'i rngam gyi 'og shed na// mi dge bcu yi las dbang las// yi dwags rgyal po 'chi bdag sku// sha za keM keM 'khor dang bcas// dbang sdud

sngags kyi las kun byed// las kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ste// rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcas// lhun grub tshe bdag nag po'i las// rtsa ba gnyis dang yan lag bcu// khyad par brgya dang bcu drug yod// snying po

man ngag rtsa ba gnyis// yan lag phral na nyi shu dgu/ zil gnon phyag rgya chen po las// ltas log lus kyi go cha srung// phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshe bdag la// rtsa ba gsum la yan lag lnga// sprul pa'i tshe bdag mgo

dgu'i las// sbyor ba bcu drug a kro'i mthar// las kyi tshe bdag nag po'i las// sbyor ba'i rnam grangs brgya phrag gcig/ drug cu rtsa gcig byed par gsungs// tshe bdag nag po'i ngo bo 'di lta ste// thams cad

chos skur ngo bo gcig/ ye shes lhun grub chen po'i sku// sna tshogs sbyor ba sprul pa'i sku// rol pa gsum gyi ngang du rdzogs// 'bras bu'i gnas tshul 'di lta ste// chos nyid 'gyur med rang bzhin las// rang byung

ye shes phyag rgyar 'bar// thams cad snang stong ye shes sku// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// sna tshogs ngos gzung med pa'i sku// snang stong ma 'gags bde chen nyid// 'khor 'das gnyis med brdal ba'i

klong// rtog dpyod phrin las rtsol las 'das// ting 'dzin 'du 'phro rkyen las 'das// bgrod thob rtsol med lhun gyis grub// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs// theg pa kun gyis bgrod pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma

lhun grub yul la rol// ye shes lhun grub rtog brjod 'das// rang rig rang gsal rang byung sku// sna tshogs snang la ngos gzung med// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ tshe bdag gi rnam grangs kyi le'u
ste brgyad pa'o//// gzhan yang bgrod pa'i rim pa ni// sems nyid dben pa'i bde gnas su// rang nyams brtan pa'i mtshams bcad la// maN+Dal chen po bya bar brtsam// sngon du 'gro ba'i las

rdzogs nas// dur khrod dpa' ro rgyu blangs la// thugs kyi sprul pa mkha' khyab spro// gug rgyal dri yis khrus byas la// maN+Dal dbus su brtan par bzhag/ bsam gtan bum pas sum yar sbyar// dngos grub gang

'dod drag sngags gdags// gzhan tshogs gtor ma brgyad cu spyad// skur bsgom drag sngags sku yi sngags// rtags dang sbyar la lto sbyar bzlas// bam gyi tsit+ta'i pho brang du// tshe bdag 'khor dang bcas pa

brtag/ phung po 'byung ba rnam shes la// ya ma'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par brtag/ skabs dang sbyor la rtsol ba brtsam// tshogs dang sbyor mchod ba lin+tas// phyi rgyud mchod sogs rgyun mi gcad// rang sems
shugs ldan r+t+yags thob na// slob ma tshe bdag sku bsgom la// yol bas bcad la khrus dang sbyar// phyag rgya bkra shis gzungs ma brtag/ sngags skyes rgyas rigs bram ze'i rigs// lang tsho mtshan
ldan khrus byas la// gso byed gzungs mas g.yon nas 'khyud// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang du// lhun grub dkyil 'khor rdzogs par brtag/ rdo rjer bcas pa'i phyag rgya yis// gsang ba'i lha la gsol ba
gdab// byin brlabs brtul zhugs 'jug pa brtsam// khrus dang me tog 'jug pa yis// bde chen sku dang bam dkyil 'khor// gsang ba lhun grub mkha' la 'jug/ brtul zhugs sngon 'gro'i rim pa

bdun// bum pa sems phreng sme ba blang// rgyan cha phyag mtshan drag po'i dbang// gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsi bstab// lung bstan gzengs bstod dbugs dbyung bya// gsang mtshan brtan pa mi zlog sbyin// dam tshig
chos bshad gdams pa bya// bka' bsgo mna' chu gsang ba bsgrag/ lhar bskyed bu la tshogs kyis rol// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// slob ma gzhug phyir gsol ba gdab// lhun grub rang bzhin gnas pa'i pho
brang nas// ye shes rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub pa'i lha// ma lus mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// slob ma mtshan ldan yum gyi dkyil 'khor du// brtul zhugs drag po'i stobs kyis gzhug tu gsol// bde
chen mnyam pa'i pho brang gsang ba ru// rig pa'i brtul zhugs stobs kyis gzhug tu gsol// slob ma mnyam pa'i don dang bgrod pa 'dod pa yis// me tog rin chen 'dod pas mdzes byas la// dkyil 'khor
dang bcas bdag cag mnyam pa yi// rdo rje rgyal po dag la gsol ba gdab// ston pa'i sgron ma bcom ldan 'das// lha dang slob dpon dgongs su gsol// dregs pa stobs kyis tshul bstan pa// 'gyur med
bde chen pho brang nas// dregs pa'i lha tshogs dgongs su gsol// b+ha ga gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mnyam pa'i rgyal po dgongs su gsol// dam tshig dka' thub sdom pa'i mchog/ rig pa'i rgyal po
bdag la dgongs// gsang ba'i sgron ma bdag la dgongs// ye shes rol pa bdag la stsol// me tog rin chen dbyig bsdus la// bde chen phyi yi 'jug pa brtsam// phung po lhun grub tshe bdag rten// bam chen

mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jug pa nang gi lha ngo bstan// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pho brang du// me tog dor la lha ngo bstan// gdong g.yogs dang ldan spro ba bskyed// bkra shis mtshan ldan gsang ba'i pho brang

na// gnyis med sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyar ba'i// byang chub sems nyid mi 'gyur bde ba'i mchog/ pho brang lhun gyis grub par bzhugs pa dang// sme ba lnga dang bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sems// bkra shis
mtshan ldan b+han+d+har brtul zhugs sbyin// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i sku dang ye shes bgrod// gsang ba gzungs ma spro ba bskyed la blang// ho// bde chen gsang ba'i pho brang du// thabs chen gsang ba'i

bde phab la// dbu ma'i rtsa rgyud sa bon bsreg/ b+ha ga gsang ba'i chos skur bskyil// rtsa lam 'od 'phros longs spyod sku// mnyam par gnas pa byang chub sku// spros bral kun khyab sprul pa'i sku// brtan pa thob pa

rdo rje'i sku// yab yum mnyes pas mnyes par bya// sbyor ba dag pa'i byin rlabs las// rtsa brgyud bde ba'i thig ler bskyil// byang chub shugs dang sme ba bsre// bkra shis mtshan ldan bum par bskyil// brtul
zhugs rab 'byams dbang bskur bya// hoH/ rig pa'i stobs ldan sbyor ba'i gnas// 'khrul pa'i bag chags sprin lta bu// ye shes rol pa'i sgron mes bsal// mnyam pa'i rgyal po brtul zhugs longs// e ka

ya ma pra tIts+tsha hoH/ mtshan ldan bkra shis pho brang du// drag po stobs kyi lha ngo bstan// bkra shis bum pas dbang bskur bya// hoH/ ye shes lhun grub bum pa yis// brtul zhugs dag pa'i dbang bskur

bas// 'khor ba rnam dag chos skur gsal// rang byung ye shes dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma g+hu h+ya b+ha ga bo d+hi tsit+ta hoH/ 'bras bu khrag 'thung ye shes lngar// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya lhun grub pa'o// rgyan cha stobs kyi

dbang sbyin bya// glang chen stag glang zhing lpags sbrul// thod pa snying phreng keng rus brgyan// me ri dur khrod dbang bskur bas// dregs pa'i mthu stobs dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma ha sti ma hA nA ga ka pA la tsit+ta dz+wa

la ni ri hoH// hoH/ 'khor ba 'dral byed 'khor lo dang// nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri dang// chos nyid mtshon pa'i rdo rje yis// sku gsum mnyam pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma tsakra khaD+ga badzra hoH/ be con
dug lnga zil gyis gnon pa dang// gdug 'joms byed pa'i gtun shing dang// log rtog brkam chags 'joms pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis// rig pa stobs kyi sgo gsum dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma tsit+ta hu ti sa

ra la hoH// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i ro la mnyam par rol pa ni// hoH// pad+ma rdo rje mnyam sbyar nas// pad+ma rak+ta byang chub sems// bam chen sme ba'i don dang sbyar// brtul zhugs rol pa'i dbang bskur bas// mi

zad rgyan gyis dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma a d+hi pa ta sid+d+hi hoH// longs spyod dag pa'i dbang bskur bya// 'chi med rang byung ra sA yan// bkra shis mtshan ldan lhag pa'i rdzas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbang

bskur bas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma sarba pany+tsa/ a mr-i ta dz+nyA na shud+d+ha hoH// bkra shis dngos grub ga'u ru// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i tshe bskyil nas// rang rtags tshe yi dbang bskur
bas// 'chi med mi 'gyur brtan pa'i dbang thob shog/ e ka ya ma A yur+dz+nyA na sid+d+hi hoH/ snod kyi 'jig rten gtor snod du// bcud kyi 'jig rten gtor mar gsal// 'byung ba sna lnga gtor

ma'i rgyu// lhun grub kun 'byung gtor ma'i rgyan// 'dzin chags med pa'i stobs kyis rol// e ka ya ma ma hA ba liM ta pU dza hoH// snod med brtul zhugs zhan pa la// spel zhing smras na khro bo dang// gtum po

gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro dbang chen gyis// lus 'dral khong gshag tsit+ta khrag tu 'thung// rdo rje 'chang chen dregs pa nga yin pas// bka' yi zur yang bcag par bya ba min// bsgo ba byos shig dam tshig srog ltar

srungs// gal te 'das na rdo rje dmyal bar ltung// 'di ni rdo rje dmyal ba'i chu// tshul 'di bsrungs na dngos grub 'thob// nyams na mnar med dmyal bar ltung// rdo rje'i chu 'di khyod kyis longs// badzro da ka i
dam hoH// 'dod pa'i tshogs la rol pa'o// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ bam chen gsang ba'i dbang gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// gzhan yang gdug pa'i nad zhugs na// mtshan nyid rtag pas
las rnams smin// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// rgyal rigs mgo nas rus nad bskyed// rje'u rigs lag g.yas tsha ba skem// bram ze lag g.yon khrag chu skem// dmangs rigs rkang g.yas zha grum g.yo// gdol

pa rkang g.yon rnag la 'jug/ ba su rtsa la phol 'bras g.yo// sman dang 'phye bo rlung sgor 'jug/ mdze rlung khrag bskyed tsha grang 'khrug/ rkang gcig bu ga kha gnyis 'jug/ gzhogs skem sub pa nad kyi rgyu// gel
ba so dang sen la 'jug/ lci 'thibs gzer nad glang po gtang// 'thoms pa tshigs mgo zha 'brum skem// mgo mang kha zas ro la 'jug/ lce yang dang po ro dang bral// gdug pa chen po snying la 'jug/ smyo

'bog 'chol mdze sdug bsngal myong// sa yams rjen shun dri la 'jug/ nang rol lnga la mdze yams skyed// lto 'phye rtsa bzhi sbubs la 'jug/ bad kan khrag rlung mkhris nad bskyed// skyo dub 'chal g.yeng 'chal
dang 'thibs// sha rus g.yengs pa'i rtags lnga 'byung// klu bdud klu srin sgang dag 'thib// glang thabs grum dang pho srin nad// ma mos rims dal smyo nad gtong// rgyal pos smyo 'bog 'chal dang

bsngang// btsan gyi gzer nad gri dang bsngang// the brang glo bur hur thum gtang// 'dzin pa rtags ni bzhi dang ldan// yid kyi dug can khong nas ldong// dmar len mchog gi sngags kyis gdon// reg pa'i dug

ni rtsol bas 'dzin// shi phrad phyag rgya nyin mtshan gdon// mthong ba'i dug ni mdze shus 'dzin// mgo dgu sngags kyi lto sbyor shis// kha rlangs dug ni sha bkras 'dzin// gzhan yang gdon pa'i sbyor ba ni// sngags
dang 'khor lo sreg pa'i las// 'jug pa'i rjes gcod sngags kyis gdon// mgo la sogs pa gdug pa las// dril gtor 'khor lo lto sbyar bsdeb// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsum gyis
gdon// mgo la shi phrad nyin mtshan dang// lto sdebs gtor ba'i sbyor bas gdon// lag g.yas zhugs la snying gzer dgu// de bzhin g.yon la nyi shu gcig/ rkang pa g.yas la gdug pas gdon// g.yon la
lto bkrug sbyor bas gdon// bu ga dgu la bcu gcig pas// rtsa phran zhugs la 'bru brgyad shis// dbugs dang rdzi la bcu gcig gtor// rjen shun shugs na gnyis gnyis bsdeb// drod la zhugs na lnga tsho
bsdeb// rlung la zhugs na gnyis por tri// rtsa lam bcu gcig gtsor blang yang// sa me tsa la sum sdebs dkrug/ rtsa bzhi gdug pas 'byung ba'i nad// dkrugs nas phyag rgya chen pos gdon// tshig mgo bdun
la dgu bdun bsdeb// kha zas zhugs la shi 'phrad bsdeb// tsit+tar zhugs la bcu gcig dkrug/ klu bdug klu srin bdud pa dkrug/ du me 'bru dgu'i sbyor ba bsdeb// ma mo la sogs rims dal gcod// tsit+ta
'bru dgu'i sbyor ba yis// smyo 'bog la sogs 'joms pa'i mchog/ dza yaM 'bru dgu dkrugs bsdebs pas// gzer dang dri yi sbyor ba 'joms// ro nr-i bcu ya 'bru bsdebs pas// glo bur nad dang mdze yams
'joms// mchog tu snying po maN+Da la// dmar len sngags kyi snying po zung// kun 'joms rtags rnams med pa'o// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las nad kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid gtan la phab pa 'di gsungs so// ma bcos chos sku ye brdal ni// gdod nas gnas pas lhug pa yin// bgres rgud med pas gnyug ma
yin// phyogs ris med pas kun la khyab// mtha' dbus med pas brdal ba yin// rang rgyud med pas 'gyur ba med// mi phyed mi shigs rdo rje'i sku// srid gsum khams gsum 'khor ba yang// ming tsam
btags pas sgyu ma ste// rang bzhin med pas nyams pa med// ji ltar btags pa'i chos rnams kun// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems// sems dang chos nyid gnyis med pas// rtag pa chen po bde ba'i

sku// khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin// chos skur sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas// bde ba'i ye shes rang la shar// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ chos nyid gtan la
dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'khor gyi 'jam pa'i rdo rje des/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ drag sngags rtsa ba ji ltar gnas// dka' thub sdom pa ji ltar gsungs// sbyor
ba'i rgyal po ji ltar bsdeb// drag po'i sngags rgod ji ltar lags// rdo rje snying pos rgyas par mdzod// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis/ rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa bsdus nas
bkod do// drag po sngags kyi rtsa ba ni// rim pa bdun dang ldan pa yin// 'dun pa gsum dang lta ba gzhi// yin pa gsum dang gab bsdeb gsum// gsang lugs gsum dang gnan lugs gsum// 'char
lugs gsum dang 'pho ba gsum// gsal ba gsum gyis don tshan 'grub// glang chen gungs so ltol po gzung// bde ba mchog dang thugs rje'i gzungs// gtsang sme med blang zil gnon sgrol// yi ge lha dang
mtshon cha las// lus dang yan lag bsrung gsang bsdeb// rten can rten med sbyor ba'i tshul// nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhir gnas// thugs rje chos dang ye shes chos// yul dang 'phrad na 'chor ba'i
tshul// lha dang 'khor lo gzas pa po// lha dang sngags dang yul dang dmigs// de yis drag sngags rtsa ba 'dus// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// gzhan yang dka' thub sdom pa ni// dpa' brtul sngags kyi dmod pa la// gtsang sme le lo g.yeng ba min// gsang thub shes rab spyod pa can// dpal brtul stobs dang nyams ldan pa// sbyor
ba'i khyad par dka' thub bsrung// gdug pa gsum gyi sbyor ba la// tsha gsum bcud dang rol de bzhin// dri ma cha chung zil ba la// brtag pa gsum gyi sbyor bas blang// yon tan dka' thub kun dang

ldan// phyag rgya bstan pa'i skur gsal bya// rang lus dmigs pa gzhan mi bstan// 'bum tsho drag sngags rgyun mi gcad// nya stong drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam// dka' thub drag po'i sbyor ba yin// bsrung ba'i dam
tshig sngags kyi srog/ bcu gnyis gcig gis drang don can// kun gyis dang du blang ba ni// rdo rje rmang gi ri mi bshig/ mngon phyung dogs med brtul zhugs spyad// 'khor lo srog mthar gnad pa zor// gzir
sogs dbab pa yan lag yin// dam tshig gzungs la rtag tu 'jug/ gcan gzan rgyal po gsad pa min// za ma tog tu dug mi blug/ rin chen lha brag bsreg mi bya// gangs kyi zhun chu btung ba min// bdud

rtsi snod ngan nang mi blug/ mi shis snod du mdangs mi dbab// snod ngan seng ge'i zho mi blug/ yid bzhin nor bu bsreg mi bya// gnam lcags ur mo nang mi 'thab// stag gzig rol pa'i lhag mi bsdu// rdo rjes

gtams pa'i brag mi gshig/ rdo rje'i ra ba'i rmang mi bral// mun pa sel ba'i sgron mi gsad// rdo rje chu bo'i rka mi gcad// rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rtags mi dbye// rdo rje'i rdzong gi mkhar mi bshig/ rin chen rgyal
mtshan rtse mo dbog/ thun mong sngags kyi dam tshig yin// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam pa gsum// bgrod pa brtul zhugs blta ba'o// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ dka' thub dam tshig gi
le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// de yi las rim 'di lta ste// rtsa ba rnam pa gsum du bsrung// gsad dang gso dang lo thog
gzhom// gsad pa'i las ni lnga dang ldan// mtshon cha bsnol ma gnyan bsreg gnyis// lto shal log then thun dang lnga// drag po bsad pa'i skabs su sbyar// sangs rgyas thugs kyi bcud bsdus pas// gab pa
mngon phyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ rang sems dben pa'i dur khrod du// dpa' brtul sngags kyi dmod pa bor// shog bu gru bzhi mtho gang la// thig skor gsum ldan zla gsum mthong// bla sems ming rus lha rnams

bri// phyi rim 'khrul mig lcags mkhar bcu// rtsa ba'i snying po me rlung skyi 'dang gnas// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// ral gri rgya gram bsnol mar gnas// ral gri gsad pa'i spu gri la// rgya gram

gnon pa'i spu gris mdzes// de nyid rus sbal khro bo'i lto bar bri// cha gnyis byas la dug dang khrag gis byug/ sngon dmar dang bcas thod pa'i dong du brnag/ pho thod dmod pa mo thod ming rus brnag/ tshe bdag
bsgoms la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// zhag bdun drag sngags dmod pa rngam tshig ldan par bzlas// drag tu bskul gyin brnag pa'i yul la mngag/ drag sngags dmod pas gsad la gzir zhing thod pa

bca'// 'khor lo thod pa gdug pa'i gnyan la gtad// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs drag po'i skabs dang sbyor// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la mugs ti

shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog la staM b+ha ya nan/ gzhan yang gab sbas gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// gru gsum ming rus zla kham srung ba'i lha// 'khor lo rtsibs bdun mu khyud phyi

ru bya// mtshon chas gcod pa'i rtse mo la// ming bcas spu gri bdun pa dgod// tha ma'i rtsibs chen dgu pa la// 'dren pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dang// khong khrag 'brel ba'i 'bru lnga dgod// mtshon cha'i bar du ming

rus bris// 'khor lo thod pa kha sbyar gzhug/ thod pa steng ma mu khyud bzhi ru bskor// dbus su rgya gram lte bar oM dang ldan// ra la ya ma 'bru bzhi bsnol mar bri// mu khyud gnyis par rigs bzhi klu brgyad

bsnol// mu khyud gsum pa sbrul nag brgyad kyis bsdams// sbrul gyi gseb tu gnan pa'i sngags kyis dgang// mu khyud tha ma me ri snying po raM// thod pa'i kha khyer phyi ru nan gyis bskor// thod pa 'og ma mu khyud
zlum po gsum// dbus su gru gsum rtse mor raM gsum ldan// nr-i dang ming rus zla gam rdzogs par bri// mu khyud gnyis par sbrul brgyad ske bsnol bsdam// sbrul gyi gseb tu ming rus me ri

raM// thod pa'i bar du gcod pa'i 'khor lo gzhug/ zhag grangs nyi shu bdun du bya// gdug pa'i gnyan sar khru do brkos la gnan// gdug pa'i drag sngags 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra

bo'i srog la mug ti shag rbad/ dgra bo'i srog stam b+ha ya nan// gzhan yang gang sbas gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo mu khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// rus sbal gzugs gnyis lto ba stong par ni// rus sbal

lto bar brnag pa'i ming rus bri// de yi phyi ru gnon pa'i gdon rnams bri// dug dang khrag dang tsha ba'i rdzas kyis byug/ sbal pa lto sbyar phyi ru drag po'i sngags kyis bskor// thod pa steng mar nA ga staM b+ha nan

bri// thod pa 'og mar nA ga raM yaM nr-i dza rbad ces bri/ mthing nag dril la rtsang bcas dong du gzhug/ gong ltar sngags bzlas mthar ru gnyan sar gnan// 'bum phrag brgyad dang khri tsho brgyad cu dbye// lu ma

'khyil pa'i dbus su nam gyi gung la gnan// lha srin kun gyi pho brang btab par bsam// drag sngags dmod pa sbyor ba gsum dang ldan// e ka ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la mA ra ya rbad/ ya ma

snying khrag ra ma tsa e/ dgra bo'i srog la nA ga duSh+tAn s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ dgra bo'i srog la gzir yaM b+h+yo/ gzhan yang gnan pa drag po'i mtha' sdud du// gzhan gyi thod pa stobs can rnyed pa na// rang gi sbyor ba phyis la

zhag gsum thod par gzir// khri tsho bskul gyis rngam tshig drag tu bzlas// thod pa gdug la dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// gzhan gyi snying po tshangs pa'i rtsa la bri// ming byang phyi ru phas kyi bsnyen dang gsad pa

bri// tha ma yang dag drag po gsang ba bri// thod pa kha khyer raM yaM baM gyis bskor// thod pa steng ma'i dbus su ma dang nr-i// de yi phyi ru bsnyen bsgrub gsad pas bskor// nyin mtshan mtshams su brgya brgya drag tu

bskul// tha ma yang dag drag sngags rdzogs par bri// thod pa'i phyi nang dug dang khrag gis byug/ bsgrub sngags brgya brgya drag sngags khri tsho re// nyin zhag bcu ru yul la bskul gyin rbad// mi rgyus skra shad bcings

la dang po'i gnas su gnan// gsad pa rnams gnan la 'bru bzhi yang// khri tsho drug tu drag po'i sngags kyis gzir// e ka ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la khram shing rbad/ e ka ya ma ma ra/ dgra

bo'i srog s+t+wam b+ha ya nan/ thun thun mugs raM b+h+yo/ drag sngags dug mda' thun gyi sbyor ba ni// gang la sbyor dang mngon sum 'joms shing 'pho// de yang rten gyi thod pa gling mangs su// thun khrag sna tshogs thod pa
ming rus bca'// phye gsum thun gsum khrag gsum brdeg pa'i rdzas// skyer tsher rten la thod pa dar gyis dgab// gsal ba zhag dgu dmod pa dbab// brgya brgya bzlas shing thun khrag dag la

bstim// drag sngags bskul bas dug mda' khog du skyel// rtsa gcod khong khrag skam nas shes pa 'pho// sngags kyi grangs las tshad kyi sbyor ba min// drag tu bskul gyin thod khrag zor du 'phung// thod pa'i pra

ngan drag po sngags kyis bzlog/ lus bskyod rngam tshig sgra dang bcas pas bya// dregs pas bskyod cing rngam pas yul la 'phro// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka ya ma srog la dza mugs thun rbad b+h+yo/ rtsa

khrag rtsal breng shag thun rbad b+h+yo/ ra ma snying rtsa hur yaM thun rbad b+h+yo/ rtsa khrag khram shig thun rbad b+h+yo/ gsad pa gsum sbrel drag po sngags// gnyis sbrel mtha' gsum sbyor ba man// rig pas brtag la sdebs kyi

sbyor ba blang// rig pa gsum dang ldan pa lnga ru bya// gsang ba las kyi rim pa bsdeb dang sbyar/ sbyor ba gab pa'i snying po gsad pa yin// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba drag po'i le'u ste bcu
bzhi pa'o//// gzhan yang lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod ras sam shog gu gru bzhi la// dbus su rus sbal lto ba stong par bri// 'khor lo rtsibs chen bcu gnyis dag dang ldan// 'dren

pa'i 'bru bzhi 'byung ba'i 'bru lnga pa// dbab pa'i sngags bzhi chu dril zor thogs gzar// gta' ma thod pa 'dra gnyis gcig dang gsum// khrag lnga so lnga 'bru gsum thal// rten gnyis 'bru gsum tshil gsum

dang// bla gnas yul rten 'dug pa thod pa'i rten// sbyor ba gzhom phyir khrag dang dug gis gdab// dgu bdun lnga ru tha chung gsum dang sbyar// khri brgyad gang dmigs khri yis lam du gzhug/ dmigs pa gsum

gyis gnas yul rten la sbyar// chu rgod 'khyags pa ri ru rdib nas 'joms// drag sngags sbyor ba bzhi ru bsdeb// e ka ya ma pra ma srur ya bam/ phroM phroM hril hril nyid 'dril phroM/ hril shar shar yaM yaM 'ub hril b+h+yo/

phroM shar shar b+hi ta rak+sha shar shar raM thun yaM shar phob/ nA ga gzir nan dril phob/ de ba yu nan gzir phob/ ma ma rak+sha gzir phob/ si si ya ma tsa shu la gzir nan hril shar phob/ 'bras bu rtsi thog skye shing
'joms// lus dang yan lag 'dod par sbyar// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ lo thog 'joms pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// gzhan yang srung ba'i sbyor ba ni// rim pa brgyad dang ldan par
bya// bshig pa 'khor lo gzugs dang brda// de bzhin gdug pa gzir ba gsum// kha bcing rang gzir sbyor ba mchog/ drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba khyad par gyis// gzhan gyis sbyor ba bshig cing gnon byed
gzir ba'i las// rgya shog dag la gang gnod gzugs de bri// snying gar snying po tha ma sngags kyis bskor// ga'u so sor bcug la gru gsum rtsang bcas brnag/ mthing nag dur khrod dar ram re
bas gtums// zhag gsum brabs la mtha' ru bka' rten gnan// gzugs la bshig pa'i sbyor ba dang po yin// dur khrod ras la snying po brda mid bri// sngags kyis bskor la dug chu tsha ba bsku// la cha'i
ga'ur sbal pa'i lto bar bca'// zhag gsum thun bzhir brgya dang bcu ru brab// thon nas du bas bdugs la seng ge'i khog par gnan// brda la gshig pa'i sbyor ba gnyis pa'o// dur khrod ras la thig skor
gsum du bya// dbus su gru gsum ming bcas 'khrul mig dug lnga'i sngags// yang logs rtsibs bcur bshig pa'i spu gri dgod// rus sbal lto bar dug khrag tsha ba bsku// kha sbyar gong bzhin thod pa dong du

gzhug/ lha bsgom sngags bzlas yul la drag tu rbad// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba gcig gis bya// e ka ya ma g+has ma dza nir ya/ sarba sha truM staM b+ha ya nan 'brid rbad/ 'khor los bshig pa'i sbyor ba gsum
pa'o// gzhan yang klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa'i nad dar na// rgya shog dag la gzugs bri nA ga sngags kyis bskor// nad khrag dug khrag tsha bas zhing ras gril// thod pa dong du mnol khrag zhag bdun

brab// nya stong lha bsgom gzir sngags mtha' ru gnan// sa dang nA ga su yi mtha' ru bri// brda dang ming sbel snying gzer sngags kyis bskor// gong bzhin sbyor ba phag thod chu mchog gnan// dur mched bka'
rten gnod pa'i sa ru gnan// gzhan yang gdug pa gzir ba'i 'khor lo ni// dur khrod ras dang shog bu gru bzhi la// thig skor rim gsum dbus su sa nA ga/ 'khrul mig bzhi gnyis he b+ha rtsa ba'i

sngags// rtsibs brgyad spu gris gdug pa'i zhen chags gcod// rus sbal la sogs khri brgyad mnol khrag brab// thon nas gzir zhing mtha' ru gnan pa bya// he b+ha ya ma thi pa ra ya/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la

myog rbad/ sa nA ga snying spur nan nan/ gzhan yang gnod byed kha bcing ba// sbyor ba gzhan ming sngags kyis bya// sarba tsit+ta gzir thuM big+h+nAM nan/ gzhan yang stobs kyis bdag po nang gzir na// rgya shog
gzugs byas lto bar 'khor lo bca'// thig skor gsum ldan dbus su ya dang ka/ 'khrul mig bcu la gshig pa'i spu gri dgod// mtha' ma'i bcu gnyis rtsibs la rang gzir rtsa ba'i sngags// dug khrag brab
la rten gyi phur pas bsdig/ rang nyid zil non dmigs pa gcer bur brtag/ sngags bzlas dam bdar thun brad khrag gis brab// drag po thon nas zhag gsum gcig na phye'o// sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di lta

ste// e ka ya ma g+ha dza ni ra ya/ e ya hur thuM sha truM 'drid khang shag ya ri/ rang gi lus bsrung gzhan gyi sbyor ba dbral// mchog tu gsang ba rang gzir med pa'i gnas// drag sngags mngon du phyung
ba'i rgyud las/ bsrung ba khyad par gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags dbang sdud kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// srid pa las kyi mtha' sdud du// dbang sdud las

kyi 'khor lo brtag/ las kyi tshe bdag lto ba na// srid pa sngags kyi 'khor lo gnas// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// srid pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud lnga// lto ba chos kyi pho brang hUM// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig ni// gsad pa
drag po'i sngags kyis dgang// gnyis pa 'khrul mig rtsa sbub brgyad// gnas pa ser ba'i sngags kyis dgang// de yi phyi mig bcu gnyis la// yan lag sbyor ba'i drag sngags te// gshin rje ma mo bdud dang

rgyal// zhi khro sri can gzir ba'i sngags// snying gzer gdug pa gzir ba'i sngags// pho mo ma ning 'pho ba'i sngags// bcu gnyis las kyi skabs kyi gnas// 'khrul mig bzhi la brda yis gang// kun 'byung rtsa
ba'i 'khor lo yin// las kyi yan lag phral la ste// thun gyis gzugs la brdeg pa yin// mnan pa la sogs gong bzhin sbyar// a kro'i mtha' ru shis par gsungs// skabs dang sbyar la thun

mong spyad// g.yeng min bde ba'i nyams kyis brtags// gdeng dang ldan na mchog tu bsngags// sngags kyi dbye ba 'di lta ste// he ka he tun rak+sha rbad/ ya ma he sad rak+sha rbad/ kha raka tsa thur rak+sha rbad/ g+hus sma dza

ni rak+sha rbad/ thar kang sad ka ra ya dgra bo'i srog mA ra ya rbad/ ya ma e ka ra dza 'dri ma nan// ma hA sang tsa ru ra nan/ pra ma sa ra nA ga thi sa ra nan/ nri tri rA tsa mA ra ya rbad nan/ e ka he ka e ma ke ya ma he

sang pra ma khrag la phroM phroM hril shar shar drag tu phroM phroM shar shar hril b+h+yo/ phroM shar shar ka ma da ri hril phroM/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myag phroM phroM shar shar trag tu hril snying gzer kham shag phob/ e ka he ka 'dri me he kaM traM yaM he

kaM b+hi sa ma sma dzar kus ma dza ni/ dza rang sad kar ya hUM phaT/ e ka ya ma he ka 'dri ma ya rag mo rak+she ma b+h+yo/ e ka ya ma he ka 'dri ma ya sarba tsit+ta gzer thuM big+h+nAM/ e ka ya ma he sang sad ka ra ya dza raM rbad sarba sha

truM nan gzir thun b+h+yo/ e ka ya ma dun b+h+yo ka du dza raM ya ma sha truM sad ka ra ya thun/ gzer rbad b+h+yo/ e ka ya ma ka dun dza raM sad ka ra sha truM na gzir thun rbad/ da raM sha truM sad ka ra ya rbad/ ya ma he sang bra ma

khrag tsa tri sha truM raM thun gzir rbad/ he sang ya ma sad ka ra ya/ sa nA ga sha truM snying gzer hUM rbad/ ya ma ka dun dza raM sad ka ra ya/ b+ha ti ya sha truM na khaM nan thun gzir rbad/ ya ma rak+sha thun rbad/ e ka he ka ya ma

nA ga snying gzer thun/ rtsa ba 'dri ma thi ba ra nA ga thun gzir rbad/ e ka he ka nA ga sbur nan/ ar+ya ga ru na nA ga mA ra ya nan/ he baM thi pa ra nA ga sbur nan/ s+t+wam b+ha ya nan/ e ka ya ma du ma thi ba

ra nA ga thun gzir rbad 'dri ma dun dza/ he saM ya ma dun ya ma nr-i sarba sho na ya nan/ de dag las kyi sbyor ba kun// don ldan thabs kyi rgyal pos bya// dbang sdud sngags kyi sbyor ba kun// sku yi bsnyen ma mtha' ru

sbyar// drag por sbyor na rang la nyen// rig pa'i stobs kyi phyag rgyas 'phang// las rnams rtsa bar dril ba yin// drag sngags brgyad gnyis gcig gis rdzogs// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ dbang
sdud rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i don 'di gsungs so// sbyor ba mi shes sbyor byed pa// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ma shes na// btags la don gyi ngo

bor 'dzin pa yis// mngal gyi grong khyer brgyud pa'i bdud kyis zin// thabs lam gsang ba'i don dang ldan gyur na// snang srid chags pa'i spyod pas me 'bar kyang// gnyis med phyag rgyar grol ba'i 'bras bur

bgrod// sgrol ba mi shes sgrol byed pa// skye shi med pa'i gdeng dang mi ldan na// rtsol bas sgrol ba mu stegs 'khrul pa ste// las kyi srin pos bcings pa'i bdud kyis zin// byar med rdzogs pas srog kyang
gcad du med// ye shes chen po'i phyag rgyar rang grol na// khams gsum sems can dus gcig srog bcad kyang// chos sku bde ba chen po bgrod pa med par rtogs// spyad du med pa'i phrin las ma shar

na// dpe la mtshon byed lus med spyod pa ni// las kyi rnam smin dmyal ba'i btson rar tshud// rtsol ba byas pas rtag pa'i bdud kyis gzir// spyad du med pa'i phrin las spyod shes na// lha srin kun gyi ming dang

mtshang smos nas// las la mngags nas pho nyar kun rbad kyang// blang dor med pas rol pa'i spyod par dag/ bsnyen bsgrub rtsol med sngags don ma shes na// phyi nang rtags la brten nas sgrub byed pa// mi shes

srog la rtsol bas rang bdud rang la 'khor// mnar med dmyal ba'i gnas la the tshom med// bsnyen bsgrub rtsol med sngags kyi don shes na// srid gsum mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i srog dngas ma// lha srin kun gyi

srog snying dril ba'i mchog/ drag po e dang yan lag sbyor ba ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pas ye shes rol par shar// gang mthong ci spyad lhun grub mtha' gnyis grol// nam mkha' rin chen lhun po rgya mtsho ltar// don
gnyis smin pa yon tan lhun gyis grub// ma bcings grol med bgrod pa'i 'bras bur smin// snang srid 'khrul pa dug lnga'i smag rum du// sangs rgyas bka' yi drag sngags ye shes nyi ma shar// sngags kyi go
mtshon drag sngags me rlung 'di// ye shes gnyis med rang las chos skur gsal// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ rtsol ba dang bral ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis mgo dgu pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// rnam grangs sbyor ba bzhi ru bkod// rnal ma'i 'khor lo spogs pa gnyis// lo tog gzhom dang bsrung ba'o// rnal ma'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur
khrod gdug pa'i bde gnas su// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri// sme ba lnga dang tsha ba bsku// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru bskor// gru gsum zla kham lcags mkhar bzhi// mtshams bzhi rdo rje'i ka bas

'deg/ thod pa'i ra ba brgyad gnyis ldan// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu drug la// mtshams su rin chen ka ba de bzhin sa ri'i mtshams// de yi phyi rim sbrul gdug chun pos bskor// srid pa rus sbal khra bo'i lto
na gnas// de dag dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su brnag pa'i ming rus bri// zla kham gsum la pha mes dur du song ba yi// de bzhin brnag par bya ba'i snag tsha khrag gis bri// zla kham gcig la

srung ba'i lha rnams bri// 'khrul mig bzhi la spu gri tshan bzhi dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// drag po dbang sdud las kyi rgyal po gnyis// khro bo rngam pa'i sgra dang bdud kyi snying po gnyis// gshin

rje nyid dang ma mo'i snying po gnyis// chags byed ma dang srin po'i snying po gnyis// shan pa btsan dang dmu yi snying po gnyis// shan pa las mkhan sgrol byed snying po gnyis// dregs pa can dang nam mkha'i snying po
gnyis// srog bdag pho mo gsod pa'i snying po gnyis// rang rang lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i gnas de nas// drag tu bskul gyis shan pa dag la rbad// 'khor lo mtshon chen drag sngags me dbal drug/ 'khrul

'khor me rlung spu gri thog chen 'dis// lus bshig rtsa gcad khrag dang bag chags skems// shes pa rten dang dbang po yul las 'byed// rten gcig lus la shes pa kun bsdus thim// kha sbyor 'khor lo thod pa

ga bur gzhug/ nyin mtshan dril gtor ming bcas spu gri sbyar// thod pa'i gseb tu thun gyi spu gri dgod// ri rgyal rbab dang gser gyi dgu thog ltar// sbrul gyi gseb tu gnan pa'i spu gri dgod// gser gyi sa
gzhi ri rab brtan ltar bzlas// gru gsum nang du brnag pa'i rten rnams bzhag/ mthing nag kha bcad gsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// brgyad dam bcu gnyis dril gtor drag sngags bzlas// sbyor ba thon nas thod

pa gzir zhing bca'// ri rab pho brang gdug pa'i klu la gtad// nya stong kha gso thod khrag dug bza' 'phang// drag po sngags kyi dmod pa 'di lta ste// e ka he dun ya ma rag sha ma dza mun tri/ sham tsang kring shu

snying/ dgra bo'i srog la nr-i sha truM mA ra ya rbad/ srog s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ srog la nr-i shag rbad yaM thun b+h+yo/ me rlung sbyor ba las kyi mchog/ rnal mas gsad pa'i sbyor ba yin// drag sngags mngon du phyur

ba'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// gzhan yang gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// ma grub spogs na lto dkrug bca'// ras la thig skor bzhi ru bskor// gru gsum zla kham ming rus lha// 'khrul
mig bcu drug rtsa ba'i sngags// yang legs bcu drug spu gri mtshon// tha ma sbrul bzhi'i ra bas bskor// gcod cing gnon pa'i 'khor lo yin// bla sems 'chang ba drag po'i gnas// gdug pa sreg byed las kyi
me// lus sems rten 'brel 'gug pa'i rlung// srog dbugs 'chad pa gshed gsang mdzod// rtsa gcod dbugs bral mtshon chen dug/ srog dang las sdud ze yi lcags// dbang po gnon pa ri bo'i rbab// las

sbyangs shes smin phyag rgya brtan// gdug pa'i mtshon cha ngar blud la// drag sngags lto dkrug khri brgyad gnyis// mtshan mo bskul gyin dril ba'i sngags// thon nas thod mkhar gdug pas gdab// thun khrag dug

gzer kha gso bskyed// shes pa'i khyad par gsum ldan 'phang// dbang po rno myur gsal 'phro sdud// gdeng gsum sngags skong rgyas par bgrod// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka he dun rag sha ya ma tsa dza

shu tri shaM mug tri snying/ dgra bo'i srog la yongs thums shig rbad/ s+t+waM ba ya gzir nan/ srog khyer yam shig hri thums myog thun b+h+yo/ gzhan yang las kyi rim pa ni// sprul pas lo thog gzhom pa las// dur khrod

ras sam shog bu la// thig skor rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum yul gyi ming// zla gam sbyor ba gzhom pa bri// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags rnal ma bkod// tha ma rtsib

chen nyi shu la// dbab pa'i spu gri drag po dgod// rus sbal lto bar sbyor ba bsdu// kha sbyor thod pa zhabs mas gril// khrag sna dug sna sngo na brdeb// sprul pa'i bsgom gyin bskul la bzlas// sbyor ba thon nas

gta' ma gzhug/ drag sngags stong du rgyun mi gcad// ston zla gsum du dbab pa brtsam// zor dang du ba thab dang gzir// khrag dang dug rdzas sngo sna dug/ lcags phur drag sngags khri bzhir ldan// gdug pa'i

rten dang gzugs la brdeg/ dregs pa kun gyi mthu dril ba'i// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lta ste// e ka he dun yaM yaM shaM dz+wa mun tri sham raM kring shu snying phroMs phroMs shar shar nA ga hur nan phroM phroM shar shar hril hril drag

tu phob phroM nA ga dza yaM snying gzir tsi ta nan phroM/ shar shar hril b+h+yo/ lo thog gzhom pa drag po'i las// thod pa stobs dang ldan pa'o// gzhan yang sprul pa'i tshe bdag gis// gsung bzhin gzir ba 'di lta
ste// thams cad gcig tu dril ba'i las// shog bu gru bzhi cha mnyam la// 'khrul 'khor rim pa gsum du bskor// srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bri// dbus su gru gsum gang gnod bri// 'khrul

mig bcu drug rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs bcu bzhi spu gri rtsibs// las ni sna tshogs rtsa ba gcig/ zla kham me tog bsrung ba'i 'bru// bcu bzhi bkod la skabs dang sbyar// khrag dang dug chu tsha ba bsku// thod pa
dang bcas sbyor ba brtsam// zhag bdun sngags bzlas drag tu bskul// lha bsgom bka' rten 'og tu gnan// sngags kyi rtsa ba gnyis su bya// bcu drug bcu gnyis rno dang shis// rig pa stobs dang brda yis

sbyar// drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste// e ka he dun yaM maM ra shaM dza mu na dri shaM raM kring shu/ sarba du raM u nan gzer phyung sbur nan srog la myogs rbad/ drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ yan lag gi sbyor
ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags yongs su smin pa'i don 'di gsungs so// e ma chos sku byang chub sems// skye 'gag med pa'i ngo bor gnas// ma bcos bde chen
lhun gyis grub// ye shes thig le ngang la rdzogs// thabs kyi rgyal po rdo rje yis// gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa yi// drag po sngags kyi dmod pa gdams// kun tu bgrod pa gsum gyis sbyang// bde ba'i lam

can gzhan las min/ ye shes rig pa snang bar spyad// rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon phyung 'di// ma 'ongs dam ldan srung byed na// da yang dam las mi g.yel bsrung// 'chi bdag dregs pa stobs can kun// dam tshig
bka' yi 'khor lo srungs// e ma ho rig pa'i bka' rgyud 'di// bde ba'i lam can dag pa dang// ma bsgribs lam la gnas pa dang// 'chi bdag tshogs kyi dge 'dun kun// rig pa'i lam la zhugs pa
dang// 'chi bdag dregs pa myos pa dang// 'thoms pa'i tshogs dang khrag skyugs tshogs// phung byed mngag pa gdug pa'i tshogs// 'khor na gnas pa'i dam can kun// sangs rgyas bka' yi rgyud 'di

zung// gnyis med bgrod pa'i sa la gnas// rdo rje gtum po rdo rje'i tshogs// rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khrag 'thung dad// rdo rje gnod sbyin srin po dang// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang// dam la gnas shing ma

g.yel srungs// sangs rgyas bka' yi yon tan brjod mi lang// che ba'i yon tan gsum dang gcig tu ldan// khro bo'i snying po dregs pa ma mo drag po dang// bcu dang sum sgril rin chen phreng ba ltar// dam par

sbyar la gnyen po gcig tu bsgrub// dbang sdud phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin gzir// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho me dang 'dra// dregs pa stobs chen phyag rgya brtan byas la// snying po bcu gnyis rtsa ba gcig tu
dril// yan lag gang 'dod spu gri thems// gang rung sbyar na rin chen snying po 'bru// bstan pa gsum ldan bde ba gcig gi ngang// snying po bcu gnyis mi 'gyur thig le la// bsrung ba'i rgyal po

dmar len mtshon dang sbyar// gzir ba'i snying po gang yin mtshams su 'pho// rnam shes 'phrog pa 'bru gcig snying la bsdu// mtshon dpag dka' na skye med nam mkha' dbrog/ shes la rgyang ring sbyor ba'i tshad dang
ldan// 'bru brgyad rtsa ba gang dmigs spu grir ldan// 'dod pa'i don bzhi snying po gcad nas dbrog/ nyes la gnod byed mtshon cha rang gcod de// man ngag ldan pas bde bar spyad na rno// rang sems stobs
ldan ye shes rig pa'i rtsal// 'ching med grol bar thar pa'i lam mchog 'bras// de med rang 'ching mnar med sa la rings// thabs med spyod bral gdeng med bgrod ma thob// rtsa ba re dang yan lag brda' mi

sbyor// sun 'byin grol med 'ching ba'i gnas las bgrod// blo yengs che ba'i yon tan bsam mi lang// grol ba'i phyag rgya yang dag 'phags lam ldan// 'di de bde dang smin par byed pa'i mchog/ gu h+ya tsit+ta

so ma ha/ yaM baM raM laM tsA d+ha rI/ nA ga de wa rak+sha ma// ya ma ka yi bde ba'i klong// a dang khyab ho pu shu ta// ye shes rig pa'i klong du brdal// 'di dag bde ba'i lam can de// smin cing bgrod pa'i thabs mchog

rgyal// a yi ye shes las byung ba// skye med rnam dag chos skur gsal// e yi ye shes las byung ba// drag po sreg byed nam mkhar gsal// sangs rgyas skye ba'i cho 'phrul lo// bde ba'i lam can snying po kun
las 'das// nor bu gser ldan rin chen rgyal sa thob// bka' yi bden pa bde ba'i ngang la bzhag/ ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la/ 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ste mngon par bstod do// 'khor

de dag gis bden pa mthong bar gyur to// drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// dpal gshin rje'i rgyud khri drug stong pa nas/ drag po rno dbal
mtshon cha'i skabs bton pa'o// snying po man ngag gi rgyud rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI kro d+ha tsit+ta shang+ku gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po gdug pa gsum 'dul ba de la phyag

'tshal lo// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa'i tshogs// kun nas gus pas thal sbyar te// bde chen yab la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo

nyid// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// mtshams med las ngan kun spyod pas// nad dang gdon du rnam smin pa'i// sa yams drag po dz+wa la'i nad// 'gro ba yongs la khyab pa la// srung ba'i rim pa bshad du

gsol// de nas phyag rgya chen po yis// rdo rje snying po'i khro tshogs la// gsang tshig drag po'i dmod pa yis// bcud lnga'i snying po gso ba'i mchog/ 'khor la nges par bka' stsal to// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid

du// mtshams med las ngan kun spyod pas// mdze yams drag po nyam nga dar// nad ni rnam pa gsum yin te// spyi dang khyad par la sogs pa// sdom par gyur pa kun nyams dang// mtshams med nye ba'i rnam smin
pas// gnas ngan ltung ba'i rigs dag la// las kyi rnam smin nad 'byung ba'o// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa yis// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i// 'du ba smin pa'i nad 'byung ba'o// rigs dang rang

gi glang thabs las// rtsol ba byad kyi gtad khram dang// rang gi gnas su ma phyin log/ de lnga'i rkyen las byung ba'i nad// rkyen gyis bslang ba'i nad 'byung ba'o// de yi nad rigs bstan bya ba// sngags dang sman

gyi sbyor ba bsdebs// sngags la phan gnod ma tshor bar// sman gyi phan gnod che ba na// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad dar bas// 'tsho byed sman gyis bcos par bya// sngags rnams bzlas kyang phan gnod med// zas

la yang na phan gnod med// de ni rnam smin las yin pas// 'dus byas dge rtsa ci nus bya// sngags la phan gnod cher 'byung zhing// zas la phan gnod ma thon na// rkyen zlog sngags kyi sbyor ba bya// nad pa glu

la dga' ba dang// nub mo na nas snying mi dga'// lus la tsha ba'i khrag skyes pa// klu ya nad kyis zin pa'o// de la gdug pa'i nad dang dug/ rigs bzhi gdol pa kha 'khor gyi// 'jug pa nges pa'i tshad mas
brtag/ rgyal rigs mgo nas 'jug par byed// rje rigs lag pa g.yas la 'jug/ bram ze lag pa g.yon la 'jug/ dmangs rigs rkang pa g.yas la 'jug/ gdol pa rkang pa g.yon la 'jug/ kha 'khor

lus la khyab pa ste// drag sngags 'khor los dug rlangs gdon// lci 'thibs rgyal rigs sa yi dug/ grang ba bram ze chu yi dug/ tsha ba rje rigs me yi dug/ yang g.yo dmangs rigs rlung gi dug/ nad kyi mtshan
nyid ngo shes na// snying gzer 'khor lo gnyan por gdon// rtags med klu yi gdon gnod na// phyag rgya bsam gtan cho ga bya// kun nas zhugs par gyur pa la// yang gsang thugs kyi 'khor lo

bskor// rang bzhin drag po btsan thabs kyi// dug gsum nad dang zhen chags dbral// bsam gtan khrus kyi cho ga dang// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyin sreg bya// 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las/
sa yams kyi nad brtags pa'i le'u ste skabs dang po'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sa yams drag po'i nad de dag gi gnyen po/ drag sngags 'khor lo 'di dag gsungs so// rtsa ba lus kyi

snying po ni// shis la tshan che rno la myur// klad du che la rgyal po 'dra// spu gri du ma skabs kyis te// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze dang// dmangs dang gdol par gyur pa dang// ba su ta dang 'phye bo dang// rkang
gcig gel pa mgo mang dang// gdug pa che dang sa yams dang// lto 'phye 'thoms pa mgo dgu lnga// sa bdag sa srin gnyan gyi rigs// klu bdud klu srin la sogs pa// ma mo rgyal po btsan mdze 'dre// las
dang sbyor ba stobs kyis gcad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa gsum 'dul gyi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun// e ka he dun ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ sa nA

ga tsit+ta ri myags rbad/ khrag la myags ti yaM shag rbad/ dug phyung khrag shig tsit+ta rbad/ khaM shag thuM ril hril myags rbad/ tsa tri ma ma dbugs la thang gzer rbad/ sa nA ga rtsa la hur thuM rbad/ srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ sa

nA ga ma trag snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga tsa tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga du me snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga k+She tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga khaM shag snying

gzer rbad/ sa nA ga srog snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga thuM snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer dza/ sa nA ga snying gzer dug phyung nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta khas nan

rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer thun nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer du raM nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM bzlog nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la nan/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta myogs nan rbad/ sa nA ga

snying gzer thum ril nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsa la nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer ya nan 'drid nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer breng shag nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta khas nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer khrag thibs nan rbad// sa nA ga snying

gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer ti nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer u nan tan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer e nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la dun dun nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta thums nan
rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer du yaM bzlog nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer 'drid phyung nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la myogs nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer du

raM nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM bzlog nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsi la nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer u nan rbad/ sarba du raM a nan 'drid phyung snying gzer thuM ril shag rbad/ he sa ma ya thi pa ra ya sa nA

ga snying gzer sbur nan/ sa nA ga srog la dun dun shag/ sa nA ga tsit+ta thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga rtsa la rbad thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga du ma ling shag/ sa nA ga srog la hur thum ril shag/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur

nan thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga du me ma ma srog gzir rbad thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga tsa tri shu la gzir nan thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga nr-i tri yaM shig nan gzir thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga srog la breng shag thuM ril dun dun dza/ sa

nA ga snying gzer sarba u nan gzer phyung rbad/ sa nA ga du raM i dan 'drid phyung tsit+ta snying gzer thuM ril shag rbad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga duM ling thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga duM ling thuM ril shag

rbad/ sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha tham srog gzir sbur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags rbad/ khrag la myogs ti rbad/ srog la mugs ti rbad/ dug phyung khraM shing rbad/ sa nA ga dug phyung snying gzer

rbad/ sa nA ga ma trag snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga tsa tri snying gzer tsit+ta rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur 'drid phyung rbad/ sa nA ga khaM shag thuM ril hril myags rbad/ tsa tri ma ma

dbugs la thang gzer rbad/ rtsa la hur thum rbad/ srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ sa nA ga khraM la myogs ti rbad/ khaM shag thuM ril hril myogs rbad/ sa nA ga duM ling thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga rtsal rbad thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga

tsit+ta ro myag kha tham srog gzir sbur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga ma trag snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ro myags rbad/ du me maM srog gzir thuM ril shag tsa tri nA ga thuM
ril shag/ sa nA ga dza yaM gzir thuM ril shag rbad/ sa nA ga ro tri yaM shag gzir thuM ril shag/ 'jug pa nges par rab brtags la// drag sngags 'khrul 'khor re res gdon// rtags rnams 'khrugs sam kun

nas zhugs// shi phrad drag sngags bcu gcig pa// rno dbal mtshon cha'i drag sngags bsdeb/ sa nA ga rA dza/ bri du me srog la breng breng/ rtsa la dun dun sbyar nan khaM shag rbad/ sa nA' ga srog la breng breng dun dun thuM

ril nA ga dzaH/ sa nA ga srog la breng breng dza dza thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga srog la hur dun dun thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga tsit+ta thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga rtsa la rbad thuM ril shag/ sa nA' ga duM ling khas thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga
srog la thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga khaM nan thuM ril shag/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan thuM ril shag/ du me maM srog gzir thuM ril shag/ tsa tri shu la gzir nan thuM ril shag/ ro ni tri yang shig nan
gzir thuM ril shag/ drag sngags med dbal 'khor lo mtshon// gdug pa'i rang gshed rang gis 'bebs// 'khor lo me dbal mtshon chen gyis// bdag srung gzhan skyob bstan pa'i yul// yang gsang thugs
kyi sngags su bshad// 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sngags kyi le'u ste skabs gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po sngags kyi rten/ drag po rdzas kyi

'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// lho phyogs dur khrod ro sa dang// phung sa gsum la dug chus sbru// grub khung gru gsum sbag tu brtsig/ kha dog nag po rtsang gis bskor// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// dug khrag
tsha ba'i rdzas phyugs la// mkhas pas 'khor lo bri bar bya// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// 'khor lo bzhi gnyis bzhi gsum brtsig/ phyi rim lcags mkhar drug par
ldan// shi phrad kun 'joms bya ba yi// rgyal rigs 'joms pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa rim gsum dbus// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsa sbug dgu na snying po mchog/ rtsibs chen
bcu drug shi phrad sngags// rje rigs 'joms pa'i 'khor lor gsungs// mu khyud gsum la gru gsum dbus// phyi rim rgya gram rtsa ba'i lus// nyi shu gcig rtsibs phag mo'i ltor// bram ze'i klu gnyan 'joms
par bshad// mu khyud gsum la rus sbal ltor// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa sbug bdun// dmangs rigs 'joms pa'i 'khor lor bshad/ mu khyud gsum la gru gsum dbus// mu khyud bcu gnyis bcu bzhi
rtsibs// gdol pa'i rigs 'joms 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa 'bub gnas bzhi// rgya gram rtsa ba mtshams su gzugs// mu khyud zlum por gdug pa'i gzugs// phyi rol 'khrul mig bcu gcig
pa// yang gsang bcu gcig 'khor lor gsungs// phyi ma gdug pa'i ro ras sam/ rgya shog gro ga de dag la// gdug pa'i gzugs la sngags kyis bskor// 'khor lo kha sbyor thod par brub// ling+ga 'brub khung

gan rkyal gzhag/ nyung dkar dug khrag thun du brab// zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// drag po'i 'khor lo nyin mtshan bskor// bya rta mi yi tshil bu dang// khyi phag spyang ki'i rtug pa dang// mdzo rtol dre'u'i spu dang

ni// ra dug re lcag thar nu btsod// nya sbrul sbal pa'i sha dag dang// gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug/ mnol khrag myos pa'i khrag brlab cing// brtul zhugs rdzas dang mtshon cha'i dbal// las rdzogs 'khor
lo phag thod dam// sri can thod par rab brubs la// bka' rten byin can 'og tu gnan// gzhan yang gdug pa'i nad zug na// bsku dang byug pa'i sbyor ba ni// spyang dug tsher ma gla chu dang// spod

dang tsha sna btsod khu dang// ra dug long rtol gu gul dang// ka ra bi ra dri chen dang// ga bur tsan dan dkar chu dag/ mu zi dri chen ldang ros dang// ti tsa mar dkar ba bla dang// gu gul ra dug ra gzhob

bsku// ra tshwa rgya tshwa kha ru tshwa// ra dug ba spru dri chen dang// ga bur gur gum ba bla bsku// sha ro ldang ros dbyi mo tshwa// dur byid sna tshogs thabs kyis sbyar// dug dang mu zi skar chu bsku// byug dang bsku ba'i rim

pa'o// gla rtsi sgog skya sha chen dang// dri chu dang ni zil pa la// brtag pa gsum byas sngags bzlas la// khong du btang bar yang dag bshad// 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gyi gsang rgyud las/ rdzas dang 'khor
lo'i le'u ste skabs gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po zil gnon 'di gsungs so// thog mar shes rab rtsal rig la// stong nyid snying rje'i rang bzhin las// skye
'gag med pa'i ye shes gsal// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dkar dbus mthing rngams// 'khor lo rdo rje ral gri dang// be con gtun shing sdig mdzub 'bar// rigs lnga'i
dbu rgyan dpal chas brgyad// phyi nang srog gshed sprul pa dang// sgrol byed yum dang bcas gsal bas// sa bdag klu dang gnyan dag gi/ snying ga la sogs sngags 'phros pas// gdug pa can gyi lto dkrugs
te// srog dang rnam par shes pa kun// thod pa'i 'khrul 'khor chen por 'chang// 'khor lo yig 'bru me dbal dang// chu rgod skyin thang rlung nag 'khrugs// ri rab mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yis// rigs bzhi'i

dug rnams 'joms par byed// gdug pa sgrol ba'i 'khor lor bshad// rnam smin tha mal lus nyid kyi// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo la// dbus su ye shes chos kyi sku// phyag rgya zil gnon gsal ba yi// sngags

kyi 'od zer mtshon cha'i dbal// 'phros pas dbugs kyi rtsa ded nas// dngas ma'i rtsa dang rtsa bran dang// sha dang pags pa rus mig nas// nad dang dug rlangs kun ded nas// ba spu'i bu ga la sogs nas// sngo
dmar du ba'i mdog lta bu// 'thon par bsams shing shes pa gdon// rnam smin gzhan gyi lus dag la// sngags kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// ba spu'i bu ga dgur thim nas// sngags kyi dbugs kyis nad zhi

nas// zla gsal mun pa sel ba ltar// ye shes 'od kyi gong bur bsam// myos pa'i khrag dang mtshon cha dug/ drag po rdzas kyi du ba yis// klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag dang// ma mo rgyal po btsan the'u brang// klu
bdud mo dang dam sri dang// sdong zlar gyur pa la sogs pa// rang rang gnas nas srog 'phrog ste// myos te 'khrul 'khor lto bar bca'// bsam gtan sems kyi 'khor lor bshad// 'jam

dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang sdud 'khor lor bstan pa'i le'u ste skabs bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan bum pa'i cho ga dang/ phyag rgya chen po sbyin sreg
gi cho ga 'di gsungs so// maN+Dal dri dang me tog mdzes// rin chen bum par rin chen bcud// 'bru dang sman tshogs dri dang ldan// gtsang ma gza' skar can gyi chu// kha rgyan mgul chings rab ldan

bsham// sngags pas zil gnon skur bsgom lo// thugs kyi snying po 'phros 'dus las// bum par phyag rgya'i lha tshogs bsam// drag sngags brgya bzlas bstim zhing bzhu// ye shes chu dang sngags kyi zer// spro
zhing sprul pas zhen chags sbyong// bsam gtan bsrung ba'i spyod pa bshad// snying la phyag rgya gsal ba yis// gsang sngags gsal bas rtsa rgyud dag/ ye shes gong bur rab gsal ba// zla gsal 'khor lo'i
srung bar bshad// rnam rtog bag chags sprin lta bu// nam mkha' lta bur 'dzin med na// bsam gtan sems kyi srung bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag rgya sems kyi bsam gtan gyi sngags 'di

gsungs so// sarba tsit+ta ro myags kha thaM srog gzir spur nan 'drid phyung hri shag rbad/ kha chings rgyal po gsang ba'i mchog/ bsam gtan 'phrul gyi srung bar bshad// phung sa gsum gyi thab khung ni// kha khyer

gsum pa gru gsum brtsig/ kha dog nag pos byug pa'i dbus// sna tshogs rdo rje ljang gu mdzes// gang gnod sa gnas rdzas rnams la// gdug pa gsum dang sdong zla bri// snying ga gdug cing rab tu gces// ming

rus gro ga sen gang ba// dug gi ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad// mi rta khyi dang gdug pa'i sha/ dug gsum tshil gsum gi hang bcas// til dang yungs nag tsha ba gsum// mar khu 'o ma sme ba'i khrag/ nyung dkar rdo phye

lcags zangs phye// bsreg rdzas rdzogs dang rnal 'byor bya// thab khung raM las me lhar bskyed// thugs kar phyag rgya'i lha gsal bar// rdzas dang ling+ga dbul bar bya// pho nya gtang zhing gdab pa dang// drag sngags

bzlas shing bsreg par bsam// sa nA ga du raM nA ga u nan gzer phyung srog la du raM/ tsit+ta breng shag thuM rbad e raM/ sa nA ga snying gzer du raM e nan 'drid phyung/ sa nA ga tsit+ta thuM ril rbad/ dz+wa la raM mA ra ya phaT
phaT/ ces pas gdug pa bsreg par bshad/ thal ba gnon cing gzer bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// nyon cig khro bo rol pa'i tshogs// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin dag/ sbyor
ba rnam pa gsum gyi bsdeb// bsdeb dang rkyang pa nyams kyis brtag/ bsdeb na rtsa ba'i snying po la// spu gri mtshon gyis snol mar bsdeb// bag chags zhen pa khrus kyis sbyang// gdug rtsub sbyor ba me
yis bsreg/ las dang sbyor ba thun gyis bzlog/ 'byung ba 'khrugs pa sman gyis bcos// zhes gsungs te 'khor la gdams so// 'jam dpal khro bo snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud las/ bkru ba dang sreg pa'i

sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste skabs lnga pa'o//// snying gzer gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// phra rgyud drug cu rtsa gcig/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gshin rje 'bum sde rnam par bkod pa las/ gdug
pa klu 'dul byed le'u bkol pa'o// bal po'i rgyal po ba su d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba spu ngan sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/// rgyud 'di dpe gcig las bsdur sa ma rnyed///

rgya gar skad du/ sarba bi nA sha tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ drag po phung byed kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dregs pa chen po nar girti la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri ka ri ka bya rkang

phug ron zangs phug zhes bya ba na/ dregs pa lha'i bdag po kha the nag po zhes bya ba/ mu stegs rnam bzhi gdul ba'i don ched du/ dka' thub sbyin spong mdzad pa la/ gdug pa klu gnyan mang po'i sgra sgrog pa byung

yang/ yid chags shing g.yo ba med de/ ka ri ka'i bla thad rnams nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ rdo rje'i brkyang phyag btsal te/ mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ e ma'o// dregs pa chen po lha yi gtso// thabs la

mkhas pa'i thugs rje can// dregs pa chen po'i bka' bzhin bgyid// ces smras so// de nas de ma thag tu bdud gcod byed nag pos/ drag po mtshon cha'i char 'di phab po// trag rak+sha kha la yaM shud/ snying la

'dus 'dus/ pra tsa la pra tsa la 'ub tsika 'ub tsika phaT/ ces mtshon cha'i char 'di phab ste 'di skad ces gsungs so// drag po phung ba 'di bzlas kyis ma sdangs khyed rnams thams cad kyang/ deng 'dir las
rnams bka' bzhin gyis/ zhes gsungs te mi snang bar gyur to/ drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// dregs pa'i
bdag po lha bdag po// rdzu 'phrul bdag po mthu stobs ldan// thog ser drag sngags rnam pa gnyis// lung bstan pa ni gsum yin te// drag po dbab pa ji ltar lags// rdzas la brten pa ji ltar

dbab// ser ba'i rdzas rnams ji ltar lags// rten pa'i ling+ga ji ltar bca'// dregs pa chen pos bka' stsal pa// drag po dbab pa gnyis yin te// ri gsum rtse 'dus srin gyi dbyibs// de ni nga rgyal bdud kyi
gnas// sngags sgo yan pa bdud srin gnod sbyin bsngags// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa/ skra shad skud pa sum bsgril la// tsa ra rog po'i srog rtsar gdags// zhag gsum bsgrubs nas tsa ra

gnyis// dar gyis mgo phur phyogs su bskyal// sngags kyi nan tan skud pa la// ling+ga sngags kyis bskor ba bri// sum bsgril gsang sgo yin zhes bshad// ra ra tsa shu ti pa tsa ka tsa la mi ma tsa la/ rak+sha dz+wa la rak+sha

dz+wa la/ tra yaM du shan shang ka du shang du/ rak+sha srin gyis mu rus khas rbad/ drag po thog bsgrub 'di yis ni// las rnams 'grub par nga yis ba shad// mkhar la phyi phyir yul lha dpang// srog chags rnams la bya
ba'i phyir// srog lha dgra lha dpang du gzug/ de bzhin rdzas la brten byas te// rabs chad nag po'i me long g.yon// gser dngul ra gan 'khar ba zhing// bcu gnyis bdun no man chad yin// dum bu gsum

pa'i nang du bsreg/ ling+ga gang la 'dod pa'i dbyibs// rdzas chen pos ni brab cing dgug/ sngags kyi nan tan shes par bya// drag ser 'dod pa 'di ltar bya// thab ni thod pa sum skyed btsug/ chu mig dkar po
can ni bsgrub pa'i gnas// bshan ma zor thogs ma bzhi dgug/ rdzas ni chu mig rka mang mgo ru bskyal// thog ser ji ltar 'dod pa yi// las rnams 'grub par bcol ba'i phyir// bram ze nag po mchod par

bya// dgug pa snying po'i sngags kyis bya// gnod sbyin lag [×]na pho so rnon pa dmar po yis// sngags kyi dam tshig 'di brjod do// rnal 'byor chen po skal ldan gtso// las dang skal par ldan pa yis// gdeng

tshugs rA hu la la bya// de min gyis ni bya ba min// byang nas lho ni gsang chog yin// zhes gsungs te// dam tshig 'di gsungs so// ma mo gnod sbyin thams cad kyi mthu dang byin gyis rlabs kyis// ji ltar

'dod pa ltar du grub par gyur cig/ ces nas 'di gsungs so// na mo ru tra ya/ mi hri hi ri bri sha du/ kA la tsa ba la ti ti li ling shar/ mdzer ta ba ho/ si ri sha ri bar ka ti/ kruM pa ting/ rak+sha kri ba ta ya/ ta ra

tsa ta ra tsa/ i ra tse i ra tse/ pa si ra/ sha laM pho ka ra/ dum shan tri du nan du du ra rbad/ kA la rU pa tsa 'dar chums chums/ srin gyi bya ra sad swA hA/ zhes pas gnod sbyin pho mo la sogs pa la mgrin gcig tu
smras nas 'dod do// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las thog ser dbab pa dang/ drag po phung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// dregs pa'i bdag po lha bdag

gtso// srid pa sgyur byed phrin las gang// sa bslang dbab pa de bzhin bsgrub// de yi rdzas rnams ji ltar bsog/ dregs bdag lha yis bka' stsal pa// srid pa sgyur byed 'khor lo la// las kyi ma mo thams cad
rdzogs// 'bras bu thams cad bcud len ma// lo nad rims kyi mnga' bdag mo// de yi dkyil 'khor 'di ltar bya// dug sna tshang bar bsogs byas te// gtsor ni mu zi nag pos bya// de yi phyogs bzhir khru re
brko// rus sbal pho khog nag po la// de bzhin yab yum snying po bri// gling bzhi ri rab mdangs kyis brgyan// phyag dang dar gyi gur phub bzhag/ 'dzam gling nyi ma dgu 'bum bstod pa bya// zhes gsungs

so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ sa bslang dbab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// maN+Dal cha bsnyams yid 'ong la// rtsa ba lnga yi lde gus byug/ dbus su mthing

nag gru gsum bya// zur gsum logs la shes par bya// dbus ma gru gsum rtse mo ru// ming dang mtshan dang rten rnams ni// ga gon gsum las shes par bya// sman gyis gso dang rten du bya// ling+ga nang la gdod

pa'i dbyings// ga gon nang du gzhug par bya// mtshan ni sum stong nyung dkar la// drag po'i rdzas su bsgrub par bya// gnad la dbab cing cho 'phrul bstan// drag po'i ltas ngan sna tshogs sogs// dam tshig drag

po'i chad byung tshe// 'bras bu sna tshogs me tog rtsa ba lnga// rma bya'i rgyal mtshan ru dar dang// de bzhin mtshan ldan bam gyis bskang// rdzas rnams longs spyod 'khor la 'byug/ gzhan dbang de bzhin mi 'gyur
ro// de bzhin bcings dang cho 'phrul 'byung// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ sngags srung nag mo'i yon tan phung bzlog gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to// srin mo phung ba 'di ltar bzlog/ gru gsum mthing nag dbus su spyad// gru gsum rtse mor thod skam gzhag/ rtsa ra urda'i sdig bshags te// sngags dang ling+ga sprad par bya// gshegs kyi khar bcug sngo

dmar bcing// ri nag rtsa gcig khyung du gnas// srin mo bdud kyi sngags kyis bya// dur dur sha la mu tra heb heb/ dun sha khrag khrig khrag la yA/ rnal ma rnal te gsod la rngam// sris la mer mer chums rbad dza
dza/ de bzhin drag po 'di yis bzlog/ ces gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ srin mo phung bzlog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thams cad bsgrub par bya
ba'i phyir// thab thob nag mo 'di ltar bca'// dur khrod thod pa mtshan ngan la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i ling+ga bca'// sme ba gsum gyi snying khrag dang// dug sna tshang mngar bsog par bya// dkar po

gsum gyi sgyed pu gzug/ tshes bzhi'i bsnur smad man chad nag/ zla ba zer ka yan chad du// drag po'i shing la me spar te// drag po ji ltar 'dod par bsreg/ thod pa phyogs su gril nas kyang// bsnyen dang

dbang bskur sngags kyis bya// bsnyen thun nyid ni rdzas dang bya// ces gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las snying thun zor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag
po'i dmar nag gru gsum la// dbus su du rti'i thod pa gzhug/ mu zi nag po gtsor byas te// dug sna tshang pa bsog par bya// gtsor ni me yi zil pas bya// gzhan yang khrag sna tshang bar bsog/ dme ba rog

po'i snying dang grod// snying ni kham phor nang du gzhug/ grod par mthun pa'i rdzas rnams blug/ dbang bskur sngags kyis bsgrub par bya// drag drag gur len ser ser tub tub/ e be sha tra be sha/ ru be sha kha thun

b+h+yo/ sa thaM sa thaM/ shog thaM shog thaM/ baM mugs thaM mugs/ ni tiSh+ta dza la kha'i/ dang po gsum gyi sngags kyis bsgrub// gdong pa rdzas kyi 'khor lo gzhag/ bdun dgus ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub// dal yams chen po
yod par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ ma mo phung gsum me'i drag po phung bzlog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'bras bu nag po'i rdzas

rnams dang// nag po mthun pa'i sa blangs te// sme ba nag po'i khrag dang bsres// mthun pa tsit+ta gtang bar bya/ gang la mthun pa'i ling+ga bya// mi rus tha ltag khrag gis bris// trag bdun gyis ni bskor bar

bri// shing shun ka ro ka la bri// gru gsum byas la lha mo'i 'og/ de ltar mthun pa'i rdzas rnams la// lha mo'i ling+ga khru gang ngo// g.yas su bu ba nag po la// dad pa'i snying po bri bar bya// g.yon du drag po'i phur pa

la// bsad pa'i sngags dang bcas pa bskur// snying gar bod pa'i snying po bri// mdog nag mo yi cha byad do// bcu gcig nang par sbyin bsreg bya// rdzas dang bsreg pa'i lha mo yi// bod rbad bsad pas bsgrubs
gyur na// drag pos bsad dang phur bzlog 'gyur// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ re ma ti phung bzlog gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas nag mo phung gsum ma// dug sbrul nag mo'i bsad pa 'di gsungs

so// dug gi khu bas sbrul nag bri/ ling+ga de bzhin bri bar bya// bsad na mgo bo yan lag kha// na na rkang pa g.yas pa bri// smyo na rtsibs logs g.yon pa bri'o// ling+ga drag sngags 'di yis bskor// oM bab Tu Tu

ma rab huM d+ha nA/ 'brub khung nang du gsad par bya// sgrub pa'i snying po 'di yis bya// hUM tsit+ta rak+sha/ smri ta rag mo ni sha dun te kha la/ rag mo dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dun ti hUM b+h+yo/ mA ra ya rbad/ bsad pa gsum

gyi nyi shu pa// mnan na rabs chad thod nag go/ bsad na gsum gyi sbyin bsreg go/ oM sa man mung nyung kha yul te/ sde shig sde shig graM yal graM yal ni swA hA/ zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/
dug sbrul nag pos gsad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gdug byed bdud kyis 'di ltar bsgrub// gang yang rung ba'i gzhi mo la// nub nas shar du kha bltas
te// baM se nag po'i rdzas rnams dang// mthun pa'i rdzas chen sngon gtor la// sman rnams gu gul dkar nag dang// ka chen gtor ma byas nas ni// dum bu bzhi pa'i nang du bsreg/ bstod mchod drag po 'di
yis dbab// rdzas chen 'di yis rbad par bya// dus ni nyi ma bzang zer ro// drag po'i zer chen 'di ltar ro// shin tu drag po'i snod nang du// phrin las bzhi yi dkyil 'khor bri// bdun la zhi ba srin la

dbab// de bzhin phyogs cha shes par bya// nang du yak+sha me dbal dgod// lho byang gnyis su snying po bri// dbus su gdug pa'i snying po bri// gsum gyi bar du ming rus bri// dbang la de bzhin ling+ga bri// drag po'i

sngags kyis bsgrub par bya// thod pa dum mang mtshan ngan du// phyir ni sol chen lang khun byug/ nang du drag po bri bar bya// sme ba'i khrag rnams gsog par bya// mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bya rnams la// sbrul lam

sbal pa'i snying khrag bsog/ sngo dmar bal gyis kha gcad la// drag sngags 'di yis brdeg par bya// trag rag mo hril shad ser hril shar b+h+yo/ oM ba sha mi ki du ru ma shig ki dz+wa la hi/ yaM a tsi te swA hA/ brgyab

ste thod par gnan par bya// thun ni g.yas sam phyogs su brdeg/ cho 'phrul ji ltar 'dod pa 'byung// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las phrin las cho 'phrul gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas

yang mi rgod cho 'phrul 'di gsungs so// drag po'i rdzas rnams 'di ltar bsog/ ya tsa dkar po'i lcags rnams dang// bya las byung ba'i zil pa dang// me yi zil pa rdo dang lcags// sbar ba lag tu blangs nas
ni// mthun pas de bzhin sa bon dbyung// de bzhin rdzas mthun bsreg par bya// gsur chen sol bas rdzas de zhib tu btags// ga gon nag po bsgrub pa'i rdzas// me 'od dkar po gru gsum bri// de bzhin

rdzas rnams blug par bya// sgrub pa de bzhin ya tsa la// rdzas kyi dbang bskur gshed chen gdags// mnga' bdag gtsug phud can la bstod// de bzhin drag po'i cha byad bya// skyed shing srog shing drag po'i shing
rnams la// rtse gsum pa yi gri gug brdeg/ sngags kyis sbar bar bya ba yin// zhes drag sngags 'di gsungs so// smar ma smas tsar du na raM tsa ga ri ma la ma du na yaM/ shing raM du ru ra tsa ga laM/

zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ drag po stag hom gyi rgyud kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i nad rigs bco brgyad la// bcos par byed pa
'di rnams yin// gzhan gyi dbang gis gcod par bya// de ni yan lag 'khum par 'gyur// gzhan yang nal la nyes gyur na// rigs ngan dag gis zin pa ni// kha mig yo dang yan lag 'khum// me dbal drag

po thor pa 'byung// sha bkra can rnams bcos par bya// phol lam 'bras ltar gyur pa la// cig par skye shi de ltar brjod// de rnams bcos pa 'di ltar bya// dam tshig bsgrub pa byas nas ni// ka ro ka yam ro

rnams la// sbrul mgo dgu'am bdun pa dang// lnga pa gsum pa de bzhin bri// gzhan yang longs spyod sna tshogs bri// shing sna tshang ba bsog par bya// 'bras dang mtshal dang sna tshogs sman// de bzhin gzhan yang
bsag par bya// glang bu dmar khra zal dmar ram// gzhan yang zal chags dag la ni// mdangs ldan brgya yis rwa la brgyan// rgya long me long dpral bar gdags// dar sna tshang ba rwa la brgyan// bris pa'i
longs spyod de dag gis// las kyi 'khor lo nag mo la// de bzhin mchod dang bstod pa bya// rten 'brel sngags kyis yang dag dgug/ de nyid bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan// glang ma'am ni mo rigs

shing// brgya'am brgyad la rten mchan bri// de bzhin glang la bskyon par bya// zhag bdun nang par phyogs ngan bskor// de bzhin ming byang bkru bar bya// sus ma tshor bar khyim du gzhug/ mkha' lding rgyal pos
dbang bskor ro// rten 'brel drag po'i sngags chus bkru// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ 'khor lo rten 'brel gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dam tshig gi sngags 'di

gsungs so// chu sbrul thang sbrul gdug pa yi// khrag skam nyungs dkar gu gul nag po yis// ming bri bdug dang brdeg par bya// de bzhin gdug pa'i gsob tu gzhug/ chu mig nang du gzhug par bya// rtsa ba'i

sngags kyis nan tan bya// sgrub pa drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas// dung dung breng breng/ shal yaM/ sho 'ub byed/ sbugs longs/ srog chod rtsal 'dus 'dus/ snying sha srog la rbad rbad/ ya ya rnal ma rnal ma tri dza/

snying la gyur 'dus rbad nr-i dza/ zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ drag po phung bzlog gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i dmu rdo 'di ltar
'phang// rdo ba smin pa'i nag gru bzhi// lcags dang 'khar ba dpung rus mgo/ drag po'i snod du bsog par bya// thal bas kha bcad rang gi 'og/ sngags srung nag mo'i dgug sngags
kyis// dgu'am bcu gcig bsgrub gyur na// de nyid 'phar dang ldeg par 'gyur// kha dog tshang ba'i 'bi 'bir bzhugs// drag sngags 'di yis gdab par bya// trag traM rak+sha dral rtsir ni ya bral/ ma ma

trag bral/ trag rak+sha/ nr-i ma choM choM phob/ 'ub 'ub bir ba shig shig/ bir ba nag po de la ma// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ga gon nang du ling+ga gzhug/ drag po 'di yis gzir bar bya// dug sna tshang ba

bsogs byas te// brab pa ga gon nyid la'o// bsreg pa dam tshig klu yi sngags// chu mig ngo ru bsreg par bya// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ dmu rdo dbab pa dang/ klu'i drag sngags kyi le'u

ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khwa'am shwa na'i kha nang du// drag po'i sngags kyis gnan par bya// stag sbyangs las la mngags pa yin// mthun pa'i ling+ga dug gis bri// khyi bya

kha khrid ming dang spel// de bzhin ka ko'i gzugs byas la// stag sbyangs las la btang ba'o// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ stag sbyangs las la btang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de

nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal ni drag pos gsad pa'i phyir// lha klu mi gnas pa nyid du/ drag po'i tsher ma bsog par bya// gzhung dang mthun par dkyil 'khor bri// dgra bo'i ling+ga bri bar

bya// phur rtsang nyi shu rtsa gcig la// gu gul nag po'i mar gyis byug/ de bzhin bsreg khang nang du gzhug/ g.yas su me dang g.yon du mtshon// ag ni me yi mnga' bdag la// chu phud chang phud a mr-itas// mchod

pa byas la g.yas g.yon gtor// de bzhin mtshon chen brdeg par bya// oM a ka ni raM/ oM tsit+ta shag raM/ ti pa ri/ shag raM/ yaM raM yaM raM/ ma ke na ri/ he la he/ shu raM/ ma raM ma raM/ de bzhin du ni bsreg par
bya// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ drag po hom nag gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drag po'i sngags 'di la yang gnyis te/ drag po'i dmag
sngags bzlog pa'i phyir// yak+sha me dbal bri bar bya// rtse gsum pa la btags nas kyang// dmag dpon chen por dbang bskur te// yak+sha me dbal nyid kyi sngags// bdud kyi rdzas la bsgrubs te rbad// de

bzhin thum po byas nas ni// skra dang sor mo du ru blugs// de bzhin lus bsrung bya ba ni/ oM hUM yaM ma lte ba spyi// g.yas su nga rgyal nga bris te// g.yon du ma dang trang gnyis bri// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung
byed kyi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin nyi ma mig dmar gyis/ lha min gyi g.yul bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha min g.yul ngo bzlog pa'i
phyir// drag po sngags kyi thun nag 'di// las kyi 'khor lo nyid la bca'// maN+Dal mda' gang 'phangs su mnyam// las kyi 'khor lo dbus su dgod// sngags srung nag mo la sogs rdzogs// sngags rnams so

sos de bzhin bsgrub// g.yas su las kyi 'khor lo bri// ming rus hri yi bar du gzhug/ g.yon du pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// k+ShoM hri'i bar du ming rus gzhug/ de bzhin kha sprod so so'i sngags kyis dbye// rdzas ni gu

gul dkar nag dang// mo zhabs pa ru bsregs pa yi// ling+ga lam chen mdo ru sba// zhes gsungs so// drag po phung byed kyi rgyud las/ lha dang nang dbye ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// yang mgrin gcig tu
'di skad ces gsol to// drag po phung ba'i las ni gang// mi snang rkang mgyogs gang gis 'grub// gcan gzan kha 'ching gnod pa ji ltar bsal// zhes zhus nas 'khod do// de nas dregs pa'i bdag pos

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phrin las rnams ni 'di ltar bya// zhing la ri bong za ba dang// gang yang rung ste ri dwags rnams// rdzas la brten te dkar rtsis bskor// shing tog kha dog nyi shu gcig/ kha 'ching
